story:
If you're like us, your pets are part of your family. Making sure your furry family members have everything they need to thrive is just part of loving them every day.  

Enter Pebby: a smart collar and ball system that gives you access to monitor and entertain your pet from anywhere your cell phone can go.

 

 

 

 

The Pebby pack comes complete with the Pebby™ Ball (with your choice of EASYfix™ magnetic caps so you can customize the look of your Pebby) , PebbyKennel™ charging dock, PebbyCollar™ motion sensor collar,  and, of course, the Pebby app, free to download off iTunes or GooglePlay store.

Pebby is a ball on mission to keep you and your pet together even when you’re not physically there.  Using Wi-Fi and Bluetooth technology, the Pebby system’s remote controlled ball allows owners to watch, interact, and capture their pet’s cutest moments in real time. A wide-angle fisheye lens feature gives you an optimal view of all the cute things you might have missed while you were away, as well as records, snaps, and shares images and video at the touch of a button.

Time to get back to work? Turn on the Auto-Play function and let Pebby go wild, entertaining Rover while you get back to business. Cats can also play with a specially designed pet and human safe laser, which, as you know, is irresistible for every kitty worth his whiskers!

 

No time to play with your pet? No problem! With the Auto-Play mode, you can simply turn it on and let Pebby go crazy to give your pets a fun, active and entertaining time! And not forgetting all the cat lovers out there, we have specifically designed a pet (and human) safe built in laser to make our feline friends go nuts. Watch the snippet of our Kickstarter video below to see Pebby's built-in laser in action!

No matter where you are in the world, your phone will receive Bark and Nudge Alert notifications to let you know when your pet is itching to play with Pebby. Ready for fun before they are? The 2-way audio and mic system lets you send a “woof,” “meow,” or pre-recorded message of your voice through your phone and get a response in return. Who’s a good boy? Your pup knows!

 

 

With thick shatterproof, replaceable PolyCarbonate casing and our special SHOCK™ suspension system, Pebby is play-proof even with the most rowdy dogs and cats. Pebby is also waterproof, so it’s still safe if it gets bounced into the water bowl.

 

 

 

 

Are you a pet fashionista? Get the look you want with our EASYfix™ magnetic caps. You can customize your Pebby smart ball with an array of different colors and patterns. There are more designs on the way, so your pet will have the latest look for his favorite interactive toy. Refer to Design & Colors section below to view currently available options that you can choose from.

 

Your Pebby ball can be charged anytime - even if you're not home! Just drive it into it's PebbyKennel™ and you'll be playing again in no time.

 

 

Featuring PebbyKennel™: Intelligent, remote self-docking allows wireless charging even if you’re not around. Fast charging, with power status alerts and a long battery life, your pet playtime won't be cut short.  Simply drive the ball near the charging dock and let the auto-align function lock it in! You'll be back to playing in no time!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our PebbyCollar™ motion sensor syncs with the smart ball and tracks your pet’s activities all day! Using our special technology, you can keep tabs on your fur baby's mobility and activity levels, giving you peace of mind, even when you're not home. 

 

The Pebby app is free to download from iTunes or GooglePlay and allows you to easily live stream video and control all the functions of the Pebby smart ball from virtually anywhere you have access to Internet on your smartphone. The intuitive app interface is easy to use live or in auto-play mode. Tap the cat or dog icon to send your pets a “woof,” or “meow,” sound, as well as hear their reply as you play! You can literally call your pet and hear how they're doing!

 

Not only does Pebby live stream video of your pet playing, you can snap pictures and record videos at the same time. Share your favorite cute moments with your friends and family on social media via the media Gallery board included as part of your free app.

 

Our built-in powerful LED Headlights lets you navigate Pebby even in dark or dimly lit rooms so playtime never stops!

 

 

  

 

 

Designed to inspire curiosity, creativity, and invention through connected play and coding, Pebby is far more than just a robot. Powered by the latest Intel Edison computing module and supported by a huge developer forum, developers now have the ability to program and integrate their own algorithms into Pebby. 

The Pebby Team will provide an API and programming guidebooks upon request to anyone who wants to go about learning how to program and develop their very own interactive algorithms or even a new App for your phone. Bring your ideas to life with Pebby!

Contact us to learn more about how you can program your own Pebby!

 

Team Pebby Research and Development Facility

 

Don't forget to pick your favorite Pebby design! Backers who have opted into the early bird special or reward that includes a unit will get their choice of the below options!

Choose from a variety of colors and designs: 

 *Backers will be able to select their color/design when the Pebby team contacts them after the campaign to confirm their order details.

  Soy the Chiweenie meets Pebby

Catch those lasers!!

Sybo Tech Singapore is a company that prototypes and manufactures pet related smart electronic gadgets with operations in San Francisco and Singapore. The focus of Sybo Tech Singapore is to establish itself as the leading and premier brand for smart pet products. The team behind Sybo Tech Singapore aims to solve real world problems faced by pet parents and their pets through IoT (Internet of Things) innovations. 

THANKS to all our Pebby Partners 

Pebby could not have been possible without their help and support! 

How long does it last? Does it have a warranty?
With interchangeable inner and outer caps, you can always upkeep the condition of Pebby after your pets have played with it. Pebby comes with 1 year limited warranty with a simple return policy should there be a manufacturing defect.

Do you ship internationally?
Yes, we ship the Pebby Package internationally! A follow up email will be sent to confirm your shipping address once campaign ends.

What can Pebby do?
In short, Pebby is a robotic ball that can be driven from the mobile app. It has in-built camera, laser, audio functions and can auto-play with your pets. Additionally with the Pebby collar you can track your pet's activity.

How long does the battery last?
PebbyBall: 1.5hrs of optimal playtime and 12hrs on idle mode. When Pebby is awake but not in use, it automatically goes into idle mode, saving battery power consumption.
PebbyCollar™: A single charge of the collar can last between 8-12 days.

Is it water resistant?
Yes. Simple splashes and dips in water bowl will not affect Pebby's functionality.

Can Pebby work on carpets or just flat surfaces?
Pebby works  on both carpets and flat surfaces.

How to purchase an extra set of PebbyCollarTM & Inner and Outer PC caps
Simply make a purchase for the SmartCollar and Caps going at $39 and $15 respectively.

Can this be used for cats and dogs?
Pebby was made for both cats and dogs. The in-built laser was specifically designed with cats in mind!

Can't find your answers from the FAQ above or wish to place a large order?
Please contact us at hello@getpebby.com and we will reply to all inquiries within 48hrs .

story:
Pre-order your ryfi today!

Lock in a 25% discount and receive your ryfi before the end of March - right around spring break time!

Not ready to pre-order yet?  Share your email with us and we'll keep you updated about ryfi as we approach our launch date.  We'll be sure to find a way to thank our early fans (although pre-ordering is the way to get your best discount!).

ryfi is the world's first router that helps parents track homework and chores.

Now your kids can focus on critical tasks like homework and chores before indulging in sedentary screen time. ryfi™ will notify you when their tasks are done, and allow you to track rewards for them including internet time. Designed by parents for parents.

Ensure bedtime means your kids are getting their sleep.

Our kids don't always like bedtime, but as parents we understand how important quality sleep it is for our kids' healthy development.  These days, online screen time presents one of the greatest distractions to our kids at bedtime.  Use ryfi to easily set up a bedtime schedule for each of your kids.  Feel confident that bedtime means your kids and their devices are both asleep.

 

ryfi is an internet router and an app that work together to allow parents to manage their kids' online screen time.  Want dinner to be device and distraction free?  Set a schedule to turn ryfi off everyday when it's time to eat.  Need those devices down right away?  A single tap turns ryfi off immediately.  

ryfi will help you to help your kids unplug and enjoy healthy time away from the internet.  More time playing outside, quality time focused on school work and - best of all - kids who are present and in the moment with you during family time, not buried online.

Quality family time and healthier kids are at your fingertips.

 

ryfi™ comes with a 100% money-back guarantee!

We're confident you'll love ryfi as much as we do.   If for any reason you don't, return it for a full refund of the purchase price. No questions asked.

ryfi™ vs the Competition

There are a lot of devices that claim to solve your screen time problems, but none of them can do the job of what a ryfi unit can do. We are the only device designed to reduce screen time and we are the easiest to use. Its that simple. 

"We’ve been using ryfi for the last few months and it has been a dream come true! When I say they can have 20 minutes of iPad time after finishing chores, I no longer have to follow-up or manage it personally. It’s a huge time-saver!"

- Kim, Elementary Teacher, Los Angeles County School District

"As a lifelong educator, I'm a big advocate for less screen time and more quality family time. Parents need tools like ryfi to keep up with the explosion of devices their kids have access to. I have a ryfi for my grandkids and see first-hand how helpful it is."

- Richard, Grandfather of 14, Retired Principal of 20 years

 

Enjoy family time without device distractions.

Family time is increasingly precious these days.  With ryfi, enjoy a device-free dinner or some quality time catching up with your kids after getting home from school.  Set a timer to turn ryfi off for a bit or simply switch off ryfi on demand so you don't miss those opportunities for quality family time when they pop up.

 

 

ryfi™ has been tested with many different internet service providers, modems/routers, connected home devices, mobile phones and tablets, desktops, laptops and gaming consoles.  Unlike some other parental routers, ryfi does not use any invasive technology.

(In technical jargon, ryfi is a customized wireless access point. It does not use ARP spoofing, a technique known to destabilize networks.)

 

Manage ryfi from anywhere. ryfi even responds to text messages!

You can't always be home when your kids are.  It's one of today's challenges as a parent, and we get it.  Using the ryfi mobile app, you can manage your kids' internet time at home wherever you are.  ryfi even knows how to respond to text messages.  When opening the app isn't convenient, send ryfi a short text message and ryfi will text you back with confirmation and an update on its status.

 

ryfi is the easiest parental router to use - it sets up in less than a minute.

ryfi was designed to be setup in less than a minute. Simply plug in the device, install our app and you are ready to go. No need to configure your existing home network, just put the kids on the ryfi network and you are off to the races.

ryfi won't interfere with your home network or other connected devices.

Unlike other parental routers that try to take over and manage your entire home network, ryfi doesn't need to be your primary router and plays nicely with your existing setup. We don't filter using ARP Spoofing, which has been known to interfere with common connected home devices like smart thermostats and door bell cameras. If you like simple products that relieve stress instead of creating it, ryfi is for you.

 

ryfi helps parents manage chores and homework.

ryfi is the first parental router that integrates chore and homework tracking.  The ryfi app lets you set goals for your kids and helps you track their progress together.  As your kids complete their tasks, celebrate their accomplishment by unlocking screen time.  Since it's ryfi, you're still in control.  Decide how much screen time they earn and manage when they use that time, right from the ryfi app.

 

Controlled by you anytime, anywhere.

The ryfi app puts you in control of your home ryfi wherever you are.  For those times when an app isn't convenient, we made ryfi smart enough to understand text messages.  Turn your ryfi on or off or set up a timer with a quick text.  You can even send it your favorite emoji for fun!

 

Create schedules.

Personalize ryfi by creating different schedules for each child and device. Make sure that kids aren't surfing during bed time. You can override this schedule at anytime with a simple text command. 

 

"Oh wow, we NEED this at home. Creating a structured approach to screen time like this would make life a lot easier." 

- Andrea, Insurance Executive, Anaheim Hills, Mother of 2

"I love the simplicity. My husband brought something similar to ryfi a while ago but it was so complicated to set up. And once we finally did that, we had so many issues with the connection that we gave up and took it back. I'm looking forward to your Indiegogo campaign!"

- Summer, Nurse Huntington Beach, Mother of a 5 year old

Here's just a sample of what they're saying on Facebook about ryfi!

 

 

 

As a dad of three, I know it's difficult to balance screen time and family time. I’ve seen first hand the proliferation of technology devices in our household, leading to the overused phrase "Just five more minutes?" Kim & I found a few products that manage family internet, but they were complicated. They had so many features and gadgets, it was overwhelming. Life is complicated enough and we wanted simplicity.

There had to be a better way.

But there wasn't. So we built it ourselves.

Co-founders John and Eric have been best friends since being roommates at Caltech, where Eric served as John's alarm clock, splashing water on his face (by request!) to wake him early in the morning during exam week.  That trust and confidence in each other allows us to design awesome products together without worrying about who's right or who gets credit.  We care passionately about designing products that solve real problems and are easy to use.  When we succeed, we both share in the feeling of accomplishment that comes from creating something that benefits individuals and society.

We've always cared about finding others who share that philosophy, believing we'll be most successful surrounding ourselves with good, genuine, selfless people.  A huge part of our success in bringing ryfi to life is due to the efforts of those who have taken us from being "John and Eric" to being the "ryfi team" you see below.

 

 

FAQs

How does this differ from other parental control routers?

PRODUCT FOCUS

ryfi has been designed with one goal in mind, to provide parents an easy to use tool to manage their kids' time online.  ryfi does not attempt to filter, block or otherwise interfere with or interpret kids' internet use.  While some parents may prefer a more complex tool with additional features, we discovered two principles that drove the ryfi design:

  1. Parents are very busy.  They need tools that are quick and easy to use.  Those tools should minimize stress, not create stress by demanding frequent attention or long, complicated setup or maintenance to realize their value.
  2. Managing kids' screen time is a universal need.  Filtering or blocking what kids do online is also a need, but one that is difficult to address in a "one size fits all" manner.

Through research and testing, we have discovered that providing a filtering/blocking solution is difficult to do in a way that both requires minimal effort and is flexible enough to satisfy the broad spectrum of what different parents deem safe or acceptable for their kids.  Products on the market that attempt to do this often require a significant investment of time to configure and maintain for parents to extract the value they expect those products to deliver.

 

How is the technology behind ryfi different than other parental routers?

Many parental routers use technology that is very invasive and disruptive to the existing home network.  Some use a technology known as ARP Spoofing (also called ARP Poisoning), a technique known to cause problems with other connected home devices.  In some cases, those devices (ex. Nest, Echo, Vonage, Ring) need to be reprogrammed as a result of introducing a parental router into the home network.  Even after disconnecting those devices, or disconnecting the parental router itself, the home network may not function as it originally did, sometimes requiring professional-level technical expertise to troubleshoot and fix.

ryfi is not intended to be the primary router on the home network, and does not disturb any of the existing setup or connected devices.  ryfi only interacts with the existing router as its way of sending and receiving internet traffic.  It does not interact with any other devices on the network or place any unusual demands on the existing router.

 

Does ryfi come with internet service?

No, ryfi is intended to be used with existing internet service.

 

Does ryfi provide control over mobile phones on a data plan that are not using wifi?

No.  Currently, ryfi provides control only when internet devices are connected to it over wifi.  Mobile phones, tablets or other devices using cellular data to connect to the internet would not be controlled by ryfi.

 

Can't you do what ryfi does on a regular router?

The ability to control and schedule a router via an app or SMS is not a common feature on most routers. We have designed ryfi so that these features are very easy to setup and control.  Those routers that do have these capabilities typically require advanced technical skill to access, configure and maintain.  

 

Does this block dating sites, adult sites or social networks?

No.  ryfi is focused on managing screen time.  While there is some content on the internet that is universally acknowledged as unhealthy for kids, it is difficult to design a solution that meets our standards for being absolutely reliable (filters out the content it claims to), flexible enough to work for different parents in the way they prefer, and easy enough to use that it remains accessible for nearly everyone.  We are actively researching additional features for ryfi, filtering and blocking being among them, but prefer to maintain the quality and integrity of our products by not releasing new features until we are confident they meet the needs of our customers while following our design principles of simplicity, flexibility and high quality.

 

Will you be collecting my data for advertising purposes?

Absolutely not. Our pricing model allows us to focus on a positive user experience without relying on advertising revenue.  We only collect basic account information, such as your name and email address and the model and version number of your ryfi, to allow us to provide product and customer support.

 

Do I need technical skills to set up ryfi?

No. We designed ryfi to be accessible to everyone, regardless of technical skill level. The ryfi device only requires two cables to be connected, one to a power outlet and the other to the existing router or modem.  The mobile app follows design best practices and will be accessible to anyone with a basic comfort level using mobile apps.

My husband brought something similar to ryfi a while ago but it was so complicated to set up. And once we finally did that, we had so many issues with the connection that we gave up and took it back. I'm looking forward to your Indiegogo campaign!"- Summer, Nurse Huntington Beach, Mother of a 5 year oldHere's just a sample of what they're saying on Facebook about ryfi!   As a dad of three, I know it's difficult to balance screen time and family time. I’ve seen first hand the proliferation of technology devices in our household, leading to the overused phrase "Just five more minutes?" Kim & I found a few products that manage family internet, but they were complicated. They had so many features and gadgets, it was overwhelming. Life is complicated enough and we wanted simplicity.There had to be a better way.But there wasn't. So we built it ourselves.Co-founders John and Eric have been best friends since being roommates at Caltech, where Eric served as John's alarm clock, splashing water on his face (by request!) to wake him early in the morning during exam week.  That trust and confidence in each other allows us to design awesome products together without worrying about who's right or who gets credit.  We care passionately about designing products that solve real problems and are easy to use.  When we succeed, we both share in the feeling of accomplishment that comes from creating something that benefits individuals and society.We've always cared about finding others who share that philosophy, believing we'll be most successful surrounding ourselves with good, genuine, selfless people.  A huge part of our success in bringing ryfi to life is due to the efforts of those who have taken us from being "John and Eric" to being the "ryfi team" you see below.  FAQsHow does this differ from other parental control routers?PRODUCT FOCUS ryfi has been designed with one goal in mind, to provide parents an easy to use tool to manage their kids' time online.  ryfi does not attempt to filter, block or otherwise interfere with or interpret kids' internet use.  While some parents may prefer a more complex tool with additional features, we discovered two principles that drove the ryfi design:
Parents are very busy.  They need tools that are quick and easy to use.  Those tools should minimize stress, not create stress by demanding frequent attention or long, complicated setup or maintenance to realize their value.
Managing kids' screen time is a universal need.  Filtering or blocking what kids do online is also a need, but one that is difficult to address in a "one size fits all" manner.
Through research and testing, we have discovered that providing a filtering/blocking solution is difficult to do in a way that both requires minimal effort and is flexible enough to satisfy the broad spectrum of what different parents deem safe or acceptable for their kids.  Products on the market that attempt to do this often require a significant investment of time to configure and maintain for parents to extract the value they expect those products to deliver. How is the technology behind ryfi different than other parental routers?Many parental routers use technology that is very invasive and disruptive to the existing home network.  Some use a technology known as ARP Spoofing (also called ARP Poisoning), a technique known to cause problems with other connected home devices.  In some cases, those devices (ex. Nest, Echo, Vonage, Ring) need to be reprogrammed as a result of introducing a parental router into the home network.  Even after disconnecting those devices, or disconnecting the parental router itself, the home network may not function as it originally did, sometimes requiring professional-level technical expertise to troubleshoot and fix.ryfi is not intended to be the primary router on the home network, and does not disturb any of the existing setup or connected devices.  ryfi only interacts with the existing router as its way of sending and receiving internet traffic.  It does not interact with any other devices on the network or place any unusual demands on the existing router. Does ryfi come with internet service?No, ryfi is intended to be used with existing internet service. Does ryfi provide control over mobile phones on a data plan that are not using wifi?No.  Currently, ryfi provides control only when internet devices are connected to it over wifi.  Mobile phones, tablets or other devices using cellular data to connect to the internet would not be controlled by ryfi. Can't you do what ryfi does on a regular router?The ability to control and schedule a router via an app or SMS is not a common feature on most routers. We have designed ryfi so that these features are very easy to setup and control.  Those routers that do have these capabilities typically require advanced technical skill to access, configure and maintain.   Does this block dating sites, adult sites or social networks?No.  ryfi is focused on managing screen time.  While there is some content on the internet that is universally acknowledged as unhealthy for kids, it is difficult to design a solution that meets our standards for being absolutely reliable (filters out the content it claims to), flexible enough to work for different parents in the way they prefer, and easy enough to use that it remains accessible for nearly everyone.  We are actively researching additional features for ryfi, filtering and blocking being among them, but prefer to maintain the quality and integrity of our products by not releasing new features until we are confident they meet the needs of our customers while following our design principles of simplicity, flexibility and high quality. Will you be collecting my data for advertising purposes?Absolutely not. Our pricing model allows us to focus on a positive user experience without relying on advertising revenue.  We only collect basic account information, such as your name and email address and the model and version number of your ryfi, to allow us to provide product and customer support. Do I need technical skills to set up ryfi?No. We designed ryfi to be accessible to everyone, regardless of technical skill level. The ryfi device only requires two cables to be connected, one to a power outlet and the other to the existing router or modem.  The mobile app follows design best practices and will be accessible to anyone with a basic comfort level using mobile apps.

story:
Hundreds of years ago, in the lands bathed by the sun of southern Spain, the Botijo was born; this instrument capable of cooling the water was used to beat the heat. Nowadays, due to the use of refrigerators, the earthenware jug has fallen into disuse and only a few craftsmen still continue manufacturing it.

   English      http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Botijo

   Spanish    https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Botijo

   French      https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gargoulette

   German    https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Botijo

    Italian       https://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Botijo

 

HOW IT WORKS

This earthenware jug, typical of the Spanish culture, is able to cool the water thanks to the blend of special types of clay with which it is made. These materials give it the necessary porosity for the water inside to slowly seep to the outside, wetting its surface. The surface water evaporates absorbing energy from the Botijo, which makes its temperature go down, this phenomenon is known as evaporative cooling. It is the same system used by the human body when it perspires.

http://www.physiome.org/jsim/models/webmodel/NSR/Botijo/

The Botijo is able to lower the temperature of the water contained from 10ºC-13ºC (18ºF-24ºF) only using 5% of the water contained therein. The cooling level depends on the outdoor temperature and humidity. The higher the temperature level and the lower the humidity, the more degrees it is able to lower. It can take from 1 to 2 hours to reach the minimum temperature.

BENEFITS OF THE EARTHENWARE JUG

This very ancient engineering work allows you to cool water wherever you are, without the need for electricity, without spending a penny and without contaminating.

IT IS PORTABLE

You can have cold water wherever you are, in the sun or in the shade, at home, in the countryside, on the beach. It is ideal for places where there is no electricity and it is hot, on excursions, while camping, in the mountains, working outdoors…

IT IS CHEAPER

o refrigerate water in the fridge consumes a lot of electricity. This earthenware jug is able to cool water without spending energy, helping you save on electricity bills.

 

IT IS LESS CONTAMINATING

Its manufacture is completely handcrafted and the unique materials used are local clays, so it is environmentally friendly and no pollution or waste is generated as in other industries. Its use does not entail the consumption of any kind of energy; therefore it lets you enjoy cold water without contaminating.

IT IS HEALTHIER

Unlike the cooling of the electric refrigerator that is not healthy, due to the sharp contrast between the artificial cold and the body heat, the fresh water from the Botijo has the perfect temperature for our health. This earthenware jug is not airtight and therefore facilitates the evaporation of the chlorine and the disappearance of the unpleasant odors that may be present in tap water. That is, it improves the properties of the tap water.

 

IT IS PRETTIER

This beautiful piece of pottery, result of the Spanish culture, makes you return to the classic, to the simple, to the beautiful. It is not a plastic bottle; it is a piece of art with water inside it. It is drinking with elegance; it’s sharing, with your friends, with your family.

IT IS UNIQUE

Probably no one in your family, none of your friends or neighbors has seen one, you will be able to show it to them, tell them its story, tell them it has been manufactured in Spain, molded by the hands of a skilled craftsman, and explain to them that it serves to cool water.

DEVELOPMENT

In `Alfarero´ we have opted to preserve the classic patterns of the most typical Botijos, adding a little freshness to them, enhancing their figure and making them lighter. The earthenware jugs are completely handcrafted. Due to the necessary complexity of its shape the earthenware jug cannot be manufactured by machine, only the expert hands of an artisan can carry it out.

LEARN MORE ABOUT THE PRODUCT

 The Botijo has 2 openings, the widest one to fill it up and another narrower one from where to pour the cold water. You can serve the water in a glass or drink directly from it, as you prefer!

 

OUR MODELS

                                                                 `Classic´ Botijo

                                                                 `Alicante´ Botijo

                                                              `Valencia´ Botijo

                                                              `Sevilla´ Botijo

OUR GOAL

Our goal is to recover the use of this practical object, make it known to the world and prevent its disappearance. Promote this craft marketing it internationally. Show another way to hydrate oneself, loving the craft, preserving the traditional, being respectful for the environment. 
 

 

Risks and challenges

 

In principle, there should not be any problem in the production process, other than those minor delays if the demand is too large. If that were the case, we do not rule out working with other trustworthy workshops to help us with the production process so that delays do not occur. 
Regarding shipments, it is true that no matter how well we do our job, there is always the possibility that a package may be lost or that some Botijo may break; although this possibility is very remote, it can occur. To reduce this possibility to a minimum, we plan to use the Amazon logistics management for the shipments to Europe and North America. Amazon’s efficiency is well known when it comes to doing their job. Even though we would like to use this method for all of the countries, is not possible at the moment, perhaps it can be expanded to Japan, we will be informing you. The rest of the orders will be shipped by a traditional package delivery, which does not mean there should be any problem.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
The average toothbrush contains more than 10 million bacteria, including E. coli and Staph, according to a recent study at the University of Manchester in England. And researchers from the University of Alabama at Birmingham recently found that brushes stored in the bathroom—a.k.a. all of them—are contaminated with fecal germs, among other bacteria.

 

 

 

 

  • Using a cover on your toothbrush after brushing your teeth seems like a good idea but, actually, it's poor health practice. Moisture gets trapped within the cap keeping your toothbrush bristles from drying. This promotes bacterial growth.
  • The bathroom countertop is home to 452 bacteria per square inch, so if you leave your toothbrush on it, you’re putting those bacteria in your mouth.  
  • Bacteria can spread from one head of a toothbrush to another when the bristles touch. If your family member is sick or has an infection, touching toothbrushes could spread their illness and germs to you. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 There are countless toothbrush holders and sanitizers on the market today but almost none follow the natural, easy and fast method of decontaminating your toothbrush. 

SensiFresh uses a brush-like pattern of silicone heads, housed in a protective holder to capture toothbrush handles of just about any size or shape.

 

 

These long, flexible (but durable) silicone finger-like structures easily grab toothbrushes and create an environment that isolates toothbrushes, preventing cross-contamination from other toothbrushes in the holder.        

 

 

 

 

 

   

 

 

Other holders are easily exposed to gargled water and toothpaste residue. Leading to the same contamination issues that you were seeking to solve in the first place. 

The reverse toothbrush holder by Working K using an internal structure of silicon bristles that prevents contamination. 

 

 

 

 

 

Contacts between toothbrushes can cause unwanted infection.

The cup also gets dirty from collected toothbrush water. Our device allows for the separate but concurrent holding of whatever you need: Toothbrushes, razors, toothpaste, tongue cleaner, even a comb without cross-contamination. 

 

 

 

 

Capping a toothbrush or putting it in a container ensures the toothbrush will never dry and worse, can serve as a breeding ground for germs.

Inserting toothbrushes upside down (inverted) in the SensiFresh ensures you are getting the fastest, most natural drying and decontamination of toothbrushes after use. The free flow of air, absence of cross-contamination bacteria make the SensiFresh the easiest, most natural way to store and dry your toothbrushes. 

 

 

 

 

 

SensiFresh is made of easy to sterilize dishwasher safe materials so you can keep it clean. Or use microwave or boiling water to thoroughly sterilize it. 

 

 

 

 

 

SensiFresh is space-saving and easy to install. Simply remove the strip at the back of the holder and place SensiFresh anywhere you want. 

 

 

 

 

 

SensiFresh is not only for toothbrush. Take it to your shower, kitchen, office and more. SensiFresh can do it all. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Founded in 2016, Working-K has been working to improve the quality of human life by developing products that are essential, not just good to have. Through research and development, the company continues to march towards becoming a leading product supplier.

The new 2019 product, "Reversed Toothbrush Holder" will enable safe and hygienic use of toothbrushes that have been neglected. With crowdfunding, we will create practical usage reviews of supporters. They will be utilized for new product development as well as for the coverage of initial production costs.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Product Detail

  • Product Name: Reverse Toothbrush Holder
  • Material: Outside ABS, Inside Silicon
  • Color: White, Gray
  • Product Size: 13.0×4.5×5.0 cm
  • Package Size: 10.1×2.9×13.4 cm
  • Manufacturing country: Republic of Korea
  • Manufacture and Sale: Working K

story:
ENTER THE THUNDER ZONE

Milwaukee rapper Juiceboxxx has been deep in the game forever. Performing since the age of 15, he has done multiple tours of North America, Asia, and Europe, sharing the stage with legends like Big Freedia, Lightning Bolt and Public Enemy.

THUNDER ZONE is Juiceboxxx's new brand/record label focusing on a no-rules approach to music and culture. A label where Southern Rap 7 inches, custom nails, tee shirts, tapes and energy drinks stand together as part of one movement.

In the spirit of Factory Records, Thunder Zone operates with no boundaries. Anything is possible and everything gets a catalog number, including energy drinks. And that is where this INDIEGOGO campaign comes in.

Thunder Zone Energy is to be the flagship product for a brand attempting to move beyond. Reverse engineered suburban freakout culture with an emphasis on the dirt style is the name of the game and there is no limit to what kind of projects Thunder Zone can and will take on.

WHAT WE NEED

This INDIEGOGO serves as fundraising for production, distribution, branding, backing and marketing of the Thunder Zone energy drink and Thunder Zone Enterprises.  It's also the best and only way to pre-order Juiceboxxx's long-awaited new record "I Don't Wanna Go Into The Darkness" which is finished and comes out in July as a co-venture with Thunder Zone and Jeff The Brotherhood's Infinity Cat Records.

Donators receive a variety of premiums including energy drinks, Juiceboxxx album pre-orders, custom clothing and even the ability to have pizza with Juiceboxxx when he comes to your town. Or if you are really feeling the thunder, there is an option to have Juiceboxxx show up at your front door with a few cases of Thunder Zone and rage a private party!

The premiums are blazing. The drink is sick. "I Don't Wanna Go Into The Darkness" is packed with anthems. Juiceboxxx has seen the ups and downs that come with a life of music but he's still standing and ready to fight the good fight for all the kids out there with a dream. Never Surrender Forever.

story:
WINDOW CLEANING ROBOT
Dual Ultrasonic Spray

 

Dual Ultrasonic Spray

The ultrasonic spray nozzles nebulize water into 15μm fine mist particles to deliver unparalleled cleaning results without leaving water stains.

 

Strong Suction & Ascending Power

While the strong suction power positions HOBOT firmly on vertical surfaces and removes dust and dirt effectively, the 7 kg ascending power allows HOBOT to move steadily up and down without skidding.

 
 
 
Exclusive Patent

 

High Reliability Design

An auto-adjustable pneumatic pad automatically controls the driving force and keeps the force between caterpillar treads and cleaning cloth in balance.

 

Working on Multi-Surface

With a high volume centrifugal pump which supplies negative pressure consistently, HOBOT is able to overcome small air leakages and move well on rough surfaces.

 

Designed for Glass of All Thickness

HOBOT is specially designed to operate on glasses of all thickness and design.

 

Edge-Leakage Sensor

The Edge-Leakage Sensor technology can detect air leakage caused by the slight lift around the window seal or the edge of the frameless windows.

 
 
 

Cleaning Deep into Corners

HOBOT-2S introduces extended cleaning cloth deep into corners.

 

HOBOT

Corner Coverage Rate 80%

 

 

Large Coverage Area

The size of the microfiber cleaning cloth is 24×24 cm; the large size makes HOBOT suitable for homes, offices, cafes, restaurants, and others small businesses.

 

Efficient Routes

The two caterpillar belts attached to HOBOT moves quickly at 12cm per second; in other words, HOBOT can clean 1 m2 area in 2.4 minutes.

 

 

Intelligent Route Planning for Thorough Cleaning

HOBOT has auto edge detection and is also preprogrammed to work in zigzag routes first horizontally then vertically, cleaning thoroughly without missing a spot.

 

 

Safety Rope

The 4.5-meter-long safety rope can bear up to 200kg pulling force. Before operating HOBOT, always tie the safety rope to a fixed object indoors.

 

Long Power Cord

The power cord is 5 meters long, allowing HOBOT to work on large areas and surfaces far away from a power socket.

 

Extra Secure DC Power Connector

HOBOT will stay wired through the extra secured DC power connecter to ensure you a carefree experience.

 

Embedded UPS System

In case of power outage, the embedded Uninterruptible Power System (UPS) keeps HOBOT in position for 20 minutes with audio alert.

 

 

One-button Easy Start & Ultra-flat Design

Start HOBOT simply by pushing the Easy Start button, and the sophisticated-looking device will begin to work magic on your windows!

 
 

Smartphone Control Remote Control

HOBOT can be controlled by iOS/Android devices via Bluetooth connection and by the remote control included in the box.

 

Voice Prompt

HOBOT voice prompt updates its progress or status as it goes, so you are always in control.

 

Creative Voice

With the HOBOT App, you can now replace the default voice prompt with any sound of your choice, creating more fun and a personal touch to your robot.

 
 
 

OTA Firmware Update & Cleaning Reminder

Keep up with the latest features by regularly updating HOBOT’s ﬁrmware over-the-air (OTA). Also, HOBOT will send you a cleaning reminder every 3 months to help you keep your windows spotlessly clean!

 
 
 

HOBOT Window Detergent

The HOBOT Window Detergent is specially formulated to work with HOBOT-2S ultrasonic spray nozzle. Water will work just as fine!

 

Replaceable Water Tank

In case needed to replace the clogged ultrasonic spray nozzle, simply replace the entire water tank module with one screw, HOBOT will work as new again!

 

Powerful Brushless DC Motor

The strong suction power positions HOBOT firmly on vertical surfaces and removes dust and dirt effectively.

 

Noise Level

Measured at 1-meter distance.
story_txt:
WINDOW CLEANING ROBOTDual Ultrasonic Spray






 
Dual Ultrasonic Spray
The ultrasonic spray nozzles nebulize water into 15μm fine mist particles to deliver unparalleled cleaning results without leaving water stains.
 



Strong Suction & Ascending Power
While the strong suction power positions HOBOT firmly on vertical surfaces and removes dust and dirt effectively, the 7 kg ascending power allows HOBOT to move steadily up and down without skidding.



 



 






 
Exclusive Patent
 
High Reliability Design
An auto-adjustable pneumatic pad automatically controls the driving force and keeps the force between caterpillar treads and cleaning cloth in balance.




 
Working on Multi-Surface
With a high volume centrifugal pump which supplies negative pressure consistently, HOBOT is able to overcome small air leakages and move well on rough surfaces.




 
Designed for Glass of All Thickness
HOBOT is specially designed to operate on glasses of all thickness and design.







 
Edge-Leakage Sensor
The Edge-Leakage Sensor technology can detect air leakage caused by the slight lift around the window seal or the edge of the frameless windows.



 



 
 




Cleaning Deep into Corners
HOBOT-2S introduces extended cleaning cloth deep into corners.



 
HOBOT
Corner Coverage Rate 80%

 





 
Large Coverage Area
The size of the microfiber cleaning cloth is 24×24 cm; the large size makes HOBOT suitable for homes, offices, cafes, restaurants, and others small businesses.



 
Efficient Routes
The two caterpillar belts attached to HOBOT moves quickly at 12cm per second; in other words, HOBOT can clean 1 m2 area in 2.4 minutes.



 
 
Intelligent Route Planning for Thorough Cleaning
HOBOT has auto edge detection and is also preprogrammed to work in zigzag routes first horizontally then vertically, cleaning thoroughly without missing a spot.

 




 
Safety Rope
The 4.5-meter-long safety rope can bear up to 200kg pulling force. Before operating HOBOT, always tie the safety rope to a fixed object indoors.





 
Long Power Cord
The power cord is 5 meters long, allowing HOBOT to work on large areas and surfaces far away from a power socket.



 
Extra Secure DC Power Connector
HOBOT will stay wired through the extra secured DC power connecter to ensure you a carefree experience.







 
Embedded UPS System
In case of power outage, the embedded Uninterruptible Power System (UPS) keeps HOBOT in position for 20 minutes with audio alert.



 





 
One-button Easy Start & Ultra-flat Design
Start HOBOT simply by pushing the Easy Start button, and the sophisticated-looking device will begin to work magic on your windows!





 
 
Smartphone Control Remote Control
HOBOT can be controlled by iOS/Android devices via Bluetooth connection and by the remote control included in the box.



 
Voice Prompt
HOBOT voice prompt updates its progress or status as it goes, so you are always in control.





 
Creative Voice
With the HOBOT App, you can now replace the default voice prompt with any sound of your choice, creating more fun and a personal touch to your robot.



 





 
 
OTA Firmware Update & Cleaning Reminder
Keep up with the latest features by regularly updating HOBOT’s ﬁrmware over-the-air (OTA). Also, HOBOT will send you a cleaning reminder every 3 months to help you keep your windows spotlessly clean!





 


 
 
HOBOT Window Detergent
The HOBOT Window Detergent is specially formulated to work with HOBOT-2S ultrasonic spray nozzle. Water will work just as fine!





 
Replaceable Water Tank
In case needed to replace the clogged ultrasonic spray nozzle, simply replace the entire water tank module with one screw, HOBOT will work as new again!




 
Powerful Brushless DC Motor
The strong suction power positions HOBOT firmly on vertical surfaces and removes dust and dirt effectively.





 
Noise Level
Measured at 1-meter distance.

story:
MODU makes active play the fun and natural choice for your kids by encouraging them to build their own real creations. Life-size building blocks in tactile foam create endless fun for children of all ages.


Let your kids immerse themselves in active play by building exciting creations of varying complexity. Only imagination is the limit and they can use their whole body for balancing, walking, rolling, climbing, rocking, jumping or riding fun.
 


MODU is designed to develop the gross motor skills that are essential for your child. Don't take our word for it – here's what an expert says:

 

No apps required - just good ol' imagination & elbow grease


 


We offer MODU in kits of blocks, pegs & wheels - everything designed to interlock in a patented construction system and make up creations that trigger the physical activity & imagination of kids.

CURIOSITY KIT; Our smallest starter kit with 3 different blocks, some pegs and 4 caster wheels, contains 5+ creations and many years of active fun! The content of the Curiosity Kit will teach your kid how to balance, rock, jump, ride and more. 

EXPLORER KIT; This next-level kit offers at least 15 different creations, and a whole lot more for the creatives out there. A super fun starter kit that will help your kid learn the most fundamental motor skills through open-ended play. Includes all possible creations from the Curiosity Kit.

DREAMER KIT; Our flagship kit. Unleash your dreams and build 20+ unique creations in just one kit - all of which you can ride, climb or balance! The fun begins with the first steps of building and continues through years of active play. Includes all possible creations from our other kits.


Every kit comes with an inspiration guide with clear instructions on how to build numerous creations. The creations are communicated as very simple 'exploded' views that are easy for everyone to read and follow.

Also included are suggestions for versatile usages, motor skill benefits, storage options and upkeep inspiration. Of course, you don't have to follow the guide. In fact, we encourage open-ended play and are excited to learn about the awesome things you and your kids will do with MODU.


We know that toys can clash with a modern, minimalistic home and that is why our MODU blocks come in unobtrusive light grey. However, with the help from our awesome MODU community, we have chosen 4 playful colors for the connecting elements of MODU.

4 playful colors to chose from - and more to come in the future!


After the campaign we'll send out an email asking you to pick your favorite color for your MODU kit. Meanwhile, please don't be shy to let us know which new colors you wish for in the future!


We are Theo & Jonathan; 2 design engineers from Denmark with a passion for creating simple solutions to complex problems. We have a proven track record of launching successful products and today we have the strongest team ever to help us bring MODU into the world.

We believe that MODU solves an important and very real problem. Tablets are taking over children's lives, and this is an issue because activity and gross motor stimulation form the foundation of both physical, linguistic and social learning. We dream of a future where kids develop and are enabled to inspire us through their natural imagination and open-ended, active play.
 

Fortunately, we are not alone in pursuing our play mission. MODU is supported, co-developed and endorsed by a number of Danish organisations:


With MODU kids will imagine, then build to get moving, imagine new things and so on. We call it a Play Loop and our toy caters for a natural flow in these steps. This is important since kids learn more and play better when they are bodily activated.

In a single toy, we supply a media to active play that stimulates all the natural needs a child has in play. The tangible and interactive aspect of MODU play is great for collaborative play for all ages, both among kids and adults. Everyone can be part of this Play Loop.
 

 

While delivering an open-ended play experience MODU also connects the home and the parents with the child in play. We believe that making a vehicle to get around the living room and getting new ideas because of shifted perspective will give the kids continuous yet diverse play experiences. Our 2 types of cool wheels will provide just that:

 

Wheels and casters - one's stable, the other's agile

 

The stumbling era is coming to an end - flip over your MODU wheels to add resistance if your toddler wanna go slow & safe.


Kids outgrow their toys - especially in their early years when fundamental motor skills are learned. We designed the MODU system to be truly multifunctional. This means that when your kid outgrows one creation, another one is easily built. MODU remains fun and challenging from just 6 months up to 6 years.. ..and beyond!

 


For young infants, MODU in its mere individual elements offers intriguing features, such as tumbling shapes, contrast colors and through-going holes. When reaching the toddler age, i.e. 1-3 years, simple creations like walkers, rockers and rides enable continous fun and stimulating play. After the age of 3, MODU becomes an endless source of inspiration for explorative and imaginative creations.
 


MODU covers the need for several gross motor stimulating toys in a single fun, imaginative and long-lasting product, while encouraging and supporting every stage of your kid's development.


Being super age-adaptable MODU is the epitome of sustainable toys – a toy with a long life cycle that stays fun & relevant for years. As we like to say: "A toy that helps you grow and grows with you."
 

The MODU blocks consist of tough EVA-foam approved for kids toys. All other parts are made from high-grade ABS plastic - a quality material known from LEGO. Health, safety and environmental impact are key to MODU, so it goes without saying that the parts are 100% phthalate- and BPA-free and have gone through the toughest tests for fumes and toxicity.

MODU is made strictly from high-end materials

Our design follows the tradition of Scandinavian toy design, where functionalism is pride of place, and we care deeply about our planet. We produce MODU through two carefully selected toy manufacturers. The facilities and working environment of both partners live up to Danish standards and they are continuously taking initiatives to reduce their environmental footprint.


And we are not done yet! In the future we'll keep developing intriguing additions to the MODU ecosystem, and we invite you and your kids to help us decide which new features would be most awesome! In addition to new shapes of blocks, expect cool features like:


Thank you for reading all the way to the end. We hope that you’re just as excited about MODU as we   are, and that you’ll join our adventure in creating a world with more fun, imagination and open-ended, active play. We love what we’ve made, and we’re honored to share it with you. For even more info check out our webpage http://www.modutoy.com or join us on the social media.
 

 

If you have any questions, or if we can assist you in any way, feel free to shoot an email to our Head of Imaginationland, Jonathan - jonathan@modutoy.com, and he’ll get right back to you. Thank you again, we hope you choose to join us on our journey.

Risks and challenges

Products backed and delivered inside the EU are covered with Danish VAT and are subject to no further costs. Please be advised that products shipped outside EU could be subject to local VAT and Taxes. You have to check up with your local regulations in order to get information about this.

We already have fully functional prototypes in play that are currently being tested among families, child physiotherapists and kindergardens all over - MODU holds up and they all love it!

Manufacturing a product is a fine art and always a complex process. That is why we have teamed up with manufacturers experienced in delivering quality products that are compliant with the strict European standards. Moreover, MODU is continuously being tested at both public and independent consumer labs specialized in toy safety. 

Our promise to you? Every backer will be treated like our first and everyone will receive a high quality product that they and their kids can enjoy for years. Our estimates for delivery are conservative because we'll take the time to ensure that the quality of MODU is perfect. And although we can’t promise a risk free start, we have done everything in our power to make sure that all the ‘building blocks’ we need to get your MODU kit to your doorstep are there.

story:
Forever Fresh™ is the solution millions of wet wipe users have been complaining about for twenty years! There wasn't any place convenient to put them. Problem solved!

The 'American dream' is to get this awesome product into major retailers, which starts with you triggering off the news story by bragging up this cool invention on Facebook (click here!), and being the FIRST to have Forever Fresh™ in your home!

Two major home builders want the Forever Fresh™ dispensers in their new homes as a value-added "must have" MODERN feature. Your order will help fund our large-scale production run. If you are an early bird, you'll get Forever Fresh™ at the home builder's wholesale price! And, you'll get them before the home builders do! Ships within ONE week from today.

 

 

Forever Fresh™ installs everywhere you need it.

  • Wet wipes in your bathrooms.
  • Anti-Bacterial wipes for your kitchen. 
  • Baby wipes near your baby changing station.
  • Fabric softener sheets in your laundry room.
  • Rubber glove dispenser in your garage.
  • Shoe cover dispenser near your front door. 

  • Made from radically durable ABS plastic (same stuff LEGO's® are made of).
  • One finger opens and closes the dispenser door.
  • Fits all sizes of your favorite brand of wet wipes.
  • Fits flushable wet wipes.
  • Moisture tight seal keeps your wet wipes moist and ready to go.
  • Designed to fit your home decor, looks just like a light plate switch.
  • Clean & sleek, with gorgeous gloss shine.
  • Super easy to refill, just put fingers into the hole and gently pull open the cover.
  • Installs in just 5 minutes into drywall, with utility knife and phillips screwdriver.
  • Designed to be installed into cabinets as well.

The last thing Anthony wanted was the headache of copycats stealing his invention, so he hired a magnificent patent attorney to protect his utility invention.

 

 

FOREVER FRESH™ IS IN PRODUCTION!

Check out these photos below, showing various stages of development, from the initial wood prototype, 3D printed prototype, to the mold and final production unit.

 

* For bulk wholesale orders, or for distributor pricing, give us a call (951) 444-0741.

 

We believe in supporting the American economy, by manufacturing in America, and continuing the proud tradition of producing the highest quality products in the world.  We guarantee you will be satisfied with your purchase.

 

Check out Forever Fresh™ online as well!  www.ForeverFresh.net

Forever Fresh™ telephone number:  (951) 444-0741

Forever Fresh™ contact email:  customerservice@foreverfresh.net

Media Inquiries contact:  Patrick Leddy at SirPatrickLeddy@gmail.com

story:
Jar Juicer 

  - As seen in: 

 

The Juicer for a Jar! 

Jar Juicer works with any wide-mouth mason / canning jar. Simply remove the lid, and replace the inner disc with Jar Juicer. Use the threaded band to secure it in place, and you are ready to start juicing!

 

Two-sided Design

Jar Juicer features a two-sided design, allowing you to juice with one side, then flip it over to drink or pour out of the other, making it ideal for juicing at home or on the go!

Jar Juicer has been engineered to avoid spillage while juicing. It's perfect for most small to mid-sized oranges, and also works great for smaller citrus fruits like lemons or limes! 

Additional Features:

  • BPA-Free
  • Dishwasher Safe
  • Made in Detroit, Michigan, USA
  • Patent Pending

 

A citrus juicer for a mason jar just makes sense!

(well, it doesn't just make sense... it also makes juice, of course, but you know what we mean)

Here's why: 

1 - Mason jars offer a stable juicing experience. Securing Jar Juicer in place with the threaded lid band of the mason jar allows one hand to hold the jar and the other hand to press the orange.

2 - Mason jars have measurement lines built right into them. Juicing with Jar Juicer allows you to see exactly how much juice you've squeezed.

3 - Mason jars are great for storing fresh juice, and are the storage container of choice for the juicing community. Jar Juicer allows you to juice directly into your storage container.

4 - Many people regularly drink out of mason jars. Jar Juicer allows you to juice directly into the glass that you will use to drink out of. 

5 - Mason jars are durable and portable, making them great for taking beverages on the go. Jar Juicer allows you to turn oranges into juice, just about anywhere.  


Backer Perks


Our Funding Goal

Our goal for this campaign is $5,000. 

This is the absolute minimum that we still need to raise in order to make Jar Juicer a reality. Any additional funds raised will be extremely beneficial to ensuring a smooth and efficient backer fulfillment process, and the ongoing development of our business beyond the campaign.

We have elected a "Flexible" funding campaign because if we fall short of the funding goal, we plan to assess all reasonable options for alternatively raising the balance needed. If we are unable to secure the total funds required for production and fulfillment, we promise to return all campaign proceeds to our backers.

Use of Funds

  • Fabrication of Production Molds
  • Test Run of Jar Juicers for Quality Assurance 
  • Production Run of Jar Juicers
  • Product Packaging 
  • Shipping / Fulfillment

 

Squeezed in Detroit!

Jar Juicer is a product of Detroit, Michigan.  As proud supporters of our city and state, we have tried to remain as local as possible throughout the development process.  We intend to further this commitment by partnering with a Detroit-based injection-molded plastics company for all of our production needs. 

Here's a list of the people and companies that have helped bring Jar Juicer to this point:

   Brian - Inventor & Chief Jar Juicer  : /briankcurtis

   Doug - Inventive Products LLC : Product / CAD Design : inventive-products.com

   Larry - ProtoJet : Rapid Prototyping : protojet.com

   Gary - Do All Plastic Inc : Production : doallplastic.com

   Joe - 4Front Manufacturing : Development / Production Consultant : 4frontmfg.com

   Chris - Falkowski PLLC : Patent Attorney : falkowskipllc.com

   Paul - PS Designs : Photography / Design Consultant : designsbyps.com

   Bamboo Detroit : Jar Juicer HQ : bamboodetroit.com


 

The Jar Juicer Story

Let's just say, I have a thing for mason jars...  (yes, juicy pun intended)

My introduction to the mason jar came via my grandmother, an avid canner. From salsas to pickles, and just about everything in-between, seldom is a visit to grandma's house that doesn't involve something being served out of a jar. While not a canner myself, for years I have found various uses for mason jars, mostly as containers for things like loose change, pens / pencils, miscellaneous hardware, puppy food, etc. 

When planning a wedding with a woman who shared my appreciation for jars, as you can imagine, we found all sorts of ways to incorporate one or two (okay, more like one or two hundred...). 

To this day, my preferred jar use is for beverages. There is just something about a wide-mouth mason jar that makes for the perfect vessel to hold a drink, whether it's coffee, tea, soda, an adult beverage, or even a plain glass of water. For this reason, we've got a cabinet full of them. 

A couple years ago, my wife and I purchased a big fancy industrial-style juicer. While great for liquefying all sorts of fruits and vegetables into delicious concoctions, we found the results were not quite the same when it came to orange juice. Since there is nothing quite like a glass of fresh hand-squeezed orange juice, we went out and bought a citrus juicer and all was well again.  

Now, it might make for a good story to say that Jar Juicer was conceived while drinking that first jar of orange juice we made, but this is simply not the case. Looking back, it's remarkable to think of how many times I drank orange juice out of a jar prior to coming up with the idea.  In fact, the Jar Juicer light bulb went off, not over a jar of juice, but while sitting in my office at work (in fairness, I do keep a mason jar on my desk).  

When the idea hit me, my immediate inclination was to simply go online and buy a juicer for a jar, as I assumed someone had certainly thought of this before. To my surprise, I was wrong. My initial feeling was actually one of disappointment (I really wanted a Jar Juicer). That quickly changed, however, to one of opportunity, as I decided it was something I needed to pursue.  In the weeks and months that followed, the design took shape:


Project Status / Risk Disclosure

We have worked for the last several months to get as far along in the process as possible, in an effort to mitigate, as best as possible, the inherent risks associated with any business venture. We have dotted our "i"s and crossed our "t"s to ensure our ability to meet the expectations of our backers.

At this point, design and development of the product are complete, and we are very close to finalizing our product packaging plans. We have worked with our manufacturer to identify the exact materials needed and they are prepared to begin the production process as soon as we give the green light.

The only items that are not entirely under our control at this point are:

Capital - Our funding goal of $5,000 is the absolute minimum that we still need to raise in order to to pay for the necessary molds to be fabricated, and the first production run of Jar Juicers to be shot. If we fall short of our funding needs, we will assess all reasonable options for alternatively raising any remaining balance. 

If we are unable to secure the total funds required for production and fulfillment, we promise to return all campaign proceeds to our backers. 

Production / Fulfillment Timeline - We estimate backer fulfillment to be completed within 60 - 90 days of the completion of the campaign. The decision to produce Jar Juicer locally allows us much more involvement and oversight in the process. The ability to simply drive over to the manufacturing facility before, during, or after a production run ensures that we can quickly address any problems that arise. It also offers us much more control over the fulfillment timeline, as we do not have to worry about freight, customs, or other various issues that outsourcing production can often entail. That being said, unforeseen issues related to the molds, machinery, materials, etc., could occur that might have implications on the fulfillment timeline. 

We promise to provide our backers with ongoing updates regarding project status, any issues or delays we may encounter, and how we plan to overcome them.

 

We Need Your Help!

We have come quite a long way to get to this point, but our dream of bringing Jar Juicer to the world requires all the help we can get. Check out our social media pages and PLEASE Like, Add, Follow, Pin, and Share Jar Juicer with everyone you can!

Thank You!
story_txt:
Jar Juicer 
  - As seen in: 



 
The Juicer for a Jar! 

Jar Juicer works with any wide-mouth mason / canning jar. Simply remove the lid, and replace the inner disc with Jar Juicer. Use the threaded band to secure it in place, and you are ready to start juicing!






 
Two-sided Design
Jar Juicer features a two-sided design, allowing you to juice with one side, then flip it over to drink or pour out of the other, making it ideal for juicing at home or on the go!

Jar Juicer has been engineered to avoid spillage while juicing. It's perfect for most small to mid-sized oranges, and also works great for smaller citrus fruits like lemons or limes! 


Additional Features:

BPA-Free
Dishwasher Safe
Made in Detroit, Michigan, USA
Patent Pending

 

A citrus juicer for a mason jar just makes sense!
(well, it doesn't just make sense... it also makes juice, of course, but you know what we mean)
Here's why: 
1 - Mason jars offer a stable juicing experience. Securing Jar Juicer in place with the threaded lid band of the mason jar allows one hand to hold the jar and the other hand to press the orange.
2 - Mason jars have measurement lines built right into them. Juicing with Jar Juicer allows you to see exactly how much juice you've squeezed.
3 - Mason jars are great for storing fresh juice, and are the storage container of choice for the juicing community. Jar Juicer allows you to juice directly into your storage container.
4 - Many people regularly drink out of mason jars. Jar Juicer allows you to juice directly into the glass that you will use to drink out of. 
5 - Mason jars are durable and portable, making them great for taking beverages on the go. Jar Juicer allows you to turn oranges into juice, just about anywhere.  



Backer Perks













Our Funding Goal

Our goal for this campaign is $5,000. 
This is the absolute minimum that we still need to raise in order to make Jar Juicer a reality. Any additional funds raised will be extremely beneficial to ensuring a smooth and efficient backer fulfillment process, and the ongoing development of our business beyond the campaign.
We have elected a "Flexible" funding campaign because if we fall short of the funding goal, we plan to assess all reasonable options for alternatively raising the balance needed. If we are unable to secure the total funds required for production and fulfillment, we promise to return all campaign proceeds to our backers.
Use of Funds
Fabrication of Production Molds
Test Run of Jar Juicers for Quality Assurance 
Production Run of Jar Juicers
Product Packaging 
Shipping / Fulfillment
 
Squeezed in Detroit! 
Jar Juicer is a product of Detroit, Michigan.  As proud supporters of our city and state, we have tried to remain as local as possible throughout the development process.  We intend to further this commitment by partnering with a Detroit-based injection-molded plastics company for all of our production needs. Here's a list of the people and companies that have helped bring Jar Juicer to this point:
   Brian - Inventor & Chief Jar Juicer  :  /briankcurtis
   Doug - Inventive Products LLC : Product / CAD Design : inventive-products.com
   Larry - ProtoJet : Rapid Prototyping : protojet.com
   Gary - Do All Plastic Inc : Production : doallplastic.com
   Joe - 4Front Manufacturing : Development / Production Consultant : 4frontmfg.com 
   Chris - Falkowski PLLC : Patent Attorney : falkowskipllc.com
   Paul - PS Designs : Photography / Design Consultant : designsbyps.com
   Bamboo Detroit : Jar Juicer HQ : bamboodetroit.com


 
The Jar Juicer Story
Let's just say, I have a thing for mason jars...  (yes, juicy pun intended)My introduction to the mason jar came via my grandmother, an avid canner. From salsas to pickles, and just about everything in-between, seldom is a visit to grandma's house that doesn't involve something being served out of a jar. While not a canner myself, for years I have found various uses for mason jars, mostly as containers for things like loose change, pens / pencils, miscellaneous hardware, puppy food, etc. When planning a wedding with a woman who shared my appreciation for jars, as you can imagine, we found all sorts of ways to incorporate one or two (okay, more like one or two hundred...). To this day, my preferred jar use is for beverages. There is just something about a wide-mouth mason jar that makes for the perfect vessel to hold a drink, whether it's coffee, tea, soda, an adult beverage, or even a plain glass of water. For this reason, we've got a cabinet full of them. A couple years ago, my wife and I purchased a big fancy industrial-style juicer. While great for liquefying all sorts of fruits and vegetables into delicious concoctions, we found the results were not quite the same when it came to orange juice. Since there is nothing quite like a glass of fresh hand-squeezed orange juice, we went out and bought a citrus juicer and all was well again.  Now, it might make for a good story to say that Jar Juicer was conceived while drinking that first jar of orange juice we made, but this is simply not the case. Looking back, it's remarkable to think of how many times I drank orange juice out of a jar prior to coming up with the idea.  In fact, the Jar Juicer light bulb went off, not over a jar of juice, but while sitting in my office at work (in fairness, I do keep a mason jar on my desk).  When the idea hit me, my immediate inclination was to simply go online and buy a juicer for a jar, as I assumed someone had certainly thought of this before. To my surprise, I was wrong. My initial feeling was actually one of disappointment (I really wanted a Jar Juicer). That quickly changed, however, to one of opportunity, as I decided it was something I needed to pursue.  In the weeks and months that followed, the design took shape:
Project Status / Risk Disclosure
We have worked for the last several months to get as far along in the process as possible, in an effort to mitigate, as best as possible, the inherent risks associated with any business venture. We have dotted our "i"s and crossed our "t"s to ensure our ability to meet the expectations of our backers.At this point, design and development of the product are complete, and we are very close to finalizing our product packaging plans. We have worked with our manufacturer to identify the exact materials needed and they are prepared to begin the production process as soon as we give the green light.The only items that are not entirely under our control at this point are:Capital - Our funding goal of $5,000 is the absolute minimum that we still need to raise in order to to pay for the necessary molds to be fabricated, and the first production run of Jar Juicers to be shot. If we fall short of our funding needs, we will assess all reasonable options for alternatively raising any remaining balance. If we are unable to secure the total funds required for production and fulfillment, we promise to return all campaign proceeds to our backers. Production / Fulfillment Timeline - We estimate backer fulfillment to be completed within 60 - 90 days of the completion of the campaign. The decision to produce Jar Juicer locally allows us much more involvement and oversight in the process. The ability to simply drive over to the manufacturing facility before, during, or after a production run ensures that we can quickly address any problems that arise. It also offers us much more control over the fulfillment timeline, as we do not have to worry about freight, customs, or other various issues that outsourcing production can often entail. That being said, unforeseen issues related to the molds, machinery, materials, etc., could occur that might have implications on the fulfillment timeline. We promise to provide our backers with ongoing updates regarding project status, any issues or delays we may encounter, and how we plan to overcome them. 
We Need Your Help!


We have come quite a long way to get to this point, but our dream of bringing Jar Juicer to the world requires all the help we can get. Check out our social media pages and PLEASE Like, Add, Follow, Pin, and Share Jar Juicer with everyone you can!
Thank You!

story:
At the Source Fire Protection for:

& More!

 

Dedicated to Saving Lives.

Fire Detection Technology Hasn’t Changed Much….

You would do anything to keep your family safe. So why are you still using fire-detection methods that are over 50 years old?

Smoke detectors have been around for decades and are in almost every home and office, but think about where they’re placed: How often does a fire start in the middle of a ceiling, in a hallway? The truth is, by the time you hear your smoke alarm go off, it may be too late to do anything about it.

UNTIL NOW!

Safer Alarms™ transforms the fire safety industry with its rapid rate of rise heat sensor, placed at the source of common fires.

 

The Problem With Smoke Detectors

Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) and building codes recommend that you do NOT put a traditional detector in close proximity to a potential source of fire, because it will melt before being effective. But, by the time smoke travels to a traditionally placed detector, it may be too late to do anything about it.

 

The Safer Solution

Safer Home Alarm System and Safer Christmas Tree Alarm ​
Products That Put Fire Safety at the Source

Safer Alarms™ products aren’t smoke detectors. They are a compact and easily applied heat sensor and companion alarm that detects fires where they are most likely to occur: at an outlet.

Our revolutionary technology separates the sensor unit from the alarm unit and communicates danger with a safer, wireless system: technology that gets you to the source of danger, faster.

Our sensor unit is sacrificed in the fire while the alarm unit continues to sound remotely, meeting OSHA and building code standards.

There is no fire alarm system in the market today that alerts faster and detects at closer proximity than Safer, all while eliminating an increase in nuisance alarms. That’s protection that you can’t ignore.

 

How It Works

  1. Heat sensor is placed above any outlet

  2. Patent pending technology recognizes when temperature hits “danger zone” (150 degrees F or higher)

  3. Sensor transmits wireless signal to alarm unit in safe, traditional location

  4. Alarm sounds instantly, continuing to alert the consumer to danger even if the sensor is melted. Easy assembly, no tools required. Multi-year battery only alarm system (Note: AA Batteries not included)

 

 

 

EXCLUSIVE: Safer Christmas Tree Alarm

Not in stores yet

This product is a fire sensor designed as an ornament to be hidden in your Christmas tree. If there's a fire, it will immediately communicate to our remote alarm. 

 

Our Team

Marc Toland
CEO and Founder
Marc Toland is an inventor and entrepreneur who began his career 27 years ago as a stockbroker at a major NYSE firm. He is married with three children. In 2011 three little girls and their grandparents died in a horrific Christmas morning fire, Mr. Toland and his family were awakened by the sirens racing to the scene. It happened down the street from his home. It is his personal crusade to raise awareness to fire safety and to bring lifesaving products to market and prevent tragedies like these from ever happening again. An architect of multiple companies, Toland has been published by the United States Patent and Trademark Office and holds patent pending intellectual property filed with the USPTO.

Thomas L. Montagnino
Strategic Adviser/Business Development

Jody Van Houton
Financial Administrator

The Silent Partner Marketing
Public Relations/Media

Jeff Morgan​
Head of Sales

 

 

 

**If you are interested in claiming multiple perks, please make a new contribution. Thank you!**
