story:
Our Story

When i was in Liberia, shooting my last documentary, I was taken on an amazing journey by a man named Macintosh. He showed the soul of his hometown, West Point, considered by many the worst shantytown in the Liberian capital of Monrovia. Once you get past the surface we are not so different any of us, there is no sense being scared of other human beings because he had seen the worst of it. Macintosh works with a group of teenage prostitutes, giving them odd jobs, food and occasional floor space in his tiny room, where he lives with his girlfriend and children. He has dreams, one of them is to start an orphanage to get kids off the street, reunify them with their parents and give them some training. Honestly the idea is not fully formed, there needs to be some way of keeping the orphanage sustainable. I am not interested in creating a charity. But until we fully grasp the situation something must be done in the short term to get the girls off the street and fed so that they have the option to live with having to prostitute their bodies and sleep on the cement floor of a video club.


The Impact

The beginning of the Care for Us orphanage project, this money will get 6-7 girls whom Macintosh works with into two rooms in West Point, feed them and pay our staff in Liberia <Macintosh and our field operative Murba> for two months while we assess the situation and find the right way to proceed. Macintosh is a certified social worker and has worked in the field with GRS re-unifying street kids in the West Point community with their families. Chid LIberty - the driving force behind Africa's only fair-trade factory located in Liberia, Josh Tetrick - the founder of 33needs<a kickstarter for ngo's> and Katie Meyler - the founder of the More Than Me Foundation that gives scholarships to West Point girls are all on board to find a sustainable solution. This is a direct action, a half way house in every sense of the word, that lays down the ground work for creating a social business to realize Macintosh's Care for Us orphanage project. This money give us the time to get the girls off the street while we make a solid game plan. Katie and Chid will be in Liberia this summer to consult with Macintosh directly.  


What We Need & What You Get

I need the following to fund this project for two months

i need 50 dollars for two rooms

i need 250 dollars to feed the girls

i need 350 dollars to pay Macintosh

i need 250 dollars to pay Murba

i need 200 dollars to print and ship photos

i need 100 to cover the fees of sending the money and paying indiegogo 

I need anyone who donates to send me their address 

You get a nice print of one of the girls you are helping

Other Ways You Can Help

spread the word and keep an eye out for my film project, Selling Tomorrow to Save Today

story:
What if we told you anyone could install a full-featured, remotely operated security system in their home, office, garage, back yard or shed just by flipping a switch? That was our vision for our new security technology. We set out to design a device that would combine all the best features of an LED bulb and an independent wireless security camera and we like to think we’ve succeeded. 


 


















 







We are currently working with the South Korean Government and the Transportation Authority to install our cameras all over bus stops in South Korea!







Literally as simple as replacing a light bulb. The socket provides the unit with power, and your mobile device, smartphone or custom remote provide control through the included wireless network interface. Is it obtrusive or distracting? Not at all. In fact, with the light on, it’s virtually impossible to see the camera at all.

Meanwhile, you will receive high-definition, streaming real-time video of everything in the camera’s wide-angle view of up to 120 degrees. The picture quality is stunning, and if you want to monitor what is happening, you can view and record H.264 video or images through the web or on your mobile device or smartphone.








The Light Bulb Security Camera is an all-in-one unit and includes everything you need to set up on-the- spot security anywhere you can install a light bulb. Such as home, office, warehouses, restaurant, child daycare center, ‎backyard, garage etc.  






 








Locations where TOVNET is currently installed : Companies, Enterprises, Apartments, Schools, Shopping malls, Restaurants, Café, Hospitals, Warehouses, and Churches in South Korea.
















We believe this is the best option for customers interested in security but not ready to build or install permanent fixtures or a storage network. With this new technology, anyone can build a security system of nearly any complexity. That is why we launched a crowdfunding initiative to fund development and bring this exciting next-generation technology to market. We would like to invite you to make a contribution to our campaign and make the Light Bulb Security Camera a reality for homeowners, business owners and families around the world. 




















 

Q: Is there an open API for this Lamp\Camera? that that is to make it possible to control and read from it using a third party software (Home automation software, IFTTT, etc).  

A: For security issues, we do not provide open API. However, upon business collaboration model we may consider doing so.  

Q: What kind of connectivity does it support? WIFI, Z-wave, Zigbee, Bluetooth, etc.  

A: Tovnet uses WIFI connection  

Q: How independent are the camera and light in terms of control?

A: TOVNET camera and LED light can be controlled by motion detection via mobile application menu selection.  

Q: Does it support sending the video feed directly over the connectivity mean it uses ?  

A: The video can be streamed between TOVNETcam and user’s mobile phone directly. There is no cloud storage server.  

Q: Does the light come on manually or automatically via motion detection.  

A: TOVNETcam has a motion detection function and it works automatically by motion control menu selection.  

Q: Can the light and camera be independently motion controlled? For instance, one only wants the light to come on via motion control and not video, or one only wants the camera to be motion controlled but not the light. How long does the light and or video record for when it detects motion. Can the motion detection sensitivity be adjusted?.  

A: When TOVNETcam detect motion, the LED light can be turned on for 2 minutes and can record using a microSD card. The motion detection sensitivity can be chosen by 3 levels, low, medium, and high.  

Q: Can the light control via motion control be adjusted to only work between the hours of darkness?  

A: The LED light has a timer function, thus the user can set up time to turn on and off easily via mobile application.  

Q: Whats to stop a thief who sees the light come on, notices the camera in the light, then takes the unit off and runs away?  

A: In order to prevent theft, you can use a light protection bulb socket that you can purchase at any light fixture or hardware store such as this:


 

Q: Does the light switch always have to be on? Or the light within the camera work independently on the switch with power always running to the camera?

A: Electric power must always be on.Electric power is running between 110 ~ 240 volts.

Q: What about puck lights with a dimmer? Ok and safe to use with this product?

A: Yes you can use puck lights with a dimmer for this camera.


We will continuously update the FAQ and answer all of your questions.  Feel free to send us a message or leave a comment.  Thanks!


Additional Reference Material (Patents, Trade Shows, Manufacturing Process)
































 

Risks and challenges

We have been in development for the last five years from tovnets first concept being in 2011. From our earliest model we began constructing a high tech solution to a huge problem all over the world. We wanted to make a product where an average user will be able to install our security system anywhere anytime. After many years of trial and error and testing different models we were finally convinced that the current model is the most practical and efficient way to monitor your home, work or anywhere you want.

We began our partnerships with several factories in China to produce our light bulb cameras and have been testing in our local market for the last year and a half. Aside from the hardware, the most critical part of this system is with the software and app development, which is where we excelled and thrived. We are currently in clinical testing with some of the largest companies in South Korea and also major university campuses all over South Korea. Our feedback has been extraordinary and the not so good feed backs were remedied quickly. We are now ready to start mass production and to start spreading our products all over the world. With your help, I know we can achieve this goal. Thank you for your support!

We wanted to make a product where an average user will be able to install our security system anywhere anytime. After many years of trial and error and testing different models we were finally convinced that the current model is the most practical and efficient way to monitor your home, work or anywhere you want.We began our partnerships with several factories in China to produce our light bulb cameras and have been testing in our local market for the last year and a half. Aside from the hardware, the most critical part of this system is with the software and app development, which is where we excelled and thrived. We are currently in clinical testing with some of the largest companies in South Korea and also major university campuses all over South Korea. Our feedback has been extraordinary and the not so good feed backs were remedied quickly. We are now ready to start mass production and to start spreading our products all over the world. With your help, I know we can achieve this goal. Thank you for your support!

story:
VER EN ESPAÑOL


MEET SULI



The world’s first solar module for everyone.


The light of the sun is everywhere, it belongs to all, but only a few have the means to transform it into usable energy for our daily life.

SULI is a portable solar module that will change this reality, democratizing access to light for everybody. It´s PATENT PENDING (2014-001840)

Empowering people.


By mixing sustainable solar energy with the power of the 3D printing world.



Join the revolution, be part of the change you want in the world and help us to achieve our next big goal: Start our first massive production.


WE NEED YOU.

___________________________________________________________________________

SULI IN THE PRESS



___________________________________________________________________________

TECHNICAL DETAILS


___________________________________________________________________________

WHAT OUR PARTNERS ARE TALKING ABOUT SULI

And why you should support us...

___________________________________________________________________________

LIGHT FOR YOUR LIFE: ONE MODULE FOR DIFFERENT NEEDS.

SULI is portable, multi-functional, and can be adapted to different uses in everyday life through its double fitting: a PET bottle fitting and a 3D printable accessories fitting.


___________________________________________________________________________

HOW IT WORKS: LIGHT YOUR BIKE, YOUR WORK, YOUR LIFE... ONE 3D PRINT AT A TIME.

SULI modular system adapts to different accessories or to PET bottles in a easy way:


 


To a PET bottle:

For hanging:

To a window:


___________________________________________________________________________

OUR OBJECTIVE: MASSIFY AND DEMOCRATIZE THE EVERYDAY USE OF RENEWABLE ENERGY.



We know that SULI is very useful for people enjoying the great outdoors and looking to shift to a more sustainable lifestyle, but we also believe that SULI can bring high-quality, sustainable light to those who do not have it.

Turn off your light for 5 seconds and imagine there are 1.5 Billion (almost 1 out of 7) people that do not have access to electricity.

All these people spend their small budget to buy candles and kerosene. Solutions that are not renewable, very toxic and dangerous, causing 1 million deaths every year by intoxication and fires.

Without light kids cannot study longer after school, entrepreneurs cannot be more productive and streets become more dangerous.

Be a part of the solution and help us transform this reality!

SULI is more than a solar lamp. It is a model for social and environmental impact in which all can participate and access solar energy. 

___________________________________________________________________________

OUR FIRST SOCIAL PROGRAM: LIGHT FOR BOUTIN, HAITI.

Our first project is to deploy SULI modules in Boutín, Haití, in Central America.

Haití is the poorest country in America and only a few years ago it suffered a devastating earthquake. 

In Boutín approximately 3,500 people live without access to light or water. Moreover, there are 5 schools in the community and over 800 kids, effectively without access to better opportunities or a dignified life. 

To implement this project, we are partnering with AMERICA SOLIDARIA, a highly recognized Chilean non-profit organization with projects all over the American continents, especially in Haiti.

Their project WASH is delivering water to Boutín community, building 5 wells with free access for all. With your support, SULI is joining this initiative by providing light for the wells. 

Furthermore, if the support for our campaign is large enough, we will bring SULI light to schools so kids, parents and teachers may have more study hours.

Finally, if the support is amazing - we will install SULIs in the homes of Boutín.

Therefore, we created a SPECIAL PERK for those who can pay a little more to help others with limited economic resources to access the solar light of SULI.



___________________________________________________________________________

SULI COMMUNITY: THE OPEN-SOURCE MODEL.

We want to create a SULI community, allowing us to develop new ideas together, through a model open for everybody, where we can inspire creativity and innovation.

This way, every user can be a part of our team - designing, creating, building and sharing new ways to use the SULI light.

We believe that the 3D printing world is the future.


 


___________________________________________________________________________

EVERY IDEA STARTS WITH A SMALL LIGHT.

For years we explored and developed different solar lighting solutions, until we realized we could create a portable solar module, able to be attached and fitted in different ways to change its functionality. 

And thus we created SULI - a solar module that charges during the day to shine in the night, adapting itself to a variety of situations.

___________________________________________________________________________

HELP US SHINE: CHALLENGES & GOALS.

Light is creativity and energy, therefore we are constantly developing new ideas and uses for SULI.

Our goals in the short and mid-term are to start our first massive production in China, then with your collaboration and feedback we can start the second stage of product development that will allow us to add amazing features such as a USB PORT to charge smartphones.

We want SULI to be even smarter than today, adding a BLUETOOTH that allows it to connect to a smartphone app and be controlled at distance, or putting many SULIs together, creating a big system that can shine even brighter and light up bigger spaces.

But today, our main goal is to make SULI a solution that can be within everybody´s reach. Help us spread the word and reach as many people as possible.



____________________________________________________________________________

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

We need the world to know SULI. Because we believe it can change the way we use light.

We need your support to complete the first batch production of SULI. 

We want to produce at least 500 units, and to have the manufacturing platform ready for massive production. The more support we receive, the lower the cost of production would be, enabling us to bring this light to those in most need.


___________________________________________________________________________

WHAT WE HAVE ACHIEVED SO FAR

In 2013 and 2014 we have been focused on developing and finishing the SULI module, also defining our vision and mission. 

This year we have been awarded with grants from Innova Chile of CORFO  through the Chrysalis incubator, which continues to support us in developing our business strategy.

We are also very proud to be part of the 2015 class of AGORA PARTNERSHIPS ACCELERATOR, an international nonprofit organization that supports social entrepreneurs in Latin America. 

With their help we are developing our model of social impact and our next steps as a social company.

We have been supported also by the IDB (InterAmerican Development Bank) to be part of the 2015 class of Agora Partnerships.



We have an alliance with America Solidaria, a nonprofit organization committed to social impact by helping vulnerable people throughout America, with projects in areas such as health, education and social development.

We also have an alliance with FabLab Santiago, a laboratory focused on experimentation in industrial development and new technologies. They are our hands and brain to develop the open-source platform and manufacture accessories using 3D printers.

We feel very proud of what we have accomplished so far, but we know it's just the beginning.

___________________________________________________________________________

OUR COMMITMENT: FOCUSING ON SOCIAL AND ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT

SULILAB (Sun Light Laboratory) is a company that seeks to implement the best practices in every field (social, environmental, human). 

In the short time of its existence, SULI has already received the B  Pending Corporation seal of approval, which guarantees our social commitment.

B Corporations redefine their commercial success in delivering solutions to social and environmental problems. To do this, they incorporate a commitment to generating a positive impact, operating under high standards of performance and transparency.

We continue to work towards eventually becoming a certified B Corporation, and therefore, part of the global community with the highest levels of social responsibility.

Our latest partner is Acera, the Chilean Asociation of Renewables Energies.

___________________________________________________________________________

OUR TEAM: THE SPIRIT OF SULI.

We believe our team is the key to today's and future success - passionate, motivated and full of ideas to create something truly meaningful. 
We come from diverse backgrounds, with deep experience in fields such as light design, social innovation, open-source models, production and marketing.


SULI LAB social company's first steps come from 2013, when the Chilean light company LUXIA, together with MICROLÓGICA INNOVACIÓN, a Chilean company committed to the development and manufacturing of technological products, decided to create a new light solution. 

In 2014 two amazing resources joined to complete the team: first RAYA, an expert agency in digital marketing, voted the best agency in Chile on 2014, and then CRISTIÁN O´RYAN, a social entrepreneur and passionate social innovator, former COO at Desafío Levantemos Chile, one of the 3 top nonprofit organization in Chile.


___________________________________________________________________________

REWARDS: A PROJECT THAT CAN SHINE WITH YOUR SUPPORT.

Today, SULI is a dream that is about to come true. We want everybody to have access to the energy of the sun and to be able to begin a shift to a more sustainable way of life.

Because with SULI you can illuminate your path, your home, your garden, and places and lives of many where electricity is a privilege.

SUPPORT US & THE CLEAN ENERGY OF SULI!

____________________________________________________________________________

ROUTE MAP




español

            ____________________  ::  ____________________               


CONOCE A SULI



                                   El primer modulo solar para todos.

La luz del sol está en todas partes, nos pertenece a todos, pero muy pocos tienen acceso a transformarla en energía usable para nuestra vida diaria.

SULI es un módulo solar que pretende cambiar este panorama, democratizando el acceso a la luz para todos. Es PATENT PENDING (2014-001840).


Empoderando a la gente.


Mezclando la energía sustentable del sol con el poder de la impresión 3D.



Unete a la revolución, se parte del cambio que quieres ver en el mundo y ayúdanos a cumplir nuestra próxima gran meta: Comenzar nuestra primera producción masiva. 

           

                                                TE NECESITAMOS.

____________________________________________________________________________

SULI EN LA PRENSA



___________________________________________________________________________

DETALLES TECNICOS

____________________________________________________________________________

MIRA LO QUE NUESTROS PARTNERS DICEN DE NOSOTROS

Por que deberías apoyarnos...


___________________________________________________________________________

ILUMINA TU VIDA: UN MÓDULO PARA DIFERENTES NECESIDADES

SULI es portátil, multifuncional, y permite adaptarse a distintos usos de la vida cotidiana a través de accesorios impresos en tecnología 3D.



___________________________________________________________________________

COMO FUNCIONA: ILUMINA TU BICICLETA, TU TRABAJO, TU TIEMPO, TU VIDA... UNA IMPRESION 3D A LA VEZ.

El modulo SULI se encaja a los diferentes accesorios 3D o a botellas PET a través de un sencillo sistema:


 


A una botella PET:

A un colgador:

A una ventana:



___________________________________________________________________________

NUEVO OBJETIVO: MASIFICAR Y DEMOCRATIZAR EL USO DE LAS ENERGÍAS RENOVABLES.


Sabemos que SULI es muy útil para las personas que hacen vida al aire libre, pero creemos que SULI puede entregar luz de calidad también a quienes no la tienen. 

Apaga tu luz por 5 segundos e imagina que en el mundo hay 1.4 billones de personas - casi 1 de cada 7 - que hoy no tienen acceso a la luz. 

Todas estas personas gastan su escaso presupuesto diario para comprar velas o lamparas de kerosene. Soluciones no renovables, tóxicas y peligrosas que causan 1 millón de muertes al año por intoxicación e incendios y un alto costo en enfermedades.

Sin luz los niños no pueden estudiar en las tardes, los emprendedores no pueden ser más productivos y las calles se vuelven más peligrosas

¡SUMATE y ayudanos a transformar esta realidad!

SULI es más que una lámpara solar. Es un modelo de impacto social, de innovación, en el que todos pueden acceder a la energía del sol. 

___________________________________________________________________________
NUESTRA PRIMERA INICIATIVA SOCIAL: LUZ PARA BOUTIN, HAITÍ.

Nuestro primer proyecto consistirá en instalar módulos SULI en la comunidad de Boutin, Haiti, en America Central.

Haití es el país con mayor pobreza en America y hace unos años sufrió un devastador terremoto. 

En Boutin viven cerca de 3.500 personas sin acceso a luz ni agua, además de 5 escuelas con aproximadamente 815 alumnos. En definitiva sin acceso a mejores oportunidades ni a una vida más digna.  

Para implementar este proyecto nos asociamos con AMERICA SOLIDARIA, una reconocida organización chilena sin fines de lucro con proyectos en todo America, en especial en Haití.

Su proyecto WASH entregará agua potable a la comunidad, instalando 5 pozos comunitarios de libre acceso. SULI se sumará a esta iniciativa iluminando estos pozos.

En segunda instancia apoyaremos a las escuelas entregándoles SULI para que los alumnos, padres y profesores puedan estudiar.

Por último, si el apoyo a esta campaña es suficientemente generoso, instalaremos SULIs en las casas.

Por eso, creamos una RECOMPENSA ESPECIAL para aquellas personas que pudiendo pagar un poco más, están dispuestas a facilitar que otra persona acceda a la iluminación solar de SULI.


___________________________________________________________________________

COMUNIDAD SULI: MODELO OPEN SOURCE

Queremos crear una comunidad SULI, que nos permita desarrollar nuevos usos para SULI en conjunto, a través de un modelo abierto a todos, potenciando la creatividad e innovación.

Así, todos los usuarios pueden diseñar, implementar y compartir NUEVOS USOS para el módulo SULI.

Esto, gracias a la creciente masificación de las impresoras 3D, que en el futuro serán una forma para que las personas puedan crear sus propios objetos.



___________________________________________________________________________

TODA IDEA COMIENZA COMO UNA PEQUEÑA LUZ

Durante años exploramos y desarrollamos distintas luminarias solares, hasta que nos dimos cuenta que podíamos crear un módulo solar portátil, que pudiera montarse o encajarse de distintas formas para ir cambiando su funcionalidad.


Así creamos SULI, un módulo solar base que se carga de día para brillar de noche, pudiéndose adaptarse a múltiples aplicaciones.

___________________________________________________________________________

AYÚDANOS A BRILLAR. DESAFIOS y METAS

La luz es creatividad y energía, por eso estamos constantemente pensando en nuevos usos y utilidades de SULI.

Nuestros objetivos en el corto y mediano plazo son lograr nuestra primera producción masiva, hacer un nueva desarrollo de producto que nos permita agregar funcionalidad a SULI, tal como carga de teléfonos celulares.

Queremos que SULI tenga Bluetooth, para poder instalar control es individuales conectados a tu Smartphone, incluso crear sistemas inteligentes que abarquen un espacio mayor y otorguen más luz. 

Pero hoy nuestro principal objetivo es hacer de SULI un producto que esté al alcance de todos. Para ello necesitamos llegar a la mayor cantidad de gente posible.


___________________________________________________________________________

PARA QUÉ NECESITAMOS TU AYUDA

Necesitamos que el mundo conozca SULI. Creemos que puede cambiar la forma de usar la luz.

Necesitamos tu apoyo para realizar la primera producción de SULI. Queremos hacer al menos 500 unidades, para poder tener todas las piezas listas para una producción masiva. Mientras mayor sea el apoyo, podremos producir SULI a un precio menor, y de esta forma llegar a quienes no tienen acceso a luz.

Además, este primer impulso y producción nos va a ayudar a seguir con las próximas etapas y desarrollos.



____________________________________________________________________________
LO QUE HEMOS LOGRADO HASTA AHORA

Durante el 2013 y 2014 nos hemos dedicado a desarrollar y terminar el producto SULI, y armar nuestra visión y misión del producto.

Este año recibimos fondos de Innova Chile de Corfo a través de la incubadora Chrysalis , quienes nos apoyan constantemente en mejorar nuestro plan de negocios.

Además somos parte de la clase 2015 de AGORA PARTNERSHIPS ACCELERATOR, una organización  sin fines de lucro que apoya a emprendedores sociales en América Latina con oficinas en Nicaragua, Washington y el Distrito Federal.

Junto a ellos estamos desarrollando nuestro plan de impacto social el cual también ha tenido el apoyo del BID (Banco Interamericano del Desarrollo).


CON FOCO EN EL DESARROLLO SOCIAL

Suli quiere ser una empresa que aspira siempre a tener las mejores prácticas, en todo ámbito (social, mediambiental, humano). En poco tiempo de vida, ya hemos recibido el Sello B Pendiente, lo que garantiza nuestro compromiso.

Las empresas B, redefinen su éxito comercial en la entrega de soluciones a problemas sociales y ambientales. Para ello, incorporan el compromiso de generar impactos positivos, operando con altos estándares de desempeño y transparencia

Seguimos trabajando para lograr, finalmente, convertirnos en una Empresa B certificada, y por ende, formar parte de la comunidad con el más alto nivel de empresas socialmente responsables.

Hemos hecho una alianza con America Solidaria, ONG que se involucra con las comunidades más vulnerables del continente, a través de proyectos de salud, educación y desarrollo económico familiar. Con ellos realizaremos nuestro primer proyecto de IMPACTO SOCIAL.

También tenemos una alianza con FabLab Santiago, que es un laboratorio de experimentación  en el área industrial y de nuevas tecnologías con ellos desarrollaremos y fabricaremos las plataformas Open Source de accesorios.

Nuestra más reciente alianza corresponde a Acera, Asociación Chilena de Energías Renovables.

___________________________________________________________________________
NUESTRO EQUIPO

Somos un equipo interdisciplinario, motivado y lleno de nuevas ideas.

SULI es una iniciativa que parte de la empresa chilena de iluminación LUXIA, junto con MICROLÓGICA INNOVACIÓN, empresa chilena dedicada al desarollo y manufactura de productos de tecnología. El 2014 se sumaron dos grandes aportes, RAYA, empresa experta en comunicación digital, y CRISTIÁN O´RYAN, quien tiene mucha experiencia en el trabajo con ONGs en proyectos sociales.



____________________________________________________________________________
RECOMPENSAS: UN PROYECTO QUE PUEDE BRILLAR CON TU AYUDA

Hoy, SULI es un sueño que está a punto de ser realidad. Queremos que todos puedan acceder a la energía del sol y a una vida sustentable. Porque con Suli puedes iluminar con alta calidad y de forma autónoma tu vuelta a casa, el patio de tus hijos, o llenar de vida lugares donde la energía eléctrica es un privilegio.

¡Colabora con nosotros y la energía limpia de Suli!


____________________________________________________________________________

MAPA DE RUTA



Mas información aqui

___________________________________________________________________________ILUMINA TU VIDA: UN MÓDULO PARA DIFERENTES NECESIDADESSULI es portátil, multifuncional, y permite adaptarse a distintos usos de la vida cotidiana a través de accesorios impresos en tecnología 3D.___________________________________________________________________________COMO FUNCIONA: ILUMINA TU BICICLETA, TU TRABAJO, TU TIEMPO, TU VIDA... UNA IMPRESION 3D A LA VEZ.El modulo SULI se encaja a los diferentes accesorios 3D o a botellas PET a través de un sencillo sistema: A una botella PET:A un colgador:A una ventana:___________________________________________________________________________NUEVO OBJETIVO: MASIFICAR Y DEMOCRATIZAR EL USO DE LAS ENERGÍAS RENOVABLES.


Sabemos que SULI es muy útil para las personas que hacen vida al aire libre, pero creemos que SULI puede entregar luz de calidad también a quienes no la tienen. 
Apaga tu luz por 5 segundos e imagina que en el mundo hay 1.4 billones de personas - casi 1 de cada 7 - que hoy no tienen acceso a la luz. 
Todas estas personas gastan su escaso presupuesto diario para comprar velas o lamparas de kerosene. Soluciones no renovables, tóxicas y peligrosas que causan 1 millón de muertes al año por intoxicación e incendios y un alto costo en enfermedades.
Sin luz los niños no pueden estudiar en las tardes, los emprendedores no pueden ser más productivos y las calles se vuelven más peligrosas
¡SUMATE y ayudanos a transformar esta realidad!
SULI es más que una lámpara solar. Es un modelo de impacto social, de innovación, en el que todos pueden acceder a la energía del sol. ___________________________________________________________________________NUESTRA PRIMERA INICIATIVA SOCIAL: LUZ PARA BOUTIN, HAITÍ.

Nuestro primer proyecto consistirá en instalar módulos SULI en la comunidad de Boutin, Haiti, en America Central.
Haití es el país con mayor pobreza en America y hace unos años sufrió un devastador terremoto. 
En Boutin viven cerca de 3.500 personas sin acceso a luz ni agua, además de 5 escuelas con aproximadamente 815 alumnos. En definitiva sin acceso a mejores oportunidades ni a una vida más digna.  
Para implementar este proyecto nos asociamos con AMERICA SOLIDARIA, una reconocida organización chilena sin fines de lucro con proyectos en todo America, en especial en Haití.
Su proyecto WASH entregará agua potable a la comunidad, instalando 5 pozos comunitarios de libre acceso. SULI se sumará a esta iniciativa iluminando estos pozos.
En segunda instancia apoyaremos a las escuelas entregándoles SULI para que los alumnos, padres y profesores puedan estudiar.
Por último, si el apoyo a esta campaña es suficientemente generoso, instalaremos SULIs en las casas.
Por eso, creamos una RECOMPENSA ESPECIAL para aquellas personas que pudiendo pagar un poco más, están dispuestas a facilitar que otra persona acceda a la iluminación solar de SULI.



___________________________________________________________________________


COMUNIDAD SULI: MODELO OPEN SOURCE
Queremos crear una comunidad SULI, que nos permita desarrollar nuevos usos para SULI en conjunto, a través
de un modelo abierto a todos, potenciando la creatividad e innovación.
Así,
todos los usuarios pueden diseñar, implementar y compartir NUEVOS USOS para el módulo SULI. 
Esto, gracias a la creciente masificación de las impresoras 3D, que en 
el futuro serán una forma para que las personas puedan crear sus propios
 objetos.



___________________________________________________________________________

TODA IDEA COMIENZA COMO UNA PEQUEÑA LUZ
Durante años exploramos y desarrollamos distintas luminarias solares, hasta que nos dimos cuenta que podíamos crear un módulo solar portátil, que pudiera montarse o encajarse de distintas formas para ir cambiando su funcionalidad.



Así creamos SULI, un módulo solar base que se carga de día para brillar de noche, pudiéndose adaptarse a múltiples aplicaciones.
___________________________________________________________________________
AYÚDANOS A BRILLAR. DESAFIOS y METAS 
La luz es creatividad y energía,
por eso estamos constantemente pensando en nuevos usos y utilidades de SULI. 

Nuestros
 objetivos en el corto y mediano plazo son lograr nuestra primera 
producción masiva, hacer un nueva desarrollo de producto que nos permita
 agregar funcionalidad a SULI, tal como carga de teléfonos celulares.
Queremos
 que SULI tenga Bluetooth, para poder instalar control es individuales 
conectados a tu Smartphone, incluso crear sistemas inteligentes que 
abarquen un espacio mayor y otorguen más luz. 
Pero
 hoy nuestro principal objetivo es hacer de SULI un producto que esté al
 alcance de todos. Para ello necesitamos llegar a la mayor cantidad de 
gente posible.



___________________________________________________________________________
PARA QUÉ NECESITAMOS TU AYUDA

Necesitamos que el mundo conozca SULI. Creemos que puede cambiar la forma de usar la luz. 
Necesitamos
 tu apoyo para realizar la primera producción de SULI. Queremos hacer al
 menos 500 unidades, para poder tener todas las piezas listas para una 
producción masiva. Mientras mayor sea el apoyo, podremos
producir SULI a un precio menor, y de esta forma llegar a quienes no 
tienen acceso a luz.


Además, este primer impulso y
producción nos va a ayudar a seguir con las próximas etapas y desarrollos.

____________________________________________________________________________LO QUE HEMOS LOGRADO HASTA AHORADurante el 2013 y 2014 nos hemos dedicado a desarrollar y
terminar el producto SULI, y armar nuestra visión y misión del producto. 
Este año recibimos fondos de Innova Chile  de Corfo a través de la incubadora  Chrysalis , quienes nos apoyan
constantemente en mejorar nuestro plan de negocios. 
Además somos parte de la clase 2015 de AGORA PARTNERSHIPS ACCELERATOR,
 una organización  sin fines de lucro que apoya a emprendedores
sociales en América Latina con oficinas en Nicaragua, Washington y el 
Distrito Federal. 
Junto a ellos estamos desarrollando nuestro plan de 
impacto social el
cual también ha tenido el apoyo del BID
(Banco Interamericano del Desarrollo). 

CON FOCO EN EL DESARROLLO SOCIAL

Suli quiere ser una empresa que aspira siempre a tener las mejores 
prácticas, en todo ámbito (social, mediambiental, humano). En poco 
tiempo de vida, ya hemos recibido el Sello B Pendiente, lo que garantiza
 nuestro compromiso.
Las empresas
B, redefinen su éxito comercial en la entrega de soluciones a problemas
sociales y ambientales. Para ello, incorporan el compromiso de generar impactos
positivos, operando con altos estándares de desempeño y transparencia
Seguimos trabajando para lograr,
finalmente, convertirnos en una Empresa B certificada, y por ende, formar parte
de la comunidad con el más alto nivel de empresas socialmente responsables.
Hemos hecho una alianza con  America Solidaria,
 ONG que se involucra con las comunidades más vulnerables del 
continente,
a través de proyectos de salud, educación y desarrollo económico 
familiar. Con ellos realizaremos nuestro primer proyecto de IMPACTO 
SOCIAL.


También tenemos una alianza con FabLab Santiago, que es un laboratorio de experimentación  en el área industrial y de nuevas tecnologías
con ellos desarrollaremos y fabricaremos las plataformas Open Source de
accesorios. 
Nuestra más reciente alianza corresponde a Acera, Asociación Chilena de Energías Renovables.___________________________________________________________________________NUESTRO EQUIPOSomos un equipo interdisciplinario, motivado y lleno de nuevas ideas.SULI es una iniciativa que parte de la empresa chilena de iluminación LUXIA, junto con MICROLÓGICA INNOVACIÓN, empresa chilena dedicada al desarollo y manufactura de productos de tecnología. El 2014 se sumaron dos grandes aportes, RAYA,
 empresa experta en comunicación digital, y CRISTIÁN O´RYAN, quien tiene
 mucha experiencia en el trabajo con ONGs en proyectos sociales.
____________________________________________________________________________RECOMPENSAS: UN PROYECTO QUE PUEDE BRILLAR CON TU AYUDAHoy,
 SULI es un sueño que está a punto de ser realidad. Queremos que todos 
puedan acceder a la energía del sol y a una vida sustentable. Porque con
 Suli puedes iluminar con alta calidad y de forma autónoma tu vuelta a 
casa, el patio de tus hijos, o llenar de vida lugares donde la energía 
eléctrica es un privilegio.
¡Colabora con nosotros y la energía limpia de Suli! 

____________________________________________________________________________MAPA DE RUTA



Mas información aqui

story:
For those who want to:

  • Navigate the Internet privately and securely via public Wi-Fi, Ethernet or 4G.
  • Connect all their devices safely any easily regardless of their type and OS.
  • Securely protect their data traffic against hackers.
  • Access websites even if they were blocked or geographically restricted.


What is
IncognIt.Travel VPN router?


IncognIt.Travel is a compact Wi-Fi router-anonymizer that helps establish a private and secure connection to the Internet outside of the home via public Wi-Fi, 3G/4G/LTE and Ethernet networks.
Multiple options of Internet connection allow you to feel as safe as at home, wherever you are – in a cafe, on a business-trip, on holiday or travelling.


  • IncognIt.Travel is automatically connected to VPN servers and gets a new IP address in the country of the user’s choice. After this the traffic of all devices connected to the router becomes anonymous.
  • Changing user’s real IP address for an address in another country, IncognIt.Travel opens the websites that used to be inaccessible because of website blockings and geographical restrictions.
  • IncognIt.Travel transfers data over open networks along encrypted VPN channels. All your traffic is securely protected against intruders and strangers’ eyes.

The router is already configured for the VPN connection,
you just need to choose the country (server)!


Read on or jump to:
  • What can you do with IncognIt.Travel
  • VPN service in IncognIt.Travel
  • IncogniTime VPN service advantages
  • IncognIt.Travel advantages
  • Compare it yourself
  • Special offer
  • Stretch goals
  • About us
  • Contact us


Where do you need
IncognIt.Travel VPN router?


...and many other places, where you connect to the Internet via public network with low security and privacy level.

Of course, you can use IncognIt.Travel router at home too. Just connect it to your usual (non-VPN) router via the LAN-port. But for home users we have a more powerful IncognIt.Home router with dual-band Wi-Fi up to to 300+867 Mbit/s, Gigabit LAN-ports and Gigabit WAN port.



What can you do
with IncognIt.Travel VPN router?


 Connect to the Internet via public Wi-Fi, Ethernet or 3G/4G/LTE.

Create your own Wi-Fi network, even if you have only Ethernet or 4G connection to the Internet.

Connect all your devices to this private and secure Wi-Fi network regardless of their type and operating system.

Securely protect all your data traffic against strangers’ eyes and hackers.

Open your favorite websites no matter where you are, even if they were inaccessible because of geographical restrictions or website blockings.


Which VPN service is used
in IncognIt.Travel VPN router?


IncognIt.Travel router uses its own VPN service IncogniTime. It allows you to connect to our VPN servers located in North and South America, Western and Eastern Europe, Asia, Africa and Oceania.

There are different IncogniTime packs depending on their validity – 1, 3, 6 and 12 months. The regular price of IncogniTime VPN service is:

But we have a special offer with the purchase of IncognIt.Travel router-anonymizer. A discount of up to 75%! (See below).



What are the advantages
of IncogniTime VPN service?


 Unlimited capabilities:
  • Unlimited number of connected devices.
  • Unlimited traffic.
  • Unlimited bandwidth.
  • Unlimited number of servers switches.

Security and privacy:
  • 256-bit data encryption.
  • No logs on the VPN-servers.
  • DNS leak protection.

Supported services:
  • Torrent (p2p).
  • Tor and I2P.
  • Streaming video (Netflix, Hulu, etc.)
  • VoIP (Skype, Viber, etc.) and
    IM (ICQ, WhatsApp, etc.).


How does IncognIt.Travel work with Tor or I2P networks?

It's easy!
You can surf dark web resources (Tor or I2P) over VPN without any software installation.
Just choose this option in VPN servers filter and find special VPN server for Tor/I2P.



What are the advantages
of IncognIt.Travel VPN router?


  • Built-in VPN service that does not require any configuration either of the router itself or end devices.
  • Native VPN support by chipset.
  • Full speed VPN connection.
  • VPN settings control using a browser add-on.
  • One of the best technical characteristics in its class:



Compare it yourself




Special offer


Retail price of IncognIt.Travel router in our web store will be $39 with 1 month IncogniTime VPN service.
The EarlyBird special offer is:

For those who want to buy in bulk:

10x (IncognIt.Travel + 12 month VPN service) - $549. Additional savings $41.
10x (IncognIt.Travel + 24 month VPN service) - $929. Additional savings $61.


IncognIt.Travel router will be available in May 2016.


Shipping

Delivery is carried out by ChinaPost from our warehouse in China. The price of shipping is $12. The delivery terms depend on the country of delivery and is usually between 5 and 20 days.


On top of that

  • 10% discount for IncognIt.Home router.
  • 10% lifetime discount for any future IncogniTeam services (for example, Encryption cloud service).


Stretch goals


Funding goal - $20000.
If we reach this goal we’ll be able to start the production of IncognIt.Travel right now, without waiting for the turnout and sale of the first lot of IncognIt.Home.

Stretch goal 1 - $40000.
Right now we have servers in 13 countries. We are able to considerably increase their number for you and we’d like to do so.

Stretch goal 2 - $80000.
There is no such thing as partial security. More and more often, using firewall, VPN and other means, users keep their data not in their secured computers but in cloud storages. And this data is not secured by anything. That’s why we started the development of our own encryption cloud, accessible only over VPN for our users. Thus we’ll be able to ensure safety and privacy of their data.
Obviously, everyone who helped us on Indiegogo will get this service with a discount.



About us

We have created an international team coming from different countries – Estonia, Russia, Ukraine, Israel, China, etc. The Internet enabled us to bring together great engineers, software developers, designers and translators to make the kind of VPN that we would like to use ourselves – without complicated settings, without any restrictions on the number and type of devices, without speed losses, without anything that may seem unnecessary. A VPN that you just need to switch on in order to feel free and secure. This is available to anyone, even to those who seem to know little about computer technologies.

In some of the countries where we live there exist Internet restrictions and censorship, so we managed to get to know all the leading VPN-servers well before we started making our own one.

IncogniTeam Company is registered in Estonia – a comfortable European country, hospitable to IT-projects. To bring our ideas to life we invited as a Managing Director a man having a wealth of experience in carrying out similar projects – the development and production of internet devices for different applications. It was of particular importance for us that he should know the process of internet connection not only from the point of view of the end-user or someone who knows the device (router), but also from the point of view of the internet-provider – it would be difficult for us to do so without it.

We started with the development of a stationary, home version of the VPN-router IncognIt.Home. It has already gone into production and it will be on sale in January, 2016. But you can place a free pre-order now and get a 10% discount.

However, reading the very first comments of our would-be users, we understood that people need privacy and security everywhere, wherever they might be. Moreover, out of home – connecting via open public networks in a café, hotel, in another country – and you can’t do this without VPN. So we started the development of the compact router IncognIt.Travel version that we’re introducing here.



Contact us


If you have any questions, please contact us at info@incogniteam.com.



IncognIt. Welcome to the Masked World!

story:
A lot of parties or gatherings can get static quickly. They usually follow the same routine. Whenever you throw a party or have a small gathering, you never want it to be boring. You want to be known to host a good time. However, it’s often challenging to find new ways to jazz up the night - without going too crazy of course.

Because it’s unlike any other and it’s made for parties, it’s sure to be an experience that people will enjoy and remember.

 

 

You won’t find another liquor decanter like this. ShotsClub comes with 2 gun decanters made of thick quality glass, a holster to handle each gun, 8 traditional shot glasses, and a durable case with protective padding.

Just add your favorite whiskey and it’s everything you need for a good time.

 

Showing up to a party with ShotsClub is greater than showing up to a party with chips or a 6-pack.

With ShotsClub, you’re showing up with an experience to offer. Sometimes it isn’t enough to just go to a party, show up and be the party!

The briefcase alone hints to the crowd that the party is about to be taken to the next level. So when you open it up and show off your guns, everyone will surely want to be a part of the fun that you have to offer!

Take ShotsClub to your next house party, tailgate party, or even a chill kickback. It has everything you need and it’s always ready to go.

 

ShotsClub is truly a great gift - for yourself, your friend, or a family member who really appreciates his whiskey. You don’t even have to wrap it. It’s ready to go as is. And when it’s used at a party or a gathering, share the fun experiences with those in your circle.

Everyone has their own hobbies and interests. For some it’s gun collecting, for others is whiskey. But we all share the interest of sharing our interests. Where’s the fun in collecting whiskey if you aren’t going to share those experiences with others. ShotsClub merges all of these hobbies so that you can create unique and fun times.

Share a part of yourself with your family and friends all over some great convo and some great whiskey. After all, life is too short not to.

 

I’m ready to make ShotsClub a reality. This is the last step to bring it into the marketplace. With your support, we can bring ShotsClub into the party scene and help get the party started.

story:
Uplift 2.0 creates a mesmerising, never-ending spiral that inspires you to unwind, as it gracefully turns the sun's power into a hypnotic flowing motion.

The limited edition spiral is made from an industrially purified stream of waste fishing nets, sourced from the Hake Fisheries in Cornwall, England. 

Our mission is to lift the spirits of a stressed out world - so we make products that are good for our minds and good for our planet.

 

 

 

 

 

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING

 

 

UPLIFT 2.0 - GOOD FOR OUR MINDS, GOOD FOR OUR PLANET

 

  • Feel yourself unwind with Uplift 2.0, a spiralling kinetic sculpture powered by the sun.
  • Limited edition aquamarine spiral beautifully re-manufactured from waste fishing nets
  • A beautiful, mesmeric & silent Spiral sculpture to raise your spirit
  • Uplift 2.0 rotates gently, adding a peaceful dynamic presence to your Home or Office
  • Encased within a transparent Glass dome, the aquamarine wing, uniquely, is made from the recycled waste Fishing Nets of the Hake Fisheries in Cornwall, England
  • Sea blue at the edge, Ocean deep at its heart
  • The spirals are manufactured with 100% purified waste fishing nets

 

HI! I’M TOM LAWTON, DESIGNER AND INVENTOR

 

 
 
LET IT FLOW, LET IT GO
 
The spiral can turn freely in either direction - so we like this simple philosophy.

 

 

MAGNETIC WAND

You can of course choose which way it turns by interacting with the spiral using the magnetic wand provided.

 

 

LIFELONG PEACE

Designed to last a lifetime and made from responsibly sourced materials, including waste fishing nets which we use to re-manufacture the spiral. Each unit is hand-assembled in the UK.

 

 

ALWAYS RELAXING


Uplift 2.0 loves a sunny window sill but still works well under an overcast sky. It responds subtly to variations in the sun's power and its speed is tethered at a relaxing 40 revolutions per minute.

 

 

 

 

WHAT YOU GET

 

Each Uplift 2.0 is:

 

  • Made with love to last a lifetime, so please handle with care
  • Available to pre-order now with worldwide delivery June 2020
  • Limited in edition to a batch of 1,000 units all designed, manufactured and assembled by hand in England
  • Spirals are manufactured with 100% purified waste fishing nets sourced from the Hake Fisheries in Cornwall. Processed on the harbour side. Remanufactured in Shropshire. Assembled by hand in little old Malmesbury!

 

 PERKS

 

 

Shipping

Uplift 2.0 is available worldwide. Each boxed unit measures approximately 40 x 30 x 15 cm, weighs 1.2 kg and contains all parts carefully packed in the best way possible for us to get it safely to your door.

Costs are as follows for single pledges:

  •  UK | £10 Next Day Special Delivery (Tracked & Signed)
  •  Europe | £18 5-7 Days Signed & Tracked Delivery
  •  USA | £27 5-7 Days Signed & Tracked Delivery
  •  Rest of World | £35 7-10 Days Signed & Tracked Delivery

 

For double pack pledges we add 50% to shipping cost e.g. Europe is £18 + 50% = £27.

THE STORY SO FAR

 

We ran a successful Kickstarter campaign in December 2019 that allowed us to get the ball rolling. That generated a demand for 400 units but we're going to make 1,000!

We've already ordered 100kg of processed and purified waste fishing nets in order to produce our first limited edition run of Uplift 2.0's - this equates to recycling roughly 15 large industrial nets that would have otherwise gone in to landfill

Tooling is underway up the road in Shropshire with pilot tests through March. While some other parts are in production in China, like our glass, we are on schedule for delivery worldwide from June 2020.

The more units we make, the more waste nets we can use up and the more we use up, the less waste there will be - encouraging consumers to make a difference by consciously supporting a product with good environmental credentials and demonstrating a real story of material provenance and application; inspiring manufacturers to get creative and join the blue circular movement


OUR TEAM & PARTNERS

Uplift 2.0 is the more evolved descendant of the original Uplift, which was developed by myself, friend and longtime collaborator Ben Jandrell, a micro-renewable energy expert and engineer with a fascination for doing cool things with very little power. We've learned an enormous amount having hand-made and shipped over 400 precision-tuned Uplift units ourselves and made numerous improvements to the design of Uplift 2.0.


Tom Lawton


This isn't my first environmentally conscious product design - I recently launched Million Mile Light, an Award Winning battery-free safety light for runners & walkers that's powered by motion and over a decade ago I won the Green Dot Award (LA) / Sustainable Design Award (London) for a wind-powered spiralling outdoor light called Firewinder.


Fishy Filaments

 

We’re working with Fishy Filaments in Cornwall to source and process the waste fishing nets using their proprietary technology and unique partnership with the Cornish Hake Fisheries. They are able to supply us purified fishing nets as micropellets and we are proud to be the first customer to injection mould with it.

 

 

Plastic-IT

 

We’re working with Plastic-IT in Shropshire to injection mould the individual parts that make the spiral. As an artisan injection moulding firm they are experienced in running leftfield and experimental manufacturing projects and we feel in safe hands with their family owned business.

 

 

WE’RE ON OUR WAY BUT JOIN US AND TOGETHER WE CAN DO MORE!

 

Each spiral uses 100g of recycled material, our first production batch of Uplift 2.0's have made a saving of 9.079 tons CO2-eq vs using virgin nylon.

 

"Recycled waste nylon is 46 times better for the planet than using virgin nylon. It terms of environmental impact 1kg of Fishy Filaments micro pellet costs 0.201kg of CO2-eq vs 9.28kg CO2-eq for a global reference Nylon 6. " - Ian Falconer, Fishy Filaments

 

We are excited about the potential to recycle and re-manufacture even more of - turning beauty back from the beast! Please join us, lead the way and help calm this chaotic world.

story:
To all lovers of the Wharton School of Business!!!

I'm a first year MBA in the Class of 2015, and a humble participant in the Wharton International Volunteer Program's Charity Date Auction, which will take place at Pub
on 11/21! WIVP is a non-profit dedicated to providing consulting services and resources to social impact organizations in developing countries. Needless to say, myself as well as the countless other students taking part in the event would really appreciate your support with bids… it’s for a great cause, and the
support will certainly help calm our nerves when we have to strut our stuff on stage for the dance performance :-).

But I know what you’re thinking… why on earth would I want
to go on a date with a guy that fakes it till he makes it??? (I mean that in a
completely professional tone…) Just to provide some added incentives, I’ve put
together some awards for the highest bidders (please note these perks are only available to students within the Wharton community):


Prize 1: Day-Trip to the Baseball Hall of Fame in Cooperstown, NY  - Spring ‘14 (Minimum Bid: $75 – Four Highest Bids Win)

I’ll be driving a group of four people up to
Cooperstown for the day. Travel expenses and the price of admission will all be
covered. Most importantly, the visit will include a tour of the Archives, a
section of the Hall where items not on display are stored for future use. This
will be an area where you’ll have the opportunity to hold and touch priceless
baseball collectibles – Real World Series Trophies, Uniforms and Equipment used
by your favorite players, and more. Plus, you’ll have a designated driver (ME)
so that you can wash down the full experience with a cold beer afterwards.


Prize 2: House Party destroy your apartment? NO PROBLEM: LET ME CLEAN UP (Minimum Bid: $35 – Two Highest Bids Wins)

Did your most recent 80’s Rager Kegerator get a
little out of control? Living with the consequences come 11am the next day? NO
PROBLEM. I’ll come over and clean your apartment for you. Sit back and bask in
the beauty of your hangover… indulge in a nice mimosa… your cleaning duties
will be a thing of the past. All I ask for is three days-notice for the event.
Come the following morning, I’m all yours.


Prize 3: Girls Night Out – Designated Driver / Card-Dealer / Party Planner    (Minimum Bid: $20 – Two Highest Bids Wins)

To all my favorite C4 Tiger-Ladies… have you
been wanting to throw a girls night out, but just haven’t found the time to
execute your master plan? LET ME BE OF ASSISTANCE. Have you wanted to drive out to Manayunk, but worry about the transportation? Let me be your designated
driver. Looking to have a girls-poker night, but can’t find a card-dealer? I’m
all yours. Need a planner for your Laser Tag shenanigans? My phone and calendar
are at the ready. LET ME BE YOUR PERSONAL ASSISTANT TO HELP THROW A GIRL’S NIGHT FOR THE AGES!!!

 

Prize 4: Morin vs. Brett Eating Contest with a Food of YOUR CHOICE

(Minimum Bid: $100 - Highest Overall Bid Wins)

After speaking with our fearless leader, we both have agreed to an eating contest of epic proportions. Whoever provides the highest bid to my campaign over $100 will have the privilege of choosing any food item … ANY EDIBLE ITEM… to serve as the “flow unit” for a two-minute eating contest between myself and Eric at the first Cluster Supper of second semester.

Thank you for your support... whether you're bidding for love or bidding for the prizes, just know you're bidding for a great cause :-).

story:
Now is the time for new coffee. A lot of coffee brands such as Starbucks, Stumptown Coffee and Blue Bottle Coffee are selling cold brew and nitro coffee so that you can enjoy them in their coffeehouses or at home. Cold brew and nitro coffee offer you rich flavor and creamy texture of black beer that you have never experienced in normal coffee.

Brewing Company developed and tested products like Nitro Cold Brew Coffee Solutions with which you can enjoy cold brew and nitro coffee wherever you want.

 

 

 

The combination of cold brew coffee and nitrogen at low temperature leads to molecular deformation that minimizes sour taste and increase chocolate-like taste and blackcurrant flavor.

Nitro coffee has a lot of advantages including excellent taste and flavor. 

Nitro King is a way for you to enjoy expensive nitro coffee at affordable cost. You may easily make cold brew coffee with My Cold Brew and now you can use cold brew coffee to make nitro coffee with creamy texture of black beer.

 

 

Nitro King is based on a motif of a lion, the king of animals, meaning that Nitro King will be the world’s best nitro coffee maker.

Nitro King is not something that is mass produced in a factory just like glass or stationery.

Nitro King is an assembly of 4 respective parts produced from 4 different manufacturers. Our Nitro King focuses on 2 of these 4 parts. It is similar to other product  that it has a keg but Nitro King has a premium stout faucet with creamy plate and coffee spear newly developed that combines nitro gas. The difference in performance of those parts lead to a totally different product. And the actual appearance will also differ. Therefore there might be no other one with the same structure and functions as Nitro King.

The essence of Nitro King is a coffee spear that connects the stainless steel body to the faucet.

The stout faucet used in Nitro King is equipped with a creamy plate that produces rich cream with texture of black beer, offering an optimized design to make nitro coffee with quality taste.

Creamy plate is a device that facilitate bubble generation when extracting nitro cold brew coffee.

Nitro King was intended for users to make nitro coffee with a small amount of gas unlike the ones in existing coffeehouses.

Nitro King is a nitro coffee maker that you can use at home and it was intended for users to make nitro coffee with a small amount of gas unlike the ones in existing coffeehouses.

We have planned the production of Nitro King with an intention to make more people enjoy nitro coffee at home. Nitro King is the one with which you can make the best nitro coffee and it is totally different from existing keg systems.

Nitro King can replace all of the 3 different tools.

You need a nitrogen container, a large keg container and a tower in connection, if you want to enjoy nitro coffee at home. With Nitro King, however, you don’t need complicated connections to enjoy creamy and sweet nitro coffee at home and in your office.

 

 

 

 

  • Pour the cold brew coffee into the main body of Nitro King.
  • Combine the handle with the faucet and then assemble them with the coffee spear to combine with the main body.

  • Put the nitrogen gas into the cartridge shell.
  • Combine the cartridge shell with the coffee spear of Nitro King. 
  • Fix it to the spiral line and then rotate it until you hear a sound like blowing off from a bicycle tire.

  • Shake it so that the cold brew coffee can be fully mixed with nitrogen and leave it to be ripe for 1 hour. 
  • Place the glass to the nozzle and then pull the handle to the front slowly.

 

  • When you put the nitrogen gas into the cartridge shell and rotate it, you will hear ‘whistle’ sound. Rotate it until the sound stops. Do not exercise too much force to rotate it.  
  • Where only nitrogen is discharged due to lack of coffee, when extracting the nitro coffee, pull the handle grip to the front to completely remove the nitrogen gas

 

 

 Cascading : Bubbles that sink like a small waterfall and then rise again

 

 

When you extract nitro coffee, you can see cascading like a waterfall that rises again. Soft but rich flavor will make you experience a whole new world of iced coffee.
 
 
 
We cannot provide nitrogen gas as it is prohibited on the plane. You may purchase it on online markets such as Amazon.com or eBay. And you can also find it in your local coffee goods stores.
 
 
 
 
 

Sailors who transported coffee to Europe had devised a lot of methods to enjoy coffee during their long-term sailing. One of those methods was Dutch coffee which is also called Japanese-style slow drip iced coffee. Dripping coffee with cold water makes coffee less bitter and sweeter with unique taste and flavor through ripening over time.

Cold Brew Coffee is distinctive in that you don’t extract coffee by dripping water drop by drop but extract cold brew coffee in refrigeration. So you can enjoy oily taste and rich flavor that you cannot have from Dutch coffee.

 

 

Cold brew coffee has a lot of characteristics different from those of coffee with hot water dripping. Cold brew coffee is made of coffee beans ground into particles of a size similar to that of grain sugar in an extractor and then mixed with water at the room temperature for cold storage.

A combination of ground coffee beans and room temperature water causes chemical reaction to extract elements that produce taste and flavor of coffee. Coffee extracted with hot water has full body and stronger flavor with bitter and and sour taste than cold brew coffee.

Cold brew coffee is less bitter and sour but sweeter and oilier and is available for cold storage for 2 to 4 weeks and its taste and flavor last long.

 

 

In order to enjoy nitro coffee at home, you need cold brew coffee. Of course, there are a lot of people who already have tools to make cold brew coffee. However, you can easily make cold brew coffee for Nitro King with My Cold Brew.

 

 

Cold brew coffee from My Cold Brew has sweet taste of the coffee itself with less sour taste and sweeter body texture.

  • My Cold Brew 
  • Borosoilicate glass+18/8 stainless steel 
  • 99X69X260mm 
  • 1000ml

 

 

  • Portable manual coffee grinder 
  • The main body is made of stainless steel materials with ceramic blade, detachable grip and collar for easy storage and use. 

  • My Grinder
  • Stainless steel body, Ceramic burrs
  • 50X180mm
  • 30g

 

 

  • Ergonomic opening/closing design 
  • Folding straw

  • My Can Tumbler
  • Body(stainless steel), Lid(PP), Straw(PP)
  • 70 X 165mm
  • 400ml

 

  Enjoy nitro coffee with creamy bubbles like black beer and sweet taste

You can enjoy nitro coffee with creamy bubbles like black beer and sweet taste with Nitro King.

Pull the stout handle and enjoy nitro cold brew coffee

 

 

The coffee spear used in Nitro King is designed to contain a small amount of n2o gas unlike existing keg systems and therefore you can enjoy nitro coffee at home, which has been available in coffeehouses only. In addition, you can also make a variety of drinks with n2o gas.

 

 

Coffee is a mysterious drink with a variety of tastes and flavors. Tastes and flavors vary depending on how you extract coffee. The biggest difference comes from whether you extract it from hot water or cold water.

We have planned equipment with which you can easily make cold brew and nitro coffee at home or in your office with the same taste and flavor that you can enjoy at coffeehouses. In order to produce it, we decided to start our campaign on kickstarter to get your backing.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Once the campaign ends, we will examine the number of backers to our campaign and prepare cold brew coffee solutions.  

It will take about 2 months to prepare all the products and, once they are prepared, we will arrange delivery by air freight.  

Please understand that air freight is expensive unlike usual domestic delivery and the delivery schedule may vary depending on transport conditions in your country.

 * Once the delivery starts, we will provide tracking numbers for all the supporters.*

 

 

Brewing Company is a coffee business that provides solutions related to cold brew and nitro coffee. We design and produce cold brew coffee tools for home use and the ones for coffeehouses to produce a large amount of cold brew coffee. In addition, we also provide products packaged with cold brew coffee materials so that you can enjoy a variety of cold brew coffee. 

We have developed and tested a product called Nitro King. Nitro coffee is a combination of cold brew coffee and nitrogen that offers the texture of creamy black beer. Nitro King makes you enjoy nitro coffee that has been available only at coffeehouses such as Starbucks and Stumptown Coffee at home. 

Brewing Company will continue to develope equipment and products for coffee beear with new taste and flavor by blending coffee and beer.

   Enjoy nitro coffee with creamy bubbles like black beer and sweet tasteYou can enjoy nitro coffee with creamy bubbles like black beer and sweet taste with Nitro King.Pull the stout handle and enjoy nitro cold brew coffee  The coffee spear used in Nitro King is designed to contain a small amount of n2o gas unlike existing keg systems and therefore you can enjoy nitro coffee at home, which has been available in coffeehouses only. In addition, you can also make a variety of drinks with n2o gas.  Coffee is a mysterious drink with a variety of tastes and flavors. Tastes and flavors vary depending on how you extract coffee. The biggest difference comes from whether you extract it from hot water or cold water.We have planned equipment with which you can easily make cold brew and nitro coffee at home or in your office with the same taste and flavor that you can enjoy at coffeehouses. In order to produce it, we decided to start our campaign on kickstarter to get your backing.      Once the campaign ends, we will examine the number of backers to our campaign and prepare cold brew coffee solutions.  It will take about 2 months to prepare all the products and, once they are prepared, we will arrange delivery by air freight.  Please understand that air freight is expensive unlike usual domestic delivery and the delivery schedule may vary depending on transport conditions in your country. * Once the delivery starts, we will provide tracking numbers for all the supporters.*  Brewing Company is a coffee business that provides solutions related to cold brew and nitro coffee. We design and produce cold brew coffee tools for home use and the ones for coffeehouses to produce a large amount of cold brew coffee. In addition, we also provide products packaged with cold brew coffee materials so that you can enjoy a variety of cold brew coffee. We have developed and tested a product called Nitro King. Nitro coffee is a combination of cold brew coffee and nitrogen that offers the texture of creamy black beer. Nitro King makes you enjoy nitro coffee that has been available only at coffeehouses such as Starbucks and Stumptown Coffee at home. Brewing Company will continue to develope equipment and products for coffee beear with new taste and flavor by blending coffee and beer.

  • Avoid sitting in the bad posture
  • Relax your back while sitting
  • Being convenient to carry

Smart Design, Very Compact And Light

Compact size, lightweight makes it easy to carry ComfortC anywhere in an extremely convenient way.

Various Levels Of Reclining, Ensuring An Absolute Comfort

An Extremely Solid Iron Frame

The ComfortC frame is made of high-quality steel that gives it a maximum lifting power of up to 180 lbs

story:
More pillow, less "cloud"

Ahhh, the sun. Getting up when it rises and resting when it sets....in our dreams!

These nights, our eyes fall shut to the glow of smartphones, cat videos, and mass emails—

Just to open again when a work text yanks us awake in the morning. 

Cockadoodle don't.  

Not to say that we don’t love technology. We do. But let’s face it: We’re all a bit addicted. 

And with many of us working from home right now, screen time has gone up, not down. 

What happened to unplugging? To taking space? To calm evenings and bright mornings?

 

 

Start happy

We’re Loftie, a brand dedicated to creating better tech-life balance for people everywhere.

Because technology is only as good as the way it makes us feel, 

we design things that make you feel optimally rested, relaxed, and refreshed. Happy. 

And now, with a little help from you, we’re out to retake slumberland. 

One good night's sleep at a time.

 

 

The alarm clock for non-alarmists

Loftie is the best thing that's ever happened to your nightstand, and your wellbeing. 

 

 

It features a dimmable display, nightlight, two-phase alarm, and custom content playable right on the device, including guided meditations, sound baths, breathwork exercises, sleep playlists, plus a variety of relaxing sounds.

 

 

Its sturdy, analog feel is reassuring. No small feat in a category that hasn’t been updated since the ‘80’s.

In short, it’s everything you need for a cozier bedroom vibe.

 

 

 

Open your eyes not your email

What’s equally important though, is everything Loftie doesn’t do: Connect to your email, apps, and social media, and all the anxiety they bring along.  

That’s because, while most of us default to our smartphone’s alarm, research shows that removing technology from the bedroom is one of the best ways to enhance sleep length and quality. Sounds dreamy, no?

 

 

A better sleep, by design 

Loftie is the most intuitive and reliable alarm clock in the world, from the texture of its buttons to the light of its display to the sounds that put you to sleep and wake you up. Let’s dive under the covers for a look at the features.

 

 

Everything you need, nothing you don’t 

Quality analog feel, timeless form, and thoughtful technology come together in a clock you’ll be proud to have on your nightstand.

 

 

Wake up, sleepyhead

Our two-phase alarm system was designed for the way humans actually wake up: In two distinct stages. The first sound gently lulls you out of your slumber while the second gets you out of bed and into your day.

 

 

The bed signal 

A warm glow from from the built-in nightlight signals it’s time to start thinking about drifting off.

 

 

Shhhhh…..

Meditations, Sound baths, and Breathwork. Unique content from the best instructors out there, now available on your nightstand—no phone required. Plus: Storytime is back and it’s going to knock your slippers off.

 

 

Sounds for sound sleep

Scientifically calibrated white, brown, and pink noises (plus nature sounds, naturally) to lull you to sleep and keep you there. They fade out before your alarm goes off so your brain doesn’t get mixed messages.

 

 

No app necessary

But there’s a great one if you want it—available for both iOS and Android. Set your alarm remotely. Schedule multiple alarms or alarms that vary day-by-day. Plus, you can pre-select one of your own playlists to make winding down even easier.

 

The Science

“But I love my smartphone, what’s wrong with having it next to my bed?” you ask.

The short answer? Science. (The longer answer is also science).

 


Think about it this way: Daytime technology is bad for the bedtime brain, whether we're quarantined or not. Why?

  • We scroll when we should be sleeping.
  • The stuff we look at makes us feel awake and alert when our brains and bodies are begging for rest.
  • The blue light from our phones tells our brain not to make melatonin (the hormone that tells your body it's time to go to sleep). See you at 3 AM. 

Then, when it comes to waking up, smartphones do us harm again. We're hit with a barrage of outside stressors right as we tune into consciousness. Studies show that leaving our phones outside the bedroom makes us happier—and more likely to maintain healthy phone behaviors throughout the day. We are creatures of habit after all—and when we remove temptation from our environment, it makes it easier for us to change our behavior. 

Not convinced? Check out this super interesting study about the effects smartphones have on social interaction and focus. TLDR: Just having the phone in our sight makes us less capable of having a linear conversation or finishing a task. Going to bed and waking up included. 

In case it's not clear: We are strongly recommending you to stop using your phone as an alarm clock. But don’t worry, this bedtime story does not end with you having to get rid of it entirely. 

It does, however, encourage you (nudge nudge) to get a Loftie, and get back to sleeping and waking, well, like a human. 

 

A Quick Recap

 

Let's all just go back to sleep

For that to happen, though, we need your help. 

We’ve done research, prototyping, iterating, more research, more prototyping. 

 

 

 

We’ve partnered with DorisDev, the brilliant product development minds behind Great Jones, by Humankind, and Judy (humble brag). We’re currently working on a phase called ‘engineering validation testing.’ And now...drum roll....we’re ready for production. 

In short, this is where the head hits the pillow. Your purchase on Indiegogo is critical to delivering this product, and better sleep, to the world.

 

 

Dreams > Screens

Lots of things can go haywire in the bedroom, especially during chaotic times like these.

Your sleep shouldn’t be one of them. 

Let’s unplug, unwind, and remember what waking from a good night’s rest feels like. 

Who knows, with your help, we could just create next best thing to rising with the sun.

story:
LUNCHBEAT 1-bit groovemachine campaign

Hi!

My name is Jan Cumpelik, I am 37 and I live in Brezinka, Czech republic. 

I created this Lunchbeat thing. It is AVR based groovemachine with 4 realtime generated and tweakable 1-bit sounds and 8 step programmable sequencer. Sequencer can send or receive trig pulse signal. Lunchbeat's microcontroller can be easily programmed via 6pin ISP connector.

Whole project is open-source and licensed with CC BY-SA 3.0 license. You can find all resources on my webpage (http://buranelectrix.com/lunchbeat/lunchbeat.php).

Until this time I have builded almost 10 prototype units - two of them you can see playing in video.

Goal of this campaign is to raise funds for at least 20 DIY kits.

Shipping to your home is already included in price.


Update (17-Jan-2014)
So campaign has finished and reached it's goal !!!
Thank you very much my dear contributors !!!

Update (20-Jan-2014)
All perks shipped to contributors.

And what is the future of Lunchbeat DIY kits?
Current batch (25 pcs) is almost sold out, so I am ordering second batch of PCBs very soon.
If you want to get Lunchbeat, visit http://buranelectrix.com or email me: "jan@buranelectrix.com".


SPECIFICATIONS:

DIY kit includes:
  • printed circuit board professionally manufactured in PCB house
  • programmed MCU with latest firmware
  • all other electronic parts for building the unit (except battery)
  • all mechanic parts for building the unit (bolts, rivets, nuts)
  • bottom acrylic board
What you will need to build the kit:
  • soldering iron + solder
  • pair of nippers
  • screwdriver
  • your preferred beverage
What you will need to get Lunchbeat working:
  • 9V battery (6F22 type)
  • 3.5mm jack cable plugged to amplifier (stronger amplifier = better)

(hacking is optional step, not required, but recommended!)

What you will need to hack or update unit's firmware:
  • Arduino IDE or avr-toolchain to compile and upload code
  • ISP programmer (for example usbTiny, usbASP) with 6pin cable or Arduino (or Arduino clone) either to upload code to chip placed directly on Arduino board (Lunchbeat uses Atmega328p chip so you will need Arduino with the same chip for this method) or to use any Arduino as ISP programmer (check internets how to do that).

Instructions for building DIY KIT: http://buranelectrix.com/lunchbeat/DIYKITtutor/index.html


Feel free to comment or ask for details. I am open to questions or suggestions.

If you like Lunchbeat, please help spreading info about this campaign.

Thank you for your time (and money, of course),

Jan

jan@buranelectrix.com

www.buranelectrix.com
