story:
Frank and Heather McClelland along with Curt and Lindsay Bergeron are teaming up to build "Tides." Locally sourced food cooked over fire. Located at Essex Marina, with a panoramic view of the river is where the journey begins. We invite you to take part.

TEAM

Frank McClelland - owner of L'espalier and La Brasa brings talent, tradition, and technique to the table, his experience spans over three decades from his early days at the Harvest to running the most decorated independent restaurant in Boston.

Curt and Lindsay Bergeron -  owners of Essex Marina since 2010. Curt and Lindsay have turned the marina into a family friendly destination, with customer service their number one priority. 

CONCEPT

To use a wood fire cooking concept, finding inspiration from local ingredients and the sea.

COMMUNITY

We have been looking for the perfect local spot for a restaurant since we moved to Essex in 2009. Owning a farm in Essex for 6 years, providing a CSA, hosting farm dinners; bringing the community together with food has been extremely rewarding.

EXPERIENCE

Watching the boats cruise the river, the smell of the wood fired oven, the rustic design, the people. Comfort from the food prepared with each season in mind, the attention to detail, and quality customer service.

YOU

We invite you to join us in raising $16,000 for our wood fired cooking system.

Please tell your friends and neighbors to join it too!


What We Need & What You Get

We are bringing a fresh new concept to Essex! Cooking with fire! The wood fired cooking oven and grill is being designed and built by Blue Barn (bluebarnbuilds.com) located in Gardner, MA. Made with steel locally sourced in Worcester MA and inspired by function, performance, ergonomics, and beauty.

  • We would like to raise $16,000 for the wood burning system that includes the grill and the oven. The oven is $11,000 and the grill is $5,000. 

The Impact

Your participation means the world to us. It is our mission to support the community of Essex with an outstanding destination for family and friends to gather.

story:
Do you want the ActiWait on your daily walk? Vote for your city at the CITY BATTLE

_____________________________________________________________________________

We all know the situation: you are standing at the traffic light waiting for the light to turn green. You spend quite some time with strangers and then each one goes their separate ways. You see people but you look past each other. You feel uncomfortable and bored. And that is exactly what the ActiWait is about to change.

The idea is very simple: take pedestrian lights and build a touchscreen inside of it, install this on BOTH SIDES of the street and voilà: you can play from one side against the other! This way you`ll be able to have fun while waiting for the traffic lights to turn green and you`ll easily get to meet other people.


Yeah well...  the idea was simple but traffic engineering isn't. We talked to a lot of people about this idea and they all thought we are crazy. But in the end we found amazing companies and professionals in the traffic technology industry that supported our work. Since 2012 we've been developing the prototype of the new and innovative push-button. After many ups and downs we are now ready to launch the first gamificated traffic light in the world!!


what we have

StreetPong became a Prototype of a product and so it needed to get a new name. The game was just the beginning and so we called it... the ActiWait! Because you use it while waiting .. and you're not passive, you're active!  


The prototype is finally installed at a traffic light for the first time in history. In order for this to happen we worked with the best developers that we could think of. They are experts in traffic technology and software development. The prototype is 3D printed and fully equipped, the first game is programmed and we`ve already launched our product in october so we can proudly say: the world's first smart pedestrian light button is finally here!


what we want

So you see first steps are made. The ActiWait is installed at a pedestrian light. But just at a single pedestrian light. We think everyone should have the opportunity to sweeten up their waiting time. And we´re also so called lifesavers, because: why would you want to cross the street at a red pedestrian light when you have the opportunity to play a game and have fun?

Right now the smart pedestrian light button ActiWait is just a prototype with basic functions. But in the future we need some more! 


        Hardware           Software               Case                  Tests           Applications


For this to happen we still have to develop the hard- and software to a final stage, the new case needs to be produced professionally and our product needs to pass official safety tests. We want to imply a special type of WiFi so we can change the applications on the fly, to provide you for example with :

  • news feeds
  • navigation
  • traffic education for children  
  • citizen surveys
  • speed dating 
  • and much more...!

And all these ideas still need to be developed!



That’s why we need you! If you want to play streetpong at a pedestrian light in your hometown, if you have children and want them to get to school safely, if you’re bored while waiting for the light to switch we would be thrilled if you could help us start our business. Donate some money and get cool perks or just tell your friends and family about this project. Anything helps!

Help us to take waiting to another level. Help us change reality!


perks

To thank you for your support and to give you something back for supporting us, we have a lot of cool perks and features for you! 

For example the city battle: If you as a backer tell us where you come from we will be able to monitor where the most support came from. This town or city will then get the "ActiWait" installed right after it is produced (if your city government is o.k. with that).

That’s why we need you! If you want to play streetpong at a pedestrian light in your hometown, if you have children and want them to get to school safely, if you’re bored while waiting for the light to switch we would be thrilled if you could help us start our business. Donate some money and get cool perks or just tell your friends and family about this project. Anything helps!

Everyone who backs us, no matter if you donate 7€ or 7.000€, will get a free download of preset letters and signs which you can use to convince your city to get the "ActiWait".

Help us to take waiting to another level. Help us change reality!


our partner

In order for us to realize our projects we work very closely with partners from the industry. This way we have already gathered an amazing team, which is a stable and reliable anchor in all the depending divisions.


PENGUTRONIX  They are the Linux Pros! Under their leadership, the hard- and software for the ActiWait traffic-light-button is developed.  http://www.pengutronix.de/index_de.html

LANGMATZ   Located in the markets for energy, telecommunications and transport technology, they provide us with their technology and knowledge of push buttons for pedestrian traffic lights. They are an important partner in the development of the upper shell, the merging of technology and in the production of the prototype. http://www.langmatz.de

SWARCO   As one of the leading German signal construction companies SWARCO Traffic Systems GmbH is specialized in the planning, design and implementation of intelligent and innovative traffic management systems. They help us install the new push-buttons and especially develop the prototype for the city of Oberhausen, Germany.  http://www.swarco.com/sts 

HAWK HILDESHEIM   StreetPong started as a project at the university. Therefore, the HAWK Hildesheim is an important and reliable Partner for us. To promote and advance the project the HAWK supported the us with expertise, contacts and financial resources.   http://www.hawk-hhg.de/gestaltung/default.php

HAWK PLUS   From the beginning, we received a lot of support from our Start-Up-Coaches. They helped us developing our idea to a viable business model. They put our concept on solid ground and provided us with advice, assistance and a lot of know-how.    http://www.hawk-hhg.de/hawk_plus/179493.php


Who we are

http://urban-invention.com

Amelie Künzler is currently studying Master of Arts at the HAWK Hildesheim.  Her focus lies mostly in the fields of design and development of products as also in design management. At Urban Invention she is creating the design of the case for the ActiWait and takes care of the clients requests and problems.

Sandro has achieved his Bachelor degree in Graphic-Design and Digital-Media. In his Master he is now focusing on trans-media projects. At Urban Invention he is in charge of the graphic- and interface design. As media manager he is responsible for  our public image.




-------------------------------------- deutsche Version-----------------------------------------------


Was wäre wenn warten an Ampeln Spaß machen würde?

Wir alle kennen die Situation : Man steht an der Ampel, wartet auf Grün. Man verbringt Zeit mit Fremden und dann geht jeder seine eigenen Wege. Man sieht die anderen, aber man schaut doch an einander vorbei. Man fühlt sich unwohl und gelangweilt. Und genau das soll der ActiWait ändern.

Die Idee ist einfach: man nehme einen Touchscreen, baue diesen in einen Ampel-Taster ein. Dies installiert man auf beiden Seiten der Straße und voilá: Man kann von seiner Seite aus mit Leuten auf der anderen Straßenseite spielen! Man hat Spaß beim Warten auf Grün und lernt neue Leute kennen. 


Tja... die Idee war einfach, aber Verkehrstechnik ist es leider nicht. Also haben wir uns Unterstützung von Unternehmen und Fachleuten aus der Verkehrstechnik-Industrie gesucht. Seit 2012 haben wir daran gearbeitet, einen funktionierenden Prototypen zu bauen. Nach vielen Höhen und Tiefen haben wir nun die erste gamifizierte Ampel der Welt gestartet!!


was wir haben

Die Idee StreetPong hat sich weiter entwickelt und brauchte einen neuen Namen. Das Spiel war nur der Anfang, es geht darum Warten spannender, aktiver zu gestalten. So entstand der Name ActiWait!

Zum ersten Mal in der Geschichte wurde nun ein smarter Ampeltaster an einer Ampel installiert. Wir haben einen funktionierenden Prototypen, aber damit unser Traum wahr werden konnte, brauchte es ein großartiges Team mit Experten aus der Verkehrstechnik sowie Hard- und Software- Entwicklung.

Der Prototyp wurde im 3D-Druck hergestellt und ist mit den grundlegenden Features  ausgestattet. Das erste Spiel wurde programmiert und der Taster hängt an einer Ampel. Damit können wir voller Stolz sagen: endlich ist der erste smarte Ampel-Taster der Welt da! Wir haben allen gezeigt: es funktioniert!!


was wir wollen

Im Augenblick ist der smarte Ampeltaster nur ein Prototyp mit Basisfunktionen. Doch in Zukunft soll der ActiWait noch viel mehr können! Wir wollen eine besondere Art von WiFi implizieren, damit Anwendungen im laufenden Betrieb geändert werden können, dies ermöglicht Applikationen wie:

• News-Feed

• Navigation

• Verkehrserziehung für Kinder

• Bürgerbefragungen

• Speed-Dating

und vieles mehr ...!


       Hardware           Software           Oberschale            TÜV                    Apps


Damit das Produkt an den Markt kann, müssen die Hard- und Software fertig entwickelt werden, die Oberschale muss professionell produziert werden und unser Produkt muss strenge Sicherheitstests wie TÜV, CE uvm. bestehen. 

Wir denken, jeder sollte in seiner Stadt die Möglichkeit dazu haben, seine Wartezeit zu versüßen. Aber damit dass passieren kann, muss eine Serienproduktion angeschoben werden. Aber dafür fehlt uns leider das Geld…


Und genau dafür brauchen wir DICH! Wenn Du StreetPong an einer Fußgängerampel in deiner Heimatstadt spielen möchtest, wenn Du willst, dass deine Kinder einen sicheren Schulweg haben, wenn Du Langweile beim Warten an der Ampel hast, dann unterstütze uns dabei, den ActiWait marktreif zu machen und ihn dorthin zu bringen, wo er am nötigsten gebraucht wird! 

Spende einen Betrag den du entbehren kannst, erzähle deinen Freunden und deiner Familie vom ActiWait. Alles hilft!

Hilf uns dabei, eine neue Form des Wartens zu etablieren. Hilf uns, den Traum vom aktiven Warten für alle Wahrheit werden zu lassen.


Perks

Um Dir für deine Unterstützung zu danken und dir etwas zurückgeben zu können, haben wir ein paar tolle Perks und Features für dich!

Zum Beispiel..

Wenn Du mehr als 15€ spendest, bekommst du Zugang zum City Battle. Jeder hat hier die Möglichkeit, uns zu sagen, in welcher Stadt er oder sie den ActiWait installiert haben möchte. Die Stadt, für die am Ende am meisten abgestimmt wurde, bekommt den ActiWait (falls das mit der Stadtverwaltung vereinbar ist) Also: aktiviere deine Freunde, Nachbarn, Eltern und ihr müsst euch nie wieder langweilen beim Warten an der Ampel!

Jeder, der uns unterstützt, egal ob mit 7€ oder 7.000€, bekommt Zugang zu vorgefertigten Schildern und Briefen, mit denen ihr andere vom ActiWait überzeugen könnt.


unsere Partner

Um bestmögliche Ergebnisse zu erzielen,  arbeiten wir sehr eng mit Partnern aus der Industrie zusammen. So haben wir bereits ein großartiges Team versammelt, das einen stabilen und zuverlässigen Anker in allen Geschäftsbereichen darstellt.

PENGUTRONIX

Sie sind die Linux-Profis! Unter ihrer Führung wird die Hard- und Software für die ActiWait Ampel-Taster entwickelt. 

http://www.pengutronix.de/index_de.html

LANGMATZ 

Das Unternehmen ist in den Märkten Energie, Telekommunikation und Verkehrstechnik zu Hause. Sie unterstützen uns mit ihrem Wissen und der Technologie von Ampel-Tastern. Sie sind ein wichtiger Partner bei der Entwicklung der Oberschale, der Zusammenführung der Technologie und bei der Herstellung des Prototyps. 

http://www.langmatz.de

SWARCO 

Als einer der führenden deutschen Signalbaufirmen ist SWARCO Traffic Systems GmbH auf die Planung, Konzeption und Umsetzung von intelligenten und innovativen Verkehrsmanagementsystemen spezialisiert. Sie helfen uns, die neuen Taster zu installieren und vor allem bei der Entwicklung der Prototyp für die Stadt Oberhausen, Deutschland. http://www.swarco.com/sts

HAWK HILDESHEIM 

StreetPong begann als Projekt an der Hochschule. Daher ist die HAWK Hildesheim ein wichtiger und verlässlicher Partner für uns. Sie haben von Anfang an das Projekt mit Know-how, Kontakten und finanziellen Mitteln unterstützt und gefördert. 

http://www.hawk-hhg.de/gestaltung/default.php

HAWK PLUS 

Von Anfang an haben wir viel Unterstützung von unseren Start-Up-Coaches bekommen. Sie halfen bei der Entwicklung unserer Idee hin zu einem tragfähigen Geschäftsmodell. Sie stellen unser Konzept auf festen Boden und stehen uns jeder Zeit mit Rat, Tat und viel Know-how zur Seite. 

http://www.hawk-hhg.de/hawk_plus/179493.php


Wer wir sind

http://urban-invention.com

Amelie Künzler studiert derzeit im Master of Arts an der HAWK Hildesheim. Ihre Schwerpunkte liegen vor allem in den Bereichen Design und Entwicklung von Produkten als auch in Design-Management. Bei Urban Invention ist sie zuständig für die Gestaltung des Gehäuses vom ActiWait und kümmert sich um die Kunden-Anfragen und Probleme.

Sandro hat seinen Bachelor-Abschluss in Grafik-Design und Digitalmedia absolviert. In seinem Master konzentriert er sich nun auf transmediale Projekte. Bei Urban Invention ist er verantwortlich für die Grafik- und Interface-Gestaltung. Als Medien-Manager ist er für unsere Außendarstellung in der Öffentlichkeit verantwortlich.


-------------------------------------- PERK PICS-----------------------------------------------

Vote for the city you would like to spice up waiting time at pedestrian traffic lights. The city with most votes will receive the ActiWait. Here you can see which city is in the lead right now:  
http://actiwait.info



The amazing music from our video is made by Grand Inc. For donating 8€ you get the full LP! But be quick: it's Limited Edition! 

Photo credits by Grand Inc.


Be prepared for the next rain! Play StreetPong on the ActiWait and stay dry with our original ActiWait umbrella!!


StreetPong is fun, except you play when its too cold outside..! But wait: we´ve got the solution: The official extremely-warm-padded-touchscreen-friendly-ActiWait winter gloves!! Be sure it´s high quality!!
story_txt:
Do you want the ActiWait on your daily walk? Vote for your city at the CITY BATTLE_____________________________________________________________________________We all know the situation: you are standing at the traffic light waiting for the light to turn green. You spend quite some time with strangers and then each one goes their separate ways. You see people but you look past each other. You feel uncomfortable and bored. And that is exactly what the ActiWait is about to change.The idea is very simple: take pedestrian lights and build a touchscreen inside of it, install this on BOTH SIDES of the street and voilà: you can play from one side against the other! This way you`ll be able to have fun while waiting for the traffic lights to turn green and you`ll easily get to meet other people.Yeah well...  the idea was simple but traffic engineering isn't. We talked to a lot of people about this idea and they all thought we are crazy. But in the end we found amazing companies and professionals in the traffic technology industry that supported our work. Since 2012 we've been developing the prototype of the new and innovative push-button. After many ups and downs we are now ready to launch the first gamificated traffic light in the world!!what we haveStreetPong became a Prototype of a product and so it needed to get a new name. The game was just the beginning and so we called it... the ActiWait! Because you use it while waiting .. and you're not passive, you're active!  The prototype is finally installed at a traffic light for the first time in history. In order for this to happen we worked with the best developers that we could think of. They are experts in traffic technology and software development. The prototype is 3D printed and fully equipped, the first game is programmed and we`ve already launched our product in october so we can proudly say: the world's first smart pedestrian light button is finally here!
what we want
So you see first steps are made. The ActiWait is installed at a pedestrian light. But just at a single pedestrian light. We think everyone should have the opportunity to sweeten up their waiting time. And we´re also so called lifesavers, because: why would you want to cross the street at a red pedestrian light when you have the opportunity to play a game and have fun?
Right now the smart pedestrian light button ActiWait is just a prototype with basic functions. But in the future we need some more!         Hardware           Software               Case                  Tests           ApplicationsFor this to happen we still have to develop the hard- and software to a final stage, the new case needs to be produced professionally and our product needs to pass official safety tests. We want to imply a special type of WiFi so we can change the applications on the fly, to provide you for example with :

news feeds

navigation
traffic education for children  
citizen surveys

speed dating 


and much more...!
And all these ideas still need to be developed!That’s why we need you! If you want to play streetpong at a pedestrian light in your hometown, if you have children and want them to get to school safely, if you’re bored while waiting for the light to switch we would be thrilled if you could help us start our business. Donate some money and get cool perks or just tell your friends and family about this project. Anything helps!
Help us to take waiting to another level. Help us change reality!perks
To thank you for your support and to give you something back for supporting us, we have a lot of cool perks and features for you! 
For example the city battle: If you as a backer tell us where you come from we will be able to monitor where the most support came from. This town or city will then get the "ActiWait" installed right after it is produced (if your city government is o.k. with that).That’s why we need you! If you want to play streetpong at a pedestrian light in your hometown, if you have children and want them to get to school safely, if you’re bored while waiting for the light to switch we would be thrilled if you could help us start our business. Donate some money and get cool perks or just tell your friends and family about this project. Anything helps!Everyone who backs us, no matter if you donate 7€ or 7.000€, will get a free download of preset letters and signs which you can use to convince your city to get the "ActiWait".Help us to take waiting to another level. Help us change reality!our partner
In order for us to realize our projects we work very closely with partners from the industry. This way we have already gathered an amazing team, which is a stable and reliable anchor in all the depending divisions.
PENGUTRONIX  They are the Linux Pros! Under their leadership, the hard- and software for the ActiWait traffic-light-button is developed.  http://www.pengutronix.de/index_de.html
LANGMATZ   Located in the markets for energy, telecommunications and transport technology, they provide us with their technology and knowledge of push buttons for pedestrian traffic lights. They are an important partner in the development of the upper shell, the merging of technology and in the production of the prototype. http://www.langmatz.de
SWARCO   As one of the leading German signal construction companies SWARCO Traffic Systems GmbH is specialized in the planning, design and implementation of intelligent and innovative traffic management systems. They help us install the new push-buttons and especially develop the prototype for the city of Oberhausen, Germany.  http://www.swarco.com/sts 
HAWK HILDESHEIM   StreetPong started as a project at the university. Therefore, the HAWK Hildesheim is an important and reliable Partner for us. To promote and advance the project the HAWK supported the us with expertise, contacts and financial resources.   http://www.hawk-hhg.de/gestaltung/default.php
HAWK PLUS   From the beginning, we received a lot of support from our Start-Up-Coaches. They helped us developing our idea to a viable business model. They put our concept on solid ground and provided us with advice, assistance and a lot of know-how.    http://www.hawk-hhg.de/hawk_plus/179493.php



Who we arehttp://urban-invention.com
Amelie Künzler is currently studying Master of Arts at the HAWK Hildesheim.  Her focus lies mostly in the fields of design and development of products as also in design management. At Urban Invention she is creating the design of the case for the ActiWait and takes care of the clients requests and problems.Sandro has achieved his Bachelor degree in Graphic-Design and Digital-Media. In his Master he is now focusing on trans-media projects. At Urban Invention he is in charge of the graphic- and interface design. As media manager he is responsible for  our public image.-------------------------------------- deutsche Version-----------------------------------------------Was wäre wenn warten an Ampeln Spaß machen würde?Wir alle kennen die Situation : Man steht an der Ampel, wartet auf Grün. Man verbringt Zeit mit Fremden und dann geht jeder seine eigenen Wege. Man sieht die anderen, aber man schaut doch an einander vorbei. Man fühlt sich unwohl und gelangweilt. Und genau das soll der ActiWait ändern.Die Idee ist einfach: man nehme einen Touchscreen, baue diesen in einen Ampel-Taster ein. Dies installiert man auf beiden Seiten der Straße und voilá: Man kann von seiner Seite aus mit Leuten auf der anderen Straßenseite spielen! Man hat Spaß beim Warten auf Grün und lernt neue Leute kennen. 

Tja... die Idee war einfach, aber Verkehrstechnik ist es leider nicht. Also haben wir uns Unterstützung von Unternehmen und Fachleuten aus der Verkehrstechnik-Industrie gesucht. Seit 2012 haben wir daran gearbeitet, einen funktionierenden Prototypen zu bauen. Nach vielen Höhen und Tiefen haben wir nun die erste gamifizierte Ampel der Welt gestartet!!was wir habenDie Idee StreetPong hat sich weiter entwickelt und brauchte einen neuen Namen. Das Spiel war nur der Anfang, es geht darum Warten spannender, aktiver zu gestalten. So entstand der Name ActiWait!Zum ersten Mal in der Geschichte wurde nun ein smarter Ampeltaster an einer Ampel installiert. Wir haben einen funktionierenden Prototypen, aber damit unser Traum wahr werden konnte, brauchte es ein großartiges Team mit Experten aus der Verkehrstechnik sowie Hard- und Software- Entwicklung.Der Prototyp wurde im 3D-Druck hergestellt und ist mit den grundlegenden Features  ausgestattet. Das erste Spiel wurde programmiert und der Taster hängt an einer Ampel. Damit können wir voller Stolz sagen: endlich ist der erste smarte Ampel-Taster der Welt da! Wir haben allen gezeigt: es funktioniert!!was wir wollen
Im Augenblick ist der smarte Ampeltaster nur ein Prototyp mit Basisfunktionen. Doch in Zukunft soll der ActiWait noch viel mehr können! Wir wollen eine besondere Art von WiFi implizieren, damit Anwendungen im laufenden Betrieb geändert werden können, dies ermöglicht Applikationen wie:
• News-Feed
• Navigation
• Verkehrserziehung für Kinder
• Bürgerbefragungen
• Speed-Dating
und vieles mehr ...!       Hardware           Software           Oberschale            TÜV                    Apps
Damit das Produkt an den Markt kann, müssen die Hard- und Software fertig entwickelt werden, die Oberschale muss professionell produziert werden und unser Produkt muss strenge Sicherheitstests wie TÜV, CE uvm. bestehen. 
Wir denken, jeder sollte in seiner Stadt die Möglichkeit dazu haben, seine Wartezeit zu versüßen. Aber damit dass passieren kann, muss eine Serienproduktion angeschoben werden. Aber dafür fehlt uns leider das Geld…
Und genau dafür brauchen wir DICH! Wenn Du StreetPong an einer Fußgängerampel in deiner Heimatstadt spielen möchtest, wenn Du willst, dass deine Kinder einen sicheren Schulweg haben, wenn Du Langweile beim Warten an der Ampel hast, dann unterstütze uns dabei, den ActiWait marktreif zu machen und ihn dorthin zu bringen, wo er am nötigsten gebraucht wird! 
Spende einen Betrag den du entbehren kannst, erzähle deinen Freunden und deiner Familie vom ActiWait. Alles hilft!
Hilf uns dabei, eine neue Form des Wartens zu etablieren. Hilf uns, den Traum vom aktiven Warten für alle Wahrheit werden zu lassen.
Perks
Um Dir für deine Unterstützung zu danken und dir etwas zurückgeben zu können, haben wir ein paar tolle Perks und Features für dich!
Zum Beispiel..
Wenn Du mehr als 15€ spendest, bekommst du Zugang zum City Battle. Jeder hat hier die Möglichkeit, uns zu sagen, in welcher Stadt er oder sie den ActiWait installiert haben möchte. Die Stadt, für die am Ende am meisten abgestimmt wurde, bekommt den ActiWait (falls das mit der Stadtverwaltung vereinbar ist) Also: aktiviere deine Freunde, Nachbarn, Eltern und ihr müsst euch nie wieder langweilen beim Warten an der Ampel!
Jeder, der uns unterstützt, egal ob mit 7€ oder 7.000€, bekommt Zugang zu vorgefertigten Schildern und Briefen, mit denen ihr andere vom ActiWait überzeugen könnt.
unsere Partner
Um bestmögliche Ergebnisse zu erzielen,  arbeiten wir sehr eng mit Partnern aus der Industrie zusammen. So haben wir bereits ein großartiges Team versammelt, das einen stabilen und zuverlässigen Anker in allen Geschäftsbereichen darstellt.
PENGUTRONIX
Sie sind die Linux-Profis! Unter ihrer Führung wird die Hard- und Software für die ActiWait Ampel-Taster entwickelt. 
http://www.pengutronix.de/index_de.html
LANGMATZ 
Das Unternehmen ist in den Märkten Energie, Telekommunikation und Verkehrstechnik zu Hause. Sie unterstützen uns mit ihrem Wissen und der Technologie von Ampel-Tastern. Sie sind ein wichtiger Partner bei der Entwicklung der Oberschale, der Zusammenführung der Technologie und bei der Herstellung des Prototyps. 
http://www.langmatz.de
SWARCO 
Als einer der führenden deutschen Signalbaufirmen ist SWARCO Traffic Systems GmbH auf die Planung, Konzeption und Umsetzung von intelligenten und innovativen Verkehrsmanagementsystemen spezialisiert. Sie helfen uns, die neuen Taster zu installieren und vor allem bei der Entwicklung der Prototyp für die Stadt Oberhausen, Deutschland. http://www.swarco.com/sts
HAWK HILDESHEIM 
StreetPong begann als Projekt an der Hochschule. Daher ist die HAWK Hildesheim ein wichtiger und verlässlicher Partner für uns. Sie haben von Anfang an das Projekt mit Know-how, Kontakten und finanziellen Mitteln unterstützt und gefördert.

story:
Successfully funded!

 visit www.lineable.net

If you have any questions, contact us at manager@lineable.net











What is Lineable?

Lineable is a wearable tracking beacon specifically designed for children. It comes with 3 different sizes: small, medium and large. More details can be found under specifications. 

We intentionally designed Lineable to look like an ordinary wristband in order to:

  • To seamlessly integrate with the child’s daily activity 
  • To conceal from an intruder or assailant

Lineable is compatible with both iPhone and Android Phones, even with the new iPhone 6!  


How Lineable Works?



Lineable sends its data to the server, and then to your smartphone. The best part of Lineable is that the coverage can grow internationally; more apps, more coverage your Lineable gets!

The beacon syncs with your smartphone, and lets you keep track of your children. You can sync as many Lineable as you like to your smartphone.


Compatibility

Since Lineable coverage expansion depends on the number of apps, we are on process of creating Lineable app compatible to both IOS and Android. We are going to provide more apps as in progress.

Tech Specification



One of the biggest reasons behind reducing the price to $5 was because we concentrated on keeping the only necessary functions. See the comparison chart with similar tracking devices below.


Prototypes


We have come up with many different designs, and we came up with the final design!

Development Timeline

Lineable will be shipped on February 2015 :)



Perks


FAQ

1. HOW LONG DOES LINEABLE LAST?

We have created Lineable to last at least one year. Distinctly different from other tracking devices the user is able to initiate Lineable through a mechanical button (patent pending) when the user receives the product. Thus, even while the product is being assembled and shipped, the battery life will remain full until the user initiates it.


2. HOW MANY PHONES ARE ABLE TO TRACK LINEABLE?

As many phones within the range. We have programmed Lineable to notify its location not through pairing Bluetooth but instead, when Lineable is detected in any device that has installed the Lineable App, the location data is sent to the server. Therefore, you can track as many Lineables you want with as many devices you want.


3. HOW CAN I CHOOSE DIFFERENT COLOR LINEABLE IF I PLEDGE OVER $499

After the Indiegogo campaign, we will individually contact supporters for their choice of color and writing (ex. school name, organization etc.)


4. WHERE WILL THE INDIEGOGO FUNDING BE USED?

We do not make profits from manufacturing Lineable products. Your funding will be gratefully used to maintain servers that operate the Lineable app worldwide.


5. IS LINEABLE WATERPROOF?

Absolutely! Lineable is designed to be worn by children in any condition. The PCB is cased in a poly carbonate enclosure then sealed with silicone.


6. WHAT ARE THE SIZES FOR LINEABLE?

Small: H: 0.7 inch T: 0.08~0.24 inch C: 5.5 inch

Medium: H: 0.7 inch T: 0.08~0.24 inch C: 6 inch 

Large: H: 0.7 inch T: 0.08~0.24 inch C: 6.3 inch

Find more at Lineable.net


7. WHEN DO YOU PLAN ON SHIPPING?

We will begin shipping by February 2015 at the latest. Our hardware prototypes are mostly complete needing last minute optimize testing for antennae to ensure maximum coverage and battery life.


8. WHY IS THERE NO FREE SHIPPING OPTION? WHERE DO YOU SHIP TO?

In order to offer Lineable with the lowest price possible, we could not include the Free Shipping option. However, we do ship to almost every country, with the lowest rate possible. We will provide the full listing as soon as possible. If you want to know if your country is available for shipping, please contact us. We will be happy to inform you :)

story:
Cat owners love to pamper their pets. However, they face a dilemma when choosing a cat litter box on the current market. They are forced to choose between an ugly plastic tray that that lacks hygiene features, or they must opt for a bulky and complicated robotic contraption with an unnecessarily expensive price. 
 

Introducing Poop Cube, a minimalist cat litter box that helps prevent litter tracking and saves time while leaving your home odor free. The swivel lid makes scooping and cleaning a snap and the uniquely-designed 3-in-1 cleaning set is a great helper for quick and simple tidying up. And best of all, odor won’t be a problem anymore thanks to the enclosed design specially made to effectively prevent bad smells from escaping.

 

 Full & Easy Access for Better Cleaning   

Nobody likes to scoop poop! It’s just the price we pay to have the loving companionship of our cats. So when it’s time to dig in, a bigger access for cleaning is surely helpful and lets you get the dirty deed done quickly. The swivel lid opens like a trunk, providing a wide-open space for easier cleaning. Simply, open, scoop, and get on with your life. 
 

 An Efficient 3-in-1 Cleaning Set 

The Poop Cube Cleaning Set becomes your “right-hand man”. It consists of a scoop, dustpan and hand brush that are ingeniously integrated together. The scoop is designed to sift faster and slide easily through the litter, while the dustpan and hand brush allow for quick, easy tidying around the litter box. We can’t promise you that cleaning up after kitty will be fun, but with Poop Cube, it’s easier and faster.
 

 Closed Design Eliminates Odor 

Let’s be honest, there is nothing worse than a smelly litter box in the home. But Poop Cube is here to solve this problem. Thanks to the enclosed design, there won’t be any waste exposed to the open air. Odors remain isolated and contained to keep your home fresh and pleasant.
 

 Top Opening & Mat Eliminate Litter Tracking 

The top opening design eliminates litter tracking that is common with ordinary cat boxes. Any stray litter left on the lid of Poop Cube will fall back inside when the lid is swiveled open for scooping, and grooves of the front mat catch litter effectively when your cat walks off. Litter tracking is virtually eliminated and the floor or carpet around the box stays clean. 
 

 Minimalist Cat Furniture that Fits Every Home 

How do you make a cat box look interesting and fit within contemporary home décor? You give it a clever makeover with an eye for style. Designed by two architects, Poop Cube is minimalist inspired cat furniture that elevates the simple cat box into something that perfectly fits modern home styles. Stay neat, stay simple, and stay stylish.  
 

 Tailored to Fit All Cats 

With top-entry or front-entry configurations, Poop Cube suits different sizes of cats - no matter if your beloved pet is a small kitten or distinguished elder with reduced agility, they will have no trouble using Poop Cube. The box can even accommodate cats wearing an Elizabethan collar (the dreaded cone).
 

 Easy to Wash

The body and base of Poop Cube are connected by two buckles and could be detached easily. Thus you are able to clean the inner space of Poop Cube thoroughly. 
 

The “Super Pet” series of pet supplies are designed to provide professional quality pet products to consumers. The two founders previously worked at a global architectural firm in Los Angeles before teaming up. They share a natural occupational sensitivity to the relationship between function and space that helps drive the Super Pet mission.
 

After in-depth research into all the mainstream pet products on the market, they identified new solutions for pet care that also consider aesthetics and style. The development of product process has undergone dozens of rounds of revisions using valuable feedback from professionals as well as pet owners. The ethos of our team is based on a profound understanding of the relationship between people and pets and they take an innovative approach that applies architects’ thinking to solve the problems in pet life.

Nobody likes to scoop poop! It’s just the price we pay to have the loving companionship of our cats. So when it’s time to dig in, a bigger access for cleaning is surely helpful and lets you get the dirty deed done quickly. The swivel lid opens like a trunk, providing a wide-open space for easier cleaning. Simply, open, scoop, and get on with your life.  
 
 An Efficient 3-in-1 Cleaning Set 
The Poop Cube Cleaning Set becomes your “right-hand man”. It consists of a scoop, dustpan and hand brush that are ingeniously integrated together. The scoop is designed to sift faster and slide easily through the litter, while the dustpan and hand brush allow for quick, easy tidying around the litter box. We can’t promise you that cleaning up after kitty will be fun, but with Poop Cube, it’s easier and faster. 

 

 
 
 Closed Design Eliminates Odor 
Let’s be honest, there is nothing worse than a smelly litter box in the home. But Poop Cube is here to solve this problem. Thanks to the enclosed design, there won’t be any waste exposed to the open air. Odors remain isolated and contained to keep your home fresh and pleasant. 
 Enclosed Design Keep Your Home Fresh And Pleasant 
 Top Opening & Mat Eliminate Litter Tracking 
The top opening design eliminates litter tracking that is common with ordinary cat boxes. Any stray litter left on the lid of Poop Cube will fall back inside when the lid is swiveled open for scooping, and grooves of the front mat catch litter effectively when your cat walks off. Litter tracking is virtually eliminated and the floor or carpet around the box stays clean.  
 The Top Opening Collects Litter
 
 
 Minimalist Cat Furniture that Fits Every Home 
How do you make a cat box look interesting and fit within contemporary home décor? You give it a clever makeover with an eye for style. Designed by two architects, Poop Cube is minimalist inspired cat furniture that elevates the simple cat box into something that perfectly fits modern home styles. Stay neat, stay simple, and stay stylish.   
 
 Tailored to Fit All Cats 
With top-entry or front-entry configurations, Poop Cube suits different sizes of cats - no matter if your beloved pet is a small kitten or distinguished elder with reduced agility, they will have no trouble using Poop Cube. The box can even accommodate cats wearing an Elizabethan collar (the dreaded cone). 
 
 A Switch for Different Usages 
 
 
 
 Easy to Wash
The body and base of Poop Cube are connected by two buckles and could be detached easily. Thus you are able to clean the inner space of Poop Cube thoroughly.  
 Modular Design for Thorough Cleansing 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
The “Super Pet” series of pet supplies are designed to provide professional quality pet products to consumers. The two founders previously worked at a global architectural firm in Los Angeles before teaming up. They share a natural occupational sensitivity to the relationship between function and space that helps drive the Super Pet mission. 
 
After in-depth research into all the mainstream pet products on the market, they identified new solutions for pet care that also consider aesthetics and style. The development of product process has undergone dozens of rounds of revisions using valuable feedback from professionals as well as pet owners. The ethos of our team is based on a profound understanding of the relationship between people and pets and they take an innovative approach that applies architects’ thinking to solve the problems in pet life.

story:
Update

Although we did not meet our campaign goal, our faith is neither shattered nor shaken.  We are still here and we are grateful for the contributions that we did receive.  The funds received will not buy our current building or a new facility, but they will be invested in our ongoing building needs as we continue to preach the Word of God; and seek a building in which to pray and worship.  May God Bless 1000 fold all those who gave and guide the steps of those who wished to give. 


INTRODUCTION

Hi, I am the Lead Pastor of North Springs Church, and on behalf of myself and the congregation, I'm asking for your help.

North Springs Church is a multicultural church family comprised of everyday people who seek to embrace our city, state and nations with the love of a compassionate and faithful God.  My wife and I live out God's purposes by encouraging living faith, loving families, and lasting friendships through a personal relationship with Jesus Christ. 

Our humble beginnings include worship services in a local school.  Later we were blessed to relocate into our current space for less than cost but had to renovate it.  Yes, we are familiar with renovating.  Now we seek to OWN our own space for worship.  Not rent.  Not lease.  But own a place to belong - that will allow our ministries to grow and flourish as we continue to bring the unabridged Word of God to the people.

A sample of the ministries include the following:

  • A house of worship for a multicultural people
  • Provide after school care and meals for children in the apartment complex
  • Provide after school tutoring for kids
  • Food and clothing distribution
  • Provide a center for GED completion
  • Concerts & programming for youth to keep them off the street and trouble
  • Provide Adult Day for lonely, vulnerable adults

For more information about us see: North Springs Church


We Need Your Help

The completed project is estimated between $900,000 and $1,000,000.  Although we pray that we raise the entire $1 million to completely pay for the  project, per the negotiations, even partial funding of $360,000 can allow us to get started.  Every week the congregation donates to the church, but on their own it is not enough; so we're reaching outside the congregation.  Your support could make the difference.
 

WHAT YOU GET (PERKS)

Obviously, EVERY giver has our love and appreciation.

HAVE YOU EVER HEARD IT SAID THAT THE LORD LOVES A CHEERFUL GIVER?  DID YOU EVER WONDER IF THAT WAS ACTUALLY IN THE BIBLE?  Well, 2 Corinthians 9:7 says, "... so let him give... for God loveth a cheerful giver".

Also, your tax deductible donations are from the heart and nothing we might send to you could be as valuable as your gift to us and the work of the Lord.  Thus, we promise to continue to take the word of God to the people.  Finally, as a "perk" we offer a scripture for each donation level - these are offered with a light and kind heart - to add some fun to this extremely serious need, work, and your valuable donation. Note: you will receive a receipt via FirstGiving.

We conclude by asking the Lord to BLESS all those who give as well as those who wished to give but did not have it.  We may not know you, but God does.  We trust the Lord that this project will be fully funded. And always we pray in Jesus' name.

A GREAT GIFT FOR YOU!

  • The gift of salvation is free!  We can offer nothing greater than what our Lord Jesus has already freely given.  We pray that you accept his gift.

What if we're not fully funded?

  • If the Lord chooses not to fully fund this campaign then our move might be postponed.  Whatever funds are donated (less indiegogo fees) are dedicated to a home from which to take the Gospel to the People.  Of course, we pray that this particular property is what the Lord has for us.

Our Humble Beginnings (video)

For years we have been praying to find a home of our own.  Now we've found a location that will facilitate our ability to literally take the Gospel to the people.  It is not a "stand-a-lone" building but a location where the people live!

We are also thankful for our current location.  A lot of work, money, volunteer time, and faith went into moving here.  This video NSC Beginnings Video reviews our first move and the work that went into some of the renovations.  However, negotiations with the current owner have not gone well, but whether we stay at our current location or move we will trust in the Lord wherever are.  We have sought to be good stewards of this blessing and believe the Lord wants to provide an even greater blessing.

  • If you believe in eternal salvation, please support us.
  • If you believe you have a soul, please support us.
  • If you believe Jesus is Lord, please support us.
  • If you DON'T believe, support us AND visit us.

Pass The Word

Some people just can’t contribute, but if you can not provide $1 you can still help:

  • Get the word out and ask others to also make some noise about this campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Put us on your facebook, twitter, linkedIn, et cetera.  All help is cherished.
  • Our short INTERNET address for you to cut & paste:  igg.me/at/nsc

THANK YOU AND GOD BLESS!

story:
Dear friends,

Thanks for your support on Midea U-Shaped AC. We are excited to introduce a new product, Midea Cube Dehumidifier, the world’s first extended dehumidifier enjoys up to 3 times more water tank capacity (4.2 gallons/16L), but with half the storage size compared to a conventional dehumidifier. Now it’s available on Indiegogo, up to 45% off! Do not hesitate to grab yours today! What’s more, back and comment, you can have the chance to win a FREE giveaway! 

Click the link below to find more details about this ingenious and powerful dehumidifier!

 

Check Out the Midea Cube Dehumidifier!

 

All the placed orders will be locked on Mar. 25th. Please make sure you finish below before 25th:

  1. Check your address on Indiegogo if correct or not.
  2. Enter your address by UPS link (https://www.ups.com/us/en/Home.page) to check if your address can be found in UPS system successfully, we will ship goods out by UPS service.

If you need to change your shipping address on the Indiegogo account, please refer to this link (https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/212528078-How-do-I-update-my-shipping-address-) for more details.

Orders on and before Mar. 4th will be delivered in April. Orders after Mar. 4th will be shipped out in April and delivered in May.

 

The Midea U-Shaped AC is the first of its kind, a window air conditioning unit with fast and powerful cooling while super efficient. Your home is about to get a whole lot cooler.

It’s no secret that using window air conditioner units has its downsides. You will seal one of your windows to keep it in. They can be noisy, a pain to install, and they sure use a lot of electricity.

Unlike traditional units, the Midea U-Shaped AC is a radically new type of window air conditioner. Its revolutionary U-shaped design blocks the noise out and makes it faster and easier to set up. The unique Inverter Quattro technology keeps your home cool through the worst of the summer while using 35% less energy to run.

And you don’t even have to give up a window- you can still open and close your window any time, just as you normally would.

The Midea U-shaped AC’s unique design offers unparalleled flexibility. Unlike other window AC units, Midea’s patented U-shaped design allows your window to open and close normally, without sacrificing efficiency or effectiveness. Get fresh air into your home anytime you need it. Breathe easier with the Midea U-shaped AC.

 

Installing your Midea U-shaped AC is quick and easy. Just install the  (included) quick-snap bracket, set the unit on the bracket, and secure the sidearms. The job is done! Just close your window and enjoy the cool air.

With the adjustable side arms and the U-shaped groove width of 2.75 inches, the unit can fit almost any window. And don’t worry about security – the window is secured by an anti-theft mechanism while closed.

 

Keep your home cool and quiet. The Midea U-shaped AC is up to 9 times quieter than traditional units, as its unique U shape design blocks the noise coming from the compressor outside the window and walls, so you can enjoy the comfort with peace of mind. This allows for ultra-quiet operation as low as 42 dB - almost as quiet as a library!

Getting great sleep is one of the best things you can do for your health. The Midea U-shaped AC can help you get that undisturbed, restful night's sleep. It will also be ideal for working, studying or binging your favorite shows.

The Midea U-shaped AC has a stronger airflow than traditional units as you can feel the cold air up to 20 feet away, enough to cover every corner of your room, whatever the shape. At the same time, the full DC inverter technology enables the unit to cool your home fast, and you’ll feel the crisp, cool air as soon as you turn it on. The 3 different size options make it ideal for any living space, just pick the right BTU for your room size (8K BTU is ideal for 251-350 Sq Ft, 10K BTU  is ideal 351-450 Sq Ft, 12K BTU is ideal for 451-550 Sq Ft) and you can enjoy cool air fast and easy while maximizing your energy savings.

The Midea U-shaped AC uses Full DC Inverter technology to achieve more than 35% energy savings compared to traditional units in the market. It's the first window AC to obtain the ENERGY STAR Most Efficient 2020 certification. This is due to its patented Inverter Quattro design, which allows it to do more with considerably less electricity than traditional window units. This makes it more environmentally friendly and saves you money. In a very short time, the energy savings mean the Midea U-shaped AC can pay for itself.

Midea U-shaped AC is the first window AC to obtain the ENERGY STAR Most Efficient 2020 certification. It provides 12K BTU strong cooling power with a record-breaking low estimated yearly energy cost of $58, which is 35% less than similar models.

Note: Your cost will depend on your utility rates and use. Cost range based only on models of similar capacity without reverse cycle and with louvered sides. Estimated energy cost based on a national average electricity cost of 13. For more information, visit www.ftc.gov/energy.

With an innovative U-shaped groove design and unique drop-in install method, you may open your window even with your AC installed!

If you'd like to keep your window open to enjoy fresh air during comfortable summer nights, Midea's AC is a perfect combination of form and function.

The Midea Window AC is Wifi - enabled, it can be controlled from anywhere through the cloud using an app on iOS or Android, and you can use voice commands with Google Assistant or Alexa. Have complete control of your comfort anytime, anywhere – even if you don’t know where the kids left the remote!

  • Step 1-Back and follow us on Indiegogo
  • Step 2-Get your referral link on the top right corner of our Indiegogo campaign page (indicated below) and share it with your friends. 
  • Step 3-Confirm that your friend has ordered Midea Window AC.

Note: 

  • If you or your friend refund before the project ends, you and your friend will be regarded as quitting this referral program, the prize will NOT be sent to you.
  • With each successful referral, you get one prize. For example, if your friend purchased 2 units by this referral, you will get two prizes as well.
  • Winners will be announced after the project ends.
  • The prize will be delivered to the winners together with the product shipping.

Midea Group is the world's NO.1 air treatment brand, serving millions of customers in more than 200 countries and regions.

You don’t need to prepare anything except a screwdriver for installation.

*The unit cannot be installed without the bracket, the minimum window opening should be 13.75” high for proper installation.

The Midea Window AC is Wifi - enabled, it can be controlled from anywhere through the cloud using an app on iOS or Android, and you can use voice commands with Google Assistant or Alexa. Have complete control of your comfort anytime, anywhere – even if you don’t know where the kids left the remote!
Step 1-Back and follow us on Indiegogo

Step 2-Get your referral link on the top right corner of our Indiegogo campaign page (indicated below) and share it with your friends. 
Step 3-Confirm that your friend has ordered Midea Window AC.



Note: 

If you or your friend refund before the project ends, you and your friend will be regarded as quitting this referral program, the prize will NOT be sent to you.

story:
"What an awesome design! This truly makes the previous sphere portable. I particularly like the Copper for the health benefits. I'm looking forward to backing another of your successful projects!"  -- Anna K.

"This is absolutely beautiful!" -- Cindy L.

Why Trance Jewel?

The original Trance Sphere. 3,057 backers pledged $502,998 to bring it to life!

The trance sphere was a wonderful product that turned out better than anyone expected. The quality of the finish was and still is the benchmark of quality in the industry. Everyone who stops by my desk naturally asks about it and the urge to pick it up and hold it is generally irresistible. I myself find myself rolling the sphere in my hand whenever I'm concentrating on a difficult problem. It really does seem to stimulate my thoughts somehow.

The Trance Sphere in Titanium was a great concentration tool as well.

I feel like my life has noticeably improved with the sphere at my desk. It gets more attention than the cube, acts as concentration tool and is generally just super cool. There was something missing, however. Whenever I wasn't at my desk, I found myself without my trusty spherical companion. It is impractical to take with me, even to meetings because of its shape and size. I needed something more portable.

A tiny 2 cm mini sphere was a little too small for daily use

First, I tried just carrying around the mini sphere, but it wasn't very satisfying at 2 cm in size. It was still a bit uncomfortable to carry, even at that size. With the spinner craze, I tried substituting the sphere with spinners of various types, but they all felt cheap (even solid metal spinners) and uncomfortable compared with the perfect mirror-finish smooth simplicity of the sphere.

I needed to be something that wasn't awkward or overly heavy, but still retained the sphere's magical mirror-smoothness and solid feel. At first, it seemed like a relatively easy task. I carried around everyday objects like stones, other metal shapes and pens, but nothing had the right feel. Nothing else was inducing that sense of concentration that the sphere gives.

We decided to make our own shape. It was time to make something new.

Our first 3D paper mockup of the jewel concept

After dozens of iterations, paper and 3D mockups, we settled on a shape. We struggled with the exact size and shape since we wanted something thin enough to carry around, but we couldn't accept any bends or edges. 

Choosing among dozens of curves for the perfect feel

We wanted something we could fit in a wallet, but would feel natural in the hand. Even once we settled on a basic shape, we had variations in the mathematical formula that describes the exact nature of the curves.

The incredible quality and finish on the jewel prototypes shocked us

The finish is so perfect it looks like a drop of liquid copper

A copper prototype profile. It feels perfect in the hand

We settled on what's called an oblate spheroid - basically a flattened sphere. When the prototypes came back, we instantly knew we had what we were looking for: A solid portable sphere replacement that induced that same magical feeling the sphere gave us. In fact, I think the Jewel spheroid feels even better in the hand than the sphere, and the portability is better than expected for daily use.

Slides unnoticed into your pocket

The Jewel even fits in your wallet!

After hundreds of hours of hard work by our whole team, we've reached the end of the road. The only way we can produce these is with your help. Your pledge will allow us get the minimum order quantity for production. Click here to pledge now and help us make the Jewel a reality!

The Metals

Hospitals have begun to use copper in high-touch areas due to the oligodynamic effect. Microbes have shown no ability to resist or adapt to this effect, so it is particularly good at fighting "superbugs"

COPPER

It’s Oligodynamic, which means it naturally kills germs on contact. We each have about 2mg of copper in our body, without which we could not survive. It’s dense - between lead and steel in density. Along with gold, it's the only non-greyish pure metal. Copper takes on its own unique hue over time and can be “reset” to brilliancy with baking soda and water (or salt and vinegar).

Pure copper prevents growth and even kills bacteria, molds, spores, fungi, viruses and other organisms. The exact cause is unknown, but it's likely that the ions denature the protein of the cells by binding to reactive groups (precipitating and inactivating them). Copper has the strongest known oligodynamic effect of all pure metals.

One study showed that a copper vessel filled with E. Coli and Salmonella killed the bacteria in less than half the time vs. silver and brass. Many hospitals are now using pure copper on everything from hospital beds to doorknobs in order to fight "superbugs".

TITANIUM

Titanium has the highest strength to weight ratio of any metal. It also has the most corrosion resistance, which makes it very neutral to touch. Often,Titanium parts are often used in replacement body part surgeries because of these properties.

Titanium must be machined carefully with extra-sharp cutting tools and proper cooling in order to get the mirror finish we achieve. You will not often see highly polished titanium surfaces because of this.

SILVER

Silver is an extremely soft, ductile, precious metal that also has oligodynamic germ-killing properties.

We use the traditional sterling silver alloy (92.5%), since pure silver would be too soft to hold its shape long-term. Silver is the shiniest metal of the three, though it will naturally tarnish over time (and can be re-polished easily with over-the-counter cleaners). Silver has been used both for its germ-killing properties and as a precious metal for centuries.

After making the Jewel prototype, we noticed a few things:       

Our manufacturer shocked us again with the quality of the prototypes. This is the same manufacturer that we used for the perfect spheres (our last project) and they have definitely delivered once again. 

  

Buy a pair to show someone you care

Because of the extremely high polish and accurate finish, the Jewel can also act as a wide-angle mirror:    

Never get surprised from behind again!

We made a Silver version, because of silver's oligodynamic effects (which are similar, but not quite as powerful as copper). It's expensive but super cool :)

The Jewel in Silver, side view. Over half a pound of solid Sterling Silver!

Specs

Copper
230 grams
7 cm diameter x 1 cm thickness
99.9% solid Copper       

Titanium
116 grams
7 cm diameter x 1 cm thickness
99.3+% solid Titanium

Silver
270 grams
7 cm diameter x 1 cm thickness
92.5% solid Silver (sterling)

How is it made?

We're now using a precision machining process to get a perfect finish. A large cylinder of copper, titanium or silver is put onto a metal lathe and carefully worked using a CNC. It is then polished to perfection.

Who is Trance Metals?     

Hi, I'm Rudy Marsh!  In 2015, I partnered with Nir Leibovich to bring you the Esington Glass. We raised over $196k on Kickstarter and brought the Esington Glass to life with your help!       

Next, I partnered with Jaime Raijman at Forge Solid to bring you the Forge Solid cube, raising over $487k on Kickstarter. 

Last May, I launched the Trance Sphere project which raised $502,998 on Kickstarter. 

Over $1.1 million and 9000 international backers, 100% fulfilled

Here's what people thought of our last project: Trance Sphere 

Why Trance Metals?

Many years ago, my father melted down a ½ pound spool of leftover copper wire. For no particular reason other than it seemed like a really cool thing to do. I remember thinking how attractive the resulting ball of copper was. I was drawn to it. It was particularly satisfying to roll it around on my hands. Maybe I had a copper deficiency and my body was trying to absorb it? I don’t know, but it seemed like everyone enjoyed holding it. At the time, I knew nothing about the oligodynamic effect (germ killing) or health benefits of copper. I just knew I loved that blob of solid copper.

After my mother passed away, I remembered that chunk of copper when reminiscing over our happy days together. I really wanted to buy a large piece of copper just to have for myself. I couldn’t find a large, solid piece of copper anywhere, so I had one made.

When the prototype was shipped to my house, my 3 year old son was immediately drawn to it. He really didn’t want to stop handling it. Now it’s on my desk at work along with my Esington Glass and Forge Solid cube. It gets the most attention of the three by far.

What is it about copper? Maybe it’s the distinct color? Maybe we have some other connection to it? I’m not sure, I just know it’s the thing people want to hold and talk about the most.

What people are saying

"Once again Rudy has designed a simply elegant piece of artwork that also feeds the spirit, mind, and body." -- Anna K.

"What a beautiful addition to my Forge Solid Cubes. Can't wait to see the next thing you come up with." -- Susan P.

"Hi there, just wanted to let you know I was a huge fan and backer of the tungsten project, and found this awesome as well. So backing this was a no brainer." -- Mohamad S.

"I just backed your latest KS campaign. I love your stuff and have two cubes and one hourglass already in my home. Can't wait to see this 1kilo sphere... I'm sure your campaign will be another huge success." -- Dan D.

"Hello! I was one of your esington backers, I just backed this project too...My father is a huge fan of copper so I figured This would be a wonderful gift to him. Thank you!" -- Jennifer L.

"Hey Rudy! I backed Esington (actually a Day 1 backer on that, too, I'm proud to say!!) and I just backed Trance...I love your products! Keep up the good work!" -- Tania D.

"I backed the tungsten KS project and love it. My wife is copper crazy and will think this is perfect. I hope you are able to get a good polish. Great job on the super speedy funding!!!!!" -- Mike E.

"Congrats on getting funded so quickly. It's very impressive but not surprising! A true statement to the quality of your previous products and how much people liked them. I already got my own pledge and 3 more friends are onboard. Congrats again." -- Kosta Z.

"Hi Rudy, I'm a backer of the Forge Kilo (which I loved by the way) and pledged for the Trance Copper Sphere as an early-bird backer." -- Brian H.

"Looks so cool. All Backed! Thanks and look forward to holding this thing..." -- Darrel R.

"Stunning! I did back Esington and am looking forward to adding the Copper sphere to my collection. Best wishes" -- Lee A.

"I think this project just might be more interesting than the Forge Solid! I backed that project for two cubes and this sphere will be a nice addition to my collection." Robert S.

"Hi Rudy, Count me in of the Trance Copper Sphere -- looks very cool and will be a nice addition next to my Esington glass! Onward!" -- Steve P.

"Hello! I was a backer of the [tungsten] cube project! I actually regret not getting a larger size of the cube, but now i can make up for it in copper! The cube was definitely helpful and calming just to have on my desk, so I cant wait to see the sphere!" Florence W.

"Excited for your new project! Everyone who sees the cubes from the Forge Solid project loves it. Woohoo!" -- Butch W.

"Hi, I am an [Esington] backer and just backed your Copper Sphere at the 2x 1kg level. Looking forward to this - love my timers!" -- Monika R.

"Hi - I just backed the Trance Copper Sphere...and was a backer of the Forge Solid as well. Thank you for another cool project!" -- John B.

"Hi! As a backer for your Esington glass project, I got your email today about this project and immediately had to back it. The images of this copper ball look amazing and I can't wait to see this project fulfilled!" -- Nicole T.

"G'day. I love my Tungsten cube and would love to get a copper sphere to put next to it. These are such awesome ideas. Thank you for doing them" -- Matthew I.

"Hi Rudy,...I just pledged the 1 lb. copper sphere in matte. I love my Esington glass, every one who comes over to my home, if they come in my living room they are drawn to it to turn it up side down/" -- Nate K.

"I backed the cubes and use them at work regularly. I teach at the military EOD (bomb squad) school in the nuclear division. The density of the kilo helps me show the how small 2 lbs of fissile material can be when talking about criticality incidents. I have backed this at the kilo size as well and it looks awesome." -- James H.   

Risks and challenges

My previous projects were incredibly educational. With over 9000 backers all over the world between them, manufacturing and logistics were incredibly complex for someone with no previous experience.

After several trips to manufacturers in Asia, switching shipping companies, sourcing companies and export agents, I feel like we are in a much better place than we were before our unexpected success on Kickstarter. I’m also proud to be one of the few small companies to have 100% fulfillment on our campaigns.

There are always risks involved, but the biggest one is always the timeline. We were late shipping the bulk of our projects (though we did manage to get many of our early birds on time). We’ve given ourselves an extra month with this timeline and feel very confident we can deliver on time. If we do run into manufacturing, logistics or shipping issues, we’ll always keep you updated. We promise to deliver 100%, just as we have on every other project.

Please help fund this project so you can experience the Jewel for yourself. Thank you for your support!
story_txt: "What an awesome design! This truly makes the previous sphere portable. I particularly like the Copper for the health benefits. I'm looking forward to backing another of your successful projects!"  -- Anna K."This is absolutely beautiful!" -- Cindy L.Why Trance Jewel?The original Trance Sphere. 3,057 backers pledged $502,998 to bring it to life!The trance sphere was a wonderful product that turned out better than anyone expected. The quality of the finish was and still is the benchmark of quality in the industry. Everyone who stops by my desk naturally asks about it and the urge to pick it up and hold it is generally irresistible. I myself find myself rolling the sphere in my hand whenever I'm concentrating on a difficult problem. It really does seem to stimulate my thoughts somehow.The Trance Sphere in Titanium was a great concentration tool as well.I feel like my life has noticeably improved with the sphere at my desk. It gets more attention than the cube, acts as concentration tool and is generally just super cool. There was something missing, however. Whenever I wasn't at my desk, I found myself without my trusty spherical companion. It is impractical to take with me, even to meetings because of its shape and size. I needed something more portable.A tiny 2 cm mini sphere was a little too small for daily useFirst, I tried just carrying around the mini sphere, but it wasn't very satisfying at 2 cm in size. It was still a bit uncomfortable to carry, even at that size. With the spinner craze, I tried substituting the sphere with spinners of various types, but they all felt cheap (even solid metal spinners) and uncomfortable compared with the perfect mirror-finish smooth simplicity of the sphere.I needed to be something that wasn't awkward or overly heavy, but still retained the sphere's magical mirror-smoothness and solid feel. At first, it seemed like a relatively easy task. I carried around everyday objects like stones, other metal shapes and pens, but nothing had the right feel. Nothing else was inducing that sense of concentration that the sphere gives.We decided to make our own shape. It was time to make something new.Our first 3D paper mockup of the jewel conceptAfter dozens of iterations, paper and 3D mockups, we settled on a shape. We struggled with the exact size and shape since we wanted something thin enough to carry around, but we couldn't accept any bends or edges. Choosing among dozens of curves for the perfect feelWe wanted something we could fit in a wallet, but would feel natural in the hand. Even once we settled on a basic shape, we had variations in the mathematical formula that describes the exact nature of the curves.The incredible quality and finish on the jewel prototypes shocked usThe finish is so perfect it looks like a drop of liquid copperA copper prototype profile. It feels perfect in the handWe settled on what's called an oblate spheroid - basically a flattened sphere. When the prototypes came back, we instantly knew we had what we were looking for: A solid portable sphere replacement that induced that same magical feeling the sphere gave us. In fact, I think the Jewel spheroid feels even better in the hand than the sphere, and the portability is better than expected for daily use.Slides unnoticed into your pocketThe Jewel even fits in your wallet!After hundreds of hours of hard work by our whole team, we've reached the end of the road. The only way we can produce these is with your help. Your pledge will allow us get the minimum order quantity for production. Click here to pledge now and help us make the Jewel a reality!The MetalsHospitals have begun to use copper in high-touch areas due to the oligodynamic effect. Microbes have shown no ability to resist or adapt to this effect, so it is particularly good at fighting "superbugs"COPPERIt’s Oligodynamic, which means it naturally kills germs on contact. We each have about 2mg of copper in our body, without which we could not survive. It’s dense - between lead and steel in density. Along with gold, it's the only non-greyish pure metal. Copper takes on its own unique hue over time and can be “reset” to brilliancy with baking soda and water (or salt and vinegar).Pure copper prevents growth and even kills bacteria, molds, spores, fungi, viruses and other organisms. The exact cause is unknown, but it's likely that the ions denature the protein of the cells by binding to reactive groups (precipitating and inactivating them). Copper has the strongest known oligodynamic effect of all pure metals.One study showed that a copper vessel filled with E. Coli and Salmonella killed the bacteria in less than half the time vs. silver and brass. Many hospitals are now using pure copper on everything from hospital beds to doorknobs in order to fight "superbugs".TITANIUMTitanium has the highest strength to weight ratio of any metal. It also has the most corrosion resistance, which makes it very neutral to touch. Often,Titanium parts are often used in replacement body part surgeries because of these properties.Titanium must be machined carefully with extra-sharp cutting tools and proper cooling in order to get the mirror finish we achieve. You will not often see highly polished titanium surfaces because of this.SILVERSilver is an extremely soft, ductile, precious metal that also has oligodynamic germ-killing properties.We use the traditional sterling silver alloy (92.5%), since pure silver would be too soft to hold its shape long-term. Silver is the shiniest metal of the three, though it will naturally tarnish over time (and can be re-polished easily with over-the-counter cleaners). Silver has been used both for its germ-killing properties and as a precious metal for centuries.After making the Jewel prototype, we noticed a few things:       Our manufacturer shocked us again with the quality of the prototypes. This is the same manufacturer that we used for the perfect spheres (our last project) and they have definitely delivered once again.   Buy a pair to show someone you careBecause of the extremely high polish and accurate finish, the Jewel can also act as a wide-angle mirror:    Never get surprised from behind again!We made a Silver version, because of silver's oligodynamic effects (which are similar, but not quite as powerful as copper). It's expensive but super cool :)The Jewel in Silver, side view. Over half a pound of solid Sterling Silver!SpecsCopper230 grams7 cm diameter x 1 cm thickness99.9% solid Copper       Titanium116 grams7 cm diameter x 1 cm thickness99.3+% solid TitaniumSilver270 grams7 cm diameter x 1 cm thickness92.5% solid Silver (sterling)How is it made?We're now using a precision machining process to get a perfect finish. story:
We make the pillow cube out of the same high rebound comfort foams that the top bed-in-the box companies use, but just a whole lot less of it. Most pillows shred their foam into a lumpy mess. Why not give you a highly engineered, structurally soft, perfectly shaped bed for your head?  And we wrapped it all up in a Silky smooth stretchy cover.

*PillowCube is made of 2.5 pounds of copper-gel-infused viscoelastic polyurethane foam AND a little bit of love. 

A perfect cube looked great, but after extensive testing, we found the perfect dimensions. We argued about the perfect dimensions, then we decided to offer the PillowCube in two sizes. 

People with broad shoulders and big noggins will LOVE the 7" PillowCube, while people with narrower shoulders will prefer the 5" PillowCube.

 

Designed for your head (but you can use it wherever you need to). 

Propping up your head when sleeping on your side not only helps with spinal alignment, but also decreases sleep apnea and reduces acid reflux. You don't have to use the PillowCube on your head. This soft little building block will fit wherever you need it (even that cube shaped hole in your heart)**

**Pillow Cube is not guaranteed to reduce loneliness. 

EVEN MORE USES FOR THE PILLOW CUBE

 

ALL OF THIS COMFORT IN A tiny PACKAGE.

A pillow is mostly air and when you suck that out, all that is left is a tiny cube of concentrated comfort.  This makes it easy to ship and when you open it up, it expands to its healthy (almost) perfectly cubic shape. 

But you can suck too. Suck the air of the pillow cube with a compression bag, and you've got one amazing travel pillow that fits into the corners and crevices of any airline flight. After a restful redeye, you'll be hugging your Pillow Cube too. 

DEVELOPMENT

Coming up with a square pillow wasn't easy...actually, it was. It was stupidly easy. We cut a block of foam and tested it, fell asleep, and loved it. We used it to watch TV on the couch, to elevate our feet, and to build little tiny forts. But here is a graphic that makes it look like development was really hard: 

Good sleep is its own reward, but if you support our dream of creating a better pillow, you can actually get a pillow. We've also created some incentives for our earliest backers.
