story:
First time to Indiegogo?

It's super easy!

1. Decide how many towels you want, then click the pink button that says "GET THIS PERK".

2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.

3. Receive and fill out the survey for colour choices via email.

4. You can add more towels in the survey of our partner Backerkit!

5. We receive your colour choices and get your shipment out in April 2019.

We want to set a trend in the industry and prove that it is possible to deliver a superior product while giving back more resources to the earth than we use to produce it.

By planting 2 trees for each towel and compensating the carbon emissions and blue-water usage of the towel production, we will become the first climate & resource positive textile brand.

Kushel creates superior cosiness from truly organic materials. We make it easy for you to live a more sustainable lifestyle, by designing high-quality towels at a fair price.

The towel is blended with TENCEL™ Modal, providing increased absorbency and a luxurious feel.

Breathability is the essential feature of a soft towel. Ultra fluffy towels tend to be thirsty, but because they do not release the absorbed water they can get smelly. This indicates the growth of yucky bacteria.

Our solution: we chose a thickness of 600 GSM which is cosy enough, but not too fluffy. The innovative 8 pearl stitch maximizes the surface for even more breathability.

We offer four different colours. Cloud White (a slight Off-White), Bae Rosé (a super soft pink) and Slate Grey (a dark grey) and Ocean Blue (a classic navy blue) Note: You will be able to choose your favourite colour in the Checkout Process.

Kushel is the first towel made from organic cotton and TENCEL™ Modal. We tested several blends and are proud to present this perfectly tailored towel.

TENCEL™ Modal fibers are produced by Eco Soft technology in Austria by Lenzing. They are the state of the art producer and evironmentally responsible, offering exquisite softness to textiles. The technology uses elemental chlorine-free bleaching in an integrated process, from pulp to fiber, which has high recovery rates of process ingredients and causes very low air emissions.

HOW TO PRE ORDER: 

1. Decide how many towels you want, then click the pink button that says "GET THIS PERK".

2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.

3. Receive and fill out the survey for colour choices via email.

4. You can add more towels in the survey of our partner Backerkit!

5. We receive your colour choices and get your shipment out in April 2019

 

Kushel Towels are a perfect gift for a family member, a close friend or your loved ones. Contact us and we will send a printed postcard before Christmas. Valid for all pledges before the 16th of December! Please write us a message via Indigogo or at support@kushel.de

We want to set a trend in the industry and prove that it is possible to deliver a superior product while giving back more resources to the earth than we use to produce it.

By planting trees for each towel and compensating the carbon emissions and blue-water usage of our production, we will become the first climate & resource positivetextile brand.

By planting two trees for each towel, we will give back more resources to mother Nature than we use for the production. Trees store a considerable amount of carbon dioxide within their lifetime and help to cool down the planet by lowering air temperature as they provide shade and stabilize the soil. With our partners Plant for the Planet, Trees for the Future an Klimapatenschaft Pflanzaktion we aim to plant 1 Million trees in Mexico, Africa and Germany.

After testing all the top rated towels, different materials and compositions for over a year, we finally discovered the perfect material combination and partners to create the perfect towel for you and mother nature.

We choose to produce our towels in north Portugal, a region known for state-of-the-art craftmanship and fair working conditions and. Our manufacturing partner is member of SMETA (Sedex Member’s Ethical Trade Audit and is working on the implementation of STeP by OEKO-TEX Certification. The Kushel towel is OEKO-TEX 100 certified.

In June 2018 we got certified as a B-Corp Corporation with our existing business of distributing the social business Ethnotek Bags in Germany. As a certified B-Corp we are now legally required to consider the impact of our decisions on our workers, customers, suppliers, community, and the environment. We have signed a code of conduct with our partners.

 

 

 

Wir möchten beweisen, dass es möglich ist ein hochwertiges Produkt zu entwickeln und dabei dem Planeten mehr Ressourcen zurückzugeben als wir für die Produktion verwendet haben.

Wie wir das schaffen? Pro Handtuch pflanzen wir 2 Bäume und gleichen den gesamten CO2 und Wasserverbrauch der Produktion aus. Somit geben mehr zurück und leisten einen aktiven Beitrag den Klimawandel aufzuhalten.

Das Kuschel Handtuch ist umweltfreundlicher als ein konventionelles Handtuch aus Baumwolle. Dadurch wollen wir es Menschen einfach machen sich zuhause wohl zu fühlen und der Welt etwas Gutes zu tun – Ohne Verzicht und zu einem fairen Preis.

Die Atmungsaktivität ist essenziell für unser weiches Handtuch. Dicke Handtücher nehmen zwar viel Wasser auf, trocknen aber langsamer. Das ergibt den perfekten Nährboden für Bakterien und das Handtuch fängt schnell an zu riechen.

Das Kushel Handtuch löst dieses Problem indem es eine mittlere Dicke aufweist und mit einem speziellen „8-Pearlstitch“ versehen ist, der die Oberfläche vergrößert und es somit schneller trocknen lässt.

Kushel ist das erste Handtuch das aus TENCEL™ Modal und Baumwolle aus biologischem Anbau hergestellt wird. Durch das besondere Mischverhältnis können die Fasern ihre volle Wirkung entfalten.

Du kannst Dir sicher sein, dieses Handtuch ist umweltfreundlich hergestellt.

Unser Partner LENZING produziert die TENCEL™ Modal Fasern mit Hilfe der Eco Soft Technologie in einem Naherholungsgebiet in Österreich. Die Eco Soft Technologie ist ein chlorfreier integrierter Prozess, bei dem ein Großteil der Chemikalien wiederverwendet wird.

Neu bei Indiegogo?

Es ist super einfach!

1. Wähle deine Unterstützung (Perk) aus und klicke auf den rosa Button „GET THIS PERK“.

2. Wähle deine Lieblingsfarbe aus und gib deine Lieferadresse und Zahlungsdaten ein.

3. Du erhältst eine Zahlungsbestätigung von uns und eine E-Mail für die Umfrage (Survey).

4. Bestelle weitere Handtücher in der Umfrage (Survey) bei unserem Partner Backerkit.

5. Wir bestätigen Deine Bestellung und im April 2019 kommt Dein Kushel-Paket!

Für alle Bestellungen vor dem 16.12.2018 können wir eine gedruckte Gutscheinkarte anbieten. Meldet euch einfach nach dem Kauf bei support@kushel.de und wir versenden noch rechtzeitig euren Gutschein!

Wir möchten beweisen, dass es möglich ist ein hochwertiges Produkt zu entwickeln und dabei dem Planeten mehr Ressourcen zurückzugeben als wir für die Produktion verwendet haben.

Wie wir das schaffen? Pro Handtuch pflanzen wir 2 Bäume und gleichen den gesamten CO2 und Wasserverbrauch der Produktion aus. Somit geben mehr zurück und leisten einen aktiven Beitrag den Klimawandel aufzuhalten.

Für jedes Handtuch pflanzen wir 2 Bäume und erschaffen damit neue, zusätzliche Ressourcen für unseren Planeten.

Bäume speichern CO2 durch Photosynthese, spenden Schatten und stabilisieren den Boden. Deswegen sind gesunde Wälder die Grundlage für ein funktionierendes Klima.

Unsere Baumpartner sind die Klimapatenschaft Pflanzaktion (Deutschland), Plant for the Planet (Mexiko) und Trees for the Future (Afrika).

Wir haben alle top bewerteten Handtücher und Faser-Kombinationen getestet.
Mit den Spezialisten aus der Branche haben wir den perfekten Materialmix gefunden – für Dich und für Mutter Natur.

Das Kushel Handtuch wird unter fairen Bedingungen in Portugal produziert. Im Norden Portugals gibt es ein Tal in dem seit Generationen Handtücher hergestellt werden. Wir nennen es das Silicon-Valley der Frottierwaren. Unser Partner produziert in dritter Generation Handtücher und ist Mitglied der SMETA (Sedex Member’s Ethical Trade Audit) und befindet sich in der Implementierung von STeP by OEKO-TEX, einer weitergehenden Zertifizierung als OEKO-TEX 100.
story_txt: First time to Indiegogo?It's super easy!1. Decide how many towels you want, then click the pink button that says "GET THIS PERK".2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.3. Receive and fill out the survey for colour choices via email.4. You can add more towels in the survey of our partner Backerkit!5. We receive your colour choices and get your shipment out in April 2019.We want to set a trend in the industry and prove that it is possible to deliver a superior product while giving back more resources to the earth than we use to produce it.By planting 2 trees for each towel and compensating the carbon emissions and blue-water usage of the towel production, we will become the first climate & resource positive textile brand.Kushel creates superior cosiness from truly organic materials. We make it easy for you to live a more sustainable lifestyle, by designing high-quality towels at a fair price.The towel is blended with TENCEL™ Modal, providing increased absorbency and a luxurious feel.Breathability is the essential feature of a soft towel. Ultra fluffy towels tend to be thirsty, but because they do not release the absorbed water they can get smelly. This indicates the growth of yucky bacteria.Our solution: we chose a thickness of 600 GSM which is cosy enough, but not too fluffy. The innovative 8 pearl stitch maximizes the surface for even more breathability.We offer four different colours. Cloud White (a slight Off-White), Bae Rosé (a super soft pink) and Slate Grey (a dark grey) and Ocean Blue (a classic navy blue) Note: You will be able to choose your favourite colour in the Checkout Process.Kushel is the first towel made from organic cotton and TENCEL™ Modal. We tested several blends and are proud to present this perfectly tailored towel.TENCEL™ Modal fibers are produced by Eco Soft technology in Austria by Lenzing. They are the state of the art producer and evironmentally responsible, offering exquisite softness to textiles. The technology uses elemental chlorine-free bleaching in an integrated process, from pulp to fiber, which has high recovery rates of process ingredients and causes very low air emissions.HOW TO PRE ORDER: 1. Decide how many towels you want, then click the pink button that says "GET THIS PERK".2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.3. Receive and fill out the survey for colour choices via email.4. You can add more towels in the survey of our partner Backerkit!5. We receive your colour choices and get your shipment out in April 2019 Kushel Towels are a perfect gift for a family member, a close friend or your loved ones. Contact us and we will send a printed postcard before Christmas. Valid for all pledges before the 16th of December! Please write us a message via Indigogo or at support@kushel.deWe want to set a trend in the industry and prove that it is possible to deliver a superior product while giving back more resources to the earth than we use to produce it.By planting trees for each towel and compensating the carbon emissions and blue-water usage of our production, we will become the first climate & resource positivetextile brand.By planting two trees for each towel, we will give back more resources to mother Nature than we use for the production. Trees store a considerable amount of carbon dioxide within their lifetime and help to cool down the planet by lowering air temperature as they provide shade and stabilize the soil. With our partners Plant for the Planet, Trees for the Future an Klimapatenschaft Pflanzaktion we aim to plant 1 Million trees in Mexico, Africa and Germany.After testing all the top rated towels, different materials and compositions for over a year, we finally discovered the perfect material combination and partners to create the perfect towel for you and mother nature.We choose to produce our towels in north Portugal, a region known for state-of-the-art craftmanship and fair working conditions and. Our manufacturing partner is member of SMETA (Sedex Member’s Ethical Trade Audit and is working on the implementation of STeP by OEKO-TEX Certification. The Kushel towel is OEKO-TEX 100 certified.In June 2018 we got certified as a B-Corp Corporation with our existing business of distributing the social business Ethnotek Bags in Germany. As a certified B-Corp we are now legally required to consider the impact of our decisions on our workers, customers, suppliers, community, and the environment. We have signed a code of conduct with our partners.   Wir möchten beweisen, dass es möglich ist ein hochwertiges Produkt zu entwickeln und dabei dem Planeten mehr Ressourcen zurückzugeben als wir für die Produktion verwendet haben.Wie wir das schaffen? Pro Handtuch pflanzen wir 2 Bäume und gleichen den gesamten CO2 und Wasserverbrauch der Produktion aus. Somit geben mehr zurück und leisten einen aktiven Beitrag den Klimawandel aufzuhalten.Das Kuschel Handtuch ist umweltfreundlicher als ein konventionelles Handtuch aus Baumwolle. Dadurch wollen wir es Menschen einfach machen sich zuhause wohl zu fühlen und der Welt etwas Gutes zu tun – Ohne Verzicht und zu einem fairen Preis.Die Atmungsaktivität ist essenziell für unser weiches Handtuch. Dicke Handtücher nehmen zwar viel Wasser auf, trocknen aber langsamer. Das ergibt den perfekten Nährboden für Bakterien und das Handtuch fängt schnell an zu riechen.Das Kushel Handtuch löst dieses Problem indem es eine mittlere Dicke aufweist und mit einem speziellen „8-Pearlstitch“ versehen ist, der die Oberfläche vergrößert und es somit schneller trocknen lässt.Kushel ist das erste Handtuch das aus TENCEL™ Modal und Baumwolle aus biologischem Anbau hergestellt wird. Durch das besondere Mischverhältnis können die Fasern ihre volle Wirkung entfalten.Du kannst Dir sicher sein, dieses Handtuch ist umweltfreundlich hergestellt.Unser Partner LENZING produziert die TENCEL™ Modal Fasern mit Hilfe der Eco Soft Technologie in einem Naherholungsgebiet in Österreich. Die Eco Soft Technologie ist ein chlorfreier integrierter Prozess, bei dem ein Großteil der Chemikalien wiederverwendet wird.Neu bei Indiegogo?Es ist super einfach!1. Wähle deine Unterstützung (Perk) aus und klicke auf den rosa Button „GET THIS PERK“.2. Wähle deine Lieblingsfarbe aus und gib deine Lieferadresse und Zahlungsdaten ein.3. Du erhältst eine Zahlungsbestätigung von uns und eine E-Mail für die Umfrage (Survey).4. Bestelle weitere Handtücher in der Umfrage (Survey) bei unserem Partner Backerkit.5. Wir bestätigen Deine Bestellung und im April 2019 kommt Dein Kushel-Paket!Für alle Bestellungen vor dem 16.12.2018 können wir eine gedruckte Gutscheinkarte anbieten. Meldet euch einfach nach dem Kauf bei support@kushel.de und wir versenden noch rechtzeitig euren Gutschein!Wir möchten beweisen, dass es möglich ist ein hochwertiges Produkt zu entwickeln und dabei dem Planeten mehr Ressourcen zurückzugeben als wir für die Produktion verwendet haben.Wie wir das schaffen? Pro Handtuch pflanzen wir 2 Bäume und gleichen den gesamten CO2 und Wasserverbrauch der Produktion aus. Somit geben mehr zurück und leisten einen aktiven Beitrag den Klimawandel aufzuhalten.Für jedes Handtuch pflanzen wir 2 Bäume und erschaffen damit neue, zusätzliche Ressourcen für unseren Planeten.Bäume speichern CO2 durch Photosynthese, spenden Schatten und stabilisieren den Boden. Deswegen sind gesunde Wälder die Grundlage für ein funktionierendes Klima.Unsere Baumpartner sind die Klimapatenschaft Pflanzaktion (Deutschland), Plant for the Planet (Mexiko) und Trees for the Future (Afrika).Wir haben alle top bewerteten Handtücher und Faser-Kombinationen getestet.Mit den Spezialisten aus der Branche haben wir den perfekten Materialmix gefunden – für Dich und für Mutter Natur.Das Kushel Handtuch wird unter fairen Bedingungen in Portugal produziert. Im Norden Portugals gibt es ein Tal in dem seit Generationen Handtücher hergestellt werden. Wir nennen es das Silicon-Valley der Frottierwaren. Unser Partner produziert in dritter Generation Handtücher und ist Mitglied der SMETA (Sedex Member’s Ethical Trade Audit) und befindet sich in der Implementierung von STeP by OEKO-TEX, einer weitergehenden Zertifizierung als OEKO-TEX 100.

story:
Hello and thanks for looking into our project! 

Beth and I started Orange Mud to be innovative, different, and to keep manufacturing local. Our passion for outdoor adventures has taken us from mud runs to marathons, mountain bike to adventure racing, and from triathlon to Ironman. Many times though, a walk around the neighborhood or a simple night time hike with friends is just as good. Though we're not professional athletes by any stretch, we are diligent in training and testing the limits of current gear on the market which has constantly left us asking "why isn't there something like....xxxxx on the market?" Hence the start of Orange Mud. 

Introducing our first product, the HydraQuiver™, model TH-1.

HydraQuiver™

Our Marketing Tidbit

Tired of bouncing and sloshing hydration packs? How about a waist pack tight around your waist and generating heat. Or the never ending acrobatic battle of trying to squeeze the bottle into the holder that is too small?

We aim to fix these problems. The HydraQuiver™ is a new approach to lightweight and minimal bounce to the running pack market. It's a tiny pack with loads of features. Thick foam pads and extra wide air channels provide ample support and maximum breathability. The water bottle holder is unique too sporting easy access with a wide tapered funnel opening and perfect retention once the bottle is in place. Easy in, easy out. Another bonus? Use a bottle then throw it in the dishwasher. That's hard to do with a bladder based system...

This pack isn't just for runners, it's great for a walk around the neighborhood, pushing around the baby stroller, or for walking your dog. We've found the mesh pockets work great for food, but also for doggie treats!

Key Info

  • Extremely lightweight pack that is easy to forget it's presence once you're off for your journey.
  • Funnel shaped extra wide bottle opening for easy bottle storage.
  • Food/accessory pockets on the shoulders for quick access.
  • Small footprint of the pack keeps heat buildup low.
  • Velcro® is kept to a minimum so it stays clear from your high tech wicking sports apparel. It’s a great product, but doesn't play nice with synthetics. 
  • We also want you safe at night so we put reflective webbing at the bottom of the pack that lights up nicely in the dark.
  • Adjustable bottle strap to accommodate different sized bottles.
  • A water bottle (24 oz BPA free is included with a pack purchase) based hydration system for easy washing in the dishwasher. Tough to do with a bladder!
  • High quality 420 denier pack cloth. 
  • Combo of newly developed stretch web and HDPE to create a rock solid bottle retention system. 
  • Aegis® antimicrobial coated rear mesh to keep bacteria in check.

Project History Timeline

We're just over 9 months into development as of today. It's been a long road, but we feel that our project is ready for a large roll out. To give you an idea of the design history, please see below. 

0-2 Months - We started this project almost a year ago in our garage by destroying many backpacks (some that I loved very much), and some basic tie down straps for the nylon webbing. We had a sewing machine in our garage that has survived three moves over the years, well, turned out it was broken all this time. So that left us sewing by hand which is certainly not pretty, nor easy in thick materials. Nevertheless our first concept came to life and we ran many nights in the dark to test it thoroughly yet still stay under the radar. 

2-4 Months - Once we realized that our concept had legs, we began looking to a local seamstresses for help. We got some great help in refinement, but it turns out that sewing machines for backpacks aren't the same for sewing wedding gowns. Equipment limitations aside we were able to refine and learn a few key steps along the way and further realize that we're on the right track with our concept. 

4-5 months - Hiring an industrial designer in Bend, OR helped to get our feet off the ground and moving towards a package that would show manufacturers that we actually had a strong design and were serious about our project. Who knew it would be so hard to get people to want to make a product for a small scale operation! 

6 months to present - We finally found a local source in Huntington Beach with a core specialty in backpacks, jump packs and military applications. As it turns out, he was a master at turning our concept into reality. A big thanks go to Mike for helping us get the pack to where it is today. 

Present Time - We've learned a great deal about design, materials, resources and most importantly to you, how this pack works. With your project support we will put the finishing touches on the pack and bring this idea to full scale reality. If we should be so lucky to fund, we’ll be making some minor tweaks, mainly cosmetic then will run full production and ship before the holidays!

1. The closure on the mesh pocket will be a bit wider and more robust to accommodate a more secure seal. 

2. The grommet for a head phone port will be replaced with a more resilient polymer.  

3. The reflective strips on the back will be replaced with one robust strip that goes the width of the pack for a cleaner look and more reflectivity. 

4. We're hoping to have orange instead of gray on the elastic loops on the shoulder but large custom runs may delay that.

We look forward to your support and will put your funding to good use! Not able to fund? No problem! If you could spread the word to your friends and social sites that would be awesome too.

Thanks! 

Josh & Beth ~ OrangeMud

 

HydraQuiver™ Padded Back Panel

HydraQuiver™ Funnel Shaped Retention

Wife Beth showing off our product!

story:
Visit Us & Shop Now At BodyBrew.com


     
  

 

 

 

The BOD™, (Brew On Demand) is the first compact, modular & completely portable cold brew coffee system. Its spill-proof, shatter-proof design allows you to brew, anytime anywhere, simplifying the cold brew process.  

The BOD™ transforms ordinary coffee grounds into a super-concentrated coffee extract to make hot or iced coffee in seconds.

 

 

 

 

The BOD™ by BodyBrew™ was designed for coffee lovers on the go, who want great taste, portability and convenience. The BOD™ is both elegant and tough, and the compact spill-proof design, makes it ideal for travel. With the portable Extract Chamber, Mini-Bean and the Baby Bean you can brew and take your coffee virtually anywhere. No other cold brew coffee maker brings all these features together in one easy to use system. The BOD started shipping on February 11, 2016.

 

 

 

We’ve been cold brewing coffee for over 10 years and when we tried to find an easy to use cold brewer at a reasonable price we were left scratching our heads. Cold brew coffee makers on the market today range from DIY mason jars, to white buckets, to tubs and spigots, three-foot tall towers; some even cost thousands of dollars. True these methods all make cold brew coffee, but they’re messy, hard to use, require paper filters, and lack good design. 

Every part of the BOD™ was designed with a purpose. It's easy to use, easy to clean, and with its elegant design, you won’t have to hide it after each use! After 3 years of designing, drafting, engineering and prototyping, we’re ready to show our BOD™ to the world!

 

 

Tech Specs:

 

 

Compact. Modular. Portable.

Every part of the BOD’s modular design has a purpose. The Brew Chamber and Extract Chamber look beautiful together and independently, they’re compact and highly functional:
 
  • The Brew Chamber can be used as a stand-alone brewer
  • The Extract Chamber stores your coffee extract fresh in the fridge
  • The "Easy Pour Twist Caps" are drip free, and make pouring easy.  

 

 

 

    Never Be Without Your Cold Brew...

    Enjoy our Cold Brew Accessories & Portable Flasks
     
    • Take the Mini Bean with you to work or play. 
    • It holds 6 ounces of coffee extract, which makes (2-3) servings of coffee. 
    • The Baby Bean at 3.4 oz. was custom built for traveling- it makes one serving of coffee and will easily pass through airport security!

    What's Your Brew Number?

    Use our custom count up timer to discover your perfect brew number, from  12-72 hours. You'll know exactly how long you've been brewing at a glance! 

     

     

     

     

     

    Mixology Made Easy

    The BOD™ makes a super concentrated coffee extract that's perfect for making delicious gourmet hot or iced coffee in seconds. 

     

    Available In A Variety Of Colors

     


    Colors left to right are: 

    1. Stealth (black) SOLD OUT
    2. Snow (white)
    3. Sheer (clear) SOLD OUT
    4. Sky (blue)
    5. Shadow (grey) SOLD OUT
    6. Scarlet, (red)

     

    Our Experience

    Every project has risks and challenges but as an experienced team of product developers, and small business experts, who have successfully taken a product to market in the past, we’ve eliminated much of the risk by investing heavily in R&D, design and product testing for the BOD™. We also have a great relationship with a top quality manufacturing partner that maintains our high quality standards.

    The BOD™ is the next generation of coffee brewing. We've taken all we’ve learned from our past products and experiences and applied those to every aspect of how we designed, developed and will manufacture the BOD™. We are excited to get the BOD™ off the production line and into your kitchen.


     

     

    How Can I Order A New BOD?

    The only way to get one right now, is through our Indiegogo page right here! People who back the project on Indiegogo, will get the very first BOD’s and will save money over the retail price.

    When Can I Expect To Get My New BOD?

    The BOD started shipping in February 2016 and orders are shipped shortly after we receive them.Unlike a lot of projects that don’t realize how complex the design, development and engineering can be, we’ve already done all of that.  We have a top tier manufacturing partner and a talented team of people to handle the manufacturing and supply chain quickly and efficiently.

    When and How Do I Choose My Color?

    Indiegogo does not have a way for you to select your color upfront, but you will receive an email a few days after you order that will allow you to choose your color or modify your order if needed. 

    When Will I Receive My Order?
     

    All orders are time date stamped and we will ship on a first ordered, first served basis. This means that the first backers will get their BOD™ first, according to when the orders were received. 

     

    How Do I Get Help Or Support?

    Send us a message on our contact page and our team will work with you to resolve your issue! If you have already ordered and received your Backerkit email to select your color and need help with that survey you can contact support@backerkit.com.

    What Is The Cost For Shipping To Alaska, Puerto Rico, Hawaii, Canada?

    Shipping to Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico and Canada is $20.

    What Country’s Do You Ship To and What Is The Cost?

    We've shipped to 56 countries so far. The flat rate is $40 to ship one system. 

    Can I Return My BOD™?

    Due to discounted pricing and the complexities of crowdfunding, shipping and fulfillment, all sales are final. The BOD™ is warrantied for 5 years from date of purchase.

    How Much Coffee Does The BOD™ Use?

    The BOD™ uses 8 oz. or ½ lb. of coffee per brew cycle.  The coffee extract it produces, will make 8-12 servings, depending on how much extract you use. This brew method initially uses more coffee than hot brewing, however unlike drip coffee, there is no waste, (most people drink all of their coffee extract) and if you re-brew the grounds, you get even more coffee. It was also designed so that you can re-brew the coffee grounds a second time and get 3 additional servings per brew cycle, or up to 30 servings per pound of coffee. If you pay $10.00 per pound for coffee, this comes to just .33 cents per serving!

    How Much Coffee Extract Does The BOD™ Make & How Many Servings?

    The BOD™ coffee system will make approximately 24 oz of super concentrated coffee extract per brew cycle, which will make 8-12 cups, (8 oz. each) per brew cycle.  However, the number of servings depends on how much coffee extract you use for each serving. If you use more coffee extract, you’ll have fewer servings. If you choose to Re-Brew your coffee grounds, you’ll get an additional 6 servings per pound, up to 30 cups total.

    What Makes The BOD™ Different Than Other Cold Brewers?

    The BOD™ is the first and only cold brew coffee ‘system’, optimized for cold brewing, that’s spill-proof, shatterproof, compact, modular and portable with no filters to buy. Portable Mini Bean and Baby Bean flasks allow you to take cold brew coffee to go. 

    How's The Taste Of Re-Brewed Coffee Grounds?

    It's strong, flavorful and requires no dilution with water. The BOD™ makes re-brewing easy and convenient

     

    What Type of Grind Can Be Used?

    We recommend a “coarse grind” for the best flavor and results.

    How Strong Is BodyBrew™ Coffee?

    The BOD™ makes a super concentrated coffee extract that gets stronger the longer you brew it. If you like stronger coffee, brew it longer, 18 hours or more. After brewing you can customize each cup, to taste. Adjust the extract to water ratio for the perfect cup of coffee. Most people brew between 18-24 hours.

    How Long Will The Coffee Extract Stay Fresh In The Refrigerator?

    You can store your BodyBrew™ coffee extract for up to 3 weeks. For optimal flavor and freshness, 1-2 weeks is best.

    What Is The BOD™ Made Out Of?

    We chose the highest quality materials we could find to make the BOD™. We partnered with Eastman® and use their cutting edge, proprietary material called Tritan™ which is dishwasher durable, stain resistant and, BPA/BPS, PVC and Phthalate free. The filter is made out of high quality stainless steel that’s made to last and you’ll never have to buy filters again.

    Do You Use Recycled Materials?

    While Tritan™ is recyclable at the end of your BOD’s life cycle, it is not made from post-consumer plastics. Most recycled materials come from old milk jugs and water bottles which do not meet our stringent standards for product quality and durability.

    Is The BOD™ Being Made In The USA?

    Tritan is made in the USA, but the product is manufactured in China. We made every effort possible to get the BOD™ made in the USA, but after spending 6 months talking to 9 different suppliers, we couldn't find any suppliers who wanted to manufacture it. We had no choice but to move on to a supplier that could get the job done. Some USA suppliers did not even get back to us with quotes, and others either did not meet our quality standards, or were priced so high it would be too expensive for our customers. We were disappointed, but we were able to find a great overseas manufacturer that not only adheres to our strict quality standards, but also gave us a very good price. This allowed us to deliver a top quality product at the best possible price to our customers.

     

     

    How Much Does The BOD™ Weigh and What Are The Dimensions?

    The BOD™ weighs in at 3 lbs. and measures 12.5″ tall with a diameter of 6.3″.

    Can I Use The BOD™ To Brew Tea?

    Yes, just add 1/6 pound of loose tea (herbal tea also) into the stainless filter and fill brew chamber with cold water. Cold brew for 12 hours, flip the BOD™ System over to drain and pour into the Extract Chamber for storage. When you want to make a glass of tea, hot or cold, just add 2 oz. of tea concentrate to 7 oz. of water to taste. 

    How Does The BOD Compare To Single Serve Machines and PODS?

    Single serve machines may be convenient and less messy for you, but because the plastic pods are not recyclable, they’re definitely messy for the earth. With almost 10 billion pods sold last year, they create an enormous amount of landfill waste. Pods are also very expensive, costing up to $50 per pound of coffee!  Plus, the coffee they brew is high in acid. The BOD™ does not require pods, brews coffee that's low in acid and you'll never have to buy filters again.
story_txt:
Visit Us & Shop Now At BodyBrew.com 
        
 

 
 
The BOD™, (Brew On Demand) is the first compact, modular & completely portable cold brew coffee system. Its spill-proof, shatter-proof design allows you to brew, anytime anywhere, simplifying the cold brew process.  
The BOD™ transforms ordinary coffee grounds into a super-concentrated coffee extract to make hot or iced coffee in seconds.
 
 
   
The BOD™ by BodyBrew™ was designed for coffee lovers on the go, who want great taste, portability and convenience. The BOD™ is both elegant and tough, and the compact spill-proof design, makes it ideal for travel. With the portable Extract Chamber, Mini-Bean and the Baby Bean you can brew and take your coffee virtually anywhere. No other cold brew coffee maker brings all these features together in one easy to use system. The BOD started shipping on February 11, 2016.  
 
 
We’ve been cold brewing coffee for over 10 years and when we tried to find an easy to use cold brewer at a reasonable price we were left scratching our heads. Cold brew coffee makers on the market today range from DIY mason jars, to white buckets, to tubs and spigots, three-foot tall towers; some even cost thousands of dollars. True these methods all make cold brew coffee, but they’re messy, hard to use, require paper filters, and lack good design. 
Every part of the BOD™ was designed with a purpose. It's easy to use, easy to clean, and with its elegant design, you won’t have to hide it after each use! After 3 years of designing, drafting, engineering and prototyping, we’re ready to show our BOD™ to the world!
 

 
Tech Specs:  Compact. Modular. Portable.Every part of the BOD’s modular design has a purpose. The Brew Chamber and Extract Chamber look beautiful together and independently, they’re compact and highly functional: 
The Brew Chamber can be used as a stand-alone brewer
The Extract Chamber stores your coffee extract fresh in the fridge
The "Easy Pour Twist Caps" are drip free, and make pouring easy.  

 
 
 
Never Be Without Your Cold Brew... Enjoy our Cold Brew Accessories & Portable Flasks 
Take the Mini Bean with you to work or play. 
It holds 6 ounces of coffee extract, which makes (2-3) servings of coffee. 
The Baby Bean at 3.4 oz. was custom built for traveling- it makes one serving of coffee and will easily pass through airport security!


What's Your Brew Number?

Use our custom count up timer to discover your perfect brew number, from  12-72 hours. You'll know exactly how long you've been brewing at a glance! 
 
 
 

 
 
Mixology Made Easy
The BOD™ makes a super concentrated coffee extract that's perfect for making delicious gourmet hot or iced coffee in seconds. 

 
Available In A Variety Of Colors 
Colors left to right are: 1. Stealth (black) SOLD OUT2. Snow (white)3. Sheer (clear) SOLD OUT4. Sky (blue)5. Shadow (grey) SOLD OUT6. Scarlet, (red) 
Our ExperienceEvery project has risks and challenges but as an experienced team of product developers, and small business experts, who have successfully taken a product to market in the past, we’ve eliminated much of the risk by investing heavily in R&D, design and product testing for the BOD™. We also have a great relationship with a top quality manufacturing partner that maintains our high quality standards.The BOD™ is the next generation of coffee brewing. We've taken all we’ve learned from our past products and experiences and applied those to every aspect of how we designed, developed and will manufacture the BOD™. We are excited to get the BOD™ off the production line and into your kitchen.  


How Can I Order A New BOD?
The only way to get one right now, is through our Indiegogo page right here! People who back the project on Indiegogo, will get the very first BOD’s and will save money over the retail price.
When Can I Expect To Get My New BOD?
The BOD started shipping in February 2016 and orders are shipped shortly after we receive them.Unlike a lot of projects that don’t realize how complex the design, development and engineering can be, we’ve already done all of that.  We have a top tier manufacturing partner and a talented team of people to handle the manufacturing and supply chain quickly and efficiently.
When and How Do I Choose My Color?
Indiegogo does not have a way for you to select your color upfront, but you will receive an email a few days after you order that will allow you to choose your color or modify your order if needed. 
When Will I Receive My Order? All orders are time date stamped and we will ship on a first ordered, first served basis. This means that the first backers will get their BOD™ first, according to when the orders were received.  How Do I Get Help Or Support?
Send us a message on our contact page and our team will work with you to resolve your issue! If you have already ordered and received your Backerkit email to select your color and need help with that survey you can contact support@backerkit.com.
What Is The Cost For Shipping To Alaska, Puerto Rico, Hawaii, Canada?
Shipping to Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico and Canada is $20.
What Country’s Do You Ship To and What Is The Cost?
We've shipped to 56 countries so far. The flat rate is $40 to ship one system.  Can I Return My BOD™?Due to discounted pricing and the complexities of crowdfunding, shipping and fulfillment, all sales are final. The BOD™ is warrantied for 5 years from date of purchase.
How Much Coffee Does The BOD™ Use?
The BOD™ uses 8 oz. or ½ lb. of coffee per brew cycle.  The coffee extract it produces, will make 8-12 servings, depending on how much extract you use. This brew method initially uses more coffee than hot brewing, however unlike drip coffee, there is no waste, (most people drink all of their coffee extract) and if you re-brew the grounds, you get even more coffee. It was also designed so that you can re-brew the coffee grounds a second time and get 3 additional servings per brew cycle, or up to 30 servings per pound of coffee. If you pay $10.00 per pound for coffee, this comes to just .33 cents per serving!
How Much Coffee Extract Does The BOD™ Make & How Many Servings?
The BOD™ coffee system will make approximately 24 oz of super concentrated coffee extract per brew cycle, which will make 8-12 cups, (8 oz. each) per brew cycle.  However, the number of servings depends on how much coffee extract you use for each serving. If you use more coffee extract, you’ll have fewer servings. If you choose to Re-Brew your coffee grounds, you’ll get an additional 6 servings per pound, up to 30 cups total.
What Makes The BOD™ Different Than Other Cold Brewers?
The BOD™ is the first and only cold brew coffee ‘system’, optimized for cold brewing, that’s spill-proof, shatterproof, compact, modular and portable with no filters to buy. Portable Mini Bean and Baby Bean flasks allow you to take cold brew coffee to go. 
How's The Taste Of Re-Brewed Coffee Grounds?
It's strong, flavorful and requires no dilution with water. The BOD™ makes re-brewing easy and convenient
 
What Type of Grind Can Be Used?
We recommend a “coarse grind” for the best flavor and results.
How Strong Is BodyBrew™ Coffee?
The BOD™ makes a super concentrated coffee extract that gets stronger the longer you brew it. If you like stronger coffee, brew it longer, 18 hours or more. After brewing you can customize each cup, to taste. Adjust the extract to water ratio for the perfect cup of coffee. Most people brew between 18-24 hours.
How Long Will The Coffee Extract Stay Fresh In The Refrigerator?
You can store your BodyBrew™ coffee extract for up to 3 weeks. For optimal flavor and freshness, 1-2 weeks is best.
What Is The BOD™ Made Out Of?
We chose the highest quality materials we could find to make the BOD™. We partnered with Eastman® and use their cutting edge, proprietary material called Tritan™ which is dishwasher durable, stain resistant and, BPA/BPS, PVC and Phthalate free. The filter is made out of high quality stainless steel that’s made to last and you’ll never have to buy filters again.
Do You Use Recycled Materials?
While Tritan™ is recyclable at the end of your BOD’s life cycle, it is not made from post-consumer plastics. Most recycled materials come from old milk jugs and water bottles which do not meet our stringent standards for product quality and durability.
Is The BOD™ Being Made In The USA?
Tritan is made in the USA, but the product is manufactured in China. We made every effort possible to get the BOD™ made in the USA, but after spending 6 months talking to 9 different suppliers, we couldn't find any suppliers who wanted to manufacture it. We had no choice but to move on to a supplier that could get the job done. Some USA suppliers did not even get back to us with quotes, and others either did not meet our quality standards, or were priced so high it would be too expensive for our customers. We were disappointed, but we were able to find a great overseas manufacturer that not only adheres to our strict quality standards, but also gave us a very good price. This allowed us to deliver a top quality product at the best possible price to our customers.
 
 
How Much Does The BOD™ Weigh and What Are The Dimensions?
The BOD™ weighs in at 3 lbs. and measures 12.5″ tall with a diameter of 6.3″.
Can I Use The BOD™ To Brew Tea?
Yes, just add 1/6 pound of loose tea (herbal tea also) into the stainless filter and fill brew chamber with cold water. Cold brew for 12 hours, flip the BOD™ System over to drain and pour into the Extract Chamber for storage. When you want to make a glass of tea, hot or cold, just add 2 oz. of tea concentrate to 7 oz. of water to taste. 
How Does The BOD Compare To Single Serve Machines and PODS?
Single serve machines may be convenient and less messy for you, but because the plastic pods are not recyclable, they’re definitely messy for the earth. With almost 10 billion pods sold last year, they create an enormous amount of landfill waste. Pods are also very expensive, costing up to $50 per pound of coffee!  Plus, the coffee they brew is high in acid. The BOD™ does not require pods, brews coffee that's low in acid and you'll never have to buy filters again.

story_txt: Play

story:
VOCs(Volatile Organic Compounds) are bad chemicals and cause various health effects including eye, nose, and throat irritation; headaches, loss of coordination, nausea; and damage to the liver, kidney, and central nervous system. Some organics can cause cancer in animals; some are suspected or known to cause cancer in humans. These are invisible and surprisingly found in everyday things quite often!

Did you know almost cleaner and fragranced home product as well as child toys have VOCs?

Let alone VOCs, there are many atmospheric factors that affect our health 24/7 including CO2 level, temperature, humidity, air pressure, noise level, light intensity and so on. We want to be in the know to prevent ourselves from any harmful environmental conditions all the time.

 

So we made MicroBot Alert!

Alert is a tiny device that can monitor various atmospheric variables including temperature, moisture, air pressure, light intensity, noise level and CO2 level, organic chemicals(VOCs), movements, and more. Thanks to multiple built-in sensors and machine learning, Alert learns about you and your environment and sends you push notifications containing useful information and recommendations about the environment. It gets more useful and accurate as you use Alert longer and longer.

Alert is so tiny that it can easily affix to any appliance, wall, or backpack. You can take it with you anywhere or install it in a place to monitor the environment locally and remotely 24/7.

Alert can be used with the corresponding MicroBot Alert app (available on iOS and Android), IFTTT, Amazon Alexa and Google Home. It connects to your smartphone or optionally to a smart hub via Bluetooth Low Energy.

Alert's mobile app screen

The best thing about Alert is that you don’t actually have to actively use it. Just carry it with you or leave it somewhere in a place. You will automatically receive insightful messages about the environment and air quality.

Smart Alerts example

Within the app, you can set conditions manually, and the details are available in the later section.

 


VentureBeat - "Sense leverages artificial intelligence to become smarter and give users better recommendations over time."
TechRadar - "MicroBot Sense is a tiny multi-function sensor for a tiny price."
Markets Insider - "Sense offers a comprehensive solution to monitor and detect any change in the environment"
TrendHunter - "Sense is small enough to carry around anywhere, giving . consumers precise information on the atmosphere around them."
Geeky Gadgets - "Sense learns about you and your environment and sends you push notifications containing useful information and recommendations about the environment."
InsideHook - "Thanks to its tiny size, you can take and measure your surroundings anywhere you go."
The Ambient - "The MicroBot Sense will track the health of your home on the cheap"

Media Contact 
Beatrix Labbe, Naran Inc., edward@thenaran.com

 

The possibilities are endless, but here are some examples.

1. Monitor various locations in a house (including TVOC & CO2)
Alert can tell you a lot more than just temperature and humidity. It can "sense" if lights are turned on in the basement or in the garage, if the kitchen needs ventilation, if the closet isn't too humid, and so on.

Surprisingly, temperatures can be quite different in different locations even in a small house.

2. Beware your surroundings 
Alert can also detect and measure VOCs (volatile organic compounds) and carbon dioxide. These are invisible and can be extremely toxic. You want to be in the know 24/7.

Surprisingly, VOCs are commonly found in everyday things.

3. Get notified when your dryer finishes
Alert's built-in accelerometer can look after your laundry and send you a push alert when it finishes.

Don’t you often forget about your laundry?

4. Make sure the air conditioning isn't polluting the air
Circulating air conditioning increases the carbon dioxide level in your car, making you drowsy while driving.

Know when to ventilate

5. Know when someone is at the door
The noise sensor can detect the knocking sound and give you a heads-up wherever you are.

You will get a push alert when someone knocks on your door!

6. Share your data with friends
You can instantly send your current conditions and location to your friends and family along with a photo or a video at anytime.

You can share your current weather condition with others.

7. Check if all lights are turned off
Do you often forget to turn off the lights in the garage or in the basement? Alert can tell you if all lights are turned off before you sleep. You can also set up an automation rule to turn on lights automatically when it becomes dark in the evening.

Make sure your smart home automation executed as expected

8. Proper atmosphere, very important
Changes in temperature and humidity could affect your valuables, especially string instruments and camera lenses. Stay in the know of where you store them.

 

Make sure you keep the humidity between 40-50%RH!

 



 



The most basic feature that Alert offers is monitoring the atmosphere. The app user interface explains it well below.

For users who just want a quick summary of current conditions, you can just press the tactile button on Alert, and it will send a push notification to your smartphone (the “Quick Check” feature).

"Quick check" demo

 

The Smart Alerts feature enables users to automatically receive push messages to their smartphones when certain conditions change.
Alert is able to catch the atmospheric changes around you and give you more insights about the environment and the air quality, so you can take any necessary actions for you and your family. These messages are based on analyzing your Alert data against various international air quality and construction standards such as ASHRAE, CSA, and so on.

Alert configuration with various conditions

Users can manually configure conditions themselves. For example, to receive a notification message when the living room lights are turned on, or when the temperature drops below 0°in the basement.

 
 

Alert World

You’re welcome to contribute your environmental data and share it with the community, allowing others to benefit from real-time weather. You’re free to opt-out from sharing at anytime.

 

“Alexa! Ask MicroBot to check Living room” 
“Alexa! Ask MicroBot to check my parent’s house” 
“Alexa! Ask MicroBot to check the baby room condition”

The Alexa Skill is already implemented and currently being tested for the “Works with Alexa” Certification. Google Home integration is under development and will be available for use when we ship the first batch.

 
 

Built around BLE technology, Alert comes with a tracking feature for free. Thanks to MicroBot Cloud, the community can help you find your Alert when you lose it somewhere you don’t remember (the "Find my MicroBot" feature - a.k.a. crowd GPS).

 

Alert can also measure the TVOC concentration level as well as carbon dioxide level in the air.

 
 
 

MicroBot Cloud enables remote monitoring, integrations with other services and the “Find my MicroBot” feature. It’s an optional service that makes Alert even more useful.

MicroBot Cloud operates with a dedicated smart hub, smartphone or tablet. If you have a spare iOS or Android device at home, you can remotely access your installed Alert through the device from anywhere, anytime. Having a dedicated smart hub is good (and cheaper if you don’t have a spare smart device) because it provides more consistent user experience and connectivity. If you need a dedicated hub device, please add $59 to your pledge!

All backers will get 1-year MicroBot Cloud subscription for free and unlimited remote access to your Alert!

 


Pair and use in 5 seconds.

 

  • Really, it’s that easy.

 

 

 

 

We have produced many working prototypes and developed iOS and Android apps (already released for testing). Alert is being reviewed for Alexa Certification, and the Google Home and Clova integrations are on the way.

 

Warranty

1-year limited warranty. For more information, please read our policy.

Tax & Shipping

We’re doing our best to ship MicroBot Alert globally, except for some restricted countries. Please note that backers from some countries will be responsible to pay for duties and taxes upon receipt.

Delivery

The first batch will be shipped in July, and for those who back the Distributor Kit, we’ll ship out working sample units as soon as the campaign ends! We promise we do our best to keep the ETD. This is our third campaign, so we know what’s coming. We will keep you posted!

For developers

As soon as they’re ready, you’ll receive the following:

  • access to MicroBot Cloud API and documentation 
  • access to MicroBot protocol documentation and SDK

Webhooks are available for you to quickly integrate with other applications. Please take a look at our quick guide on Webhook found in the mobile app.

 

Lonely death is a phenomenon of people dying alone and remaining undiscovered for a long period of time. It used to be quite unique to Japan and Korea, but it’s increasingly becoming a major social issue in many countries including the United States.

We were asked to address this particular issue and lucky enough to receive some funds to do the R&D for a year. For this, we needed a way to monitor person’s behaviors in a place without sacrificing privacy, so Internet Protocol (IP) cameras were no good. We came up with the multi-sensor idea; analyzing multiple environmental data can tell you beyond room conditions. With Alert, it’s now easy to detect whether a person is having a normal day or having abnormal days over a period of time. It’s easy to install, easy to use. That’s how and why Alert was born in the beginning. Achieving mass production will decrease the cost and help solve many similar issues.

 

We’re the maker of MicroBot Push, the robotic button pusher turning any dumb appliance into a smart gadget.

In late 2015, Push was successfully funded on Indiegogo and shipped to 20+ countries. It’s now widely available through various retailers in US, Japan, Korea, UK, Germany, France, and more. It’s also listed in Amazon Launchpad, and its Alexa Certification is being processed along with Alert. Push is now also used by many disabled people (especially those with limited mobility) across the world. We’re proud that our product is useful, usable and used by many users and hoping the same for Alert.

 

Risks and challenges

We’ve done mass production a couple of times now, and we’re still regularly running batches for MicroBot Push, so we know what to do with manufacturing. For this project, software is more of a challenge than the hardware. 
We need lots backers for Alert World to become more useful and usable to all of us. 

  • the Alert World needs your contribution to cover more areas
  • the data collected by Alert World is essentially used for advancing the Smart Alerts feature. The more data, the more accurate and useful the alerts will become. 
  • there will be lots of data coming from everywhere around the world, so making our server more stable and secured is our first priority before the shipment.

Push is now also used by many disabled people (especially those with limited mobility) across the world. We’re proud that our product is useful, usable and used by many users and hoping the same for Alert. Risks and challengesWe’ve done mass production a couple of times now, and we’re still regularly running batches for MicroBot Push, so we know what to do with manufacturing. For this project, software is more of a challenge than the hardware. We need lots backers for Alert World to become more useful and usable to all of us. 
the Alert World needs your contribution to cover more areas
the data collected by Alert World is essentially used for advancing the Smart Alerts feature. The more data, the more accurate and useful the alerts will become. 
there will be lots of data coming from everywhere around the world, so making our server more stable and secured is our first priority before the shipment.

story:
Oboo Smart Clock is ready: we've done the design work, we've optimized our manufacturing process with a small production run. Now, we're ready to start manufacturing in quantity. Order yours today and be one of the first to get an Oboo Smart Clock.

 

 

A brand new way to interact with a brand new take on a clock.

 

Wave Hello

Oboo features a front facing gesture sensor, providing an intuitive and natural way to use your smart device.

Wave left, right, up, and down to control your Oboo.

 

A Touch of Light

The top of the Oboo features a Touch Pad that replaces the need for physical buttons. An animated, full color light bar is integrated into the touch pad to provide context and light up your space.

 

Dynamic Buttons 

When your Oboo needs multiple inputs, the Touch Pad automatically becomes four discrete buttons.

The functionality of the buttons is contextual and depends on what you’re trying to do. Each button is color matched to actions displayed on the screen. 

 

Alarm Button 

When the alarm is going off and it’s time to get up, the entire touch pad acts as a single button: the off button.

 

Nightlight 

The touch pad works double-duty as a touch input surface as well as a light source for your space.

The night light will turn on automatically when your Oboo clock detects that you’re ready for bed and have turned off the lights. Wave goodnight to turn the night light off.

A wave during the night will turn it on to gently illuminate the room, making it easy to get around.

How an IoT device should be: practical and easy to use. 

Cards

Everything you need for your day is available at a glance. Oboo grabs real-time data from the internet and displays what you need to know in a series of cards.

Included Cards with Oboo's launch software:

  • Weather
  • Calendar
  • Traffic Info
  • Timer
  • Music

More Cards to come! We want to hear your ideas on Cards to add in future software updates.

 

WiFi

Oboo is always connected thanks to its built-in WiFi. That’s how it can get the most up to date weather and traffic data from trusted online sources as well as grab events from your calendar.

It is because of this constant internet connection that you can use the Oboo app to control your clock from anywhere and everywhere.

 

 

Music ♫

Wirelessly connect your smartphone, tablet, or other Bluetooth-enabled device within a 50-foot range to stream your favorite tunes on Oboo’s high quality speakers. 

Keep the tunes pumping wherever you go! The built-in battery makes your Oboo a 100% portable, totally wireless speaker.

Supports Bluetooth 4.2 

 

Power

Use the two fast-charging USB ports on the back of Oboo to charge your devices.

Use your Oboo on the go. It comes with a built-in Lithium ion battery that can power it for 20** hours of regular use and 8** hours of playing music over Bluetooth. Recharge Oboo overnight for a fresh start the next day. 

** Battery life estimates based on tests run on prototype model.

 

Wireless Charging

Do away with messy cords with the bundled Qi wireless charging pad to charge your Qi-enabled devices.

 

 

Reacts to the Environment 

Oboo dims its display when it’s time for bed so you can get the restful sleep that you need. 

Hidden inside is an ambient light sensor that monitors the levels of light in the room, allowing Oboo to know when the display needs to shine bright to be readable and when it needs to be dim to not impact your sleep.

 

Automatic Time Adjustment

Never forget to fall backward or spring forward for daylight savings time again. Oboo uses the Network Time Protocol to make sure the time and date are always set correctly.

Oboo uses those same smarts and WiFi based geolocation to automatically update the current time and the time of your alarms when travelling.

 

Smart Home

Oboo is Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant ready so you can tell your Amazon Echo or Google Home when you would like to wake up and it will update your Oboo.

 

We have done the design. We’ve optimized our manufacturing process. Now we've started manufacturing in quantity. Order yours today and be one of the first to get an Oboo Smart Clock.

 

  • August 2017 - First concept
  • September 2017 - First prototype
  • November 2017 - Design for manufacturing
  • December 2017 - Engineering samples ready, refining software
  • January 2018 - Engineering validation testing
  • February 2018 - Production prototypes ready
  • March 2018 - Production validation testing
  • April 2018 - Small scale production 
  • May 2018 - Mass manufacturing optimization

------------------------------- Now ----------------------------------

 

  • June 2018 - Indiegogo preorder starts
  • August 2018 - Indiegogo Manufacturing
  • September 2018 - Indiegogo shipping begins

Onion is a team of technology enthusiasts, creators, and strivers, looking to make amazing products and even better user experiences. 

Onion has been in business since 2014, going through the TechStars Accelerator in Boston that year. In 2015, we introduced the world to the Onion Omega IoT computer and in 2016 launched the ultra affordable Omega2.

We operate out of

The team has undergone some changes in the last year, and now we have all of the right people in the right places to boldly stride forward.

story:
Kansoka Designs

Kansoka Designs brings you high-quality and exquisitely designed craftwork with Japanese aesthetic styles to awaken your soul. 

The colors of our four cup set symbolizes the seasons of the year. 

Spring 

Light cyan and the vigor of spring.

Summer

The yellow glaze is the hot sun of summer.

Fall

Red reminds you of falling leaves in the fall.

Winter

White gives you the chill of snow of Winter.

Calm down with a cup of warm tea. The two grams of pure silver mellows the flavor of the tea and is a natural antiseptic ensuring it's always clean.

Tea cups play an underrated role in the tea drinking experience. In fact, aesthetics is inseparable from the act of drinking it.

Each  Kansoka Four Seasons Tea Cup  exudes the craftsman spirit

The high quality glaze gives a bright and colorful appearance.

There are unique silver edges on the top of the cup and the bottom of the cup. 

The inner wall of the cup is made with two grams of pure silver. Internal silver has the function of disinfecting and softening water quality, make tea more savory and mellow.

Specifications

Diameter: 8 cm (3.1 in)

Height: 5.5 cm (2.2 in)

Capacity: 100 ml (3.5 fl oz)

 

Pledge today to help us make the Kansoka Four Seasons Tea Cup Set a reality!

story:
Hi we are a growing team from Lindesberg Sweden.

To grow a plant needs perfect soil and Clean water. right temperature and minerals.

Its the time for exploration and to breed the plant needs light and air. some co2 or Irons, when it about to explode. a good and perfect soil will cost about 30 dollars way above whats normal for a good sized garden. but it will last. its soon springtime and the Place we are on had an renovation. Now we want to do something back but doesent have Money.A good ventilation would be a perfect idea. Or the growhouse the garden are missing. It would mean something to the rehabilitated to be part of it.

Great!

story:
New Copper Version!

By popular request, we're making a solid Copper version of the Vault! 

The new Vault in  solid Copper

The solid copper Vault looks stunning from any angle

What’s so special about Copper?  

  • It's Oligodynamic, which means it naturally kills germs on contact.
  • We each have about 2mg of copper in our body, without which we could not survive.
  • It's dense - between lead and steel in density
  • Along with gold, the only non-greyish metal
  • Takes on it's on hue(patina) over time 

What’s so special about Titanium?  

  • The most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body 
  • The only element that your body fully accepts - even bone will grow around it
  • Named after Titans of Greek mythology because of its immense strength 
  • The highest strength-to-density ratio of any metallic element 
  • Less than half the density of steel 
  • Excellent resistance to corrosion, nearly equivalent to platinum 

After crowdfunding over $1.2 million for our metal projects, we would like to introduce you to our latest project, Trance Vault.

"Once again Rudy has designed a simply elegant piece of artwork that also feeds the spirit, mind, and body." -- Anna K.

Once you know the secret (solution included) seemingly impossible problems may seem easier to grasp.

This is truly a finely crafted work of art that will last for many generations to come.

 

Pause and reflect on the impossible simplicity of this 12 piece puzzle.

Why do you need a Vault? 

  • You want something that is safe and healthy to touch that will last for generations
  • You are an educator and you want to shock your students with the highest -to-density ratio of Titanium, or the oligodynamic properties of Copper creating a memorable experience. 
  • You want to have the coolest thing in the office - the ultimate conversation starter. 

INSPIRED BY ANCIENT ARCHITECTURE

Vault is inspired by mortise and tenon joint, an ancient wood joinery technique dating back 7,000 years.

The Ti6AL4V aerospace Titanium looks stunning from any angle

A LIFETIME HEIRLOOM

Solid Titanium is resistant to the wear and tear that come from decades of use. Leave a legacy heirloom for future generations

A single key holds the secret to solving the puzzle

This is truly a finely crafted work of art that will last for many generations to come.

Pause and reflect on the impossible simplicity of this 12 piece puzzle.

Once you know the secret (solution included) seemingly impossible problems may seem easier to grasp.

You may be the only one who can solve it. Will you look at the solution before you give it a try?

SPECIFICATIONS

SIZE: 7.5 cm (2.95 in) x 7.5 cm (2.95 in) 

MATERIAL: Ti6Al4V grade 5 aerospace Titanium or 99% pure solid Copper

WEIGHT: 628 grams (Ti) ; 1250 grams (Cu)

About us

This is our 5th major metals campaign here at Trance Metals. We are striving to make the best possible aerospace quality, solid metal products on the planet. We have a 100% success and fulfillment rate with our previous crowdfunded campaigns and have raised over $1.2 million.

Here are what some people are saying about our previous projects:

"Yet another attractive addition to my growing assemblage of Rudy/Trance art objects. Many thanks for your creativity and excellent craftsmanship." -- Duncan Fordyce 

"I'm in as well- I love all of the Trance items that I have backed, and I get compliments when others see and touch them! Thanks for making these." -- Mike 

"Rudy, I believe I have everything you have made to date. I have a Trance Metal wall of excitement! I can’t wait to add this to my collection." -- Steven Landau

"Once again Rudy has designed a simply elegant piece of artwork that also feeds the spirit, mind, and body." -- Anna K.

"What a beautiful addition to my Forge Solid Cubes. Can't wait to see the next thing you come up with." -- Susan P.

"Now I'll have a cool sphere next to my Esington glass!" -- Jason A.

"Hi there, just wanted to let you know I was a huge fan and backer of the tungsten project, and found this awesome as well. So backing this was a no brainer." -- Mohamad S.

"I just backed your latest KS campaign. I love your stuff and have two cubes and one hourglass already in my home. Can't wait to see this 1kilo sphere... I'm sure your campaign will be another huge success." -- Dan D.

"Hello! I was one of your esington backers, I just backed this project too...My father is a huge fan of copper so I figured This would be a wonderful gift to him. Thank you!" -- Jennifer L.

"Hey Rudy! I backed Esington (actually a Day 1 backer on that, too, I'm proud to say!!) and I just backed Trance...I love your products! Keep up the good work!" -- Tania D.

"I backed the tungsten KS project and love it. My wife is copper crazy and will think this is perfect. I hope you are able to get a good polish. Great job on the super speedy funding!!!!!" -- Mike E.

"Congrats on getting funded so quickly. It's very impressive but not surprising! A true statement to the quality of your previous products and how much people liked them. I already got my own pledge and 3 more friends are onboard. Congrats again." -- Kosta Z.

"Hi Rudy, I'm a backer of the Forge Kilo (which I loved by the way) and pledged for the Trance Copper Sphere as an early-bird backer." -- Brian H.

"Looks so cool. All Backed! Thanks and look forward to holding this thing..." -- Darrel R.

"Stunning! I did back Esington and am looking forward to adding the Copper sphere to my collection. Best wishes" -- Lee A.

"I think this project just might be more interesting than the Forge Solid! I backed that project for two cubes and this sphere will be a nice addition to my collection." -- Robert S.

"Hi Rudy, Count me in of the Trance Copper Sphere -- looks very cool and will be a nice addition next to my Esington glass! Onward!" -- Steve P.

"Hello! I was a backer of the [tungsten] cube project! I actually regret not getting a larger size of the cube, but now i can make up for it in copper! The cube was definitely helpful and calming just to have on my desk, so I cant wait to see the sphere!" -- Florence W.

"Excited for your new project! Everyone who sees the cubes from the Forge Solid project loves it. Woohoo!" -- Butch W.

"Hi, I am an [Esington] backer and just backed your Copper Sphere at the 2x 1kg level. Looking forward to this - love my timers!" -- Monika R.

"Hi - I just backed the Trance Copper Sphere...and was a backer of the Forge Solid as well. Thank you for another cool project!" -- John B.

"Hi! As a backer for your Esington glass project, I got your email today about this project and immediately had to back it. The images of this copper ball look amazing and I can't wait to see this project fulfilled!" -- Nicole T.

"G'day. I love my Tungsten cube and would love to get a copper sphere to put next to it. These are such awesome ideas. Thank you for doing them" -- Matthew I.

"Hi Rudy,...I just pledged the 1 lb. copper sphere in matte. I love my Esington glass, every one who comes over to my home, if they come in my living room they are drawn to it to turn it up side down/" -- Nate K.

"I backed the cubes and use them at work regularly. I teach at the military EOD (bomb squad) school in the nuclear division. The density of the kilo helps me show the how small 2 lbs of fissile material can be when talking about criticality incidents. I have backed this at the kilo size as well and it looks awesome." -- James H.

Pledge today to make the Trance Vault a reality!

Risks and challenges

My previous projects were incredibly educational. With over 10,000 backers all over the world between them, manufacturing and logistics were incredibly complex for someone with no previous experience.

After several trips to manufacturers in Asia, switching shipping companies, sourcing companies and export agents, I feel like we are in a much better place than we were before our unexpected success on Kickstarter. I’m also proud to be one of the few small companies to have 100% fulfillment on our campaigns.

There are always risks involved, but the biggest one is always the timeline. We were late shipping the bulk of our projects (though we did manage to get many of our early birds on time). We’ve given ourselves an extra month with this timeline and feel very confident we can deliver on time. If we do run into manufacturing, logistics or shipping issues, we’ll always keep you updated. We promise to deliver 100%, just as we have on every other project.

story:
Hello!

Thank you for visiting our project. We hope that after reading this text you will get involved in our mission and you will help us spreading EDIE to the world.

"EDIE is an unusual approach to light design. We exploited dielectric fluid which gives us opportunity to accentuate the beauty and symbolic character of classic Edison bulb. EDIE opens almost endless universe of shapes to explore. Edie could be made from combination of glass, wood, silicone, metal and other materials. The glass can have awesome shapes, surfaces and structures. This lamp can be everything from table lamp to outdoor statue. The only limit is imagination."

The Story

Hi, my name is Petr. I love IT, science and geeky things. Misa, beside being the sun-of-my-life, is great and creative designer. We found out that my technical knowledge and Misa's design skills are perfect match. Together we started nearly year ago a company called Aura Design (auradesign.cz) because we decided that we want to do something amusing for the living. However we work on our things in our free time and the company is still not making any money so we are more like some design startup.

EDIE was born as a birthday gift for Misa nearly two years ago. The idea was to make the bulb looking like it is floating in the air. I know that there are some solutions based on so called "levitrons", but the construction is complicated and the design is limited. So the decision was to explore other possibilities and it turned out that there are dielectric fluids which are perfect for this purpose. When everything was in its place and EDIE was switched on for the first time it was lovely. The light forms beautiful aura around the bulb, the bulb moves and creates reflections on the walls just like summer sun on the water.

And so the first EDIE was created. After some time and very positive feedback from our friends we decided that it is worth trying to make it to production. We are working on production prototype for more than a year now and we still have a long way before us. And as you know, everything is easier if you have enough funding. So here we are.

Experiments. The left one is for testing of cylinder container (production will look more like on visualisation), the right one is made from raw glass and raw wood.

Why we named it EDIE?

The name of the lamp, EDIE, comes from the Edison bulb which was used in the first prototype. The bulb has also a symbolic character. It is a symbol for new ideas, thoughs, inventions and originality. And also it is very nice design and it is a pity that in most lamps this light source is hidden. EDIE is different, because the bulb is the main design element and the container is here only to accentuate its beauty.

How does it work?

We tried to keep the technical solution as simple as possible. There is only few main components:

Light source: The heart of EDIE. It can be almost anything from incandescent bulb to LED, the only limitation is the produced heat, which should not exceed certain values. There can be various shapes, sizes and technologies. It is, of course, possible to have more than one source of light in one container. The bulb is placed in our custom made "invisible" bulb holder so it is replaceable. The wires which leads to the bulb holder are so thin, that they are almost invisible.

The incandescent bulbs got banned in the EU (yet we have some on the stock :), but in more rational countries they can be used freely. Fortunately, the halogen bulbs will be available in EU for next few years and they also look very good in EDIE. But the best part is that you don't have worry about the availability of bulbs. Because the bulb is effectively cooled it has much longer lifetime - the first prototype is still in use with the original bulb!

Container: The skin of EDIE. The container gives EDIE its outer shape. Primarily we use handcrafted glass because here, in Czech Republic, it has a long tradition and because of its properties. The container can be of any size and shape, it can be coloured, cut or made from various types of glass. The container influence the properties of the light and there is whole universe of possibilities to explore.

Liquid: The blood od EDIE. We are testing number of dielectric liquids, but the best results we have wit the transformer oil. It is non toxic and very stable oil widely used in electric devices which needs good cooling.

Stand: The stand is here mainly for safety reasons. It connects EDIE to electric current and it contains safety measures to avoid injuries when manipulating with EDIE. This part is necessary because of regulations for electric devices. It can be made from various material like rubber, plastic, wood or metal. The stand is intended for the serial production version, custom made lamps may use different solution.

We have our solution patented so you can be sure that you will always get the original in perfect quality.

How the funding will be used?

As it was told earlier we are more like design startup. We use our own money to develop and test. It is very expensive for us and everything takes much longer than it should. The funding will be used for several goals:

Certification: In order to be allowed to sell EDIE on the market we need to pass a series of tests to get the CE certificate. These tests are expensive and because of EDIE's original construction they will be complicated.

Starting of serial production: We have tested almost all components which we need for production except the stand. We are now in the phase of prototyping and it will not be easy. It is the most complicated part of the lamp and the development will be expensive. We need three different forms and each costs about 500€. After we will finish the stand and pass the certification we may start the serial production. Of course it is better if you order bigger amount of every part from the supplier but this means to have lot of money for the initial investment.

Marketing: We know that the product itself is not enough. We need to tell the people about it. Advertisement and marketing could be insanely expensive. Of course we don't want to spend some excessive amount of money on advertising, but it will be easier to sell EDIE if we will have some funds to afford some marketing.

Development of other EDIE: If EDIE will find its customers and bring us some money we want to develop another series. Most probably it will be the block one. It is looking better but the form for container is insanely expensive (yes, it is lot easier to make rotary objects from glass than cubes or blocks). Let us know in the comments which shape you like most! ;)

If you want to help then spread the word. Write blogs, post on social networks, make pictures, create new designs...free your mind!

What will you get for donation?

First of all you will get our appreciation and our promise, that we will bring EDIE to production.

We will start production with the "cylinder" model, because it is easier to manufacture. The container will be from glass, the bulb will be classic 25W E27 Edison bulb and the stand will be from white silicone. If you donate at least 25€ you will get EDIE from the very first production series. If everything will go well we will have everything ready this autumn so you will have it for Christmas season. We will try to make the first series somehow special so it will be distinguishable among other EDIEs. Our goal is to make the basic model of EDIE available with price about 100€, but it depends on the amount for the first series.

If you decide to support us with some really big amount of money then we will create special EDIE just for you. If you will want it will be the only one in the world, true original. We will get in contact with you and discuss the details.

Now look at our perks and, please, DONATE! EDIE needs you!

 

FAQ

How do I replace the bulb?

EDIE is designed with the bulb replacement in mind. In order to replace the bulb you need to take the container off the stand. The container and stand are two independent parts. The container is closed by plug, co the liquid is secured in the container. Now you can turn EDIE bottom up, pull out the plug and get the bulb off the liquid. Bulb is placed in special bulb holder, so you can easily unscrew the bulb out, put in fresh bulb and asseble everything back. It should take no more than 5 minutes and you do not need any tools.

Photo of bulb in our bulb holder. The goal was to imitate the bulb base as much as possible, so it will not interfere wit the bulb shape.
