story:
These are the features of a universal system, customized to the bed or mattress you already have, however the bed that leaves the factory with this system has even more advantages, it turns the mattress from a close center point, the maximum height it reaches is approximately 2 meters and can even be installed in low-ceiling apartments.

                          

To make this happen we need your help. We have created the prototype, patented the idea and developed improvements that we hope to implement in the final models, such as the option to tend to the bed covers. The next thing is to finish the design of 8 basic models (4 universal sizes and 4 full bed sizes) register the models, and start production. According to the collected data we can work on two or more models at a time, speeding up the process much more. 

The universal model is placed on the bed or the base, and the mattress is secured to it. The back rises so we can comfortably extend the sheets and blankets. These are fixed to the foot of the bed, it is the only place that will not come loose when you lie down. Then by pressing a button, it will start going up, and the side arms will tuck the bedding under the mattress. In Intelligent mode, it knows when you get up, and minutes later this triggers the laying and cleaning, shaking the sheets and blankets. Keep them hanging for a while, so that the absorbed moisture evaporates, and then lowering the bed ready for the next sleep.






When lying down our bed absorbs body heat and humidity facilitating the development of mites and other bacteria. Therefore it is recommended to leave the bed unmade and make it after three hours, to allow the bed to air and the humidity to evaporate. However we do not always have the time available to do this task or the usual routine. GRA-BED detects the moment when you get up, and after a specific period of waiting, it places the bedding in a vertical position in order to air the whole surface, and it makes the bed hours later, so you can wake up, go to work, and find an aired well-made bed, without even pressing a button.

These
are the features of a universal system, customized to the bed or mattress you
already have, however the bed that leaves the factory with this system has even
more advantages, it turns the mattress from a close center point, the maximum
height it reaches is approximately 2 meters and can even be installed in low-ceiling

To

idea and developed improvements that we hope to implement in the final models,
such as the option to tend to the bed covers. The next thing is to finish the
design of 8 basic models (4 universal sizes and 4 full bed sizes) register the
models, and start production. According to the collected data we can work on
two or more models at a time, speeding up the process much more. 

The
universal model is placed on the bed or the base, and the mattress is secured
to it. The back rises so we can comfortably extend the sheets and blankets. These
are fixed to the foot of the bed, it is the only place that will not come loose
when you lie down. Then by pressing a button, it will start going up, and the
side arms will tuck the bedding under the mattress. In Intelligent mode, it
knows when you get up, and minutes later this triggers the laying and cleaning,
shaking the sheets and blankets. Keep them hanging for a while, so that the
absorbed moisture evaporates, and then lowering the bed ready for the next
sleep.












When lying down our bed absorbs body heat and humidity facilitating the development of mites and other bacteria. Therefore it is recommended to leave the bed unmade and make it after three hours, to allow the bed to air and the humidity to evaporate.  However we do not always have the time available to do this task or the usual routine. GRA-BED detects the moment when you get up, and after a specific period of waiting, it places the bedding in a vertical position in order to air the whole surface, and it makes the bed hours later, so you can wake up, go to work, and find an aired well-made bed, without even pressing a button.

story:
I went to a wedding out of town over the weekend and let a friend of a friend stay in my apartment while I was gone. i had hung out with this guy a few times and thought he was cool, so I had no problem letting him use my place while he was visiting NYC and I was in Rhode Island.

Unfortunately, while I enjoyed the cozy confines of said wedding in the nether regions of West Greenwich, the guy I let stay in my place was busy picking up another guy and banging him on my bed. To his credit, my guest was considerate enough to wash the dishes and towels he used before he left, but he inconveniently left my bed sheets and shit-stained comforter in place and somehow failed to mention how his Saturday night had gone.

I have thrown out the old sheets and am still trying to figure out the best way to burn/ destroy my comforter in the most environmentally friendly manner possible. I already had replacements for all the bedding, but there's still the question of what to do with the mattress, not to mention the fact I now openly weep every time I look at my bed. As too many people already know, trips to Sleepy's are torturous experiences, and making matters worse, no restitution will be forthcoming from the individual who ran roughshod (literally) on my bed.

I've learned all too painfully that no good deed goes unpunished, and in this case I don't want to spend the time, resources, or energy necessary to buy a new mattress, so any help would be appreciated. Thank you.

story:
We are open to cooperation with…

Scientists

If you are passionate about research in this field and would like to contribute your knowledge and experience, have time to spend on the systematic research that we will be conducting with the help of our experimental set-up, we would be more than glad to cooperate with you. Especially if your field of interests spans: high-power VLF waves in medium, ionosphere and ‘solar wind’, geo-physics and geo-electrodynamics or similar aspects of the Worldwide Energy System.

Contact us directly at: science@globalenergytransmission.com

Engineers

We would be more than happy if more engineers who know how to design and build high-power high-voltage systems would join us. If you are passionate about the systems that we are building and have any suggestions after looking at our blueprints or would like to contribute to the design and building of our experimental set-up, contact us directly at: engineering@globalenergytransmission.com

Enthusiasts passionate about Tesla’s legacy

We keep researching Tesla’s legacy to get more clues about his way of thinking about systems similar to the one we are building. We’ve studied every letter of his ‘Colorado Notes’ and related patents, but perhaps you can help give us some additional clues. Contact us directly at: legacy@globalenergytransmission.com

Inventors

Nikola Tesla was The Inventor of the 20th century, and his ideas are sure to live on. Drop us a line if you are already inventing the ‘next step’ of his Magnifying Transmitter or if you have a similar idea that may work even better. Please contact us directly at: inventions@globalenergytransmission.com

Critics

We are open to criticism. This is an invaluable part of making this project open for everybody from the very start. You are welcome to tell us why ‘it will not work’; drop us a message at: criticism@globalenergytransmission.com

Companies that would like to use these inventions

We are absolutely sure that these inventions can only be implemented with the help and contributions of energy producing and energy transmitting companies. We will be more than glad to discuss this experiment and other possible implementations. Contact us at: corp@globalenergytransmission.com

General public

We will be posting updates about our project on our website and on our pages in social networks. Still, don’t hesitate to tell us what you think about this initiative and we will be glad to answer your inquiry. Drop us a line at: public@globalenergytransmission.com

story:
BEAT THE HEAT!!!  With the Coolest Product in the World!!!

It is Hot, Be Cool!!!

FROSTY TOWEL® has solved the age old issue of suffering with heat, humidity, and hot flashes…

THE NEED!

People everywhere struggle with heat, humidity, hot flashes, and overheating; especially the handicapped; people struggling with diseases such as MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Cancer, and Lupus to name a few. Our awsome troops defending our freedom and liberty fight the heat and humidity all over the world. Our wounded warriors espcially have trouble dealing with extreem heat.  The elderly and small children and infants also struggle with heat and can even have life treating heat illiness. Little did we know that we created a product to make all their lives a little better and safer. 

Countless times we have specifically seen children in wheelchairs trying to enjoy a sporting event only to see them struggling in the heat.  We give them a cool Frosty Towel® and their face lights up, they smile, and later on we receive an email telling us how the Frosty Towel® made their day...it helps make their day more livable…and that is something we all should cherish.

We have seen the same thing over and over with our heroes – our wounded warriors – struggling with the heat at an event and once they receive a Frosty Towel®, they say “WOW that feels great, thank you so much”.  

It is a blessing to get a call, an email, or a letter from cancer patients that tells how Frosty Towel® helps them get through the bad days of the debilitating results of chemotherapy.

We have also received letters from our troops overseas defending our freedom time and time again, saying how grateful they were when they returned from their mission in the deserts of Iraq or Afghanistan to see a care package full of Frosty Towel®.  They say it made their day and put a smile on everyone’s face. Frosty towels helped make a difference.

On and on we could go with the wonderful testimonials we have received hearing back from people that have used the Frosty Towel® in the worst of situations and conditions to help them beat the heat, humidity, and hot flashes associated with whatever they are struggling with.  

This is why we need your help.  This is why we need your support.  When we started our business and invented the Frosty Towel® we had no idea the magnitude of the need, and how the Frosty Towel® truly meets this need, and solves this problem. 

With your donations over $100.00, not only will you receive a gift, we will send Frosty Towels (in your name if you like) to your choice of Make a Wish Foundation (help children in the heat living out their wish), to our troops, or American Cancer Society (please see perks).

We ask you a very simple question.  When was the last time you were standing in line for 30 plus minutes in 90 plus degree weather, or sitting in the stands at an event in extremely hot weather and high humidity drinking tons of water and still feeling like your were going pass out in the heat?  Well this is the need that Frosty Towel® has solved for people like you and for folks like we mentioned above.

 

Please help us help others beat the heat, and enjoy life a little more.

The Dream coming true:

Seven years ago my wife and I decided to make a major change in our lives and reach for the Amercian dream. So I retired from a long and blessed career from Home Depot and came home to spend more time with my family and build a business.  Just right before the down turn in the US ecomony we started A Quiver Full, Inc. It was at that time we developed our US patented all natural cooling towel that we call Frosty Towel®.  Little did we know that we had solved one of the world's most basic needs of beating the heat and humidity. We had no idea that we would be affecting peoples lives in such a postive way as written above.

The rest of the story is a real true Amercian dream coming true.  That is why we are reaching out to you.  We are so humbled by the reception and growth of the Frosty Towel®.  For us to succeed any further we need your support, your help, and your time to read the rest of the story.  We would be very grateful if you would support us and the Frosty Towel®, and become part of the team and the dream.

Please watch the videos in the Gallary Section to learn more.

What is Frosty Towel®

Frosty Towel® is an all natural cooling towel that contains pure essential plant oils and extracts that we add to our liguid solution and infuse into a premium cotton towel.  Frosty Towel® will stay cool for hours and refresh you in moments as it relieves you from the heat and humidity.

Frosty Towel® has proven to be a solution for needs in the following industries or organizations: medical and healthcare, safety industry, oil and gas, first responder, and national disaster relief.  We have also been able to find needs in or with the following industries or organizations: entertainment, sports, US Military, GSA, health and fitness, spas, clubs, resorts, and travel (air, sea, road) just to name a few. 

In the creation of the patented Frosty Towel®, we developed a very successful natural mosquito repellant as well.  This is part of our main formula of the Frosty Towel® solution that met the needs and concerns of parents all over the world looking for products that do not contain harmful man-made chemicals in them that they can safely use with their children.

Frosty Towel® has purchase orders to fill in the above industries and organizations for the 2013 season and requests for product for the 2014 season.  Management has spent 4 years developing the Frosty Towel® and the distribution network.  All we need now is the capital to produce the towel in quantity.

What Does Frosty Towel®  Need to Succeed Phase 1?

Frosty Towel has the product, the patent, the manufacturing, the distribution and the management to grow this Company immediately.  The only element missing is working capital. 

Use of proceeds from the $14,000 campaign Phase 1:

 

  •  Production of towels for orders for the remainder of 2013 season;

    Any additiona funds raised or Phase 2:

  •  Production of towels for orders placed in fall for 2014 season;
  •  Complete purchase of point of purchase displays for product;
  •  Production of personalized towels for existing clients;
  •  Move operations into a small warehouse/office complex;
  •  Notify distribution network of our capacity to produce product;
  •  Launch new Website and Social Media tools - campaign;
  •  Open US production facility

 

What You Get for Your Contribution

In addition to Frosty Towel® and a Day Pass to Disney World for our $1,000 contributors, you will help send free Frosty Towel's to your choice of Make a Wish Foundation, Our US Troops, or American Cancer Society as well as  you will have the satisfaction of knowing you have allowed the Company to deliver our highly sought-after product to existing orders from major retail distributors nationwide.

 

 To Learn more about the Business and our history please read below:

 

THE BUSINESS OF A QUIVER FULL INC 

The Frosty Towel®

A Quiver Full, Inc. has developed a patented, innovative, high-quality Polar Fresh™ Frosty Towel®, that has solved some very important needs at places like Disney World.  Frosty Towel® is an all-natural cooling towel that refreshes and relieves the user from heat, humidity, and hot flashes as it naturally softens and moisturizes the skin. The Frosty Towel® cooling towel is made with a proprietary blend of eco-friendly, all-natural oils, and extracts that cause the towel to quickly cool down without refrigeration. As an added bonus, the unique formula naturally repels biting insects, such as mosquitoes while providing a pleasing citrus scent.  Each Frosty Towel® cooling towel is individually wrapped and has a two-year shelf life. The product is made of 100% premium natural cotton or non-woven cotton fabrics. The Frosty Towel® cooling towel maintains its refreshing effect for four to six hours, or more, depending upon heat, humidity, or wind conditions (it might even be used for days). The towels are made in several sizes and colors and can be customized with any company logo or image.                                  

A Quiver Full, Inc. received written notice of allowance from the U.S. Patent Office in the spring of 2012 and is now protected under US Patent Number 8182826 with additional patents pending.  As of 12-22-12 we were notified by the US Patent Office that we have also received allowances on additional claims we filed and we expect additional patent numbers to be issued in late May or early June 2013.  A Quiver Full, Inc. has applied for a patent, titled “Refreshment Towel and Applied Solution,” U.S. Patent Publication No.  US2009-0068239A1.

Frosty Towel Solves a Real Problem Encountered by Every Human

We have solved one of the world’s biggest needs: staying cooler to beat the heat and the humidity while outside.  This is critical, if you have ever been outside at Disney World standing in line when it is hot or at a sporting evening sitting in the sun, you know how uncomfortable the heat can be.  No amount of drinks will cool you down; they only satisfy your thirst. Frosty Towel® is the patented solution that solves the need throughout the world to be cool and refreshed.  We have a vision for the Frosty Towel®.  It could be the next Gatorade ®. 

History and Growth 

The Frosty Towel® cooling towel is sold through distributors, sales reps, as well as sold directly to some major accounts. 

Frosty Towel® went to market first in the promotional industry.  This is an eighteen billion dollar industry. The customizable nature of the product makes it especially appealing to the promotional industry where sales have grown each year thus far.     

                                     

A Quiver Full, Inc. has established credibility in the promotional industry by building a strong presence for Frosty Towel® at Disney World®. With over 45 million guests each year, Disney World® holds a huge opportunity for Frosty Towel®.  Disney World® has purchased tens of thousands of Frosty Towels through Barker Specialty.  As of August 2012, Disney World® has made the decision to add Frosty Towel® to their retail product offering in their Orlando Parks through StarLight Creations, Inc.   We are in over 100 retail location in Disney World theme parks and resorts in Florida.                                          

 

Through independent multi-line sales representatives, A Quiver Full, Inc. has successfully built key relationships with leading promotional distributors, as well as raised brand awareness and built inroads with some of the most well-known brands in the nation, including major league sports teams, Chick-fil-a, UPS, Chevrolet, FedEx, and others.   

In 2009, Walgreens’ Florida stores performed a limited market test. The test generated sales of 68 units per store per month in 35 Florida stores during a three-month test (approximately 5,000 units sold), beating Walgreens’ expectations by 36%. In 2010 and 2011, A Quiver Full, Inc. expanded Frosty Towel® distribution to 17 states and more than 250 Walgreens stores. Walgreens is now expanding the Frosty Towel® program into as many stores as A Quiver Full, Inc. can supply.  For 2013 the product has been activated in 1,500 Walgreens stores in their system. With more than 8,800 locations in the United States, Walgreens provides a significant national distribution channel for Frosty Towel®. At this time, Foxworthy Outdoors is meeting with Walgreens for national distribution of Frosty Towel® via Walgreens Distribution centers for 2014.   

 

                                

 In 2011, the Frosty Towel® also made its debut as a premier vendor item at select NASCAR events through SMI Properties, the licensing and merchandising arm of Speedway Motorsports, Inc.(SMI).  In August 2012 we broke our sales record for both Bristol Motor Speedway and Atlanta Motor Speedway.  At Atlanta Motor Speedway over the Labor Day weekend, we doubled the sales of all other outside vendors.  SMI has requested that we expand to 5 to 6 races for 2013.    

                                       

In the spring of 2012, Frosty Towel® was added to four Six Flags® amusement parks, including Six Flags Over Georgia and Six Flags White Water. We did a full roll-out at Six Flags Over Georgia as a test.  We were in 23 retail locations inside the park.  We exceeded all expectations. A Quiver Full, Inc. is working with Six Flags Corporation to develop a 2014 marketing campaign to sell the Frosty Towel® at all nineteen (19) of the Six Flags amusement parks.  As of January 24 2013 we have already received opening purchase orders from Six Flags, as they are expanding to 6 parks.

 

How Will Frosty Towel®  Grow?

A Quiver Full, Inc. was started in the fall of 2006, as a cottage industry/lifestyle business. Once the Frosty Towel® had been in the market place for several years, it became apparent that the potential was there for A Quiver Full, Inc. and Frosty Towel® to become a wealth generating global company.  This is the decision at hand.  We desire to move beyond a small cottage industry business and become a strong wealth building company.  A Quiver Full, Inc. has operated on a break-even basis incurring operating losses in some years and profits in others. The Frosty Towel® is fully developed and is being aggressively marketed. The detailed formulas of the Frosty Towel® are trade secrets.  

Jeff Foxworthy and Foxworthy Outdoors 

In March of 2012, A Quiver Full, Inc. began discussions with Foxworthy Outdoors for a national branding program and sales product representation, as well as a licensing agreement with Jeff Foxworthy.  This has now been completed. We are excited about the potential this holds and we are already seeing new doors opening and new deals closing.    

Foxworthy Outdoors is a rep group for products endorsed by Jeff Foxworthy or co-branded with Jeff Foxworthy, including the Frosty Towel®.   Recently Jacob Grant & Associates, which is a rep group comprised of more than 50 experienced long-time sales associates, was acquired by Foxworthy Outdoors. They have over 20 years of sales experience in the retail industry in excess of $100,000,000. The founder of Jacob Grant & Associates, Jacob Grant, is a member of A Quiver Full, Inc.’s advisory board. Mr. Grant now has the title of Executive Vice President of sales of Foxworthy Outdoors. 

As a result of this relationship with Foxworthy Outdoors, we have already been added to web base retailers for late 2012 into 2013 such as Amazon.com, Costco.com, and Walgreens.com for a total of over 29 websites.  We just received notification from the buyer at Bed Bath & Beyond that we have been set up for 2013.  We have also been added to Big Y Groceries in the North East for 2013.  

Here are a few of the retailers that are currently in final stage meetings with:  CVS, Walgreens (national distribution), Ace, Tru-Value, and Race Track. 

Foxworthy Outdoors is in ongoing meetings with the follow companies for 2014 as well:  Kroger, Publix, Bass Pro, Sports Authority, Costco, 7-11, Dicks, Cabelas, and Academy Sports…(these are companies that they have met with the buyers).

Additional Distribution and Future Growth 

A Quiver Full, Inc. is also working with some of the leading retail industry distributors and representatives such as Hudson News and Big Rock Sports with the potential to expand Frosty Towel® distribution to many more major national and regional retail chains.

In April of 2012, A Quiver Full, Inc. began shipping Frosty Towel® cooling towels for distribution through more than 140 U.S. Armed Forces exchanges.  We are shipping to these bases in 2013. 

A Quiver Full, Inc. is also working with RealTree™ on a new line of camouflaged and customized colored Frosty Towel® cooling cloths for retail distribution and for use by the U.S. Armed Forces and federal government. A Quiver Full, Inc. is also working on a U.S. based manufacturing relationship to meet the requirements of the U.S. General Services Administration (GSA) and the U.S. Armed Forces.

Frosty Towel® will also be introduced into the Caribbean Island as part of our late 2103 and 2014 growth plan.

To promote the Frosty Towel®, A Quiver Full, Inc. has been very active in attending strategic tradeshows in the promotional and retail industry to increase exposure and brand awareness. The Frosty Towel® has received a consistently favorable response from attendees of industry tradeshows. We have built a database of over 4500 customers, sales reps, and distributors around the world. 

To increase capacity, A Quiver Full, Inc. is establishing key partnerships with the following sales rep groups and distributors, which are currently selling the Frosty Towel® or have expressed interest in selling the product: 

Big Rock Sports:  Big Rock Sports is a 2 step distributor into the outdoors industry including but not limited to camping, biking, hiking, fishing, marina, boating, and hunting.  Frosty Towel was a huge hit in their December 2012 Sales Rep meeting to kick off their 2013 season.  They have 15 distribution centers. 140 sales reps and additional associates that call on 16,000 independent retailers throughout North America. Big Rock Sports is excited about the Frosty Towel from the CEO, Ed Small, down to their merchants and sales reps. We have recently received opening orders from Big Rock Sport.

Hudson News Distributors, LLC:  Hudson News Distributors, LLC is a full-service distributor of more than 49 retail brands representing more than 10,000 retail outlets, including Walgreens, CVS and other retail chains. They also operate retail outlets in 74 airports, terminals and transportation centers in the United States. 

Charles Cochran & Associates:  Charles Cochran & Associates is one of the most respected sales rep groups in the promotional industry. Charles (Charlie) Cochran, a member of A Quiver Full’s advisory board, personally calls on major players, including CEOs, presidents and owners of some of the top promotional businesses in the world. His team calls on more than 100 distributors and organizations annually. The company manages brands such as Coke, Disney, UPS, FedEx, Chick-fil-A, AT&T, Verizon, Chevrolet, Sprint, The Masters, and Southern Company. 

StarLight Creation:  StarLight Creations has been a full service hands on distributor and sales rep group that specializes in the Orlando market.  Their three main customers are Disney World, Universal Studios, and SeaWorld.  These three parks alone have the potential to be over $4,000,000 dollars a year in revenue not to mention the tremendous amount of brand recognition this would bring to us. 

Expanding Frosty Towel®  Production 

A Quiver Full, Inc. will increase the manufacturing and production capacity of the Frosty Towel® using resources overseas. A Quiver Full, Inc has the ability to expand production in Malaysia quickly due to access to a strong labor pool. A Quiver Full, Inc. has access to all the raw materials needed to produce the Frosty Towel®. To decrease risk, A Quiver Full, Inc. plans to have two separate production facilities in Malaysia for security and safety purposes.

A Quiver Full, Inc. is also making plans to manufacture its Frosty Towel® cooling cloths in Columbus, Georgia for the US Military and US Government market. Once full funding is in place, A Quiver Full, Inc. will be able to set up the last stages of the production area in the Columbus facility, which will be located at the Ridgeway Outdoors facility. The U.S. manufacturing location will allow for quick turn-around times for customized orders, as well as allow A Quiver Full to meet the requirements of the U.S. Government and U.S. Armed Forces purchasing polol.

Marketing and Branding 

Social Media:  A Quiver Full is building a social media campaign through Facebook, Twitter, and other web-based opportunities to help grow and expand the business. A Quiver Full is working on a media relations strategy as well. A Quiver Full is in discussions with a few companies that specialize in helping small, rapidly growing companies use these power tools to build market awareness and branding such as So Grow PR, LLC.  We are very excited about the plans we have with Social Media.      

 

Tradeshows:  A Quiver Full attends tradeshows in multiple industries to build strategic partnerships with potential buyers, manufactures, investors, distributors, sales reps, and many other key contacts. Foxworthy Outdoors is now attending tradeshows as well. Over the past four years, A Quiver Full, Inc. has built and has maintained relationships with buyers, owners, executives, and decision makers with many major retailers and distributors, such as Walgreens, CVS, Gander Mountain, Menards, Disney, Six Flags, Publix, Kroger, Dollar General, SMI – NASCAR, Home Depot, Hudson News, Signet, Summit Marketing, Barker Specialty Distribution, Boundless Network, Markup Promotions, and many other leading promotional distributors and general merchandise rep groups. 

Promotional Materials:

A Quiver Full, Inc. has designed point-of-purchase materials, sales materials, and advertising to promote the Frosty Towel®.  A Quiver Full, Inc. is in the process of redesigning all point-of-purchase materials, sales materials, and advertising for late 2013 as we organize a cohesive and exciting brand message across all forms of media. Much of this new material will involve Jeff Foxworhty and his organization.  A Quiver Full has also launched and regularly maintains a website (www.frostytowel.com).  Once funding is in place A Quiver Full will launch a new and redesigned www.frostytowel.com incorporating Facebook, Twitter and other social media components with the website.    

The Competition 

Similar cooling products have been available for a number of years. A Quiver Full believes that the Frosty Towel® cooling cloth holds a competitive advantage over these other products because of its effectiveness and quality and its growing retail presence.  Its distinctiveness is now protected by a recently issued U.S. patents. A Quiver Full also believes that its management brings knowledge, experience, and relationships in the distribution industry that will continue to set Frosty Towel® apart from any competitors.

A Quiver Full, Inc. is seeking the American Dream

A Quiver Full, Inc. produces and markets The Frosty Towel®.  We are a locally owned business seeking the American Dream by producing a product that benefits our customers at a fair price.  Please help us do this by contributing.  Thank you for your time to read about our Company and for your contribution. 

THE MANAGEMENT OF A QUIVER FULL, INC.
story_txt:
BEAT THE HEAT!!!  With the Coolest Product in the World!!!
It is Hot, Be Cool!!!
FROSTY TOWEL® has solved the age old issue of suffering with heat, humidity, and hot flashes…

THE NEED!
People everywhere struggle with heat, humidity, hot flashes, and overheating; especially the handicapped; people struggling with diseases such as MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Cancer, and Lupus to name a few. Our awsome troops defending our freedom and liberty fight the heat and humidity all over the world. Our wounded warriors espcially have trouble dealing with extreem heat.  The elderly and small children and infants also struggle with heat and can even have life treating heat illiness. Little did we know that we created a product to make all their lives a little better and safer. 
Countless times we have specifically seen children in wheelchairs trying to enjoy a sporting event only to see them struggling in the heat.  We give them a cool Frosty Towel® and their face lights up, they smile, and later on we receive an email telling us how the Frosty Towel® made their day...it helps make their day more livable…and that is something we all should cherish.
We have seen the same thing over and over with our heroes – our wounded warriors – struggling with the heat at an event and once they receive a Frosty Towel®, they say “WOW that feels great, thank you so much”.  
It is a blessing to get a call, an email, or a letter from cancer patients that tells how Frosty Towel® helps them get through the bad days of the debilitating results of chemotherapy.
We have also received letters from our troops overseas defending our freedom time and time again, saying how grateful they were when they returned from their mission in the deserts of Iraq or Afghanistan to see a care package full of Frosty Towel®.  They say it made their day and put a smile on everyone’s face. Frosty towels helped make a difference.
On and on we could go with the wonderful testimonials we have received hearing back from people that have used the Frosty Towel® in the worst of situations and conditions to help them beat the heat, humidity, and hot flashes associated with whatever they are struggling with.  
This is why we need your help.  This is why we need your support.  When we started our business and invented the Frosty Towel® we had no idea the magnitude of the need, and how the Frosty Towel® truly meets this need, and solves this problem. 
With your donations over $100.00, not only will you receive a gift, we will send Frosty Towels (in your name if you like) to your choice of Make a Wish Foundation (help children in the heat living out their wish), to our troops, or American Cancer Society (please see perks).
We ask you a very simple question.  When was the last time you were standing in line for 30 plus minutes in 90 plus degree weather, or sitting in the stands at an event in extremely hot weather and high humidity drinking tons of water and still feeling like your were going pass out in the heat?  Well this is the need that Frosty Towel® has solved for people like you and for folks like we mentioned above.
 
Please help us help others beat the heat, and enjoy life a little more.
The Dream coming true:
Seven years ago my wife and I decided to make a major change in our lives and reach for the Amercian dream. So I retired from a long and blessed career from Home Depot and came home to spend more time with my family and build a business.  Just right before the down turn in the US ecomony we started A Quiver Full, Inc. It was at that time we developed our US patented all natural cooling towel that we call Frosty Towel®.  Little did we know that we had solved one of the world's most basic needs of beating the heat and humidity. We had no idea that we would be affecting peoples lives in such a postive way as written above.
The rest of the story is a real true Amercian dream coming true.  That is why we are reaching out to you.  We are so humbled by the reception and growth of the Frosty Towel®.  For us to succeed any further we need your support, your help, and your time to read the rest of the story.  We would be very grateful if you would support us and the Frosty Towel®, and become part of the team and the dream.
Please watch the videos in the Gallary Section to learn more.
What is Frosty Towel®
Frosty Towel® is an all natural cooling towel that contains pure essential plant oils and extracts that we add to our liguid solution and infuse into a premium cotton towel.  Frosty Towel® will stay cool for hours and refresh you in moments as it relieves you from the heat and humidity.
Frosty Towel® has proven to be a solution for needs in the following industries or organizations: medical and healthcare, safety industry, oil and gas, first responder, and national disaster relief.  We have also been able to find needs in or with the following industries or organizations: entertainment, sports, US Military, GSA, health and fitness, spas, clubs, resorts, and travel (air, sea, road) just to name a few. 
In the creation of the patented Frosty Towel®, we developed a very successful natural mosquito repellant as well.  This is part of our main formula of the Frosty Towel® solution that met the needs and concerns of parents all over the world looking for products that do not contain harmful man-made chemicals in them that they can safely use with their children.
Frosty Towel® has purchase orders to fill in the above industries and organizations for the 2013 season and requests for product for the 2014 season.  Management has spent 4 years developing the Frosty Towel® and the distribution network.  All we need now is the capital to produce the towel in quantity.

What Does Frosty Towel®  Need to Succeed Phase 1?
Frosty Towel has the product, the patent, the manufacturing, the distribution and the management to grow this Company immediately.  The only element missing is working capital. 
Use of proceeds from the $14,000 campaign Phase 1:
 

 Production of towels for orders for the remainder of 2013 season;
Any additiona funds raised or Phase 2:

 Production of towels for orders placed in fall for 2014 season;
 Complete purchase of point of purchase displays for product;
 Production of personalized towels for existing clients;
 Move operations into a small warehouse/office complex;
 Notify distribution network of our capacity to produce product;
 Launch new Website and Social Media tools - campaign;
 Open US production facility
 
What You Get for Your Contribution
In addition to Frosty Towel® and a Day Pass to Disney World for our $1,000 contributors, you will help send free Frosty Towel's to your choice of Make a Wish Foundation, Our US Troops, or American Cancer Society as well as  you will have the satisfaction of knowing you have allowed the Company to deliver our highly sought-after product to existing orders from major retail distributors nationwide.

Charles (Charlie) Cochran, a member of A Quiver Full’s advisory board, personally calls on major players, including CEOs, presidents and owners of some of the top promotional businesses in the world. His team calls on more than 100 distributors and organizations annually. The company manages brands such as Coke, Disney, UPS, FedEx, Chick-fil-A, AT&T, Verizon, Chevrolet, Sprint, The Masters, and Southern Company. 
StarLight Creation:  StarLight Creations has been a full service hands on distributor and sales rep group that specializes in the Orlando market.  Their three main customers are Disney World, Universal Studios, and SeaWorld.  These three parks alone have the potential to be over $4,000,000 dollars a year in revenue not to mention the tremendous amount of brand recognition this would bring to us. 
Expanding Frosty Towel®  Production 
A Quiver Full, Inc. will increase the manufacturing and production capacity of the Frosty Towel® using resources overseas. A Quiver Full, Inc has the ability to expand production in Malaysia quickly due to access to a strong labor pool. A Quiver Full, Inc. has access to all the raw materials needed to produce the Frosty Towel®. To decrease risk, A Quiver Full, Inc. plans to have two separate production facilities in Malaysia for security and safety purposes.
A Quiver Full, Inc. is also making plans to manufacture its Frosty Towel® cooling cloths in Columbus, Georgia for the US Military and US Government market. Once full funding is in place, A Quiver Full, Inc. will be able to set up the last stages of the production area in the Columbus facility, which will be located at the Ridgeway Outdoors facility. The U.S. manufacturing location will allow for quick turn-around times for customized orders, as well as allow A Quiver Full to meet the requirements of the U.S. Government and U.S. Armed Forces purchasing polol.
Marketing and Branding 
Social Media:  A Quiver Full is building a social media campaign through Facebook, Twitter, and other web-based opportunities to help grow and expand the business. A Quiver Full is working on a media relations strategy as well. A Quiver Full is in discussions with a few companies that specialize in helping small, rapidly growing companies use these power tools to build market awareness and branding such as So Grow PR, LLC.  We are very excited about the plans we have with Social Media.      

 
Tradeshows:  A Quiver Full attends tradeshows in multiple industries to build strategic partnerships with potential buyers, manufactures, investors, distributors, sales reps, and many other key contacts. Foxworthy Outdoors is now attending tradeshows as well. Over the past four years, A Quiver Full, Inc. has built and has maintained relationships with buyers, owners, executives, and decision makers with many major retailers and distributors, such as Walgreens, CVS, Gander Mountain, Menards, Disney, Six Flags, Publix, Kroger, Dollar General, SMI – NASCAR, Home Depot, Hudson News, Signet, Summit Marketing, Barker Specialty Distribution, Boundless Network, Markup Promotions, and many other leading promotional distributors and general merchandise rep groups. 
Promotional Materials: 
A Quiver Full, Inc. has designed point-of-purchase materials, sales materials, and advertising to promote the Frosty Towel®.  A Quiver Full, Inc. is in the process of redesigning all point-of-purchase materials, sales materials, and advertising for late 2013 as we organize a cohesive and exciting brand message across all forms of media. Much of this new material will involve Jeff Foxworhty and his organization.  A Quiver Full has also launched and regularly maintains a website (www.frostytowel.com).  Once funding is in place A Quiver Full will launch a new and redesigned www.frostytowel.com incorporating Facebook, Twitter and other social media components with the website.    
The Competition 
Similar cooling products have been available for a number of years. A Quiver Full believes that the Frosty Towel® cooling cloth holds a competitive advantage over these other products because of its effectiveness and quality and its growing retail presence.  Its distinctiveness is now protected by a recently issued U.S. patents. A Quiver Full also believes that its management brings knowledge, experience, and relationships in the distribution industry that will continue to set Frosty Towel® apart from any competitors.
A Quiver Full, Inc. is seeking the American Dream
A Quiver Full, Inc. produces and markets The Frosty Towel®.  We are a locally owned business seeking the American Dream by producing a product that benefits our customers at a fair price.  Please help us do this by contributing.  Thank you for your time to read about our Company and for your contribution. 
THE MANAGEMENT OF A QUIVER FULL, INC.

story:
English: www.yabid.net  German: www.yabid.net. Deutscher Text, deutsches Video

YABID. Eliminating the weaknesses of other auction systems. It’s easier, faster, fairer and more profitable. The bidding system works according to classic auction principles yet makes buying and selling simple, exiciting and speeds it up. The length of the auction shortens with each bid. You can move the end of the auction from the future into the present or you can finish the auction anytime. You are in control with yabid.net.

Bide your time? Not here. Neither seller nor buyer have to wait around. Time flies and both can make an excellent deal with more fun!

You as a seller have no financial risk as there are no fees - no start fees, no optional advertising fees - till the product is sold. With the sale a very low 5,5% commission applies. Simple, easy, fair. The turnover of products takes off due to the quicker sales that happen due to flexible auction time. It can be minutes instead of days or weeks. The end price can go through the roof with buyer demand.

You as a buyer can finally influence the progress of the auction by changing the price or the time factor. Price and time are interdependent. The buyer can set the end point of the auction to whatever time suits him – across time zones -. He strategically moves the price or the time. If the price is right he can end the auction by buying the product immediately. Depending on market demand and the number of bids the end price may move up or down.

Buyer and seller receive a fair and a quick deal that will give them savings and puts money in their banks.

   

We made time flexible during the auction. Now YOU can manipulate time! Although you actually buy a product, you purchase time units. This way each bid reduces the remaining online time of an auction moving the future end point ever closer to the present. Changing the time will change the price, changing the price will change the time. A user can bid strategically or can buy the whole remaining time and thereby finish the auction. A special algorithm will let the end price move up or down depending of the number of bids and on market demand.

We are into being fair. That’s why there are absolutely no fees for the seller until he sells his product. As a seller you finally have no financial risk and you have faster turnover. As a buyer you can get what you want when you want it. No waiting around for anyone.

Embedded into this auction format we created 3 ways of selling. We took into account the requirements for different products and varied calculations:

           

We started this platform with you, the buyer and seller, in mind. Now we need your support to make it all happen.

We need the funds in order to bring YABID into the mobile world, improve usability, to add features in the user account, increase features on the presentation page, update photo/video presentation, pep up the design, offer it in selected countries and the US adding other currencies (complying with regulation in other countries) and implement other languages, improve handling of fees after selling, program integration with merchant platforms and their interfaces, connect current auctions to social media, increase support activity, expand the user profile.

Please give us your donation so that we can give you the improved alternative platform to do business early 2014.

Do you have time to sit around for the final seconds of an auction at a predetermined time or do you have to catch a plane, take care of the kids or are just too tired to stay up? Who was in control? Well, it was not you! Frustrated? NOW with Yabid YOU decide!

Often the simplest things are the hardest to figure out. We wanted to add usefulness, service and convenience for both buyer and seller. And there it was: “Time is money”. So we simply connected money and time.

       

We were convinced to go forward because it was such a simple but extraordinary idea. We received a patent. So far the complete funding was provided by us, Dr. Ralf Manstein and Ursula Herzog-Denu, we both moved other professional activities to the back to focus on YABID.

                      

Our valued team members are Johannes Wiese (he works without sleep :-), Andree Hochbach (he works after sleeping), Jana Simon (the communicator), BlueLineProductions (Social Media Marketing), Imal Wagner PR (puts the word out in the US). Everyone is up to top speed.

www.yabid.net is operated by TIMEsupreme.com GmbH & Co KG, Sophienstr. 26, D-76530 Baden-Baden, Germany.

See us on facebook, twitter, pinterest, tumblr.


·  YABID - A buyer can step in at any moment to complete the purchase, resulting in a fast turnover. 

Traditional Auction - Only in the final seconds can the buyer win the bid by raising his price.

·  YABID - The variable price-time manipulation raises the excitement for the buyer in every second of the auction.

Traditional Auction - The price can only be changed by making a higher bid, and excitement is generated only in the final seconds of a set time frame.

·  YABID - Links price and time; therefore prices can rise or fall.

Traditional Auction - There is no price-time link. Prices can only go higher.

·  YABID - If there is high demand for an item, the final price can be much higher than the initial maximum price and the auction can end quickly.

Traditional Auction - Auction drags on for set amount of time.

·  YABID - The buyer can use strategic bidding to his advantage. Changing the end point of the auction – pulling it into the present - can work to his advantage.

Traditional Auction - Strategic bidding not possible.

·  YABID – In a global economy the buyer can now overcome the different time zones by pulling the end of an auction into his present, into a time frame that is comfortable to him.

Traditional Auction – Adjustments for time zones not possible.

With all the free auctions over so many days anyone will save a lot of money as any auction you place will have neither a commission fee nor any fee for whatever advertising option you choose.

You can find the best meals with amateur and professional cooks in a private setting, usually their home. The delicious website www.eatwith.com provides this service all over the world.

We will create a special “Thank You” webpage on our site where we will list you - if you so choose – with the donation amount, your logo, your website.

The marketing course is a highlight for anyone who wants to learn from a successful expert in the business. Imal Wagner is straight forward and gives you an honest learning experience.

The absolutely relaxing weekend at international renowed Brenner’s Park Hotel in beautiful Baden-Baden. You choose when. The Caracalla hot springs  are famous, even the Romans took R&R here hundreds of years ago.

story:
Dear Friends, 

I am writing to tell you about a brand new adventure at Sowing Solutions – a community hub for ecological living and learning– and to request your support to make this vision a reality!

At Sowing Solutions, we have been dreaming of a multi-functional space where people can be inspired about permaculture planning and techniques. We envision an easily accessible center that houses our Sowing Solutions design studio as well as the office for the permaculture course, which we offer twice a year for the last ten years.  This will also be a meeting place for monthly permaculture meet-up groups, ongoing classes, evening events, full day workshops, film screenings, meditations, and talks. A place where people feel welcome to wander in, have a cup of tea, and peruse our extensive library of books, resources, and design examples highlighting an ecologically sound way of life. A place where people can drop in to ask for guidance from our staff about how to make their own home landscape more productive, healthy and resilient.

I think we have found the location for all of this to happen!

In our current office building along the river in downtown Shelburne Falls, a storefront is up for rent. Our landlord is wonderful, the location is wonderful, and the potential to greet visitors is wonderful. 

Not so wonderful (yet!) is the indoor space, which needs much improvement. Attached is a photo of the space currently. With some new design and care, it will look very different in the near future!

Our fundraising goal is $3,000. 

Will you help us open our doors this spring by making a donation of any size? Your contribution of $10, $100, $1000 will go toward transforming our wish list into an indoor garden of permaculture inspiration. We need:

  • lamps 
  • 3 large area rugs (to cover an uneven concrete floor)
  • projector bulbs
  • a drop-down movie screen
  • paint
  • wood for making shelves and cubbies
  • professional carpentry support
  • 12 folding chairs 
  • 5 backjack chairs
  • 10 zafus / meditation cushions
  • 1 efficient space heater
  • 10 blankets or cushions to place the zafus on 
  • 5 comfy reading chairs for our guests
  • reference charts and displays with info about edible/medical plants, local resources, ecological and ethically sound local businesses, etc. 
  • a fund to bring in guest speakers on a year-round and ongoing basis
  • (In the event that we exceed our fundraising goal, we will direct any surplus towards a scholarship fund for low income students who attend our annual Permaculture Design Course)

Perks ~ To thank you for your sponsorship, we appreciatively offer the following:  

Examples of the evening events: 1. A seed swap, 2. A viewing of the film 'Inhabit, A Permaculture Perspective', 3. Fermentation demonstrations, 4. How to plant native pollinator habitat, etc. 

Examples of the day-long workshops:  1. Growing gourmet mushrooms, 2. Designing your garden with annual and perennial vegetables, 3. Creating a rain garden, etc.

  • $10 donation = attendance at one of our evening events
  • $25 donation = attendance at 3 evening events
  • $50 donation = attendance at a half year of evening events
  • $100 donation = attendance at a full year of our evening events
  • $200 = attendance at one of our full day workshops, as well as a half year of evening events
  • $300 = attendance at two full day workshops, as well as one year of evening events
  • $500 = attendance at three of our full day workshops, as well as one year of evening events
  • $1000 = attendance at five of our full day workshops, as well as one year of evening events

In this environmental climate, I am ever more aware of the need to foster connections in our local communities. I am inspired to create more opportunities and jobs for others, to further share the knowledge and skills that we at Sowing Solutions have gathered thus far, and to be of benefit to our local community and the greater permaculture community. 

I humbly ask for your help to further these aspirations.  :)

In gratitude and wishing you wellbeing always, 

~ Kay Aihla McGrenaghan Cafasso, Director of Sowing Solutions

(A photo of Kay in the new meeting space, while visioning about what it can be in the future!)

story:
Declutter Your Cords!

The Kurrent Alarm Clock best way to charge all of your devices without the clutter!


Charge all your devices at your fingertips and never leave your home or office without full power. Kurrent has charging options for every device. The perfect alarm clock for travelers, gadget lovers, parents and anyone that wants to stay connected.

With a history of working with luxury hotels, Kube Systems wanted to bring that luxury into the home. We have spoken to thousands of travelers that have told us of their love for our multi-device charging solutions, so we designed something that was ideal and convenient for the home. You can already see our Kube Audio Clock and Kube 5 Portable in our partner hotels today.


 

WIRELESS CHARGING HAS ARRIVED with Qi

Haven't started charging wirelessly yet? You probably will very soon. Add the optional Qi wireless charging pad for newer smartphones and leave the other ports for everything else.

Designed with every gadget lover in mind, Kurrent is a minimalist design that comes in two basic and loved colors, black and white.



CHARGING FOR ANY DEVICE

You don't have to decide which device gets full power anymore. Charge all your devices simultaneously with one of six charging ports available on the Kurrent.

We at Kube Systems, Kurrent's manufacturer, are a 3rd party Apple approved provider. That means Kurrent is an MFi (Made For iPhone) product, designed to work perfectly with all of your Apple gear! Whether at home, in the office or in a hotel room, Kurrent by Kube Systems provides the ultimate charging solution

UPGRADEABLE CABLES

Companies may change their charging options, but don't worry, so do we! Our detachable charging cables are upgradeable, customizable and best of all magnetic. Micro USB and Lightning cable included, but you can upgrade or customize to include additional lightning cables or USB-C.

In 2014, the founder, Garry Ramler, was sitting in a hotel room in Kiev, Ukraine on the first leg of a hectic business trip. In his rush, he had forgotten his iPhone cord at home and felt that all too familiar panic when he was at 2% battery with no way charge his phone to keep in touch with his upcoming appointments or his family. The hotel had no spare iPhone cords and could only advise him where to buy one - in an area where he was likely to get mugged as it was already after midnight. Out of desperation, he had to knock on the doors of other guests, pleading in sign language for a cable to give life back to his phone. It was then, three years ago, he vowed to never be in that situation again and to not let it happen to others - Kube Systems was born.



 


 

 


 

Are you MFi? Is Kurrent a 3rd party Apple-approved provider?
Yes! Kurrent is a Made For iPhone products and we are 3rd party Apple approved.

Is there an AC socket circuit breaker button?
Yes, on the back of Kurrent there is a breaker button that allows for reset.

How long is the warranty?
1 year

How long does the internal battery last for the alarm clock’s memory?
25 years

Will a USB-C cable be available?
Yes, you can purchase it separately and change out either the supplied Lighting or Micro USB cable.

Will the wireless charging pad work with the iPhone 8?
The new iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus and iPhone X will have built-in wireless charging that will be compatible with Qi technology.

Can I use the Qi pad by itself without the Kurrent?
No. The Qi pad is designed to be used in conjunction with the Kurrent.

What if I live outside the US, can I use Kurrent?
If you live outside the US, we will ship your Kurrent with a built-in Universal AC socket that will work in the rest of the world, along with the correct power lead for your region. The power input to Kurrent is universal, ranging from 110v - 240v.

What are the seven DST (Daylight saving time) regions?
USA, UK. EU, AUS, NZ, Brazil and Mexico.

What color can I buy a Kurrent?
Kurrent will originally be shipping in Black and will be offered in White as a stretch goal.

Is Kurrent a 3rd party Apple-approved provider?Yes! Kurrent is a Made For iPhone products and we are 3rd party Apple approved.Is there an AC socket circuit breaker button?Yes, on the back of Kurrent there is a breaker button that allows for reset.How long is the warranty?1 yearHow long does the internal battery last for the alarm clock’s memory?25 yearsWill a USB-C cable be available?Yes, you can purchase it separately and change out either the supplied Lighting or Micro USB cable.Will the wireless charging pad work with the iPhone 8?The new iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus and iPhone X will have built-in wireless charging that will be compatible with Qi technology.Can I use the Qi pad by itself without the Kurrent?No. The Qi pad is designed to be used in conjunction with the Kurrent.What if I live outside the US, can I use Kurrent?If you live outside the US, we will ship your Kurrent with a built-in Universal AC socket that will work in the rest of the world, along with the correct power lead for your region. The power input to Kurrent is universal, ranging from 110v - 240v. What are the seven DST (Daylight saving time) regions?USA, UK. EU, AUS, NZ, Brazil and Mexico.What color can I buy a Kurrent?Kurrent will originally be shipping in Black and will be offered in White  as a stretch goal.

story:
What is mui? 

“mui” is a "calm design"  smart display  for  distraction-free smart home lifestyle.  
 

（日本語サイトはこちら）

mui is a wooden touch panel that serves as a smart home control hub. Designed as a distraction-free “calm design” interface for the post-smart screen era, mui enables users to focus on their tasks at hand and be in the moment while staying digitally “connected.” mui is the first product of mui Lab, which draws inspiration from the Taoism philosophy of “mui shizen” works to develop calm design devices and systems that can create a harmony among technology, the humans who use and the nature surrounding them.

 

Why mui ?

1. Enables distraction-free digital communication. Allows us to be more mindful readers, more creative artists and better families.
2. Easy way to talk with your family, check news, weather, calendar information and more. No need to reach for your smart phone(s).
3. Hustle-free way to control connected devices, including smart speakers and smart appliances.
4. Work with Alexa or Google Assistant via IFTTT integration.
5. Less time looking at your phone and more time to spend with your family.

 

Want to know how mui works? Take a look at these short movies.

 
 

 

 
 

Enjoy distraction-free family time.
Unlike smartphones, mui doesn't get you hooked on it.

We aim to solve one of the biggest issues in today's society: Everyone is looking at their phones at the dinner table. 

mui enables you to enjoy a mindful life and spend quality time with your family. It helps you keep a healthy distance from social media, so you won't be endlessly on the phone -- an important digital life management skill for children to learn.  

Calm Design Device

mui is an interactive wood panel that is activated by swiping your finger across its surface. Using the digital display that appears on the wood surface, you can talk, send and receive messages, and check the news and weather. You can also control connected devices in your home, office or public spaces, like lighting, thermostats, and so on. When you are done, the panel goes back to sleep mode and looks just like a piece of beautifully sanded wood again.   

 

In accordance with calm design principles, mui aims to minimize the “noise” of technology and create a calm and peaceful environment for you to live in while providing just the right kind of convenience catered to your needs.

Press Coverage

At CES2020, mui had great responses from media and audience! 

mui has been covered by Tech Crunch, CNET, The New Yorker , BBC, Le Figaro , The Verge  as a one of very unique and meaningful product in the technology world. 

We're awarded "Best of CES2020" by House Beautiful.  

mui was selected one of the 5 biggest tech trends at CES2020 by CNET.

 

 

                                                             

 Here is the link to the Gizmodo Japan, CNET Japan, AXIS, core77 articles.

Finishes

Natural & Dark

 

 

How it works 

Text Messaging & Voice Mail between family and home

OUR STORY

At mui Lab, many of our team members are in our late 30s and early 40s and have busy family lives. We all struggle to balance our precious family time with the demands of technology. Instead of playing and talking with our children, we found ourselves glued to our phones and computers, desperately trying to “connect” with others. This saddened our children and disconnects us from our spouses.

Personal Stories    

mui in Hirobe’s home | Nobuyasu Hirobe (Co-Founder, Creative Director) 

Whenever leaving the office late at night, I send a good night message to mui for my 7-year-old son and 5-year-old daughter. That always makes them happy.  

My daughter is mesmerized by the light slide dimmer switch that appears on mui. She slides it back and forth over and over, trying to figure out how the lighting in the room is connected to mui, turning the lights up and down every time she moves her little fingers. Her brother wants his turn, too. They fight for the switch and never seem to get tired of playing with it.

My wife’s approach to mui is more practical. She wanted to be able to turn off the last light from inside her bed at night. So, I used mui’s settings to make it happen for her.

She likes having mui within arms’ reach, so she can easily check the weather forecast in the morning when deciding what to wear.

We use a beta version of mui in our house. When I was removing mui to update it the other day, our kids had worried looks on their faces and asked: “Are we losing mui?” Apparently, mui became a necessity for my son.

mui Lab’s Creative Director Nobu Hirobe was thinking about mui being in a public gathering place when developing the concept for the device. He believed people, not the device, need to be the focus of the space.

mui at Oki’s home | Kaz Oki (Co-Founder, CEO)

My wife often comes home late from work. Exhausted and ready to “unplug,” she turns to “mui-san” (the nickname for mui in our household) to get done only what she wants and nothing more. For example, the weather forecast would quickly appear on mui and then disappear, letting us gently slip into dreamland. She loves having just the right level of access to technology with mui-san, instead of the glowing phones we used to look at before going to bed.   

Because mui lets us to control the lighting and appliance from another part of the house, the layout of the home no longer dictates our behavior. But we still wanted more from mui, including an option to shut off all lights with a touch of a button. This prompted us to develop the “Do Not Disturb” feature, which keeps the device on airplane mode until the alarm goes off in the morning.

mui Lab’s CEO Kazunori Oki is a newlywed. His and his wife both lead busy professional lives and typically have just three hours together each day. Oki did not want to waste any part of those three hours looking at his phone. mui was a perfect solution to this problem, and helped the couple stay connected.


Conclusion

mui is designed to create a modern living and work space where humans can thrive without being conditioned by technology. The intention is to stop technology from continuously demanding our attention, pulling us away from our loved ones while we try to enjoy our personal time. We can be more mindful readers, more creative artists, better families, thanks to the boundaries mui sets around our personal space and time.

Our homes will undoubtedly grow “smarter” as technologies further advance. There will always be some level of gaps between how technology works and how humans are meant to live. Still, mui empowers people to live their lives in the way they want by minimizing technological barriers. We envision mui as a tool which will help you create your desirable lifestyle, just like your favorite furniture which you choose to design your living space.


Team: Assembly of Experienced Technology & Design talents 

Tech Team

Our NEW CTO Mr. Mune Sato used to work  for MIT Media Lab as a human-computer-interaction specialist! 

We have been gathering Japanese tech talents! 

Mune Sato: CTO(EX-MIT Media LAB) 

Yutaka Kobayashi : Software Architect (EX-SONY)

Takuya Kubota: Software Architect (EX-EPSON)

Taka Yamamoto : Hardware Architect (EX-Fujitsu TEN) 

Masao Takahashi: Application Architect (EX-GOOD PATCH)

Shinya Tsuchiya: Hardware Engineer (NISSHA)  

Design Team

Nobu Hirobe : Creative Director (EX-NISSHA, Zen minded- Minimalist,Dream Creator) 

Mark Nomura: Industrial Designer 

Mandy Meissner: UX and Service Designer 

Koki Nishikawa : Industrial Designer 

Use Cases 


Design

-Color, Material and Finish(CMF)

mui was trying to hide all product surface into space. 
We have tested multiple times integrating mui function into architectural wall. But this trial was too early to be used. We have changed our mind to make object first to investigate future possibility of mui. 

 
We consider mui as an interior design piece. We wanted mui to blend in with other furniture in the room. Because of that, we considered all kinds of natural stuff -- such as fabric, glass, stone, and wood -- as a potential material for mui. In the end, we concluded wood was the best material for mui because of its place in human history.
Our team developed the concept of the product during our trip to the HIDA forest region in central Japan, which has been the hub of artisan woodworking since the 7th Century. 

We learned about stories that illustrate the relationships between wood and those who use it and how the lifestyle of the forest region is rooted in the nature that surround the residents. Yes, nature, not digital technology nor data. We felt mui needs a story of its own that shows its connection to nature. 

 mui fuses nature with the digital world.
What's special about mui is that it's almost entirely made of natural wood (except for the electronic components).  We know how electronic smart devices are making our homes feel cold and sterile. By using wood as the material, mui can create a peaceful and relaxing space. The beautiful look of the sanded sycamore grains blends in with the room’s décor and furniture, allowing you to forget the device’s existence when not using it. mui is also available in Cherry, Maple or Ash. 

 

We selected a color tone and grain pattern that provide a sense of warmth. mui features a unique stripe pattern called "Fu," which also mui more durable.

We are still deciding on darker color tones. We may select materials commonly used to make furniture, such as cherry and walnut. Once we make a decision, we will update our backers.

 USER EXPERIENCE DESIGN

Set up & Connectivity

-Hardware setting 

There will be uses instructions. We want to make it easy to mount mui on the wall. Our hardware team and architects are working to on it.

Software / Wifi Settings/ Connecting smart home devices 

You can use the mui mobile app to connect mui to other devices and various services. 
The app will be for both iOS and Android. 
Here are some of the setup protocols via the mobile app. 
 
mui app is starting from iOS but we'll prepare Web-app for Android users! 
 

IFTTT can be integrated with mui through a mobile app. We will provide mobile console images for easy setup. Smart Home Gadgets and IoT devices can be connected via this app.

https://ifttt.com/muilab
 
mui has been officially ready for IFTTT since Summer 2018. Via IFTTT, mui can connect with Google Home, Amazon Echo, Facebook, Twitter, Slack, Uber, Ring, Domino’s Pizza, Sonos, Philips Hue, New York Times News and other Smart Home Gadgets and Services. Please feel free to customize mui with your preferred applications. Triggers and Actions will be extended in the future.

mui can also be connected to Google Home and Amazon Echo ecosystems via the cloud and API.

Engineering Specs

mui 1st 

Product Dimension: W585.8xH78.5xD26（mm） / W23*H3.1*D1.0(inch)                                              item Weight: 850g (1.9lbs)
Input: mui Material Capacitive Touch Panel System 
Network: Wi-Fi:IEEE802.11.b/g/n/ac 2.4Ghz/5GHz
Bluetooth:4.2/BLE                                                                                                                                          Microphone: 1 installed 
Speakers: 2 installed 
Power Source Type: AC100-240V（50Hz/60Hz） 

Timeline

Mass-Production is starting now. 

For Japan Domestic backers : Starting Jan 29/2020

For overseas backers : Starting mid-Feb/2020

Based upon delivery location, shipment timeline will be varied due to several reasons such as custom clearance / procedures.

story:
Who we are?

Azzura Solar is in the business to change lives in Indonesia. We are committed to empower communities in need, improve local standards of living and create a sustainable environment for Indonesia.

  • Azzura Solar was established in May 2013, and since then, have installed over 65 solar lights in rural homes around Indonesia.
  • Over 66 million Indonesians do not have access to electricity, this is approximately 1 in 4 lives. Without basic access to electricity, children are unable to read, write and study after dark, and left to use harmful kerosene or oil lamps. 
  • By raising enough funds to install 30 Solar Powered Light Kits, we can brighten 10 homes, empowering the lives of the families inside. 


What exactly is the Solar Power Light Kit? 

  

The Solar Power Light Kit is comprised of:

  • 1 X 4 watt solar panel
  • 1 x 3.7 V Inverter / Battery (3,000 MAH)
  • 3 X LED Light
  • Over 20 meters of cabling to connect all the components.


What we do with EVERY DOLLAR:

We take 'transparency' extremely seriously!

  • Each Solar Power Light Kit costs $120 and every home requires 3 KIT, That's a total of 9 LED lights. 
  • Once we collect enough funds, we inspect various rural homes with local charities, and prepare an installation plan. 
  • EVERY home is different, so the inspection process is VITAL!
  • EACH and EVERY installation is photographed and posted on all our social media pages, so you know EXACTLY where your funds have gone. 


What you get as a Funder:

  • By helping us reach our GOAL of $3,500, you get various perks, from "good karma" to Honorable mentions and even a photo of yourself on Azzura Solar's Wall of Contributors!
  • Check out our 'Perks' section to find our more.


The Impact:

We empower children living in poverty. By the simple gift of 'light', children have the ability to study, read and write after dark. Helping them reach their goals in and out of the classroom. 

  • Indonesia's electricity grid is inneficient and unreliable. Millions of homes just boardering the capital city, Jakarta, have little or no access to power. They resort to using candles, and kerosene lamps after dark, which emit dangerous fumes and can cause a fire. 
  • Since we started Azzura Solar, we have worked with various charities, both local and international including Hope Worldwide Indonesia and Yayasan Usaha Mulia, to bring our KIT to rural homes.
  • We have also been mentioned in the JAKARTA GLOBE NEWSPAPER. Azzura Solar's Bright Future Program: Article.
  • By partnering with these charities, we develop closer ties to the local community, help strengthen their existing charitable programs and HELP MORE FAMILIES.

Why Azzura Solar?

With so many charities and programs out there, why fund our campaign you ask?
  • We post photos and updates of every installation on our social media pages, so you know exactly where your funds have gone. TRANSPARENT. 
  • Instead of giving financial donations directly to those living in poverty, we believe in EMPOWERING them, and give them the ability to better themselves.


Other Ways You Can Help:

Funding out program isn't the only way you can help, By following, liking and sharing us, you can support out program and those living without electrity in Indonesia. 

   Azzura Solar

   azzurasolar

  AzzuraSolar

 www.azzura-solar.com


Need more information?

Contact our founder directly at:

Mobile: + 62 815 95 215 45

Email: h.chanrai@azzura-solar.com

By helping us reach our GOAL of $3,500, you get various perks, from "good karma" to Honorable mentions and even a photo of yourself on Azzura Solar's Wall of Contributors! 
Check out our 'Perks' section to find our more.


The Impact: We empower children living in poverty. By the simple gift of 'light', children have the ability to study, read and write after dark. Helping them reach their goals in and out of the classroom.  
Indonesia's electricity grid is inneficient and unreliable. Millions of homes just boardering the capital city, Jakarta, have little or no access to power. They resort to using candles, and kerosene lamps after dark, which emit dangerous fumes and can cause a fire.  Since we started Azzura Solar, we have worked with various charities, both local and international including Hope Worldwide Indonesia and Yayasan Usaha Mulia, to bring our KIT to rural homes.
We have also been mentioned in the JAKARTA GLOBE NEWSPAPER. Azzura Solar's Bright Future Program: Article. 
 By partnering with these charities, we develop closer ties to the local community, help strengthen their existing charitable programs and HELP MORE FAMILIES. 
  Why Azzura Solar?
With so many charities and programs out there, why fund our campaign you ask?



We post photos and updates of every installation on our social media pages, so you know exactly where your funds have gone. TRANSPARENT. 

Instead of giving financial donations directly to those living in poverty, we believe in EMPOWERING them, and give them the ability to better themselves.







Other Ways You Can Help:

 Funding out program isn't the only way you can help, By following, liking and sharing us, you can support out program and those living without electrity in Indonesia. 

   Azzura Solar

   azzurasolar
  AzzuraSolar

 www.azzura-solar.com

Need more information?Contact our founder directly at:

Mobile: + 62 815 95 215 45
Email: h.chanrai@azzura-solar.com

story:
InvizBox Go is a discreet, portable VPN device that allows you to secure all your Internet traffic when using WiFi. It works everywhere to secure your browsing privacy and security - at home, abroad or on any public WiFi. The InvizBox Go also allows you to charge your mobile devices on the go!

InvizBox Go is now shipping from invizbox.com

Please visit here to purchase

 

Our new range of products is available here

 

 

 

 

 

 

Use public WiFi securely

 

 

 

The security threat with public WiFi is real - Troels Oerting, head of Europol's cybercrime centre, recently said  "We have seen an increase in the misuse of wi-fi, in order to steal information, identity or passwords and money from the users who use public or insecure wi-fi connections," - BBC News

 

We have also seen Russian hackers target hotel WiFi recently "and silently gather usernames and passwords without victims even having to type them in" - Engadget

 

InvizBox Go encrypts all your traffic to keep your data safe.

 

 

 

Now shipping globally, the InvizBox Go couldn't be easier to use - Simply connect your phone, laptop or other device to the InvizBox Go over WiFi and that's it! All of your Internet traffic is now encrypted, ensuring your privacy and security. There is no software to install on your devices and the InvizBox Go keeps itself up to date with regular security and feature updates.

 

 

You can connect multiple devices to just one InvizBox Go. 

Use it at home 24 / 7 to protect every wireless capable device in your home. You can connect smart TV's, laptops, phones or any other WiFi capable device.

As soon as you're connected, you're safe. Safe from tracking and profiling by people, governments, companies and hackers who you neither know or trust. InvizBox Go uses either a VPN connection or a connection to Tor to encrypt all the traffic coming from your local network.

 

 

 

 

Our software is open source and we have continued this tradition with the InvizBox Go. This provides two major benefits to you: 

1) It allows other security experts to examine our code, ensuring the best security.
2) It gives you that extra confidence that we're not hiding anything malicious.

Full InvizBox Go source code is now available on our Github page.

  • Box includes InvizBox Go, 1 Micro usb cable, quick start user manual
  • Secure Shipping with tamper evident stickers.
  • Individually flashed and verified in Dublin to ensure quality and security.
  • Unique secure password per device.
  • The simplest and easy to use UI.
  • Pluggable Transports in the form of obfs2/obfs3/scramblesuit to mask your Tor traffic.
  • GeoIP Configuration. Choose which countries you allow as exit nodes. Block the "Five Eyes".
  • Prevent exploit of WebRTC IP disclosure vulnerability on Firefox and Chrome.
  • Real-time stats and graphs.

 

Based in Dublin, Ireland, Team InvizBox are passionate about your security and privacy.

Chris has worked for 19 years in the IT sector, primarily in software quality assurance and has worked for the last 10 years in the mobile security industry. Chris has a degree in Information Technology and also has the Certified Ethical Hacker qualification. Yes, that's a thing. :)

Paul has been working as a software developer and manager for over 17 years and has been working in the mobile security industry for nearly 13 years. Paul has a degree in Computer Science and Software engineering and also has the Certified Ethical Hacker qualification. Yes, that's a thing. :)

Elizabeth has most recently been working the most demanding job of all - a full time mother to four kids and wife to Paul (nightmare!). Before that Elizabeth worked as a software engineer for the national broadcaster in Ireland (RTÉ). Elizabeth has a diploma in Computer Science.
