story:
• Space saver - 20 X smaller than a towel rack
  • Can be placed anywhere - Closet, Bathroom, Kitchen, Doors, Garage, RV, boat, by pool or hot tub, etc...
  • NO SLIDING, NO WRINKLES, NO DENTS  
  • No tools required!

 

 

 

 

Why Ruggy?

Ruggy allows you to hang more towels individually, and saves you lots of space. A towel rack bar ranges between 18-36 inches in length, while Ruggy is less than 1.5 inches wide. 

 

 

 

Wood Species Selection

Natural wood is resilient, aesthetically pleasing, and comes with different colors. Below are 5 types of wood species to match your desire. 

 

How it Works

Ruggy is configured in a manner different from any wall hanger product. It has a marble that runs inside the hanger. 

 

 It's supported by a double-sided tape for fast and easy installation.

 

When sliding in any type of fabric, the marble wedges the material against the tongue of the hanger, causing it to hang tight. To release, hold the fabric and pull gently to either side.

Endless Potential 

 

 

 

Ruggy Production

 

 

Final Product
story_txt:
Space saver - 20 X smaller than a towel rack
Can be placed anywhere - Closet, Bathroom, Kitchen, Doors, Garage, RV, boat, by pool or hot tub, etc...

NO SLIDING, NO WRINKLES, NO DENTS  
No tools required!
     Ruggy Experiences
 
  Why Ruggy?Ruggy allows you to hang more towels individually, and saves you lots of space. A towel rack bar ranges between 18-36 inches in length, while Ruggy is less than 1.5 inches wide.  
                                Only 5 wood species left to choose from! 
Towels retain moisture, allowing bacteria to breed. The main concept of Ruggy is the marble that holds the towel at a pin point. This technique allows the weight of the towel to hang free, while airing out the moisture captured in the towel. Ruggy allows more air to flow through the entire towel, causing the towel to dry faster than using a towel rack.

  Wood Species SelectionNatural wood is resilient, aesthetically pleasing, and comes with different colors. Below are 5 types of wood species to match your desire.  How it WorksRuggy is configured in a manner different from any wall hanger product. It has a marble that runs inside the hanger.   It's supported by a double-sided tape for fast and easy installation. When sliding in any type of fabric, the marble wedges the material against the tongue of the hanger, causing it to hang tight. To release, hold the fabric and pull gently to either side.  
                  Endless Potential Your kitchen towel is always OFF the floor and within reach. Compact and can be placed anywhere  Ruggy Production   

 
3M Tape Production
Special 3M Tape order to fit the back of Ruggy.

 
Final Product

story:
UPDATE: The campaign has ended and we reached our goal! Thanks to everyone who backed, supported, and cheered. 

If you want updates on what we're doing, new box and subscription availability, and some stellar discounts be sure to sign up for our newsletter at smartassandsass.com/news.

 

Welcome to Smartass and Sass, a subscription service with snark. Smartass and Sass was created by us because we love sassy stuff, and we know other people do, too.

In exchange for a few of your hard-earned dollars, we'll send you a box full of hand-picked items from some amazing designers, artists, and small businesses. It's that simple.

We are using this campaign to jumpstart our service and will be continuing service via our website after the campaign is complete.

There are a couple of different options:

  • One-time box: Great as a gift for yourself or a cynical loved one, or if you just want to see what we're all about before committing to a subscription. You can order the Mini or the Classic box, which contain general hilarious items, or you can choose a themed box that will contain items relevant to a specific thing, like BAMF moms (Mama Bear Box), satirical cooks (Saucy Chef Box), or inappropriate D bags (Inappropriate as F*ck Box). We also announced TWO NEW options for badass brides (BAMF Bride Box) and the perfect holiday gift for those people who have everything (-Tis the Season Box).
  • Subscription box (3-,  6-, and 12-month options): If you're really feeling our vibes and want to see where this thing goes, sign up for a subscription. You'll get new, fantastical products delivered to your door once a month. Each box will contain brand new items (no dupes, we promise) and the longer you choose to subscribe, the better discount you get (3 months subscription = 10% off, 6 months = 13% off, 12 months = 15% off).

All boxes will feature information about each artist, where to find more of their cool stuff, and some special offers. 

Oh, and shipping is always free for U.S. (discounted for international).

We have quite a few products and vendors on our wish list of items. We are working to finalize agreements with these lovely businesses, but the below photos will give you an idea of the types of  things we are scheming for each of the boxes. The products below are not guaranteed to be in your backer box; your goodies will be a surprise!

 
THE CLASSIC BOX: Available as a one-time purchase or as a 3-, 6-, or 12-month subscription. We’ll send you new, generally hilarious items each month.

 

 
THE MINI BOX: Available as a one-time purchase. This is a small version of our
Classic box with things like stickers, magnets, notebooks, and more.

 

 
THE MAMA BEAR BOX: Available as a one-time purchase.
This box is for BAMF moms who love to laugh.

 

 
THE SAUCY CHEF BOX: Available as a one-time purchase.
This box contains kitchen-themed to spice up your cooking!

 

 
And if you're reealllly feeling feisty...
THE INAPPROPRIATE AS F*CK BOX: Available as a one-time purchase. 
This box contains items specifically for profanity lovers.

 

AND WE JUST ADDED TWO NEW BOXES...

 

THE BAMF BRIDE BOX: The BAMF Bride Box is available as a one-time purchase. This box contains things that every bride will appreciate for her big day.

 

THE 'TIS THE SEASON BOX: The 'Tis the Season Box is available as a one-time purchase. This is a box of pure holiday sass, perfect for White Elephant/Yankee Swap/other-weirdly-named gift exchange events.

 

The stuff that we source for boxes is stuff that we like. 

Some of it comes from artists we've followed for years, and some comes from shops we've found falling down the Etsy/Pinterest/Wanelo/Instagram rabbit holes. 

Most of our items will come from the United States, and some will be made internationally. All of our chosen items will be handmade by artists and small businesses, because in addition to wanting to share cool stuff we find, we want to provide an additional outlet for awesome artists and businesses to sell their wares.

 In addition to backing the campaign, there are a few ways you can get updates about Smartass and Sass happenings. Follow us on any or all of the outlets below to keep up with what's going on.

       

 

Smartass and Sass was created by us—Kim and Abby. We've been friends for almost 25 years. We can quote every line in Wedding Crashers, and we frequently carry on conversations in song. We are silly weirdos and we love to laugh. 

We started Smartass and Sass because we adore these products and the vendors who create them. We wanted to cultivate a collection of hilarious stuff while also creating a platform for awesome artists and designers to share their goods in a unique way. 

Video music | "Fireworks" by Jahzzar (http://www.betterwithmusic.com)

 

  • Will the items in the photo come in the box I receive? Nope! Your goodies will be a surprise! But your items will be similar to those shown. They will be on track what whichever theme you chose, they'll be useful, and they'll be awesome as hell.
  • If I buy a box as a gift, is there a way to personalize it? Yes! After the campaign ends, we will send out a survey collecting some information from you. If you are planning to give yours as a gift, we can write a personal message and include it in the box!
  • Can I ship to a different address? Yes! When you choose a box, the next screen will ask for billing and shipping details separately. 
  • When will boxes ship? All boxes will ship in early December. We've padded our schedule to allow for any unforeseen timing speed bumps, so all boxes should arrive in plenty of time for the holidays!
  • Is shipping included in the price? Shipping is FREE for U.S. destinations and discounted for any international locations.
  • What if I want to buy a box in the future? Soon we will be launching ordering on our website. Boxes will be available for purchase and subscription, with shipping beginning in January. Be sure to sign up for our newsletter at www.smartassandsass.com to get all of our updates and some awesome promotions!

Have other questions? Send us a message up above or email us at info@smartassandsass.com

This is a small version of ourClassic box with things like stickers, magnets, notebooks, and more.  THE MAMA BEAR BOX: Available as a one-time purchase.This box is for BAMF moms who love to laugh.  THE SAUCY CHEF BOX: Available as a one-time purchase.This box contains kitchen-themed to spice up your cooking!  And if you're reealllly feeling feisty...THE INAPPROPRIATE AS F*CK BOX: Available as a one-time purchase. This box contains items specifically for profanity lovers. AND WE JUST ADDED TWO NEW BOXES... THE BAMF BRIDE BOX: The BAMF Bride Box is available as a one-time purchase. This box contains things that every bride will appreciate for her big day. THE 'TIS THE SEASON BOX: The 'Tis the Season Box is available as a one-time purchase. This is a box of pure holiday sass, perfect for White Elephant/Yankee Swap/other-weirdly-named gift exchange events. The stuff that we source for boxes is stuff that we like. Some of it comes from artists we've followed for years, and some comes from shops we've found falling down the Etsy/Pinterest/Wanelo/Instagram rabbit holes. Most of our items will come from the United States, and some will be made internationally. All of our chosen items will be handmade by artists and small businesses, because in addition to wanting to share cool stuff we find, we want to provide an additional outlet for awesome artists and businesses to sell their wares. In addition to backing the campaign, there are a few ways you can get updates about Smartass and Sass happenings. Follow us on any or all of the outlets below to keep up with what's going on.        Smartass and Sass was created by us—Kim and Abby. We've been friends for almost 25 years. We can quote every line in Wedding Crashers, and we frequently carry on conversations in song. We are silly weirdos and we love to laugh. We started Smartass and Sass because we adore these products and the vendors who create them. We wanted to cultivate a collection of hilarious stuff while also creating a platform for awesome artists and designers to share their goods in a unique way. Video music | "Fireworks" by Jahzzar (http://www.betterwithmusic.com) 

Will the items in the photo come in the box I receive? Nope! Your goodies will be a surprise! But your items will be similar to those shown. They will be on track what whichever theme you chose, they'll be useful, and they'll be awesome as hell.

If I buy a box as a gift, is there a way to personalize it? Yes! After the campaign ends, we will send out a survey collecting some information from you. If you are planning to give yours as a gift, we can write a personal message and include it in the box!

Can I ship to a different address? Yes! When you choose a box, the next screen will ask for billing and shipping details separately. 

When will boxes ship? All boxes will ship in early December. We've padded our schedule to allow for any unforeseen timing speed bumps, so all boxes should arrive in plenty of time for the holidays!

Is shipping included in the price? Shipping is FREE for U.S. destinations and discounted for any international locations.

What if I want to buy a box in the future? Soon we will be launching ordering on our website. Boxes will be available for purchase and subscription, with shipping beginning in January. Be sure to sign up for our newsletter at www.smartassandsass.com to get all of our updates and some awesome promotions!
Have other questions? Send us a message up above or email us at info@smartassandsass.com

story:
Most laundry detergents on the market keep trying to improve their composition in a never-ending search for the magic formula. But no matter how hard they try, there will always be some chemical residues left on your clothes. For kids and people with sensitive skin, choosing a suitable detergent has become an impossible challenge!

WASHWOW 5.1 is an Electronic Laundry Ball that makes your laundry easy, saves you money, and helps the environment when we all need it most. Without using any cleaning agent or other chemicals, WASHWOW achieves effective and efficient cleaning through advanced electrolysis technology. Small, compact, and very simple to use, you can take it everywhere to clean, wash, and totally deodorize your clothes!

story:
We are almost there! Spéciale rewards will be shipped out in January

 

Artfully Cutting Experience 

Many chefs and restaurant owners will tell you that presentation of food is just as important as the taste of the food. They will also advice you that having the right tools in the kitchen is essential for achieving the best results.

These two facts combined have led to the development of a unique knife and cutting board solution that allows for easy cutting, chopping, slicing, dicing, and even peeling of delicious food such as cheeses, fruit, vegetables, breads, meats, and more while presenting them in an appealing manner.

Introducing Spéciale

The walnut with which the cutting board has been carved is of the finest grain, selected for its durability and for the splendor that it brings to Spéciale while a built-in hand-made Damascus knife with rosewood handle that moves around on the board made of an historical metal with a wavy surface pattern, hammered out with steel and iron and first used in present-day Syria during the medieval age.

Spéciale is great for right and left handed chefs.

Your next dinner event will be a cinch. We know that there are hosts and hostesses all around the world just waiting to get something like this into their homes. 

Development

For years the hunt for the right knife and cutting board have had us wondering about that perfect blade that would work its way through all types of food items perfectly. The knife had to be sharp and unique and the cutting board had to be durable. Because of these principles, we chose damascus knife and walnut wood for the cutting board.

And after a long period of trial and testings, we finally developed the perfect cutting board which will ease your kitchen struggles and hone your cutting skills, taking them to the next level.

Removable Built-in Brass Pin

Our Damascus Knife can spin around the board and make cutting easier, it does not just work its way up and down but right and left as well. We've spent a lot of hours finding a way to attach our custom knife on our walnut cutting board that spins it around. We finally developed a built-in brass pin. We made the brass pin removable so when any of the parts need to be cleaned, including knife and pin, will be able to disassemble. The whole system is incredibly intuitive, the knife swiveling along the surface of the cutting board in order to reach any food item that you place on it. The idea is to give value to good quality food and having it with enjoyment.

Damascus Knife

Spéciale cutting board knife is shaped into its form with our own design on Damascus steel and carbon reputed to be tough , resistant to shattering and capable of being honed to a sharp, resilient edge.

 

Hence, taking advantage of our history lessons, we got our hands on Damascus steel and moulded it into your most perfect kitchen experience "Spéciale". In addition, we have also had a beautifully patterned and elegant cutting board made to compliment the grace of our Damascus knife.

Details & Specs

 

Rosewood Handle:

We use the selected rosewood for the Spéciale knives' handles. Beautifully patterned and stamped Rosewood perfectly embodies this idea with exquisite looks, top notch performance. Our traditional rosewood handle is designed to provide maximum comfort and wonderful feel to touch with extra durability.

Walnut Cutting Board: 

Handsome walnut cutting board is designed to be both beautiful and functional. Our design and material source ables to protect the damascus knife and our board, also provide stability during use and look handsome to keep out on the counter. The reason we picked walnut as our cutting board is this hardwood is so gentle on our knives yet very durable and also it has very beautiful natural grain patterns.

Cutting Board Dimensions

Damascus Knife's Dimensions

                                             

Spéciale 17inches long Damascus knife can be used separately from the board. Hang the knife on the hook and enjoy the beauty of it!

Traditional Retail Markups

Traditional retail markups are so high, therefore the Japanese Damascus knives and walnut cutting boards cost so much at retail shops. We set our Kickstarter goal at $25K, so we will be able to reach the minimum quantity requirement to customize our own steel and set up a manufacturing line for our unique hand-made knife. Also, with our goal, we will be able to pick the beautifully grained walnut wood for producing our custom cutting boards. With your support, we are able to bring Spéciale directly to you while avoiding high cost retail markups. 

Design: Beauty & Function

Knife and cutting board that is the stuff of legends.

Spéciale brings sophistication and ambiance together which will amaze friends and bring something special to any meal. Each solid walnut board will be unique with its natural grain giving it an element of class and beauty.

Let’s start a knife and cutting board revolution!

The fundings will go towards sourcing patterned walnut wood and first production run for our custom designed handmade damascus knives. 

After spending more than a year on designing, prototyping and manufacturing the samples, we are ready to go into production. Our manufacturing wooden products experience and tight connections with our damascus blade producers, we are confident that with your help, we can successfully stay on our production timeline and provide you with the best Spéciale cutting board with built-in Damascus Knife.

story:
The hope of clean limitless power

You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.

Martin Luther King, Jr

I will be a year constructing and modifying a Model A to run on fusion power.

I am a 62 year old retiring physics prof who has been working on “cold fusion” for 24 years. I am ready to stop turning knobs and actually try putting it to the test. I am not getting any younger. Now is time to dream big and “go for it”. It is bold. It is daring. It is crazy but I have to try. I have a few “hot” samples and I have a ’28 Model A Ford that I will use for a standalone test of the concept. It will take about $25,000 to get fancy Lithium Iron Phosphate batteries, steam engine, a generator, mechanical and electrical items. I need to raise $20,000 for it. (questions- check out https://www.facebook.com/dennis.fusioncar.5 )

I will be scaling up an existing experiment involving electric stimulation of a deuterium containing metal lattice system for higher levels of heat. I will be using “Cold Fusion” (also known by its current "politically correct term" as LENR) to generate heat to boil water** to drive a steam engine ** and turn an electric generator. I don’t expect to have enough power to run the car directly but I hope to “trickle charge” some batteries enough to run the car after very long charging times. I am hoping for about 5 Watts of net electrical energy. I am close. The heating should scale with volume/mass and my losses will scale just as surface area. I even have a few samples that have been “self heating”.

It is a long shot. I cannot promise success but I definitely will give it my best effort. Please spread the word to friends and those you think would be interested. I will post updates as I go via https://www.facebook.com/dennis.fusioncar.5

See I told you it was bold and daring but after 24 year of seeing so much hope for a better world in the bottom of a test tube, I need to see if I can make it work. Researchers have amassed a lot of data but it sits mostly ignored and or disbelieved. (see http://lenr-canr.org/ and specifically see my paper there: http://www.lenr-canr.org/acrobat/CravensDtheenablin.pdf ) If I can demonstrate a credible application of “cold fusion”, it will change the entire world.

What Happens If I Surpass My Goal?

I would opt for 1) +$20K, the more efficient and powerful Stirling generator from WhisperGen instead of the steam engine 2) +$10K, larger batteries and better current control for more range 3). +$10K, Scale up samples for higher thermal output levels and shorter charging times 4). +$5K, have some special parts machined.

If underfunded

If I get less than half, I will not have enough for the car project. However, I would try for a scaled down demo. Perhaps a simple LED and a small “toy” ¼ W Stirling.

 

 

Nerd stuff in rough numbers:

Model A because: 1) exempt from state inspection restrictions, 2) can move with just 1 to 2 HP, 3) high gas tank can be used for gravity feed water to steam system, 4) keeps fusion system as focus, 5) easy access to system, 6) and the mystique – people smile at a slow old Model A; Steam because: 1) Peltiers only get me 2% efficiency, steam about 8% conversion, 2) Stirlings at this level are very costly; Target power levels: 1) COP 20, 2) 100 W thermal, 3) net electrical output 6 W, 4) drive motor at 2 kW ave, 4) charge to run time ratio 333 hours(2 weeks) charge for 1 hour drive time. Battery storage: 1) Lithium Iron Phosphate 2) >80 AH, 3) 72 Volt array; Fusion approach: electric stimulation of D and Pd loaded Carbon mesopore powder spiked with rare earths and thorium.

Fusion? I will leave it to theorists to debate if it is really fusion, virtual neutron fusion, or something else- strong nuclear force or weak nuclear force events. I just want to take it out of the lab and use it.

 Note: this is part 2 since "they" terminateded it early.  I had $360 pledge the first time- hence this is only for $19640.

story:
To all my fellow Wayward friends...

This is your chance to make something awesome happen.
Rothfuss is going to be giving out a single ring that leaves him indebted to do ONE favor in hopes to gain money for Worldbuilders and help those in need. I would like to raise the most money we can as a group to give to Worldbuilders and gain a Patrick Rothfuss to officiate the very first wedding of two of your own Waywarders. 

Obviously we do not know the exact amount that will be needed or how much anyone will bid, so I've just put a nice large sum on the page, because better safe than sorry...right? 

Should we win this bid we will ask Patrick Rothfuss to officiate our wedding and we will ask anyone who helped make it happen to join us for the occasion. 
That means everyone gets to share the Rothfuss himself in a nice, Name of the Wind themed wedding that we would like to share with you. 

Why share?

Even if we do not win the final bid, you are still donating money to Worldbuilders which will in turn be used to feed hungry families or help with projects around the world. All money will go to a good cause and none will be wasted. 
So lets do this!
Lets make it happen.

story:
Growing up, I worked in my father’s Chinese restaurants in New York before I joined the film industry as a grip in the early 90s.  Typical of most small, family-run restaurants, I was involved with all aspects of the business, from delivery, prepping ingredients, cooking, to installation and repair of kitchen equipment.  Drawing upon these skills and experiences I started my own Chinese restaurant in California where I was able share my favorite dishes with my customers. I then rejoined the film industry. However, those customers continued to ask me to prepare their favorite dishes and soon realized that the most important tool, an industrial strength Wok Station, did not exist in the consumer market.  This is what inspired and motivated me to create The WonderWok.

After several prototypes, I designed a revolutionary portable cooking solution with The WonderWok that captures the design, high heat, portability, versatility, and ease of use, all in one product.  There is no other product currently in the marketplace like this.  It is specifically designed for the home user and professional food service operator that want an alternative to what is currently inadequate.  The cost of manufacturing to bring The WonderWok to the market is costly (especially with the initial small production) because of the high quality of materials and hand-assembled parts.  This is very much like BBQ grills where inferior models are substantially cheaper while the more solid ones cost more.  This campaign is aimed at raising the funds to produce the first batch of The WonderWok.

A common complaint of many of my YouTube followers (also online competitor reviews of wok burners) is that conventional burners do not produce sufficient heat that is vital to good wok cooking.  For the last few years, I have read the comments and sympathized with my viewers that have been unable to successfully replicate my recipes at home.  It then, became a passion for me to develop a solid, high-end, but reasonably priced Wok Station that will allow anyone to use my recipes to produce healthy and delicious Chinese dishes and more.  

The production of the first batch of The WonderWok will fulfill my long time wish to finally make this available to my viewers.


Our Goal is $100,000. These funds will go directly to the manufacturing of the parts that make up the WonderWok. This will cover the first run of the WonderWok and start up costs.

If our goal is not met the funds raised will go to manufacture a limited number of units.

This project will allow me to bring a much demanded product to the market place for the home consumer and food service operators who need the right equipment that will allow them to duplicate their own healthy authentic Chinese foods and more.

On my YouTube channel

http://m.youtube.com/user/thewonderwok

You can find comments from viewers that express interest in having the right tool to do their own cooking

story:
A hook like no other

The iHookOn is a hook that is an innovative, space saving, and well designed solution for closets with a ventilated wire shelving system. The iHookOn makes use and brings functionality to an otherwise wasted space in the back of a closet. Since closet space is so precious, having the ability to utilize a previously unused area is what sets the iHookOn apart from other space saving closet solutions.

The iHookOn is easy to install. Just place the iHookOn on a wire in the back portion of the wire shelf and click it into place. Once installed, it does not move and you are ready to hang any type of accessory. The items that can be placed on the iHookOn are only limited by ones imagination. By placing items such as scarves, belts, necklaces, tank tops, bathing suits, and handbags, it not only de-clutters the closet, but also displays the items in an orderly, as well as attractive fashion.

The iHookOn is made out of molded plastic and comes in a variety of 9 vibrant colors. The color palette for the iHookOn includes White, Gray, Pink, Purple, Orange, Yellow, Red, Blue and Turquoise. Having a choice of colors, gives the consumer the ability to customize their closet and organize it at the same time. It is 2 7/8” in Height, ¾” Wide, and the Depth of the hook is 1 ½”. The opening of the hook is designed to accommodate a wide variety of items from thin to bulky.

The iHookOn is:

  • A closet organization hook that uses an area of the closet in the back that is not currently (traditionally) being used.
  • A space saving solution that does not require additional space.
  • Brings organization
  • Cuts down on the clutter and disorganization the closet
  • Easy to install. Just put on the wire and click into place.
  • Once in place it is secure, and does not move.
  • Easy to un-install.
  • Strong and durable
  • No tapes, no mess, and no holes in the walls.
  • Displays the items on the hooks so they are in sight
  • Easy access to all items on the hooks.
  • Functional and decorative
  • Enhances the look of closet with all the hooks and items on display.
  • No more tangled necklaces or not being able to find the scarf or the belt you need to complete your outfit
  • No more having your accessories falling on the floor when you reach for the item you want.
  • Decreases the stress of getting dressed in the morning.
  • The color palate can be fun and playful, or utilitarian.
  • Great for Children’s closets too!
  • For children who can’t use hangers, they can now hang up their own clothes. It gives children a sense on involvement and accomplishment.
  • Girls love the pink and purple hooks, and boys love the red and blue.
  • Can be used in a coat closet to hang umbrellas, hats and scarves.
  • Can be used in the laundry room, garage and utility room.
  • The iHookOn can be used with any ventilated wire shelving system.
  • Great for Millennials in urban setting.
  • The perfect solution for Baby Boomers who have downsized.
story_txt:
A hook like no otherThe iHookOn is a hook that is an innovative, space saving, and well designed solution for closets with a ventilated wire shelving system. The iHookOn makes use and brings functionality to an otherwise wasted space in the back of a closet. Since closet space is so precious, having the ability to utilize a previously unused area is what sets the iHookOn apart from other space saving closet solutions.The iHookOn is easy to install. Just place the iHookOn on a wire in the back portion of the wire shelf and click it into place. Once installed, it does not move and you are ready to hang any type of accessory. The items that can be placed on the iHookOn are only limited by ones imagination. By placing items such as scarves, belts, necklaces, tank tops, bathing suits, and handbags, it not only de-clutters the closet, but also displays the items in an orderly, as well as attractive fashion.The iHookOn is made out of molded plastic and comes in a variety of 9 vibrant colors. The color palette for the iHookOn includes White, Gray, Pink, Purple, Orange, Yellow, Red, Blue and Turquoise. Having a choice of colors, gives the consumer the ability to customize their closet and organize it at the same time. It is 2 7/8” in Height, ¾” Wide, and the Depth of the hook is 1 ½”. The opening of the hook is designed to accommodate a wide variety of items from thin to bulky.The iHookOn is:
A closet organization hook that uses an area of the closet in the back that is not currently (traditionally) being used.
A space saving solution that does not require additional space.
Brings organization
Cuts down on the clutter and disorganization the closet
Easy to install. Just put on the wire and click into place.
Once in place it is secure, and does not move.
Easy to un-install.
Strong and durable
No tapes, no mess, and no holes in the walls.
Displays the items on the hooks so they are in sight
Easy access to all items on the hooks.
Functional and decorative
Enhances the look of closet with all the hooks and items on display.
No more tangled necklaces or not being able to find the scarf or the belt you need to complete your outfit
No more having your accessories falling on the floor when you reach for the item you want.
Decreases the stress of getting dressed in the morning.
The color palate can be fun and playful, or utilitarian.
Great for Children’s closets too!
For children who can’t use hangers, they can now hang up their own clothes. It gives children a sense on involvement and accomplishment.
Girls love the pink and purple hooks, and boys love the red and blue.
Can be used in a coat closet to hang umbrellas, hats and scarves.
Can be used in the laundry room, garage and utility room.
The iHookOn can be used with any ventilated wire shelving system.
Great for Millennials in urban setting.
The perfect solution for Baby Boomers who have downsized.

story:
Hello Friends, Family, and Strangers with a Heart of Gold!


My name is Beth Dodson and I am raising funds to send my roommate home to Texas for Christmas!

Debbie is in her early 50s and currently works as an Administrative Assistant for a brand new Christian high school in Torrance, CA. She commutes an hour to work each day in Southern California traffic. Debbie also volunteers her time at her church with the Ladies Ministry, enjoys spending time with her kids, and watching The Voice on television.

She hasn't seen her parents for over a year and a half, and they're not getting any younger! Due to a particularly difficult financial year, Debbie is unable to afford a plane ticket and will otherwise be spending Christmas morning by herself in our apartment. 

Well, not on my watch. I have been blessed with the opportunity to be able to go home for Christmas and I want that same blessing for Debbie, but I can only do it with a little help from my friends.

When I moved out to California to pursue my dream of writing for television and movies, I was a stranger in a strange land. (Seriously, it doesn't rain here. That's strange) My living situation was terrible. (Seriously, the house had no heat or air conditioning and I was living with five other people who had very different definitions of "clean") When I met Debbie, she needed to rent a room in her apartment for some extra income and it was a perfect fit for me. (Seriously, I get my own room and there are no bugs) I really believe that Debbie's willingness to open her home to me at a price I could afford greatly contributed to my ability to stay in California and pursue my dream.

With your support, I will be able to "pay it forward" and give someone an amazing Christmas present. And YOU can say you were a part of giving someone an amazing Christmas present: the gift of home. 

Absolutely all of the funds raised in this campaign (whether we go over by $100 or $500) will be given exclusively to Debbie. Check out the awesome perks below.

Give someone the gift of "home" for Christmas. Help me send my roommate home!

story:
As Featured on ConnectedCrib!!

Your ThermoFi: 

  • Monitors ambient conditions anywhere WiFi and only a USB Adapter (widely available USB AC Adapter) are available to keep an eye on your pets, greenhouses, musical instruments, homes, sheds and more!
  •  Uses WiFi to send info through the Internet. It can keep track of conditions a world away! 
  • Uses either a web browser or our Android app (beta) to access and save the measurements being made. View the information on our website, or download it as a spreadsheet.
By supporting us with your contribution, you can help us build a more connected world!

Setup:

USB 1.0 amp+                  Setup Wifi                                Access with our App/Website!


Specs:

Outputs data in: 

        1.  Degrees Celsius (-40 to 80°C, ±0.5°C  accuracy)
        2. Degrees Fahrenheit (-40 to 175°F, ±0.9°F accuracy)
        3.  Plus Model:  0.0-100% humidity readings (2-5% accuracy)
  • Approximately 300 foot (100 m) maximum Wifi Range
  • USB 1.0 amp or greater wall charger required.  Most USB Smartphone chargers will work for this purpose.  (not included)
  • 1.5 foot (45 cm) USB type A male cable
  • 2.30 inches * 1.39 inches * 0.61 inches (5.85 cm*3.55 cm*1.55 cm)
  • Water resistant construction (not waterproof)
  • 1.5 foot (45 cm)  USB Power Cable - can be lengthened through use of a USB extender cable available everywhere 
  • Maximum reading rate is every 15 seconds


    The Impact/Why we need You

    I created this project to fulfill a need of my own.  I found that there was no easy and inexpensive way to monitor temperature and humidity from a distance.  I think this is a new project for the consumer marketplace that the greater public could use.  As an upstart, enthusiastic, young developer, I need the funding to buy parts and support the continuation of app development.

    If we reach our goal, all ThermoFis will be upgraded to include free heat index measurements! Even if our goal is not reached, the ThermoFis will be delivered as promised.  


    Spread the word through the Internet  so we can grow a whole host of inexpensive monitoring products utilizing WiFi. Let's develop more inexpensive connected home products!  

    Questions or Comments please email us.

    Note:

    U.S. Shipping is Free.  Canada and Mexico please add $5 to your contribution as an Additional Gift, and other International Countries, such as Europe or Asia, please add $10 as an Additional Gift.

    The user is responsible for radio regulations, applicable customs and VAT in their respective countries.


    Powered by ESP8266:

story:
For more details of the finalized Muzo (Mass-production Muzo) or request additional information, please visit our website:

https://www.celestialtribe.com/home

Good News!!! Most of the Backers and Perks are fulfiled. We thank you for all the support on the way. Here are some photos sharing in production and warehouse. There are also some stocks for replacement and re-order. Please contact us if you encounter any problem in using Muzo.

 

 

STATE OF THE ART VIBRATION MONITORING SYSTEM

Muzo is the first acoustic device that applies Anti-Vibration Technology for the smooth surface. This Exclusive Technology prevents objects from vibrating to minimize any unwanted disturbances nearby.

Besides, Muzo utilizes Billionsound Technology (Powered by BST) to generate dynamic realistic sounds. These vivid sounds set the scene and drown out intrusive noises. Whether you wish to enjoy a piece of serenity or to become engulfed in the tranquil sounds of nature, Muzo will be there for you.

 

 

Muzo lets you experience the Personal Zone of Comfort. Get away from bitter reality and let Muzo take you on a journey far from the hardships of everyday life. With Muzo, you can turn every area into your own personal place. The mood, the environment, the privacy - all of this is under your control now. 
 

Increasing concentration on work

It is an experience no other device has ever supported. We may not be the first to care about your problems of suffering from hustle and bustle, but we are the first to help you get rid of them.
 

 

 

With Muzo’s Personalized Acoustic Sleep Therapy, you probably won't even know what insomnia is. From thousands of soothing sounds, we picked out a specific mixing sound which will get you sleepy in no time. All soundtracks in Sleep mode can slip into your mind unconsciously and make you fall into a deep sleep. 

Fully adjustable volume for each soundtrack

People tend to neglect the importance of sleeping routine. It actually can affect your energy for the whole day. No worries, just trust it to Muzo.

 

Sleep quality for you and your infant

Set the alarm, and Muzo will help you fall asleep, later generating sound waves to wake you up. As a result, you will be able to sleep soundly whole night and wake up at the right time of your sleep cycle to avoid that groggy feeling we all hate.
 
 

 
Muzo ensures that sensitive information is treated in a confidential manner. Muzo Sound Masking is dynamic and changes in level. Structural privacy elements cannot adapt to such intruding sounds. 
 

Turn every area into your own personal place
Muzo sound masking can adapt from location to location and across variable noise levels to calculate the output that depends on the range.
 
 

 

 

Is the noise of this big city too much for you to bear? Just turn Muzo on.

 

 

 

 

 

We designed Muzo to be simple, convenient, and effective. Just click on Muzo and Anti-Vibration System will turn on automatically. You can then drown out intrusive noises by adding some soothing soundtracks for noise masking.

Just click on Muzo

 

Muzo is compact and portable, which is perfect for baby nurseries, day care centres, college dorms, apartments, hotel rooms, office spaces, or any environment where unwanted and disruptive noises are a nagging problem.

 

 

 

Muzo Application on iOS and Android

Muzo sets your entire window frame in motion. In other words, your window becomes a Crystal Clear Quality Sound Speaker. Muzo turns it into an acoustic environment with its own speed of sound. You can easily tell the difference between an Induction Speaker with multi-sound source and a normal speaker with a single source.  

Mixing soundtracks for Muzo

With over 10 soothing soundtracks, whether it is too quiet or there is too much disruptive noise outside, you can create a comfortable natural sound in an instant.

Controlling Muzo via Smartphone

 
 

TPE is vital to Muzo. It is the secret that sticks Muzo firmly on any smooth surface. TPE material is non-toxic and environmentally friendly. It is easy to stick, reposition and remove. TPE never has a limit in terms of using times.

 

Testing the TPE Sticky of Muzo

How this little TPE support Muzo? In order to ensure that Muzo can be stuck firmly on any surface, we used the dedicated TPE for Muzo. We sandwiched a layer in every TPE, so that the TPE can fully stick on the surface. We concern about your convenience, that's why we choose and redesign TPE for you.

 

 

 

 

 

Muzo has been under development for a very long time. A simple concept is only what we had at the beginning. To be frank, we encountered many difficulties in the past year, seeing as relevant technology is rare, and we have to overcome hundreds of failed experiments. 

It was really tough getting here. However, with our passion and desire of making Muzo real, we finally got a satisfying experiment result. And now, we need your help to put us forward and make Muzo be a real mass producing device.

After several modifications, we have finalized the industrial design of Muzo that is ready to go into mass production.

Since the 1st prototype is ready, we have continued evaluating and improving its effectiveness. Before starting mass production we will continue working on optimization and software. Surely, safety testing and certification application are ongoing as well. 

 

 

Our R&D team is comprised of talented and professional acoustics experts, engineers, and designers with enthusiasm for developing innovative products. As some might know, real-time algorithms and back-end software are one of the major challenges in this project. To overcome all of the encountered challenges our team spent nearly a year. No matter how far Muzo will go, it is the achievement of all of its members. Thank you all!

Want to get more information about our company and us? Please, see our company website.

 

 

 

 

 

If you want to know more about Muzo, follow us on

At last, we must say a “thank you” for getting to know Muzo; we can't wait for you to experience our achievement.

 

 

Risks and challenges

We cannot wait to share our product with you. And we can only imagine how excited you will be when you receive Muzo. Of course, we keep our rational way of thinking, since we are convinced that the most important thing is to ensure timely delivery of Muzo to our backers.

Although we do have preliminary contracts with manufacturers, we still take huge alert of any uncontrollable accidents. If our project gets successfully funded, we are going to face the challenges related to production, packaging, and shipping worldwide.

However, we cannot foresee future problems in terms of production, packing, and shipping. We may encounter some technical problems, but we have already prepared an emergency solution which may cause the product to be slightly different. We believe we are strong enough to keep our promises to you since we have worked on production problems as the top priority. We held multiple negotiations with manufacturers long before entering the market. At the same time, logistics is thought out to the last detail for shipping out the rewards. This serves as the best evidence of how concerned we are about shipping your Muzo on time.

It is our duty to inform you about any accidents that might postpone the shipping of your order. In case this happens we will have to ask you to be patient until your Muzo arrives. We will fix the shipping problem as soon as we can. Moreover, we will keep exerting best efforts on improving our product, and, of course, you will stay informed every step of the way.

** Kickstarter and Indiegogo - Indemand campaigns are our official campaigns. If you know any third-party websites claiming that they can provide pre-orders for Muzo, please be careful with unauthorized online selling. We clarify that we have no connection/partnership with any other parties at this moment. If you have any doubts about Muzo, please feel free to contact us by info@celestialtribe.com.

© Celestial Tribe, 2016. Unauthorized use and/or duplication of the material on Kickstarter and/or Indiegogo page without express and written permission from us (copyright owner) is strictly prohibited. At the same time, use, edit and air our video content and our promotional videos without express and written permission from us (copyright owner) is also strictly prohibited. 

 

Please, keep supporting us and spreading the words! Thank you!

Muzo Team @ Celestial Tribe

story:
Meet INFi Marvel

 

 

 

                Let WiFi signal reach every spot 

                                  of your home   

With a rapid increase in the use of smart devices, wireless network (Wi-Fi) has become so popular in recent years. However, due to long distance or thick walls, there are some spots in your home that Wi-Fi signals can not reach.

Instead of using network cables, INFi Marvel with PLC technology transmits Wi-Fi signal through power lines at home. It provides stable Wi-Fi signal by bridging the wireless network through thick walls and leaves no "Wi-Fi deadzones" in your home.

 

 
 

 

                             Small enough to fit 

                                    in your hand

 

 

 

                    Instructions of INFi Marvel

Our INFi Marvel Starter Kit comes with two devices. The ellipse-shaped works as a wireless router, and the rounded works as a Wi-Fi range extender.

 

 

 

 

 

                        Simple plug-and-play

 

 

Plug the ellipse into the wall socket and connect its network port to the existing Ethernet port. Next, take the round to the room where you need Wi-Fi, simply plug it in to the wall socket. Wait for a few seconds, and the room will be covered by strong, stable Wi-Fi signal. One ellipse can be paired with 7 rounds (max) using your home’s power lines. 

 

 

                Take the extender with you, Plug it in 
                        wherever you need WiFi

 

 

 

 

 

        Better than traditional wireless routers 

 

More stable - Wi-Fi signal transmitted by power line connection, bypasses thick walls and keeps Wi-Fi signal strong enough in a large range.

Complete coverage - take the round with you, plug it in wherever you need Wi-Fi and leave no "Wi-Fi deadzones" in your home.

 

               Better than powerline adapters

 

More functions with lower price - INFi Marvel can be used as a wireless router and a Wi-Fi range extender. Other powerline adapters are not routers, and also can not  generate Wi-Fi signal. These products only provide wired network connection. 

Smarter - you can remotely control your home network through the INFi APP.

               
 

                            More from INFi Marvel

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

                  Mechanism of  PLC Technology

INFi Marvel uses PLC technology that transmits WiFi signal through power line instead of network cable. This technology solves the puzzle of WiFi signal depletion when going through walls and other barriers. 

 

                             Customer Feedback

 

 

                                        Colors

The prettiest wireless router ever existed! Now available in gold. 

 

 

 

 

 

                                         

 

 

                                     Tech Specs

・　Input Voltage: 110V-240V AC

・　Internet Connection： DHCP/PPPOE

・　Operating Frequency : 2412MHz-2472MHz

・　Protocol Standards: IEEE 802.11 b/g/n

・　Operating  Environment: Indoor

・　Maximum Power Consumption: 3.5W

・　Wireless Loss: ≤0.5W

・　Transfer Rate: 200Mbps MAX(PLC); 150Mbps MAX(WiFi)

・　Operating Humidity: ≤80%

・　Operating Temperature: -10-50

・　Carrier Protocol： HomePlug AV

 

 

 

                           Our Team

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

                              Timeline

 

 

INFi Series ― Coming Up Soon

Use INFi's products to build your smart home-- More products of INFi series will be launched. 

Prospective INFi smart home system

 

 

Our faith is to make your life simpler, healthier and more comfortable

 

 

FAQ

1. How large is the range of INFi Marvel?

INFi transfers data and signal through power lines. Normally its transfer distance on power lines can be 300 meters in one circuit which is enough for common families to use.

2. Can INFi Marvel be used with powerline adapters?

Yes.

3. Do I still need a traditional modem if I use the INFi Marvel?

Yes. The INFi Marvel only builds up WLAN for your house, so you still have to use the Community Broadband or ADSL modem to have access to the Internet.

4. Can I just use one of the two parts alone?

The main router (ellipse) can be used as a wireless router independently, but the extender (round) must be used with the main router.

5. Will the INFi Marvel be interfered by other appliances in the house when it’s transferring data?

Most appliances in the house do not interfere the INFi Marvel’s performance, but chargers may make big interference. So you’d better avoid using INFi around chargers or AC adapters.

6. What if I forget the password to log in the administration page of INFi Marvel?( how to reset the router?)

You should reset the router to factory settings. There is a “reset” button at the bottom of the router; turn on the router, hold the reset button for 10 seconds, then release it. When the PLC light is off, the reset is done.

7. What influences the strength of WiFi signal?

WLAN transfer signals through microwave, and microwave’s diffraction is weak. The main barrier in the house is the walls. Walls not only block the signal but also absorb the energy of microwave, thus a device behind a wall can not receive the WiFi signal or only receives very weak signal.

8. What is the difference between the common PLC modems and the INFi Marvel?

Normal PLC modems only function as a substitution of the network cable, but INFi Marvel not only functions as a PLC modem but also as WLAN and a router.

9. Does this router and the extender need to be paired? Is it plug-and-play?

The INFi Marvel’s main router and extender are paired before leaving the factory, so you don’t have to get them paired. But if you have bought extra extenders, you have to pair the extra extenders to the main router.

10. How strong is the signal of INFi Marvel? Is its radiation high?

The 3rd generation of communication technology (Powerline Communication) is applied in INFi Marvel; PLC helps the WiFi signal to travel through walls, which reduces the power consumption to the minimum. Besides, there’s no high-power antenna placed on INFi Marvel, which produces much lower radiation than traditional routers. INFi Marvel is an eco-friendly router with low radiation, especially suitable for being used in places like living rooms or study rooms.
story_txt:
Meet INFi Marvel   
                Let WiFi signal reach every spot 
                                  of your home   With a rapid increase in the use of smart devices, wireless network (Wi-Fi) has become so popular in recent years. However, due to long distance or thick walls, there are some spots in your home that Wi-Fi signals can not reach.

Instead of using network cables, INFi Marvel with PLC technology transmits Wi-Fi signal through power lines at home. It provides stable Wi-Fi signal by bridging the wireless network through thick walls and leaves no "Wi-Fi deadzones" in your home.
 

   
                             Small enough to fit 
                                    in your hand



  
 
                    Instructions of INFi Marvel
Our INFi Marvel Starter Kit comes with two devices. The ellipse-shaped works as a wireless router, and the rounded works as a Wi-Fi range extender.
 
 
 

 
 
                        Simple plug-and-play
 
 
Plug the ellipse into the wall socket and connect its network port to the existing Ethernet port. Next, take the round to the room where you need Wi-Fi, simply plug it in to the wall socket. Wait for a few seconds, and the room will be covered by strong, stable Wi-Fi signal. One ellipse can be paired with 7 rounds (max) using your home’s power lines. 



 
 
                Take the extender with you, Plug it in                         wherever you need WiFi


 
 
  

 
        Better than traditional wireless routers 
 

More stable - Wi-Fi signal transmitted by power line connection, bypasses thick walls and keeps Wi-Fi signal strong enough in a large range.
Complete coverage - take the round with you, plug it in wherever you need Wi-Fi and leave no "Wi-Fi deadzones" in your home.
 

               Better than powerline adapters

 

More functions with lower price - INFi Marvel can be used as a wireless router and a Wi-Fi range extender. Other powerline adapters are not routers, and also can not  generate Wi-Fi signal. These products only provide wired network connection. 
Smarter - you can remotely control your home network through the INFi APP.

・　Operating Humidity: ≤80%
・　Operating Temperature: -10-50
・　Carrier Protocol： HomePlug AV

story:
In today's world with all the daily activities going on, trying to make life easier is a challenge. Hi, my name is Robert, and I am the inventor of U Cane/Grabber. My idea came to me watching a friend using a cane trying to pick up an object. So, I began drawing U Cane/Grabber. As a clear picture evolved, I craved out a wood working prototype that was patented in 2008. My next challenge was locating a tool and die company capable of creating rapid prototype sections of U Cane/Grabber. These prototype sections allow you to feel and manipulate them in the way they are intended to be used. 3-D imaginary transformed U Cane/Grabber into a complete picture providing a blueprint to tool the mold. From the start to completion all of the companies involved are based in Wisconsin, giving U Cane/Grabber the ability to control and produce an enduring quality product. U Cane/Grabber is proud to be an American start-up company committed to employ and benefit all. Unlike others, U Cane/Grabber has more efficient handling and can simply do what others cannot. I am excited about U Cane/Grabber with the ability to offer aid towards independence. Unlike other canes or grabbers, U Cane/Grabber has an ergonomic handle that is comfortable in your grip. Located on both sides of the cane a pop out hanger that simply allows you to hang U Cane/Grabber almost anywhere. The safety switch on either side of the cane when in the down position keep's U Cane/Grabber securely locked for Cane use. Placing your hand into the Grabber handle and with a simple lift up on the safety switch unlocks the Cane to work as a Grabber. Closing the grabber and pushing the safety switch down securely locks U Cane/Grabber back into cane use. The replaceable rubber feet give U Cane/Grabber this unique feature to pick up many items.

  •  With your pledge/contribution and/or preorder of a U Cane/Grabber, the funds will be used for:

    1. setting up and leasing a warehouse 

    2. securing time for the minimum amount of pieces the manufacture will run

     3. purchasing materials needed

    The rewards for this product will not only offer more independence for those in need, U Cane/Grabber will also create jobs from sales to packaging. If U Cane/Grabber does not achieve its goal, All contributions made will go towards the U Cane/Grabber to production and market. The many of you who have inquired about purchasing the U Cane/Grabber will simply have to wait. I personally along with U Cane/Grabber's team want to thank you for your support.

story:
Welcome to RunAbout Cycle’s Indiegogo Campaign!

Electric Assist Bicycles are one of the fastest growing segments in the bicycle industry. These helpful technologies are empowering people with an enhanced riding experience, with the ability to climb hills with ease, ride with faster family and friends, and zip along, enjoying twice the speed, while only using half the pedaling effort. Our E-bikes help more and more people ride bikes again, commute to work, and utilize one of the most sustainable forms of local transportation in the world. We are RunAbout Cycles, Josh Kerson and Elana Hurwitz and we have been hand-crafting some of the world’s most efficient light electric vehicles for over eight years now. We are at a pivotal point, where we are ready for our next steps to manufacturing our electric bikes, in quantity, in a US factory.

RunAbout Cycles is going to launch from building handmade custom bikes, to ramping up our production with manufacturing of our bike frames and components in a North American factory. Our new factory produced models of our electric recumbent tricycles and electric mountain-touring bikes that will enable us to price them at affordable rates for many more people to enjoy. We invite you to support our fundraising efforts to be part of this new development.

With our assistive technology designs, we have changed the lives of our riders. We have witnessed people gaining independence, building confidence, and becoming stronger, healthier and happier. Our E-bikes give the rider the ability to choose the level of assist (motor) to combine with their pedaling, or to use the motor alone, depending upon their physical needs, riding style, terrain and load. We have also been able to custom design for each rider's specific physical needs with adaptive fittings. Understanding the heartfelt appreciation we have from our clients and early adopters, we aspire to bring the vehicles we design to many more riders in the world. "The RunAbout Smile" is something everyone has experienced, after a great test ride on our Spincycle Electric Trike. 

RunAbout Cycles has been developing our light electric vehicle designs for over eight years. We have handcrafted our SpinCycle, an electric human-hybrid-tricycle, and built custom electric bicycle conversions for a total of over a hundred satisfied customers. We’ve even built twelve prototypes, and the final vehicle for a new start-up electric bicycle company in Tennessee in 2008. Now we are ready, as leaders in the testing and use of the latest components like batteries and motors; with well tested and proven, zero emissions vehicles of our own design.


Photo: Josh Kerson at work.

Opportunity Knocking:

We have a special opportunity to work with an established North American manufacturer who would like to produce our frames. We also have had consistent interest and requests for our products to be put into a distribution network of over twenty stores throughout the New England area, as well as electric bicycle stores across the country. Additionally, we are fortunate to have interest in our product from customers here in America and around the globe, including the Netherlands, Germany and Australia.

We believe our electric-human-hybrid vehicles are a step into the future of sustainable local transportation. Our vehicles are part of the most sustainable transportation solutions that the world is calling for. They have also been purpose built from the ground up, well tested, refined, and developed over the last ten years.

With the use of advanced lithium ion batteries, brushless DC motors, and smart controllers, we have been on the cutting edge of technologies that will help change the world. The efficiencies may be hard to comprehend, but are in the area of 2,000 miles to the gallon equivalency. That is, for around 4 dollars worth of electricity, and recharging your E bike at 5 cents, per 25 miles, you can recharge and go 2,000 miles, for the same amount of energy that it costs for a gallon of gasoline!  And, the more you are able to add in your pedal-power, the more efficient your ride.

With A Factory Production Run of Our Trike and Bike Frames We will Offer

Two of Our Signature Electric Bikes:

Photo above: Elana and Josh working on a prototype frame design for a two wheeled E-bike. Cordova, Tennessee, 2008.

RunAbout Cycles 2014 SpinCycle (TM) Electric-Human-Hybrid Tricycle

The SpinCycle is our signature recumbent tricycle. It is a tadpole trike, with two wheels up front for the most stable riding platform in the industry. The SpinCycle electric assist tricycles are designed and engineered to be the most stable, comfortable, and utilitarian vehicles ever offered.

You can ride the SpinCycle at up to 20 MPH (32 K) on motor alone. Add in your pedaling for an efficient use of the battery charge, giving you a longer range ride, before you need to re-charge the battery. Our E-trikes are equipped with disc brakes for complete, sure stopping power. Our SpinCycle tricycle has a comfortable seating position that supports your back, giving you leverage to push on the pedals, and at the same time the height of the rider is at the equivalent to a small sports car, so you have the visibility and seeing ability when riding along bike lanes in urban settings. Our riders find it great for transportation, and carrying a load. 

Our E-trikes come with the most advanced lithium ion batteries, smart chargers, fuel meters and brushless hub motors available in the industry today. All SpinCycles include independent front suspension and independent front disc brakes. With safety in mind, we include tail-light "blinkies" and tires with reflective strips. Our aircraft quality 4130 Chromoly steel frames are the lightest, strongest and most durable frames in the industry, and come with our lifetime guarantee. The Trike frame can carry 350 lbs (158.75 KL) including the rider and has an integrated rack and pannier attachment rails built into the frame. Our E-bikes utilize ninety percent traditional bicycle components that can be found in bike shops across the country and the world, making for ease of use, and maintenance.

You're Invited:

Reserve one of our first factory production built SpinCycle frames today, and become part of the electric revolution sweeping the world. You will be making a positive change in reducing our carbon footprint, changing our "fuelish" ways, one E bike at a time.


RunAbout Cycles 2014 Electric Mountain Touring Bike

Meet our Electric Mountain Touring Bike. This two-wheeled machine has been designed and engineered as an electric human hybrid, from the start, providing for one of the most well balanced electric mountain bikes in the world. It is equipped with the most advanced brushless motor, and helical gear reduction available today. This feeds the power directly through the bicycle drive-train, empowering the rider to be two to three times stronger, on demand. Because of our electric assist specific design, the rider’s experience is smooth, strong and exciting. Our most interesting results, come from studying the efficiencies involved, with again, over 2,000 miles to the E gallon equivalency.

Using 90% bicycle parts, that are available around the world, enables our riders to access replacement parts from traditional bike stores. With 100% recyclable Lithium ion batteries, our extra energy can be stored in the lightest, safest batteries available today. As advancements in Nanotech batteries come forward, our E cyclists will be able to upgrade into better and better equipment, prolonging the value received from our designs. Ideally, Our riders will invest into solar charging, and help to advance these technologies into the cleanest form of transportation known.

The photo above was taken on top of Independence Pass, in Colorado, USA at about 12,000 feet elevation, during “Ride The Rockies 2012.” (see ride map below) Riding our RunAbout Electric Mountain Touring Bicycle up and over five mountains, along hundreds of miles of Colorado roads, during a total of six days, finally winding back to our home in Fort Collins Colorado. For Josh, it was the best ride of his life, he was empowered to pass hundreds of road riders per hour, as he tested the abilities of our new design. As a cyclist  for over thirty years, this was the pinnacle of his riding experience. Josh was absolutely convinced that we have an award winning design ready for factory production. 

For more Data on this epic adventure, Click on the link below!

http://runaboutcyclesinc.com/page2.php?SessionID=20784038520fd8092be09


From Hand Made To Factory Made:

We have known our manufacturer for over ten years, and have developed a strong working relationship that will be beneficial to producing our frames in their factory. Utilizing the latest in robotic welding, CNC machining, tubing bending and such, they are able to reproduce our bicycle frame designs to our exact specifications. Additionally with their in-house powder coating painting system, we will maximize the manufacturing efficiencies from cutting and bending tubes, to painting and packaging bicycle frames that will then be shipped directly to our assembly facility. Final assembly of our e-bikes will still be done by hand, as well as installing the bicycle components and finishing the final electrical systems.

Note: Specifications may change with the availability of 2014 components.

With Additional Funds

we aspire to be able to buy our components in bulk, directly from the manufacturers, helping to reduce the final cost for our customers around the world. Our experience in the past, attending bicycle manufacturing trade shows, has given us a head start in the work involved in establishing the connections for sourcing all of the vital parts necessary for our final production.
We would also like to hire and train talent to help our process of the final assembly of our E-bikes. With a larger space for assembly and warehouse, we will also be enabled to complete testing, inspection and quality control, of our electric bicycles, as well as further development and design.

We look forward to bringing more RunAbout Smiles to the world! With your help, we can spread the word. Please share our campaign page with your friends, community and family. We appreciate your support, and hope you will enjoy the ride with us!

Please check out our perks, and take a look at our updates here, by clicking the "update tab" at the top of this page.

Please email us with any questions you may have about our project, we are happy to help you have a better understanding.

With a Heartfelt Thank You,

Josh and Elana, ~ RunAbout Cycles

http://www.RunAboutCylesinc.com

 

     Josh[AT]RunAboutCyclesinc.com

    Elana[AT]RunAboutCyclesinc.com


About Us:

Some of our Accomplishments:

Our light electric vehicles have been shipped all over the country, raced up Mount Washington, in New Hampshire, Pikes Peak, Colorado, and at the Oregon Human Powered Challenges in a new E-bike class. We strive to use the latest technologies available, to create the most value for our customers and to continue to enter races to push our designs forward.

RunAbout Cycles has Participated in, won awards, set land-speed records, and organized events in many alternative energy and vehicle venues including this list below. We have also been the first electric bikes at many of these events, as well as the first and only handmade electric bicycles to participate in these events, many times setting a precedent for years to come, and helping to enlighten participants and organizers of existing events, that have not yet included e-bikes. Here is our list below of these events.

E-bikes Belong!

Smithsonian Institute's Alternative Vehicle day (Washington, D.C.)
NESEA's The Tour De Sol - (NY - NJ - MA)
Alt Wheels - (MA)
Solar Fest - (VT)
Alt Fest - (VT)
Northeastern Velomobile Rally - (MA- ME)
Junior Solar Sprint - (MA)
USA Solar Stores Grand Openings (VT- NH- PA)
Earth Day Amherst - (MA)
Earth Day Festival - (CT)
Electrathon America - (MA)
Oregon Human Power Vehicle Races - (OR) (set records at this race with our handbuilt electric SpinCycle trike)
Pikes Peak Hill Climb - (CO)
Mount Washington Hill Climb Laconia Day - (NH)
Rocky Mountain Sustainability Fair - (CO)
Tour de Fat - Fort Collins (CO)
Realities Ride - (CO)
Ride The Rockies 2012 - (CO) (First and only electric bike to participate )
Colorado Rides Electric - (CO)
Boulder Green Streets - (CO)
Disabilities Pride Festival and Parade - (CO) (First and only electric bikes to participate )
RAMs Classic - (CO) (Provided Mechanic's stop for the race)
USA PRO Challenge -Fort Collins
