controllers, we have been on the cutting edge of technologies that will help change the world. The
efficiencies may be hard to comprehend, but are in the area of 2,000 miles to the
gallon equivalency. That is, for around 4 dollars worth of electricity, and
recharging your E bike at 5 cents, per 25 miles, you can recharge and go 2,000
miles, for the same amount of energy that it costs for a gallon of gasoline!  And, the more you are able to add in your pedal-power, the more efficient your ride.With A Factory Production Run of Our Trike and Bike Frames We will Offer
Two of Our Signature Electric Bikes:


Photo above: Elana and Josh working on a prototype frame design for a two wheeled E-bike. Cordova, Tennessee, 2008.
RunAbout Cycles 2014 SpinCycle (TM) Electric-Human-Hybrid TricycleThe SpinCycle is our signature recumbent tricycle. It is a tadpole trike, with two
wheels up front for the most stable riding platform in the industry. The SpinCycle electric assist tricycles are designed and engineered to be the most stable,
comfortable, and utilitarian vehicles ever offered. 
You can ride the SpinCycle at up to 20 MPH (32 K) on motor alone. Add in your pedaling for an efficient use of the battery charge, giving you a longer range ride, before you need to re-charge the battery. Our E-trikes are equipped with disc brakes for complete, sure stopping power. Our SpinCycle tricycle has a comfortable seating position that supports your back, giving you leverage to push on the pedals, and at the same time the height of the rider is at the equivalent to a small sports car, so you have the visibility and seeing ability when riding along bike lanes in urban settings. Our riders find it great for transportation, and carrying a load.  
Our E-trikes come with the most advanced lithium ion
batteries, smart chargers, fuel meters and brushless hub motors available in
the industry today. All SpinCycles include independent front suspension and independent front disc brakes. With safety in mind, we include tail-light "blinkies" and tires with reflective strips. Our aircraft quality 4130 Chromoly steel frames are the
lightest, strongest and most durable frames in the industry, and come with our
lifetime guarantee. The Trike frame can carry 350 lbs (158.75 KL) including the rider and has an integrated rack and pannier attachment rails built into the frame. Our E-bikes utilize ninety percent traditional bicycle components that can be found in bike shops
across the country and the world, making for ease of use, and maintenance. You're Invited: Reserve one of our first factory production built SpinCycle frames today, and become part of the electric revolution sweeping the world. You will be making a positive change in reducing our carbon footprint, changing our "fuelish"
ways, one E bike at a time.

RunAbout Cycles 2014 Electric Mountain Touring Bike
Meet our Electric Mountain Touring Bike. This two-wheeled
machine has been designed and engineered as an electric human hybrid, from the
start, providing for one of the most well balanced electric mountain bikes in
the world. It is equipped with the most advanced brushless motor, and helical
gear reduction available today. This feeds the power directly through the
bicycle drive-train, empowering the rider to be two to three times stronger, on
demand. Because of our electric assist specific design, the rider’s experience
is smooth, strong and exciting. Our most interesting results, come from
studying the efficiencies involved, with again, over 2,000 miles to the E gallon
equivalency. 
Using 90% bicycle parts, that are available around the
world, enables our riders to access replacement parts from traditional bike
stores. With 100% recyclable Lithium ion batteries, our extra energy can be
stored in the lightest, safest batteries available today. As advancements in
Nanotech batteries come forward, our E cyclists will be able to upgrade into
better and better equipment, prolonging the value received from our designs.
Ideally, Our riders will invest into solar charging, and help to advance these
technologies into the cleanest form of transportation known. 





The photo above was taken on top of Independence Pass, in
Colorado, USA at about 12,000 feet elevation, during “Ride The Rockies 2012.” (see ride map below) Riding
our RunAbout Electric Mountain Touring Bicycle up and over five mountains, along hundreds of miles of Colorado roads, during a
total of six days, finally winding back to our home in Fort Collins Colorado. For
Josh, it was the best ride of his life, he was empowered to pass hundreds of road
riders per hour, as he tested the abilities of our new design. As a cyclist  for over thirty years, this was the pinnacle of his riding experience. Josh was
absolutely convinced that we have an award winning design ready for factory
production. 



For more Data on this epic adventure, Click on the link below! 
http://runaboutcyclesinc.com/page2.php?SessionID=20784038520fd8092be09

From Hand Made To Factory Made:We have known our manufacturer for over ten years, and have developed
a strong working relationship that will be beneficial to producing our frames in their factory. Utilizing the latest in robotic welding, CNC machining, tubing bending and
such, they are able to reproduce our bicycle frame designs to our exact specifications. Additionally
with their in-house powder coating painting system, we will maximize the manufacturing
efficiencies from cutting and bending tubes, to painting and packaging bicycle frames that will then be shipped directly to
our assembly facility. Final assembly of our e-bikes will still be done by hand, as well as installing the bicycle components and finishing the final electrical systems.
Note: Specifications may change with the availability of 2014 components. 
With Additional Funds we aspire to be able to buy our
components in bulk, directly from the manufacturers, helping to reduce the final cost for our customers around the world. Our experience in the past, attending bicycle manufacturing trade shows, has given us a head start in the work involved in establishing the connections for sourcing all of the vital parts necessary for our final production. We would also like to hire and train talent to help our process of the final assembly of our E-bikes. With a larger space for assembly and warehouse, we will also be enabled to complete testing, inspection and quality control, of our electric bicycles, as well as further development and design. We look forward to bringing more RunAbout Smiles to the world! With your help, we can spread the word. Please share our campaign page with your friends, community and family. We appreciate your support, and hope you will enjoy the ride with us!
Please check out our perks, and take a look at our updates here, by clicking the "update tab" at the top of this page.
Please email us with any questions you may have about our project, we are happy to help you have a better understanding.
With a Heartfelt Thank You,
Josh and Elana, ~ RunAbout Cycles
http://www.RunAboutCylesinc.com
 
     Josh[AT]RunAboutCyclesinc.com


    Elana[AT]RunAboutCyclesinc.com

About Us:Some of our Accomplishments:
Our light electric vehicles have been shipped all over the country, raced up Mount Washington, in New Hampshire, Pikes Peak, Colorado, and at the Oregon Human Powered Challenges in a new E-bike class. We strive to use the latest technologies available, to create the most value for our customers and to continue to enter races to push our designs forward.RunAbout Cycles has Participated in, won awards, set land-speed records, and organized events in many alternative energy and vehicle venues including this list below. We have also been the first electric bikes at many of these events, as well as the first and only handmade electric bicycles to participate in these events, many times setting a precedent for years to come, and helping to enlighten participants and organizers of existing events, that have not yet included e-bikes. Here is our list below of these events.
E-bikes Belong!Smithsonian Institute's Alternative Vehicle day (Washington, D.C.) NESEA's The Tour De Sol - (NY - NJ - MA)Alt Wheels - (MA)Solar Fest - (VT)Alt Fest - (VT)Northeastern Velomobile Rally - (MA- ME)Junior Solar Sprint - (MA)USA Solar Stores Grand Openings (VT- NH- PA)Earth Day Amherst - (MA)Earth Day Festival - (CT)Electrathon America - (MA)Oregon Human Power Vehicle Races - (OR) (set records at this race with our handbuilt electric SpinCycle trike)Pikes Peak Hill Climb - (CO)Mount Washington Hill Climb Laconia Day - (NH)Rocky Mountain Sustainability Fair - (CO)Tour de Fat - Fort Collins (CO)Realities Ride - (CO)Ride The Rockies 2012 - (CO) (First and only electric bike to participate )Colorado Rides Electric - (CO)Boulder Green Streets - (CO)Disabilities Pride Festival and Parade - (CO) (First and only electric bikes to participate ) RAMs Classic - (CO) (Provided Mechanic's stop for the race) USA PRO Challenge -Fort Collins

story:
We created the Vapor Sphere, because there was nothing on the market that allowed you to vaporize Alcohol that was affordable and easy to use. The simple yet elegant design of the Vapor Sphere allows you to vaporize your favorite Hard Liquor, in just about any social situation where people get  together to enjoy a drink. 

The goal we had in mind when creating the Vapor Sphere was to be able to take the drink out of your hand, and replace it with an easy to use Alcohol Vaporizer that looks and feels like you're still holding and enjoying a regular drink. 

The Vapor Sphere allows you to enjoy your favorite Hard Liquor without the Impurities, the Calories, or High Blood Sugar Spikes for Diabetics that normally come with drinking Alcohol. As an added bonus, when vaporizing Alcohol with the Vapor Sphere, the Alcohol leaves most people’s system within 15 to 30 minutes after you inhale your last vapor hit of Alcohol. This makes it safe to drive much faster than when you drink Alcohol. With the Vapor Sphere there’s no Hangover the next day. You wake up fresh and ready to face the day ahead of you.

   


We put the Vapor Sphere in the hands of people who didn't know that you could Vaporize Alcohol instead of drinking it. We showed this focus group how to use the Vapor Sphere and asked them for their honest opinions and feedback about this product so we could make improvements before bringing it to the consumer market. Watch the video above to see what the focus group participants said about the Vapor Sphere after their first experience Vaporizing Alcohol.


  

    

This video shows you what comes with the Vapor Sphere. The Vapor Sphere comes with everything needed to get started vaporizing any hard Alcohol that is sold for drinking. All you will need is something to light the candle with (Lighter/Matches), and your favorite hard Liquor that is 70-100 proof. Watch the above video to see what is included with the Vapor Sphere Kit.


Because of the special and unique heat resistant glass used to make the Vapor Sphere, you can hold the Vapor Sphere in your hand without feeling the heat from the candle that is used to vaporize the Alcohol. We have set very high standards for the glass manufacturer that we chose to use too make this product. Each Vapor Sphere is made by hand and decorated by skilled glass blowers. Watch the video above that shows how each Vapor Sphere is made. This Video Is Sped Up To 4 x The Actual Speed.



We have done everything needed to bring the Vapor Sphere to the consumer market. We tested the Vapor Sphere for over one year by putting this product into the hands of product testers and focus groups. We now feel confident about bringing this high quality, easy to use product to the consumer market.

What we need now are the funds for Marketing, and to buy the highest quality materials needed to make the Vapor Sphere at a volume discount. This is what your campaign contributions will go towards.

  • We are committed to producing the best product on the market but we need your campaign contributions to do this. Each Vapor Sphere is hand made, and we refuse to cut corners on production quality or materials.
  • If you can't contribute funds, please share this campaign on your favorite social media site. We need people to learn about the Vapor Sphere, and that there is an alternative way to enjoy their favorite spirits, without having to deal with the negative side effects that normally come with drinking Alcohol.
  • The Best Perk Possible: For our Super Early Bird & Early Bird Contributors to this campaign, we have a limited number of Vapor Spheres that have already been made in our first manufacture run. These limited number of Vapor Spheres are sitting in our warehouse and can be shipped out after this campaign ends.  Early Bird contributors will get their perks without a long waiting period unlike most Campaigns, along with a big discount off the Retail Price. Supplies are limited on these Early Bird Perks, so don't wait or you will miss out.




When considering vaporizing Alcohol, we need to ask our self what are the benefits and risks related to inhaling Alcohol vapors, compared to the risks and benefits to drinking Alcohol. Watch the above video to learn more.

BENEFITS:
  • No high blood sugar spikes for Diabetics. (Type 1 and Type 2)
  • Very few calories if any, so no need to worry about weight gain.
  • No hangover or feelings of nausea after using the Vapor Sphere.
  • No impurities that come with the Alcohol distillation process.
  • Vapor Sphere is a great conversation starter when in social situations.
  • Vapor Sphere allows you to stay in control and not get too drunk.
  • No DUI. The Alcohol leaves your system much faster than when you drink Alcohol. This allows you to drive sober in a very short period of time. On average it takes 15-30 minutes for the Alcohol to leave your system.

  • Save money because vaporizing Alcohol with the Vapor Sphere will give you a nice Alcohol buzz for ½ the cost of drinking Alcohol. Each shot of Alcohol in the Vapor Sphere is like 2 or 3 drinks of Alcohol.

The Vapor Sphere could change the way some people choose to enjoy their favorite spirits. Created by a Diabetic for Diabetics, we know that people with Diabetes can now enjoy Alcoholic Beverages, without having to worry about high blood sugar spikes that normally come when drinking Alcohol. 

For people who don't want to get a drunk driving ticket for driving under the influence of Alcohol, or feel hungover after a good Alcohol buzz, the Vapor Sphere could be just what you have been looking for. Get buzzed fast and sober up fast (15-30 minutes on average). Who knows, using the Vapor Sphere instead of drinking Alcohol, may get more drunk drivers off the highways and save lives. 

We are offering people a new and better way to enjoy Alcohol. You now have another option when it comes to enjoying your favorite Alcohol Spirits. If any of the above listed benefits related to the Vapor Sphere sounds good to you, then you owe it to yourself to give the Vapor Sphere a try.



Q: Does the Vapor Sphere create a smoke cloud like a Vapor cigarette? 
A: No, the vapors created in the Vapor Sphere are invisible and do not create a smoke cloud of any kind.

Q: Can I use Beer or Wine with the Vapor Sphere?
A: Beer and Wine will not work with the Vapor Sphere. The Vapor Sphere was designed to only be used with Alcoholic Spirits that is sold to be consumed by drinking and has an Alcohol content that is 70-100 proof. Gin, Scotch, Whisky, Vodka, Bourbon Whiskey, Tequila and other type of Alcohol Spirits work great with the Vapor Sphere. The Alcohol content in Beer and Wine is to low and will not give you the buzz that you get from drinking it.

Q: Can the Alcohol in your blood steam be detected and measured by a breathalyzer after you vaporize Alcohol instead of drinking the Alcohol?
A: Yes, the Alcohol you vaporize is detectable and measured by a breathalyzer because the Alcohol is in your blood steam. The Alcohol enters your blood by way of your lungs instead of entering by way of your digestive tract.

Q: How does Vaporizing Alcohol get you buzzed?
A: The chemical in Alcohol that gets you buzzed is called Ethanol. The heat from the candle releases the Ethanol vapors into the Sphere. When you inhale the vapors into your Lungs, the Ethanol gets into your blood stream without delay.

Q: How long will a shot of Alcohol last when vaporizing the Alcohol with the Vapor Sphere?
A: A shot of Alcohol will release the Ethanol Vapors (the chemical in Alcohol that gets you drunk) for about 40 minutes allowing you to maintain a comfortable Alcohol buzz the entire time the vapors are being released. After 40 minutes you will need to change out the old shot with a new shot.

Q: Is vaporizing Alcohol healthier than drinking Alcohol?
A: I don’t want to mislead you into believing that vaporizing Alcohol instead of drinking Alcohol, somehow makes Alcohol healthy for you to consume. Alcohol is a potentially dangerous addictive drug, especially if used in excess. Alcohol has never been considered healthy or good for you, and I am sure it never will. Just because you don’t suffer from a hangover and it leaves your system faster than drinking Alcohol, vaporizing Alcohol doesn’t magically make Alcohol good for you. To my knowledge there has never been any long term studies that provide any proof that vaporizing Alcohol instead of drinking alcohol is better or worse for you. As consumers we need to assume that vaporizing Alcohol can have serious long term effects on our bodies, just like drinking Alcohol does. So as with any Alcohol intake, enjoy Alcohol in moderation and be responsible.

Q: Why does the Alcohol leave your system fast when vaporizing Alcohol?
A: Because the Alcohol does not metabolize in your digestive tract like drinking Alcohol does, and it gets into your system fast. For this same reason it leaves your system fast. When you are no longer vaporizing the Alcohol, it's not being introduced to you system any more. On average any measurable amount of Alcohol will be out of system with 15-30 minutes after your last vapor hit. All of the blood in your body passes through your Liver every 3 minutes. We can assume that after a few passes through your Liver, the Alcohol has been filtered out of your blood stream. That is as long as you are not introducing more Alcohol into your system.

Q: Can you taste the flavor of the Alcohol when you vaporize it?
A: Yes, you can taste the flavor of the Alcohol when you vaporize it. As a matter of fact the flavor of the Alcohol is much smoother and easier to enjoy when vaporized. There is no harsh taste like when you drink the Alcohol. For the best flavor use high quality great tasting Alcohol.

Q: Why don't you get a hangover when you vaporize Alcohol?
A: The reason we get a hangover after drinking Alcoholic Beverages, is due to the fact that our body has to deal with the impurities (Congeners) that are produced during the distillation process when making Alcoholic beverages. Our body will try to get rid of the impurities through urination and drawing minerals from your body to help in the fight against these impurities. This will leave you dehydrated causing you to have headaches and other symptoms related to a handover. When you inhale Alcohol vapors instead of drinking the Alcohol, you don't ingest these impurities so your body doesn't have to deal with trying to get the impurities out of your system.

Q: Why are there no Calories related to vaporizing Alcohol?
A: Protein, Fat, and Carbohydrates are the only source of calories in food and beverages. Apparently there is no Protein, Fat, or Carbohydrates in the vapors created from vaporizing Alcohol. If there is any calories in vaporized Alcohol, the calories are so few it's very difficult to measure them.

Q: I have seen videos of people on YouTube vaporizing Alcohol with a bicycle pump and an empty two liter Soda Bottle. Does this method work like the Vapor Sphere?
A: There are two ways to vaporize Alcohol. You can used compressed air like a bike pump to release the Vapors, or use a candle or heat source to release the vapors. The only effective way to release the Ethanol Vapors from the Alcohol is to use a heat source like a candle to release the vapors from the Alcoholic Spirits. This is what the Vapor Sphere was designed to do. When you use compressed air (bicycle pump) to release the vapors, it is not a very effective way to release the Ethanol Vapors, and most people get disappointed with the results. Not to mention it's a lot of work just to get one or two hits of Alcohol Vapors.

Q: Some people posted on the internet that vaporizing Alcohol doesn’t get you drunk. Is that true?
A: If not done correctly, vaporizing Alcohol will not give you the desired effect you’re looking for. We tested the Vapor Sphere with product testers and focus groups so they could test the Vapor Sphere before bringing it to the consumer market. We found that most people who don't know how to vaporize Alcohol, inhale the vapors into their Stomach and not their Lungs. Most people make the same mistake the first couple of times they try vaporizing Alcohol. When we drink through a straw, our natural instinct is to inhale the liquid into our stomach and not our Lungs. This makes total sense when drinking. Once you understand that you need to inhale the vapors into your Lungs and not your stomach, you will have no problems getting the effect you’re looking for. I would be willing to bet that the people who posted on the internet that vaporizing Alcohol doesn't get you drunk, were doing it wrong. If you’re looking to get "DRUNK" as in too wasted to care for yourself, then vaping Alcohol is not for you. Vaporizing Alcohol will allow you to get a comfortable Alcohol buzz, but will not allow you to get wasted because the Alcohol leaves your system fast. We had focus group participants check their blood alcohol content with a breathalyzer after using the Vapor Sphere. We found that the average BAC count was .12, and that's one in a half times the legal limit for a DUI in most States. All the focus group participants described their Vapor Sphere buzz as a comfortable or nice Alcohol buzz. See the above video titled "What's It Like to Vaporize Alcohol".

Q: Will using the Vapor Sphere to vaporize Alcohol instead of drinking it make me more likely to suffer from Alcohol Poisoning?
A: Customer safety was a top priority to us when considering bringing the Vapor Sphere to the consumer market. We put the Vapor Sphere to the test with product testers and focus group participants to see if we could get these peoples Blood Alcohol Content to an unsafe level. We tested people of different ages, weight, height, and ethnic backgrounds. We put breathalyzers in their hands and challenged these participants to get there Blood Alcohol Content as high as possible by using the Vapor Sphere. No body tested was able to get there BAC any were close to an unsafe level, no matter how hard they tried. The highest BAC recorded during these test was .25 and within 30 minutes of the test, his BAC dropped to .00. We have found that if you have a functioning normal healthy liver, you will not be able to get your Blood Alcohol Content to an unsafe level using the Vapor Sphere. If you drink Alcohol to excess and then use the Vapor Sphere to get your BAC higher than of course you could suffer from Alcohol Poisoning. We are confident that if you were to use just the Vapor Sphere in the manner it was designed and not drink Alcohol with it, you will not have to worry about your BAC getting too high. DON’T TAKE OUR WORD FOR IT, TRY IT FOR YOURSELF. Buy a breathalyzer and test yourself to see if you can get your BAC to an unsafe level using the Vapor Sphere the way it was designed to be used. We are confident that you will get the same results we did during our testing process.

have headaches and other symptoms related to a handover. When you inhale
Alcohol vapors instead of drinking the Alcohol, you don't ingest these
impurities so your body doesn't have to deal with trying to get the impurities out of your
system.

Q: Why are there no Calories related to vaporizing Alcohol?
A: Protein, Fat, and Carbohydrates are the only source of calories in food and beverages.
Apparently there is no Protein, Fat, or Carbohydrates in the vapors created
from vaporizing Alcohol. If there is any calories in vaporized Alcohol, the
calories are so few it's very difficult to measure them.


Q: I have seen videos of people on YouTube vaporizing Alcohol with a
bicycle pump and an empty two liter Soda Bottle. Does this method work like the
Vapor Sphere?
A: There are two ways to vaporize Alcohol. You can used
compressed air like a bike pump to release the Vapors, or use a candle or heat
source to release the vapors. The only effective way to release the Ethanol Vapors from the Alcohol is to use a heat source
like a candle to release the vapors from the Alcoholic Spirits. This is
what the Vapor Sphere was designed to do. When you use compressed air (bicycle
pump) to release the vapors, it is not a very effective way to release the
Ethanol Vapors, and most people get disappointed with the results. Not to
mention it's a lot of work just to get one or two hits of Alcohol Vapors.


Q: Some people posted on the internet that vaporizing Alcohol
doesn’t get you drunk. Is that true?A: If not done correctly, vaporizing Alcohol will not give
you the desired effect you’re looking for. We tested the Vapor Sphere with
product testers and focus groups so they could test the Vapor Sphere before
bringing it to the consumer market. We found that most people who don't know
how to vaporize Alcohol, inhale the vapors into their Stomach and not their
Lungs. Most people make the same mistake the first couple of times they try
vaporizing Alcohol. When we drink through a straw, our natural instinct is
to inhale the liquid into our stomach and not our Lungs. This makes total sense
when drinking. Once you understand that you need to inhale the vapors into your
Lungs and not your stomach, you will have no problems getting the effect you’re
looking for. I would be willing to bet that the people who posted on the
internet that vaporizing Alcohol doesn't get you drunk, were doing it wrong. If
you’re looking to get "DRUNK" as in too wasted to care for yourself,
then vaping Alcohol is not for you. Vaporizing Alcohol will allow you to get a
comfortable Alcohol buzz, but will not allow you to get wasted because the
Alcohol leaves your system fast. We had focus group participants check their
blood alcohol content with a breathalyzer after using the Vapor Sphere. We found
that the average BAC count was .12, and that's one in a half times the legal
limit for a DUI in most States. All the focus group participants described
their Vapor Sphere buzz as a comfortable or nice Alcohol buzz. See the above
video titled "What's It Like to Vaporize Alcohol".

Q: Will using the Vapor Sphere to vaporize Alcohol instead of
drinking it make me more likely to suffer from Alcohol Poisoning?
A: Customer safety was a top priority to us when considering bringing the
Vapor Sphere to the consumer market. We put the Vapor Sphere to the test with
product testers and focus group participants to see if we could get these peoples
Blood Alcohol Content to an unsafe level. We tested people of different ages,
weight, height, and ethnic backgrounds. We put breathalyzers in their hands and
challenged these participants to get there Blood Alcohol Content as high as
possible by using the Vapor Sphere. No body tested was able to get there BAC any
were close to an unsafe level, no matter how hard they tried. The highest BAC
recorded during these test was .25 and within 30 minutes of the test, his BAC
dropped to .00. We have found that if you have a functioning normal healthy
liver, you will not be able to get your Blood Alcohol Content to an unsafe
level using the Vapor Sphere. If you drink Alcohol to excess and then use the
Vapor Sphere to get your BAC higher than of course you could suffer from
Alcohol Poisoning. We are confident that if you were to use just the Vapor
Sphere in the manner it was designed and not drink Alcohol with it, you will not have to worry about your BAC
getting too high. DON’T TAKE OUR WORD FOR IT, TRY IT FOR YOURSELF. Buy a
breathalyzer and test yourself to see if you can get your BAC to an unsafe
level using the Vapor Sphere the way it was designed to be used. We are
confident that you will get the same results we did during our testing process.

story:
Thank You and Welcome!

Thank you for visiting the S-Tool project page.

We hope you decide to pledge, which you can do at any time on the right-hand side. 

And, if you do, a sincere thank you! 

S-Tool* - is the Smart multi-tool

It is our pleasure to introduce to you our new invention. The idea we focused mainly on the tool has to be small and can be used on your keys, but with a maximum use tools:

  • Bottle opener - beer, plastic bottle
  • Can opener 
  • Screwdriver
  • Box opener
  • Stale Remover
  • Clamshell Buster
  • Letter opener
  • Pill Spliter
  • Scratche
  • Rope saw
  • Tag Popper
  • Coupon/paper Cuter
  • Spanners in inch or mm (depends on your country or request)
  • ¼“ Hex driver

14+ different tools in one S-Tool device on your keys

 

 

 

 

 



Slick enough to be classified a fashion/design tool.

How and what it is made of S-Tool:

is made of stainless steel, waterjet and laser-modified

History:

We have completed the design and structure stage, and our hard samples have been created perfectly. development of best design lasted several weeks.

previous generation prototype


And is FLY SAFE :)


Abou Us:

We are small factory, fully staffed and capable of large distribution. Fulfillment should take approximately 2-4 weeks, and the estimated delivery timeframe is April-May 2014. We will do our very best to ensure that everything goes according to plan and that we meet our promised deadlines!

As soon as we reach the pledged amount, the next step is to place the order with our material supplier and start mass production Each order will then be individually packaged and shipped, and shipping time will vary depending on the destination of the order.

We thank you for your support in helping us bring these unique S-Tool to life!

as a thank you for your support:

Postage: Free worldwide   


*Patent pending

story:
Riven and Mimsy have been together for over ten years now, starting their relationship in Highschool and taking the first step towards marriage on October 3rd 2011 by getting their Domestic Partnership. Now that same-sex marriage is legal in their state, they want to get married for real.

But wait... Where's the pony?

This isn't just any wedding! This is a full on My Little Pony, Lyra and Bon Bon, themed wedding, with Princess Cadance officiating and featuring the musical stylings of many Brony musicians who were featured at Ponystock EFNW'13. In fact, given the number of people involved with EverfreeNW that we have involved in this project, it can almost be counted as an extension of the Elements of Melody: Music of Everfree concert series, a sneak peek into some of the acts you'll see at EOM:MOE'13. Costumes and cosplay are incouraged but not reuired, and since the event is in October we decided to open the costume options up to whatever fandom or style you want. Riven and Mimsy will be attending as Lyra and BonBon, but everyone else can pick whtever they want to be from MLP, Doctor Who, Anime, Games, Steampunk, etc. Anything you want to wear, whoever you want to be, all are welcome!

Featured Artists:

Tarby [http://www.youtube.com/user/TarbyRocks/about]

Donn DeVore [http://www.youtube.com/user/edwardkyomoon/about]

Maesrto Scherzo [http://www.youtube.com/user/TheMaestroScherzo/a...]

DJ Everfree

SaxBrony

COHO [http://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9aYASvGfHwilzz...]

+ More! 

There's a lot of people inside and outside the Brony community helping to put this event together, and here's your chance to get in on the action, too!

The event is OPEN INVITATION and ALL AGES, as long as you can RSVP somewhere and let us know you want to come, you and your friends are more than welcome!

Aside from the music, food will also be provided in the form of a Potluck to save on money, so feel free to bring whatever you feel like munching on, and if you have a special recipe you want to share with everyone, the more the merrier!

Helping out with the wedding also entitles you to special MLP Lyra/Bon swag from Riven's Vagaries, the online store owned by Riven, Mookie, and Mimsy. Showing this swag at any of our future booths at a convention will net you some sweet extras, specially provided for people who were awesome enough to support our wedding, even if you weren't able to come!

Remember! The ONLY way to get this Lyra/Bon design, and perks at our shop FOR LIFE,  is by helping with our wedding. After this, the design will not be publicly available. Get it while you can!

Vector for the Exclusive 'NeverHide' LyraBon by: bronybyexception [http://bronybyexception.deviantart.com/]

Art Commisions Provided by: Mookie of Riven's Vagaries

Wedding Information: https://www.facebook.com/events/122897944531567/

We need: $1500

By helping out with this fundraiser, you'll be helping us to cover the extra monetary costs that our personal household budget can't quite cover:

Venue Costs, Lights/Sounds, Decorations, Food, and any incidentals that could come up. 


Why are we asking for your help?

Everyone we have on staff for the event is currently doing so at bare minimum cost, and most are volunteering their time to make this the best it can be.

Aside from covering the extra bits needed for the things listed above, all extra money will be given to our fabulous staff in return for donating thier free time and effort, and if we make our full goal, we were hoping to drop some money into a charity or two as a sort of pay-it-forward wedding gift.

If we manage to make our full goal, the charities we will donate the overflow to are:

+ Seattle Children's Hospital [http://www.seattlechildrens.org/ways-to-help/do...]

+ The Washington Ferret Rescue & Shelter [http://www.washingtonferret.org/support.htm]

A donation jar will also be present at the event, specifically to raise money for these. 

I can't afford it, but how do I help?

SHARE! SHARE! SHARE!

The more people know, the more that have to opportunity to help!

Even if you can't make it to the event, any small donation helps, and you still get swag!

Even if you have no money to donate, don't underestimate the power of the Share button and Social Media.

story:
We give you Morus Zero - the world’s first countertop tumble dryer equipped with Vacuum+™ dehydration technology which dries clothes in a jiffy whilst consuming less energy. It is designed for any home, and even your boat and RV!

We found that over 50% of tumble dryer users were not satisfied with the drying performance such as dryness and drying time, while more than 40% complained about high energy consumption.

Standard home tumble dryers just take too long to dry even the smallest of wash loads. They take up too much home space and can rack up a fortune in energy bills and even damage fabrics, but with Morus Zero, all of those are a thing of the past.

  • Dry as well as fresh

The built-in UV sterilization effectively eliminates 99.9% of bacteria during the ultrafast drying time. It’s also environmentally friendly since there are no dangerous or toxic chemicals to handle. So not only does Morus Zero keep your clothes dry, but also keeps them clean from any nasty bacteria!

  • Drying clothes just got smarter

The moisture sensor system automatically turns off the device when Morus Zero can no longer detect moisture within the clothes and the drying is finished. Just press “Start”, sit back, relax and let Morus Zero do the rest. It’s that simple.

  • Say goodbye to wrinkles

Unlike the single-motor design of other conventional dryers, Morus Zero has three high-performance motors inside, one of which is used to drive the drum to rotate independently. Our program can precisely control the direction, speed and even acceleration of the tumble. In this way the clothes can be dried evenly and come out with fewer wrinkles.

  • Plug in and go 

The compact design of the Morus Zero makes it an ideal choice for small living spaces, like starter homes, cramped city apartments and even RVs. Basically, you can place it anywhere. It is convenient to install, and there is no ventilation needed, making it easy to get started with the Morus Zero right away. 

  • More emojis are on their way ^_< 

Easily select the drying mode you like. Its clear display will show you all the information you want to know. 

  • Mold problem? No problem!

Its design effectively prevents mold growth in your home. Instead of disposing all the water into the air by ventilation, the detachable water tank collects and stores most of the moisture evaporating from the clothes, and the built-in water level sensor notifies when the tank needs to be emptied.

Morus combines a sleek minimalist design with patented Vacuum+™ dehydration technology changing the way you dry your clothes & giving you more time to enjoy what you do best. Thanks to Vacuum+™ dehydration technology, ultraviolet light and infrared heating, Morus Zero takes your drying experience to a new level. 

Morus BLDC motor provides 20% more power with an even smaller size!

Morus Zero uses a custom-built, high-performance Neodymium magnet brushless motor to drive a pump to create a low-pressure environment which allows water to evaporate at a higher speed.

Its 3.3lb capacity is perfect for your daily change outfits.

Just let Morus Zero keep your clothes dry and fresh everyday! 

While at CES we met some very friendly faces that stopped in awe and wonder by our stall to see the Morus Zero tumble dryer. During the 4 days at CES in Las Vegas, we were more than happy with the reception and received a lot of great feedback from attendees.

We are happy to share that Morus Zero has been awarded in the Red Dot Award: Product Design 2019!

We made two tests on 4 identical L-size long sleeve shirts (three shirts in the first and one shirt in the other)after spin-dry by washing machine. The remaining moisture content of the shirts is 30%-33%.

Morus Zero has two color options - Chalk White and Lava Gray. You can select the color you like.

We are a startup team located in Shenzhen, invested and mentored by Xbotpark and Brizan Capital. With an endless passion for innovation, equipped with years of R&D and production experience in the drone and medical care fields, we are committed to promoting the automation and intelligence of household work, using advanced automation control tools from robotics and related industries to cut steps and reduce the wait time of everyday housework, truly making life happier.  

Crowdfunding Morus Zero is just the first step or our long-term journey of hardware innovation. We are looking forward to receiving not just pre-orders but also your feedback from different aspects to help us perfect our product. We sincerely believe that vacuum drying technology will be the future of drying clothes. With all your support we are sure we can bring a better clothes drying experience to everyone.  

  • Risks and challenges

We have spent more than 24 months making Morus Zero become a reality. After 5 generations of engineering prototypes with plenty of development and testing, we are ready to enter the mass production stage. We are dedicated to delivering the product after all our perfections. However, there could possibly be small changes made to the final product that will be shipped out to you.

We are now working very closely with our manufacturers and also looking to optimize our supply chain to keep the delivery time as we promise. Unexpected delays in production can still be a possibility which may push back our estimated delivery date. We promise we'll update all our backers on at least a monthly basis about whatever progress we have achieved.

story:
This is the easiest bedtime routine for your baby.  Soothing sounds and gentle projections perfectly captivate your child's attention, soothe to calm, and keep them asleep all night long.

 

Our deluxe, fully-featured soother is customizable to suit any family's sleep routine with the Smart Connect™ app.  You can use the app to create a “Sleep Stages” plan, which is a tool to help enhance  your baby’s bedtime routine. Our child development experts at the Fisher-Price Play Lab helped us create this three-step approach to help get your little one down for the night:

STAGE 1 – Captivate – You know that feeling when your baby isn’t quite ready to settle down.  In this stage,  the soother’s enchanting lights & gentle music help grab your little ones’ attention.

STAGE 2 – Soothe – Dimmed lights and softer, slower music help your baby relax.

STAGE 3 – Sleep – Projection is replaced with a gentle night light and calming sounds to help your little one sleep.

This soother gives you and your baby tons of customizable combinations:

 

 

 

What is the benefit of pink noise?  

White noise is a combination of all frequencies across our hearing spectrum at the same volume, so it can be quite harsh. Pink noise is similar, but has a less volume in the higher frequencies.  So it is less fatiguing - especially for long durations.

 

"Fisher-Price is turning to Indiegogo – a popular crowdfunding platform – with the idea of accessing a new distribution channel and communicating directly with parents. It is following a trend in consumer retail companies which is using Indiegogo to introduce new products." - Buffalo Business First

"The soother has been billed as the latest product from the pre-school specialist to feature Fisher-Price Smart Connect technology, meaning parents can control their collection of baby products through smartphones and tablets." - Toy News

Crowdfund Insider

 

 

Here at Fisher-Price™, we listen to our consumers (parents & children!) every day. That's why this Indiegogo campaign is so important to us. What are your bedtime struggles and how will this soother help to ease that routine? What kind of music and lighting effects work to settle your little one down?  We would love your support and we want to hear from you...

The Team here - Designers, Engineers, Marketers, Childhood Development Experts, Musicians and more - can't wait to hear your feedback and we look forward to your support in bringing this cutting-edge new soother to market!

 

Taking care of a brand-new human is a whole lot of work. They’re so cute but why do they cry so much and sleep so little?!  We get it. The Smart Connect™ Deluxe Soother has everything you need to comfort your little bundle.

Fisher-Price™ has more than 80 years of experience creating some of the world’s most beloved children’s products. Our collaborative product development process brings together experts from many fields to create products that can help new families.  We know that sleep helps everyone which is why we created this breakthrough new product.

 

We're always striving to hit the right balance between sophisticated and playful and look forward to feedback on the design and aesthetic of this soother.  We have to work hard to ensure that the lighting is just right and will have many rounds of sample reviews to ensure we get there.  It is a collaborative process for the entire team and Indiegogo - your feedback will be so valuable along our journey.

 

We are working with Indiegogo to get to the heart of what our consumers – and potential consumers – really need from us. What products will make your life easier? What do you expect from us? More than crowdfunding, this campaign is about crowdsourcing ideas and opinions that will help us understand what kinds of products our consumers will really get behind and support.

Our Indiegogo campaign is not about the money. It’s about getting in touch with what our consumers really want and need. It’s about providing amazing experiences for families. As a big company, it can be challenging to really get in touch with a wide range of consumers on a meaningful level, and Indiegogo is helping us do just that.

 

How many sounds and songs does the soother have?
- 5 “captive” songs to help settle baby down
- 5 “soothe” songs to help get baby ready for sleep
- 6 SFX including nature sounds and 2 types of pink noise 

What type of lighting does that soother have?
Our soother has 3 light options:
1. Overhead starlight projection
2. Animal silhouette projection and glowing sides
3. Amber night light

How is the Soother powered?
It plugs into the wall for all-night use – no battery replacement required.

What is the age grade for this product?
Birth +

What devices is the Smart Connect App compatible with?
Apple
- iPhone® (4S, 5, 5C, 5S, 6, 6S, 6 Plus, 6S Plus and SE, 7)
- iPad mini™ (1,2,3 and 4)
- iPad® (3rd gen, 4th gen, Pro, Air, Air 2)
- iPod touch® (5th gen)
Android
- Compatible with most tablets and phones, 2014 and newer, running Android 4.3 (Jelly Bean)

Is the Smart Connect App free?
Yes.  It's on the Apple App Store and Google Play App Store.

 

If you know a family who could really use this soother... Please pass on the word and share the information about the Smart Connect™ Deluxe Soother Indiegogo campaign.  Help us help families have sweet dreams!
story_txt:
This is the easiest bedtime routine for your baby.  Soothing sounds and gentle projections perfectly captivate your child's attention, soothe to calm, and keep them asleep all night long.

 


Our deluxe, fully-featured soother is customizable to suit any family's sleep routine with the Smart Connect™ app.  You can use the app to create a “Sleep Stages” plan, which is a tool to help enhance  your baby’s bedtime routine. Our child development experts at the Fisher-Price Play Lab helped us create this three-step approach to help get your little one down for the night:STAGE 1 – Captivate – You know that feeling when your baby isn’t quite ready to settle down.  In this stage,  the soother’s enchanting lights & gentle music help grab your little ones’ attention.
STAGE 2 – Soothe – Dimmed lights and softer, slower music help your baby relax.
STAGE 3 – Sleep – Projection is replaced with a gentle night light and calming sounds to help your little one sleep.

This soother gives you and your baby tons of customizable combinations:


 


 


 


What is the benefit of pink noise?  
White noise is a combination of all frequencies across our hearing spectrum at the same volume, so it can be quite harsh. Pink noise is similar, but has a less volume in the higher frequencies.  So it is less fatiguing - especially for long durations.





 


"Fisher-Price is turning to Indiegogo – a popular crowdfunding platform – with the idea of accessing a new distribution channel and communicating directly with parents. It is following a trend in consumer retail companies which is using Indiegogo to introduce new products." - Buffalo Business First
"The soother has been billed as the latest product from the pre-school specialist to feature Fisher-Price Smart Connect technology, meaning parents can control their collection of baby products through smartphones and tablets." - Toy News
Crowdfund Insider
 



 

Here at Fisher-Price™, we listen to our consumers (parents & children!) every day. That's why this Indiegogo campaign is so important to us. What are your bedtime struggles and how will this soother help to ease that routine? What kind of music and lighting effects work to settle your little one down?  We would love your support and we want to hear from you...

The Team here - Designers, Engineers, Marketers, Childhood Development Experts, Musicians and more - can't wait to hear your feedback and we look forward to your support in bringing this cutting-edge new soother to market!
 

Taking care of a brand-new human is a whole lot of work. They’re so cute but why do they cry so much and sleep so little?!  We get it. The Smart Connect™ Deluxe Soother has everything you need to comfort your little bundle.
Fisher-Price™ has more than 80 years of experience creating some of the world’s most beloved children’s products. Our collaborative product development process brings together experts from many fields to create products that can help new families.  We know that sleep helps everyone which is why we created this breakthrough new product.

 

We're always striving to hit the right balance between sophisticated and playful and look forward to feedback on the design and aesthetic of this soother.  We have to work hard to ensure that the lighting is just right and will have many rounds of sample reviews to ensure we get there.  It is a collaborative process for the entire team and Indiegogo - your feedback will be so valuable along our journey.
 

We are working with Indiegogo to get to the heart of what our consumers – and potential consumers – really need from us. What products will make your life easier? What do you expect from us? More than crowdfunding, this campaign is about crowdsourcing ideas and opinions that will help us understand what kinds of products our consumers will really get behind and support.
Our Indiegogo campaign is not about the money. It’s about getting in touch with what our consumers really want and need. It’s about providing amazing experiences for families. As a big company, it can be challenging to really get in touch with a wide range of consumers on a meaningful level, and Indiegogo is helping us do just that.
 

How many sounds and songs does the soother have?- 5 “captive” songs to help settle baby down- 5 “soothe” songs to help get baby ready for sleep- 6 SFX including nature sounds and 2 types of pink noise 
What type of lighting does that soother have?Our soother has 3 light options:1. Overhead starlight projection2. Animal silhouette projection and glowing sides3. Amber night light
How is the Soother powered?It plugs into the wall for all-night use – no battery replacement required.
What is the age grade for this product?Birth +
What devices is the Smart Connect App compatible with?Apple- iPhone® (4S, 5, 5C, 5S, 6, 6S, 6 Plus, 6S Plus and SE, 7)- iPad mini™ (1,2,3 and 4)- iPad® (3rd gen, 4th gen, Pro, Air, Air 2)- iPod touch® (5th gen)Android- Compatible with most tablets and phones, 2014 and newer, running Android 4.3 (Jelly Bean)
Is the Smart Connect App free?Yes.  It's on the Apple App Store and Google Play App Store.
 


If you know a family who could really use this soother... Please pass on the word and share the information about the Smart Connect™ Deluxe Soother Indiegogo campaign.  Help us help families have sweet dreams!

story:
Bring home the fabulous CITY LIGHT view!

NITELANDING™ is an evocative lamp, crafted to bring back the moment of looking down at a bustling metropolis city view from your window airplane seat at 30,000 ft in the air. 

Nitelanding lamp is a sophisticated 2-in-1 decorative ART display, featuring famous city maps from around the world. During the day, it gives the visual impression of a detailed 3D city map. At night, the lamp comes to life, illuminating a fabulous city light view.

A look of London City Map in the day & Night

City Art by Day, City Light by Night

 NITELANDING LAMP™ story

We all love to travel and our goal is to run out of pages in our passports. Our story began from one night flight, when we were approaching our destination’s airport for landing. We was captivated by the mesmerizing view of the city skyline with golden lights peppering the city. The warm, ambient glow emanated from buildings, roads, and streetlights, all forming the modern-day city we know so well. 

That’s how the Nitelanding Lamp™ came to be. We created this lamp so that we could pause time and stay in that moment forever. We'd love to share this with the rest of the world, so that they can revisit the happiest memories of their trip with family, friends and love ones.

What is so Unique about NITELANDING LAMP ? 

NITELANDING Lamp is the world's first lamp that let you experience the hybrid nature of showcasing it’s ART in 2 different versions. Giving you the best of both world! Where you able to transform instantaneously to your liking. 

Style your living room during the day & night

Even our friend doze off to the comforts of the ambient surroundings!

CITY by DAY: THE ART OF CITY STREET in 3 Dimensional

"Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication" The style and design of the Nitelanding Lamp carries a minimal clean look, yet accompanied with a touch of modern. 

Each artwork of the city map is crafted with precise clean cut and contours with micro details (some lines as thin as 0.6 mm). We remain all the actual map accuracy (OpenStreetMap data), and restyle the streets, roads and rivers in the form of 3D ART. Our Satin-White finishing of the city street layer resemble a minimal purity of white canvas painting. Each city map is accompanied by the city’s name with its respective time zone (UTC).

A close up look of Satin-White city street details, created the look of white canvas painting in 3D ART.

CITY by NIGHT: GLOWING STREET LIGHT

We created the "Glowing Street Light Effect" (patent pending) to simulate the city night view. By implementing lighting depth illusion on the transparent plexiglass layer (underneath the city street map) to replicate more than a thousand illuminated lighting effect of buildings and street lights.  

The basic theory is when the light travels into the edge of a clear polymer or glass, the light will bounce around inside until it finds a way out at the far edges with the effect of no light being lost (similar to the basis of fiber optics). But an interesting twist happens when the surface between the edges is disrupted. By etching and carving pattern on each surface of the material one by one, we control where the light escapes and create the effect of more than thousand street lamps. 

illuminated lighting effects simulating vibrant building & street lights

TELL YOUR TRAVEL STORY

"Happy times come and go but the memories stay forever" Remember the last trip with your love one? Surprise them with the Nitelanding lamp and enjoy your memorable moment of the happiest time spent together.

Each city you visited has your own unique encounters and experiences, share and inspire others with your own city stories.

Time may flies but our memories on that city last forever

CREATE YOUR IMAGINATION

Not only the Nitelanding lamp is a great gift or display but doubles out as a creative avenue for the young one to explore their imagination. Encourage them to create their own adventure in the big city. Have them spark their imagination with toy planes roaming above the city or the boat gliding through the river.

NITELANDING Lamp - Perfect for miniature figurine hobbyist to collect and go creative with city collection.

Creative builders & hobbyists will love how their iconic landmarks comes to life when placed next to the Nitelanding Lamp. Creating their own mini cities in their favourite space. They may choose to display standing or having it displayed flat on the surface.


LOW HEAT LIGHTING: Safe to touch

LEDs are cool to touch because they generally don't produce heat in the form of IR. We designed the "Glowing Street Light Effect" by having the LEDs conceal along the side of the frame, a similar technique to the edge-light system for light guide panel (ELS-LGP).

With the city street layer placed on top, the heat is placed further from light source making the lamp surface low in heat and safe to touch even for playing.


WHERE DESIGN MEETS ART

With the compact M size, it stand perfectly on the bookshelf

Style your living room with the L size, wall hang or put them in the bigger space


Touch Sensor Dimmer Switch

Take control of your lamp with a smart light dimmer. A simple touch on the logo to turn the lamp ON/OFF. Touch and hold to dim the light up/down. Adjust your city light brightness to your preference with the step-less dimmer. 

With built in smart memory chipset, the lamp intelligently recognized your last brightness when turned OFF. Perfect for your preferred preset brightness to your bed light level before sleep!

Touch & hold to control the brightness level

touch sensor dimmer switch

The feature of the rotatable touch button connector making running of the wire convenient when mounting on walls

Universal power adaptor

Each Nitelanding lamp comes with Universal power adaptor. We will also provide FREE 4 additional changeable plugs attachment consist of US, UK, EU, AU sockets for every set. 

The new locking system makes it easy to change the plug according to the different country electrical socket. Perfect gift for your family and friends who lives in different country!

Attach the interchangeable plug according to your local socket with a simple twist click

AVAILABLE SIZES

NITELANDING Lamp - M size (10”x10”), 25 x 25 x 5 cm

 NITELANDING Lamp - L size (16.5”x12.5”), 42 x 33 x 5 cm

The M size come in perfect square shape, while the L size come in rectangular shape and displays a larger city area

A comparison look of the M & L size during the day and night

Style your room with the wall mounted Nitelanding L size

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?

Each Nitelanding Lamp come with inline touch dimmer button and universal adaptor. We also provide FREE additional 4 plugs (US, UK, EU, AU) for every set. What a perfect gift to send to your friends or family around the world.

AVAILABLE CITIES: Top 30 world's most-visited cities 

Want to know where everyone else is heading for their vacation? Check out our available maps based on the most-visited cities in the world. (Reference from Euromonitor International's city arrivals research, top 100 city destinations 2018). 

We've based on their statistic to create our 30 cities selection. The display area of each map are selected from popular attraction zone and carefully crafted out the best visual lighting effect for each map.

Choose your favourite destination from the list below (The cities are run by alphabet order, not by most-visited ranking)

Amsterdam, Athens, Bangkok, Berlin, Budapest, Cairo, Hong Kong, Istanbul, Kuala Lumpur, Las Vegas, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Miami, Milan, Munich, New York, Orlando, Osaka, Paris, Rome, San Francisco, Seoul, Shanghai, Singapore, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Vienna...

 PS: You can choose your city during the survey stage.

SHIPPING GUIDE

Experience in Logistics and partnering with major shipping provider!
 

We're partnering with major shipping providers (i.e. UPS, DHL). We'll use the most reliable delivery method that's suitable to different countries. All orders will be shipped from Singapore with international tracking. 

For domestic orders (Singapore), we'll be using our local courier partner to deliver your orders island wide.

 ** If you have selected multiple set, the shipping cost per set will be much lesser. Please message us if you want more than 3 sets, we'll calculate the cost for you.

THE TEAM

We’re a group of passionate designers and always dream of creating our very own product that could benefit people from all walks of life. We truly believed with the simple touch of design could make a big impact on society and let them enjoy life to the fullest. NITELANDING™ LAMP is a clean & simple art that contains the spirit of our design. This project is all about helping people travel back to a particular moment in an instant, and relive it all over again. 

Special thanks to our good friends LeayDoDee Studio & Bear House Production for believing in our project and create the amazing photoshoot & video production.

SPREAD THE WORD

Spread the word around and do support our campaign to make this project come true. There is another way for you to contribute to this campaign by sharing our campaign via social media with your friends & families and other people may know. Share our campaign with them through the "share this project" button. Sharing is caring!  

HAVE A QUESTION?

Have a question not answered in the F.A.Q? 

Drop us a private message by clicking "Ask a question"  located below the Campaigner's Name.

Type your message in the field

Ensure you check the 'I am not a robot' box and/or complete the captcha as listed

Click 'Send Message' and see confirmation the message was sent

* The campaign owner will receive an email notification of your message, and can choose to reply to the email thread. By sending this message you'll share your email address and the campaign owner can respond directly via email to your message.

* Please note, Direct Messages have a character count limit of 500 characters.
 

Risks and challenges

NITELANDING LAMP was not created overnight and we’ve gone through countless prototypes of various materials, sizes, proportions. We've spent tremendous amount of time refining the shape and aesthetical design so that you can own a timeless artisan piece. As we believe in the power of design and our experience in design development to reach its finest state. Rest assure that the Nitelanding lamp will be delivered to you the same quality as promise in this campaign.
The only challenge for us is depending on the order quantity of Nitelanding lamp. Despite having a plan in place to ensure a smooth delivery to you, in the event that there is a delay in the manufacturing or shipping, we promise to keep all of our backers updated by completely being transparent all the way throughout the end.

story:
Do you love a Midwife??

My Iife was changed because of a Super Midwife (LINDA BLUE!) My birth experience, like so many of yours was, well, AMAZING!  Since then, I have become a midwife and started making quirky little midwife videos for the American College of Nurse-Midwives Conferences! 

  • ACNM 2011 - San Antonio  "We Need You to Become a Midwife."
  • ACNM 2012- Long Beach "A Midwife Parity"
  • ACNM 2013 & 2014 (no movie - I had to catch my breath)
  • ACNM 2015- D.C.  (shhh....It's a surprise!!!!) and it's AWESOME!

At the end of this year's video, ALL 2000 midwives get a keepsake gift...from YOU!

I need $2,750 to order the gifts

You've just got to trust me on this one! This is purely a creative vision...it just happens to be a tad expensive.  But think of the impact!!!

  • At the end of the conference, June 28th, I'll post the video to YouTube!
  • I'll also post pictures of these Super Midwives getting their gifts, FROM YOU!

The Impact

Midwives work around the clock for you! Whether a midwife eased your fears, guided you through a long labor, used his/her clinical skills to appropriately handle an emergency, cried with you over a miscarriage, or listened to you with compassion at an annual exam, a midwife has been there for you.

  • Take a moment to give just a couple of bucks to show a midwife you appreciate the work he/she has done for you!
  • If just 1,000 consumers gave $2-$5, we'd be able to show these midwives that their clients LOVE THEM with this small keepsake gift!!
  • Help a sister out! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Hug a midwife immediately!
  • Post this to your Face Book Page!
  • Refer a friend to a midwife!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Two left hands? “ Now you can hang a lamp without drilling a hole in your wall “.

No more need for screws or nails as wooll-e is a unique ready to hang lamp.

The wooll-e is a lamp that doesn’t require any tools. Only a power outlet and blank wall space.

Dutch-designed to be quick-‘n- easy. No more drilling holes in your walls. Simply stick the wooll-e discs on your wall and the wooll-e FIX will do the rest!



The wooll-e® is designed as a fun product, that encourages you to be creative.


Change the appearance of your wooll-e lamp by just slipping the specially designed wooll-e sleeve over the lampshade. You can even turn the extra electric cord into a cool feature by arranging it with the wooll-e clip, that fastens in three positions.

Each Dutch-designed wooll-e lamps is handmade in the Netherlands with high quality materials, sourced locally where possible.  Created with input from experts and people around the world, the wooll-e is an artful and practical lamp at an affordable price.


We want to wooll-e the world


We chose conciously for the crowdfunding indiegogo platform to launch the wooll-e, as we know indiegogo by heart contributing to projects we liked to help people's dreams come true. 

We reached a national and international crowd and built a wooll-e community from whoms feedback we'll learn and who helped us take wooll-e into production.  

- This is what some of the earlybirds wrote about the wooll-e, " A clever little lamp inspired by pure dutch design : minimalist, experimental, innovative, quirky, and above all humorous !”, " Got two left hands?Then this crowdfunded no-drilling-needed wall lamp is for you." and  “the solution for many of us who are not allowed to drill a hole (cause you'r renting) or don't want to ruin a wall with another hole in it! ” -

 
Campaign is over but I want to
light my life with wooll-e

You can, just sent us an e-mail and we'll get in touch with you.

What's in the box?

  • 1 felt sleeve of 100% wool
  • 1 double-layered lampshade (15cm)
  • 1 iFix or oFix (depends on your choice)
  • 3 meters electric cord, fitting with integrated on/off switch and plug
  • 1 clip to organize the electric cord 
  • 2 high quality metal discs
  • Extra special tape
  • Clear instructions

Sleeves

6 exciting colour combinations you can choose from.

It’s easy to change the appearance of your wooll-e lamp. We have designed a felt sleeve, handmade of 100% wool in the Netherlands. You simply slip the sleeve over the lampshade. It contrasts nicely with the lampshade and gives you the freedom to create your own look. Just position the sleeve to suit you. On the top, middle or bottom of the lampshade.



Colour combinations for the felt sleeves*

  1. ash grey / royal orange
  2. coal grey / turquoise blue
  3. grass green / lime green
  4. turquoise blue / royal orange
  5. mustard yellow / turquoise blue
  6. hot pink / mustard yellow

Lampshades

The lampshades we use are handmade to our specifications in the Netherlands. Double-layered to give the lampshade the firmness we like. On the outside we use off-white textile and silverish-grey on the inside for that little extra reflection. So even without the sleeve the lampshade can be a shining light on your wall.


FIX

The FIX is a superior magnet sunken into a holder made of nylon granule. The design of the magnet holder gives you a good grip and protects the surface from  damage.  

Inside and outside

the iFIX (i = in) is a loose holder to be placed on the inside of the wooll-e lamp-shade,  hardly visable and is flexibile to position.

 the oFIX (o = out) is a holder to attach on the outside of the wooll-e lamp-shade, visable and quick-‘n-easy for moving it from spot to spot. Both holders are produced exclusively to order.


Electric cord

The wooll-e is provided with 3 meters of electric cord in 4 different colours. A shiny anthracite as base colour to match every wooll-e and 3 vibrant colours to make exciting combinations:luscious green, ice blue and signal orange.

Colours for the electric cord*

  1. shiny anthracite
  2. lucious green
  3. ice blue
  4. signal orange

" For the international wooll-e fans we've a special adapter, so you don't need to change the cool plug! " 


Clip

The clip is designed to organise your electric cord. It can fasten in three positions. Each clip is made in the Netherlands with a 3-D printer using nylon granules. When the printing process is finished, it is polished. This gives the clip a unique look and feel.


Be a good scout

Since your wooll-e comes with 3 meters of electric cord and your power outlet might be within 2 meters, instead of hiding the extra electric cord you can turn it into a cool feature. This way it becomes an integral part of the lamp. We already made some suggestions for you, but be a good scout and invent new ones!


wooll-e® saw the light


The wooll-e concept was succesfully presented from 18th – 20th October 2013 during the ‘Eigen Huis (Ver)Bouwen + Inrichten’ fair in the Utrechtse Jaarbeurs in the Netherlands.


Frequently asked questions!

On our page the most commonly asked questions about the wooll-e lamp and the wooll-e campaign are answered. If your question isn't answered here please contact us.

wooll-e® by readymate 

It was on a late summer day in 2012, over lunch in our favourite coffee bar, that we found our inspiration for the wooll-e concept.

The wooll-e team members are architects Geert Aarssen and Henk ten Kate and conceptor/artist Anne-Marie Ros, all based in Rotterdam in the Netherlands. 

Our designstudio is located in the Schieblock in Rotterdam (NL) and we are only available by appointment if you like to meet us. Just e-mail us and we’ll get in touch with you.

Photo left to right : Henk ten Kate, Anne-Marie Ros and Geert Aarssen.

wooll-e is a readymate product and readymate is a creative platform initiated in 2012 for Dutch-designed, beautiful products to brighten up your domestic settings and work surroundings.

The wooll-e FIX  is a registered concept & design.  © wooll-e 2013
story_txt:
Two left hands? “ Now you can hang a lamp without drilling a hole
in your wall “.

No more need for screws or nails as wooll-e is a unique ready to hang lamp.The wooll-e is a lamp that doesn’t require any tools. Only a power outlet and blank wall space.Dutch-designed to be quick-‘n- easy. No more drilling holes in your walls. Simply stick the wooll-e discs on your wall and the wooll-e FIX will do the rest!


The wooll-e® is designed as a fun
product, that encourages you to be creative. 


Change the appearance of your wooll-e lamp by just slipping the
specially designed wooll-e sleeve over the lampshade. You can even turn the extra electric cord into
a cool feature by arranging it with the wooll-e clip, that fastens in three
positions. 

Each Dutch-designed wooll-e lamps is handmade in the Netherlands with high quality materials, sourced locally where possible.  Created with input from experts and people around the world, the wooll-e is an artful and practical lamp at an affordable price.



We want to wooll-e the world
We chose conciously for the crowdfunding indiegogo platform to launch the wooll-e, as we know indiegogo by heart contributing to projects we liked to help people's dreams come true. We reached a national and international crowd and built a wooll-e community from whoms feedback we'll learn and who helped us take wooll-e into production.  

- This is what some of the earlybirds wrote about the wooll-e, " A clever little lamp inspired by pure dutch design : minimalist,
experimental, innovative, quirky, and above all humorous !”, " Got two
left hands?Then this crowdfunded
no-drilling-needed wall lamp is for you." and  “the solution for many
of us who are not allowed to drill a hole (cause you'r renting) or don't want
to ruin a wall with another hole in it! ” - Campaign is over but I want to light my life with wooll-e

You can, just sent us an e-mail and we'll get in touch with you.

1 iFix or oFix (depends on your choice)


3 meters electric cord, fitting with
