story:
We moved to Indiegogo Market Place and are SHIPPING NOW!!

"A Portable Lamp like no other, with one charge you can take Lucis anywhere and set the mood with many Hours of Full color continuous lighting."

What’s new? We have two unique new models the Lucis Lite™ and the more powerful  Lucis 2.0 Bamboo™ Sustainable powerful mood lamp with handle Indemand on Indiegogo! (450Lumen, 40watt) We are introducing a new full color light program (circles through all colors) next to that Lucis Lite™ is more affordable and has a matte finish with a special water repellent coating. We are fully stocked and in shipping mode!

 

 

Featured on BuzzFeed's coolest products, -- "Lucis will let you play with over 16 million colors and help create the perfect mood for any situation.​"

"...designed to fit into any social setting thanks to its fully customizable settings, Lucis is totally touch-activated without any apps or fancy software." --Digital Trends​

"The interface reminds me of an iPod Shuffle - up/down volume controls, forward/backward to skip tracks, and a single play/pause button. Hardcore geeks may scoff at the simplistic design, but technophobes will appreciate not needing a technician to set it up." --Engineering.com

It's miraculous, enchanting little cube that gives new dimension to my home. You can literally play with Lucis colors. Lucis is perfect for indoor and for outdoor. --Design Plus Mag


 

Indoor or outdoor; you determine the atmosphere. With the wireless and high quality LED lamp you possess all the colors of the rainbow and you can play with them at will. With up to 40 hours of lighting time for Lucis Lite, 80hours for Lucis premium you can take the lamp anywhere.      

    

 

 

 
 
 
 

Lucis hosts more than 16 million colors 

With Lucis we strive to give you the best experience with light possible. The high quality LED lights host over 16 millions different colors. The beautiful designed Plexiglas housing takes the light to another level en fills your space with any color you want easily.

A wireless lamp for just about everywhere

We believe you should be able to determine the atmosphere; whenever and wherever. With only 4 hours of charging, Lucis has 8 to 80 hours of continuous lighting. Already imagine yourself on a warm summer night at the beach? The opportunities are endless, only the sun is the limit.


Smart and flawless design 

The beauty and quality of Lucis does not only come from the inside. We equally spent thought and care on the outside. We wanted to design a lamp with a flush design, without external buttons. The touch and shake sensors work easily and literally give Lucis the finishing touch.

 

Lucis has three extra dedicated light programs. By touching multiple sensors simultaneously you can activate and deactivate the light programs at ease.


Lava
Lucis changes colors from yellow to orange to red in an endless cycle.


Mood light
Lucis endlessly changes from 30% to 100% brightness in any color.


Torch mode
Access the full power of Lucis (bright white light) with just a touch!

Full Color Party mode
Lucis Lite has full color light program (circles through all colors)

 

Talking about finishing touches. How about a beautiful crafted wooden or aluminium base? Lucis is designed to shine on these materials as well.

With the threaded hole you can connect Lucis to our Zebrano wooden tripod which is suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. We challenge you to be creative and use your imagination to connect Lucis to whatever you want! A candle stand or bottle for instance, with our specially designed plug you can do it yourself easily.


 

Our company strives to make beautiful and intuitive consumer products by a high Dutch design standard.

We noticed that high-quality and portable LED lamps either have a very low light output or lack battery time. We are convinced that our smart, innovative and Dutch design will shake up the LED lamp market and set a new standard.

Over the last years we have spent designing Lucis from scratch. We never settled for mediocrity and tweaked the lamp until it met our high standards. Multiple prototypes were produced and tested endlessly. Feedback from experts and friends helped us to make Lucis the best wireless and portable design lamp ever. Now with the end product in our hands, it feels like a dream come true. It has been an incredible year and we are very proud of the outcome.

Our start-up company is based in Amsterdam and founded by us: Lardy and Simon. Designing and producing beautiful products is our passion. 

Our head of design Simon has over ten years of experience designing super sports cars for Spyker:

                                         

 

                                                          

Lardy has many years of experience working together with high-quality production facilities in multiple markets all over the world:
 

                                                          

Watch the interview with the founders of Lucis Lamp:

Risks

This is the 3rd batch of Lucis Lamps which we are currently producing. There are no risks as we have fully financed this production and improved our products to the latest standards. We have taken the following steps to mitigate all other risks. We comply with the latest world wide electronic testing standards.

1. Testing: We have been creating, reshaping and perfectionalizing Lucis ever since the idea was born. We developed seven prototypes which we tested endlessly on start up problems, excessive exposure to water, charging time, burning time, lumen output and practical usability. The injection mould was produced last year and now we are ready to proudly present Lucis and our start-up company to the market.

2. Reliable sourcing and quality control (QC): Besides our experience with sourcing in China, we have our very own sourcing and QC partner in China.
Our partner was born in China and raised in New Zealand and understands both worlds. He has worked in the lighting industry for years. All our products will be inspected according to AQL 2.5/4.0 standards.

3. Certification: Lucis lamp is tested and internationally certified. Lucis complies with rohs/ce/fcc.

4. Transport: In order to make sure you receive Lucis in perfect condition we use carefull packaging and we only work with reliable logistic partners.

Challenges

So having reduced the risks to a bare minimum, the only challenge remaining is to realize our dreams and ambitions and to make Lucis an indispensable item in every living room worldwide!

Product specifications

Q: What are the key features of Lucis? 

A: Lucis is a full color LED lamp and is: wireless, portable, re-chargeable and splash proof (except for the wooden an aluminium lower housings). Lucis has a flush design (no buttons) and can be attached to our wooden tripod or to other items like candle stands and empty bottles. Dimensions of Lucis are: 4,33 x 4,33 x 4,33 inch    (110 x 110 x 110 mm)

                 

Q: What type of plug and voltage does the Lucis adapter have?

A: Lucis is compatible with 220V and 110V. We can provide you with a EU or US plug. Since the plug and voltage conditions vary per country, we recommend that purchasers from other countries make sure they have the right plug adapter and converter needed in their country.

Q: How long do I need to charge Lucis?

A: 4,5 hours

Q: What kind of battery does Lucis have?

A: 8000 mAh (lithium)

Q: How many colors does Lucis have?

A: 16 million colors.

Q: Can I wash Lucis?

A: Yes, carefully, because Lucis is splash proof. Please note that you cannot wash the wooden and aluminium versions.

Q: If I attach Lucis to something that cannot easily be shaken, how do I turn Lucis on and off?

A: You can turn Lucis on and off in two ways. Besides shaking, you can turn Lucis off by touching the dimming sensor for four seconds and on by touching the brightening sensor for four seconds.

Terms and conditions

Q: When will I receive my order?

A: You will receive your order in June 2017. For more details check out our timeline on the campaign page.

Q: Is the delivery of Lucis insured?

A: Yes, your order is guaranteed and all transport is insured. To ensure you will receive Lucis in good condition, we work with reliable and experienced transport companies and we use careful packaging as a way of protection.

Q: What should I do if I’ve bought one Lucis and want to buy one more?

A: Contribute to one more perk. However, in order to receive a discount we recommend you to buy our duo or four pack.

Q: Do I get a discount if I buy more than one Lucis?

A: Yes, you will receive a discount if you buy the duo, four or retail packs.

Q: Will I receive all my orders together?

A: Yes

Q: Is shipping included in the perks?

A: Shipping costs are not included in the perk prices. When you select a perk, and advance to the contribute page, the shipping price is added when you select your country. Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries (only applicable outside US/EU).

Q: Is Lucis available in my country?

A: Yes, we deliver to all countries in which Indiegogo is available, unless your country is an embargoed nation.

Q: Is there a warranty on Lucis?

A: Yes, we provide a one-year warranty. Under normal usage, if malfunction or damage occurs, you can send Lucis back to us and we’ll fix it. Please don’t try to fix Lucis yourself. If you open Lucis, the warranty expires.

Payment

Q: How can I complete my order?

A: After choosing a perk, you will be directed to the payment page. Here you can fill out your shipping and credit card information.

Q: Can you help me with my payment?

A: Yes, if you send an e-mail to info@innovativebrands.eu, we will help you.

Miscellaneous

Q: What does Lucis mean?

A: Lucis comes from lux, the Latin word for light.

story:
Are you guys kidding me?!?! We officially surpassed our goal of $15,000 with 98 of you joining in. Wow! Thank you!

What's next?


You guys are now daring us to dream even BIGGER. This is both empowering and scary.

Here’s our BIG dream: With an additional ~$7,000 we would be able to renovate a studio space that would create a rich community and provide a unified place for Tandem Quilting Co. production.

We are setting a goal for an additional $7,222 to reach $22,222. Why? To celebrate the heart of Tandem which is “two” stories coming together - yours and the makers. 

 

We are Tandem Quilting Co. (formerly Elizabeth Beck Quilts).

Our "makers" are amazingly skilled refugee women.

Quilting is an art, and these women are ready to share your story with a needle, thread, and batting.

 

Together Tandem Quilting Co. and the Makers provide:
 

  • The Highest Attention to Detail & Quality.
  • Well-Paying Employment for Refugee Women.
  • Hope for Refugee Families to Pursue their Dreams.
  • Quilts that Will Last for Decades and Be Passed Down Through Generations.

 

 

Announcing: New Products + Campaign Exclusives

 

Quilted Notecards (NEW)
 

These fold-over cards and matching envelopes are perfect for sending a personal note.  Our makers use a bold stitch for the fabric, which creates a quilted highlight, and a stitch details each envelope. Every card is a one of a kind and comes in a set of four.

Choose from Whimsical, Bold, Holiday, or Modern Holiday themes.

Whimsical:

 

Bold:

 

Holiday:

 

Modern Holiday:

 

Garland (CAMPAIGN EXCLUSIVE)

Have some fun with this 7" garland made from Saris. The silk patterns are full of life, and colorful wood beads separate the tassels. No two garlands are the same.

 

 

Table Runners (CAMPAIGN EXCLUSIVE)

Our makers are exclusively offering table runners in two sizes for the upcoming holidays. You will choose either Thanksgiving or Christmas theme. There are few places community happens more than the dinner table – and we would love to join yours. (Note: Table runners are reversible.)

 

 

Go Blankets & Go Bags (NEW)
 

Go Blankets + Go Bags are going to become one of our favorite products.

We are debuting four patterns for the IndieGoGo campaign (2 canvas and 2 all weather) with a vision that our online store will only continue to grow and offer more. These blankets are always ready for the next epic outing as the matching Go Bags are fashioned with sturdy roping, which makes it easy to grab and “go.” 

Each blanket has a label hand signed by the maker who made it.


Canvas patterns:

 

All-weather print patterns:

 

Quilted Throws (NEW)


You will choose one of three options for your new throw. These beautiful quilts are designed to be a fun throw for the home or picnics. As the throw is finished our makers will sign the label so you never forget the story these quilted throws tell.

 

Patterns from Left to Right: Triangle, Solid Bold Blocks, Patterned Bright Blocks

 

 

Custom T-Shirt Quilts

We are offering our most popular custom T-shirt quilt, both in size and design. Our customers want their stories told for graduations, anniversaries, road races, sports, Greek life, cancer walks, travel, or preserving the memory of a lost loved one.

Capture your story on a beautiful custom quilt!  Each quilt is finished with a cotton back and binding and comes with a custom label you can customize for a special message!  You will also get a 1:1 consultation (face to face if a 60-mile radius of ATL).  (Upgrades are available at the time of consultation.)

 

 

Tandem Experiences (CAMPAIGN EXCLUSIVE)

 

  • Quilting 101 Classes

This class is designed for anyone who wants to be introduced to the world of quilting.  Each student will make a quilt block and learn how to quilt it by hand. 

You will learn skills in measuring, machine sewing, hand quilting, binding & finishing.  Our makers will be on hand to make sure you have personal coaching.  Each class is limited to 6 to ensure a personal touch.  Syrian snacks and coffee will be served.  Each participant will take home their quilt block, a quilting hoop to finish your unique piece of art.  Most importantly, you'll take home a new appreciation for the ageless art of Quilting!  (All supplies will be provided.)

 

  • Syrian Dinner Experience

Our friends who arrived in Clarkston one year ago from Damascus are excellent cooks and have started a catering company called “Suryana Cuisine.” 

An amazing Syrian meal will be prepared and delivered hot for you and your guests. They will serve you and take care of everything throughout the evening while offering up a perfect opportunity to make new friends. 

Learn about life in Syria, the beautiful land, culture, food, and friendships!  Dinner hosts need to be within a 60-mile radius of Atlanta.

All dinner hosts will be gifted an exquisite international fabric table runner and fun fabric garland.  Each guest will leave with a set of 4 quilted notecards and the exclusive IndieGoGo campaign t-shirt!

 

 

How Will Your Support Make a Difference?

 

If we meet our goal, we will be able to:
 

  • Launch a website equipped with eCommerce functionality and process more orders.
     
  • Purchase new sewing machines and supplies to continue our commitment to quality and employe more women who are refugees.
     
  • Import international fabrics that celebrate the stories of our makers.
     
  • Re-brand our mission with a new logo.

 

 

Our makers have lived quite a story already, but every day is a new chapter.

 

We believe in an amazing tomorrow.

 

Your life is a witness to beautiful moments, tragic hurts and a spectrum of emotions. We want to tell your story.

 

 

We are Tandem Quilting Co. Let's "Go Together."
story_txt:
Are you guys kidding me?!?! We officially surpassed our goal of $15,000 with 98 of you joining in. Wow! Thank you!What's next?You guys are now daring us to dream even BIGGER. This is both empowering and scary.Here’s our BIG dream: With an additional ~$7,000 we would be able to renovate a studio space that would create a rich community and provide a unified place for Tandem Quilting Co. production.We are setting a goal for an additional $7,222 to reach $22,222. Why? To celebrate the heart of Tandem which is “two” stories coming together - yours and the makers.  We are Tandem Quilting Co. (formerly Elizabeth Beck Quilts).Our "makers" are amazingly skilled refugee women.Quilting is an art, and these women are ready to share your story with a needle, thread, and batting. Together Tandem Quilting Co. and the Makers provide: 
The Highest Attention to Detail & Quality.
Well-Paying Employment for Refugee Women.
Hope for Refugee Families to Pursue their Dreams.
Quilts that Will Last for Decades and Be Passed Down Through Generations.

story:
A Kitchen Staple Re-imagined 

Any chef will tell you: The most important tool in the kitchen is a knife.  Even in modern kitchens with high-tech equipment, the most ancient tool of all remains mostly unchanged. That doesn't mean there is no room for improvement...

 

 

Introducing BARE knives, a new take on a kitchen staple. While the basics of a great knife still hold, high quality steel, a sharp edge and an comfortable handle, a truly modern knife should face the challenges of its generation. By streamlining the production process and offsetting carbon emissions, we created a knife that is not only the perfect tool, but also is carbon negative.

We spent over a year trying to find the perfect combination of materials and production methods to realise our vision. Our signature mountain pattern brings the beauty of nature back into your kitchen while our hardwood handle ensures perfect grip. And the best thing, a BARE knife doesn't break the bank.

 

Every (Home)Chef Needs One 

A great knife transforms even the most tedious of tasks into something to look forward to, chopping an onion in seconds and preparing a complete salad in minutes. 

The 8-inch chef knife is likely the most versatile tool in your kitchen, whether you're a home cook or Michelin star chef. With this single knife you can cut, dice, slice, mince, and chop anything from fine fish to fresh veggies.  A good sharp knife cuts precise, clean, and saves you precious time.

Cooking is the only way to take back control of what goes into your body. Cooking is essential for a healthy lifestyle. Cooking shouldn't be a chore. It should be a joy! A good sharp knife helps to put the fun back in cooking. 

 

Tested and approved by chefs

We asked ourselves: 'If we could only have a single knife, what would it look like?' To find out if we succeeded in our design challenge we handed our first production samples over to some chefs. We asked them to use the knife as a daily driver for several weeks. Guess what? Our chef's unanimously agreed: BARE knives are restaurant-proof. 

 

What Makes Our Knives So Great?

Check out all the sharp details that go into making a BARE chef knife. Our knife design follows the same approach as our sustainability policy: no compromises. We didn't just want the best knife for the planet. We wanted the best knife on the planet. 

 

Lifetime warranty

We believe in the quality of our knives. We set out to make something sustainable. Something that lasts. To reinforce this we offer a lifetime limited warranty on manufacturing defects.

 

Razor Sharp Value

Our knife goes straight from our hands to yours. It's so simple, we're amazed it's gotten so out of fashion. This way, we get to do what we love and you get incredible value for money. That's what we call fair pricing.  

 

Our revolutionary production method enables us to offer you harder knife that keeps a better edge without the premium other brands demand. A harder steel means you knife is sharper for longer, enabling you to do what you love: Cook!

 

 

The BARE Forging Process

Formed under tremendous pressure. Hardened and sharpened to perfection. A knife built to last.

After the mountain pattern is forged into the steel, the Chef knives are heated to over 800 degrees Celsius, before being rapidly cooled to dramatically increase the hardness of the steel. Each chef’s knife is then sharpened by hand, to a razor sharp edge. A Wenge natural hardwood handle is then fitted to ensure perfect grip even in wet conditions. By reinventing the manufacturing process, we are able to produce an exceptional tool for an amazing price. 

Because the mountain imprint in our chef's knives is only 0.25 millimeters deep you don't have to worry of any food getting stuck in the pattern. Simple wash the knife under a running tap, wipe it dry and the blade is clean as a whistle.

 

Carbon Negative

We believe in responsible production. We compensate all CO2 used to make and ship your knife 10 times over. 

We look at it this way: what if all products you bought had their CO2 compensated 10 times? What if all companies took this clean approach to production? We think the world would soon be a lot cleaner.

In the Indian region of Raichur there is a serious shortage of wood due to deforestation. Moreover, the traditional way of cooking causes a lot of harmful smoke indoors, and women must spend a lot of time gathering wood. Burning wood to cook is also very inefficient and produces a lot of CO2. For every knife, we make a donation to help provide these women with convenient, clean burning stoves. Thereby reducing CO2 emissions and improving their standard of life.

This way, everybody benefits and your funding pledge is Carbon Negative.

 

The Magnet Strip

Once in a while you'll probably want to put the knife down, if only for a moment. Our beautiful hardwood magnet strip will securely hold your knife until you're ready to dice on. The magnet strip measures 45 x 6.5 x 2.5 cm (17.7 x 2.5 x 1 inch). Mounting hardware included!

 

The Rewards

The early bird gets the worm! We offer unique deals to our backers on Indiegogo . We need your help to make BARE Knives a reality!  

 

How We Got Here

Modern production methods such as 3D printing allowed us to experiment with different blade shapes and handle designs. We spent over a year to develop the perfect chef's knife. Hundreds of sketches, CAD models and 3D prints later and the BARE knife is born.  

 

Where We Are

Our tooling is ready. Every part of the knife has been tested and optimized.  Our knives have been tested in restaurants and by dozens of home chefs. We have sorted out our supply chain and packaging design. Our manufacturing partners are ready to rock.

What We Need

To be able to offer our knife to the public for the incredibly competitive price we have set, we need volume. We can only produce the knives affordably when manufacturing in large batches. We need you to help us finance our first large scale production run. We believe we've made a gorgeous and super-functional kitchen tool. And we hope you do so too.

Timeline

Our focus is on rewarding you with the best possible chef knife. We will not ship a single knife until we are confident we have lived up to this promise. We aim to deliver all rewards by November. Our manufacturing partners are convinced this is a realistic goal. However, the current global health crisis has proven to be unpredictable to say the least. We will do our absolute best to deliver you rewards in time, should any unforeseen circumstances impede us in doing so we will keep you updated every step of the way.

 

Return policy. Indiegogo is platform that allows innovators to offer their creations and ideas at discounted prices. These funds go towards initiating production and launching of the product, resulting in a product that the backer can enjoy. In accordance with Indiegogo Terms of Use will not offer refunds or return for items that are not defected. However, in the event that you receive a faulty item, you are welcome to contact us at support@bareknives.com

Global Shipping. We are happy to offer shipping worldwide. The shipping rate to your country will be indicated in the check-out menu when making a pledge for this campaign. Please note that the price of the item does not include additional duty and taxes that may apply as per local laws of importation.

 

Risks and challenges

Our knives have been extensively tested everywhere from restaurants to home kitchens. We have complete confidence in our product and our supply chain.

Production method

Our biggest challenge lies in our production method, the development of anything novel carries risks, the manufacturing technique we use to produce our unique mountain pattern is brand new. When trying to do something new you always run the chance of encountering new problems. We are lucky to have extremely knowledgeable production partners that are up to any challenge.

Covid-19

The world is currently facing a global pandemic. We thought long and hard about postponing our campaign. Our manufacturing partners are operating at 100% and our entire team, while slightly stir-crazy, can't wait to get this product out in the world. We can't deny there is a chance the current health crisis might affect our ability to manufacture and ship your rewards. Therefore, we've allowed for extra time in our production and shipping timeline. We can guarantee we will do our absolute best to ensure each and every backer gets their reward in the least amount of time possible.

If there are any delays or roadblocks down the road, we promise you transparency and regular updates.

Environmental commitments

BARE Knives are designed with the environment in mind. Here you can read some of the steps we take to ensure our knives are as green as can be.

Long-lasting design

Our steel choice is corrosion resistant and can withstand extended use. A Chef's Knife lasts a lifetime. With every knife we include care & maintenance instructions. We designed for aesthetics with durability in mind: something beautiful is less likely to be discarded. Ultimately, these knives can be passed on to the next generation when properly cared for.

Reusability and recyclability

Not only is our steel choice corrosion resistant, it is also magnetic. Meaning it is easily separated from other materials to be recycled. Our steel can be re-smelted and re-used. During this process the handle burns off. This is taken in to account by our carbon compensation. Our packaging contains no plastics.

Sustainable materials

The hardwood handle we use actually absorbs CO2 during its lifetime. The high-grade German steel we use for the blade lasts practically indefinitely and can be easily recycled.

Sustainable distribution

We did a life cycle analysis (LCA) to find out at which stages of the transport most CO2 is produced an most fossil fuels are burned. With this knowledge we optimised the means of transportation to minimise our carbon footprint.

Carbon compensation

We offset all carbon used to produce, pack, and ship our knives. Not only that: we over-compensate all carbon times ten. That means for every 1 kilogram of carbon emission we cause, we offset 10 kilograms of carbon. We like to think of it as cleaning up after ourselves and hope to set an example with this pro-active sustainable approach. Effectively every knife we sell reduces global carbon emissions.

story:
Short Summary

 To celebrate the life and courage of Katelyn Norman this month the Katelyn Norman Childhood Cancer Foundation is teaming up with Indiegogo to raise enough money to start our bucket list campaign.

 The Katelyn Norman Foundations bucket list fund would go towards helping kids with terminal cancer fund their bucket list and help families with traveling costs. You can help us make thousands of children's dreams come true by helping us raise $75,000 for 25,000+ kids.

 Every day children are passing away without being able to achieve their bucket list and we want to give them the opportunity to do so.

 WILL YOU HELP US MAKE A KID'S DREAM COME TRUE?

What We Need!

 In order to make this campaign successful and reach our goal of 25,000+ children we need to raise $75,000. The money raised for this campaign will go towards buying airplane tickets, admissions, room and board, and anything else that is needed to achieve a child's bucket list.
 
 If we do not achieve our goal of $75,000 we will still be taking everything we raise and helping as many kids as we can. Our goal for this campaign is not for personal gain it is to help as many kids as we can and let them know that they are not alone.

The Impact

 There is children all over the world who are fighting cancer and parents who are struggling to pay for medical expenses, and cannot make their child's last wishes come true. That's where The Katelyn Norman Childhood Cancer Foundation's Bucket List Fund will come in. We will do everything possible to make those children smile again.

The Community Kate Touched

A Song Wrote and Dedicated to Kate and Her Bucket List

UT Football Players Walk for Katelyn Norman

Other Ways You Can Help

 A few other ways that you can contribute to our campaign is by raising awareness of childhood cancer and letting these kids know that they are not alone, we are here to help. Please share this on all your social media sites and lets raise awareness together
